tika-vin07t0:347_14: taṃ na yuttaṃ sakavādīparavādīnaṃ ubhinnampi saṅgītittayāruḷhasuttādīnaṃ eva gahetabbato.
tika-vin07t0:347_15: Tathā hi vakkhati “tisso saṅgītiyo āruḷhaṃ pāḷiāgataṃ paññāyati,
tika-vin07t0:347_17: Na hi sakavādī aññanikāyasuttādiṃ pamāṇato gaṇhāti,
tika-vin07t0:347_18: yena tesu suttādīsu dassitesu tattha ṭhātabbaṃ bhaveyya,
tika-vin07t0:347_19: vakkhati ca “paro tassa akappiyabhāvasādhakaṃ suttato bahuṃ kāraṇañca vinicchayañca dasseti…pe…
tika-vin07t0:347_21: Tasmā paravādināpi saṅgītittaye anāruḷhampi anāruḷhamicceva dassīyati,
tika-vin07t0:347_22: kevalaṃ tassa tassa suttādino saṅgītittaye anāgatassa kūṭatā,
tika-vin07t0:347_23: āgatassa ca byañjanacchāyāya aññathā adhippāyayojanā ca viseso.
tika-vin07t0:347_27: tassa viparītatāsandassanatthaṃ tadaññena suttādinā saṃsandanā karīyati.
tika-vin07t0:347_28: Yo pana paravādinā gahito adhippāyo suttantādinā saṃsandati,
tika-vin07t0:347_29: so sakavādināpi attano gāhaṃ vissajjetvā gahetabboti ubhinnampi saṅgītittayāgatameva suttādipamāṇanti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:347_30: Teneva kathāvatthuppakaraṇe sakavāde pañca suttasatāni paravāde pañcāti suttasahassampi adhippāyaggahaṇanānattena saṅgītittayāgatameva gahitaṃ,
tika-vin07t0:348_2: Sutte otāretabbanti yassa suttassa anulomanato idaṃ suttānulomaṃ akāsi, tasmiṃ,
tika-vin07t0:348_3: tadanurūpe vā aññatarasmiṃ sutte attanā gahitaṃ suttānulomaṃ atthato saṃsandanavasena otāretabbaṃ,
tika-vin07t0:348_4: “iminā ca iminā ca kāraṇena imasmiṃ sutte saṃsandatī”ti saṃsanditvā dassetabbanti attho.
tika-vin07t0:348_7: Ācariyavādo sutte otāretabboti yassa suttassa vaṇṇanāvasena ayaṃ ācariyavādo pavatto, tasmiṃ,
tika-vin07t0:348_8: tādise ca aññatarasmiṃ sutte pubbāparaatthasaṃsandanavasena otāretabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:349_0: Yaṃ kiñci kūṭasuttaṃ bāhirakasuttādivacanaṃ na gahetabbanti dassetuṃ suttaṃ suttānulome otāretabbantiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:349_4: paravādīpi suttantiādinā aññepi vādālambanā vuttanayena sakkā ñātunti idha na vuttā.
tika-vin07t0:350_0: Evaṃ suttasuttānulomādimukhena sāmaññato vivādaṃ dassetvā idāni visesato vivādavatthuṃ tabbinicchayamukhena
tika-vin07t0:350_1: suttādīnañca dassetuṃ atha panāyaṃ kappiyantiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:350_2: Sutte ca suttānulome cāti ettha ca-
tika-vin07t0:350_6: Tattha kāraṇanti suttādinayaṃ nissāya attanomatiyā uddhaṭaṃ hetuṃ.
tika-vin07t0:350_9: “akappiya”nti gāhassa ca nimittabhūtaṃ kicchena paṭipādanīyaṃ avibhūtakāraṇaṃ kāraṇacchāyā,
tika-vin07t0:350_18: Atirekakāraṇanti suttādīsu purimaṃ purimaṃ atirekakāraṇaṃ nāma,
tika-vin07t0:351_2: “Suttaṃ nāma sakalaṃ vinayapiṭaka”nti vuttattā puna suttatoti tadatthapaṭipādakaṃ suttābhidhammapāḷivacanaṃ adhippetaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:351_3: Anubyañjanatoti imassa vivaraṇaṃ paripucchato ca aṭṭhakathāto cāti.
tika-vin07t0:351_4: Tattha paripucchāti ācariyassa santikā pāḷiyā atthasavanaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:351_6: Tadubhayampi hi pāḷiṃ anugantvā atthassa byañjanato “anubyañjana”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:351_9: Tattha patiṭṭhānaṃ nāma sañcicca āpattiyā anāpajjanādi hotīti āha “lajjībhāvena patiṭṭhito”ti,
tika-vin07t0:351_11: Vinayadharassa lakkhaṇe vattabbe kiṃ iminā lajjībhāvenāti āha alajjī hītiādi.
tika-vin07t0:351_13: Lābhagarutāyātiādinā vinaye ṭhitatāya abhāve paṭhamalakkhaṇayogo kiccakaro na hoti,
tika-vin07t0:351_14: atha kho akiccakaro anatthakaro evāti dasseti.
tika-vin07t0:352_5: yathā ācariyo ca ācariyācariyo ca pāḷiñca paripucchañca vadanti,
tika-vin07t0:352_7: Na hi ācariyānaṃ nāmamattato paramparājānane payojanamatthi.
tika-vin07t0:353_0: Imehi ca pana tīhi lakkhaṇehīti ettha paṭhamena lakkhaṇena vinayassa suṭṭhu uggahitabhāvo vutto.
tika-vin07t0:353_1: Dutiyenassa lajjībhāvena ceva acalatāya ca patiṭṭhitatā.
tika-vin07t0:353_2: Tatiyena pāḷiaṭṭhakathāsu anurūpena anāgatampi tadanulomato ācariyehi dinnanayato vinicchinituṃ samatthatā.
tika-vin07t0:353_3: Otiṇṇe vatthusminti codanāvasena vītikkamavatthusmiṃ saṅghamajjhe otiṇṇe.
tika-vin07t0:353_4: Codakena cuditakena ca vutte vattabbeti evaṃ otiṇṇe vatthuṃ nissāya codakena “diṭṭhaṃ suta”ntiādinā cuditakena
tika-vin07t0:353_8: Tikadukkaṭanti “anupasampanne upasampannasaññī ujjhāyati vā khīyati vā āpatti dukkaṭassā”tiādinā āgataṃ tikadukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:353_9: Aññataraṃ vā āpattinti “kāle vikālasaññī āpatti dukkaṭassa,
tika-vin07t0:353_10: kāle vematiko āpatti dukkaṭassā”tiādikaṃ dukadukkaṭaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:353_11: Antarāpattinti tasmiṃ tasmiṃ sikkhāpade āgatavatthuvītikkamaṃ vinā aññasmiṃ vatthuvītikkame nidānato
tika-vin07t0:353_13: Idha pana “vatthuṃ oloketī”ti visuṃ gahitattā tadavasesā antarāpattīti gahitā.
tika-vin07t0:353_15: Tattha ḍayhamānaṃ alātaṃ aggikapālādito bahi patitaṃ avijjhātameva paṭiukkhipati,
tika-vin07t0:353_18: Anāpattinti ettha antarantarā vuttā anāpattipi atthi,
tika-vin07t0:354_0: Pārājikāpattīti na tāva vattabbanti idaṃ āpannapuggalena lajjīdhamme ṭhatvā yathābhūtaṃ āvikaraṇepi dubbinicchayaṃ adinnādānādiṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:354_4: Yo pana alajjitāya paṭiññaṃ adatvā vikkhepaṃ karoti,
tika-vin07t0:354_5: tassa āpatti na sakkā oḷārikāpi vinicchinituṃ,
tika-vin07t0:354_15: taṃ karohītiādi sabbaṃ lajjīpesalaṃ kukkuccakameva sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:354_16: Yo yāthāvato pakāsetvā suddhimeva gavesati, tenāpi,
tika-vin07t0:354_17: pārājikosīti na vattabboti anāpattikoṭiyāpi saṅkiyamānattā vuttaṃ,
tika-vin07t0:354_19: Sīlāni sodhetvāti yasmiṃ vītikkame pārājikāsaṅkā vattati,
tika-vin07t0:354_20: tattha pārājikābhāvapakkhaṃ gahetvā desanāvuṭṭhānagāminīnaṃ āpattīnaṃ sodhanavasena sīlāni sodhetvā.
tika-vin07t0:354_23: Kammaṭṭhānaṃ ghaṭiyatīti vippaṭisāramūlakena vikkhepena antarantarā khaṇḍaṃ adassetvā pabandhavasena cittena saṅghaṭiyati.
tika-vin07t0:354_25: Sāpattikassa hi paguṇampi kammaṭṭhānaṃ na suṭṭhu upaṭṭhāti,
tika-vin07t0:354_27: Tassa hi vippaṭisāraninnatāya cittaṃ ekaggaṃ na hoti.
tika-vin07t0:354_28: Ekassa pana vitakkavikkhepādibahulassa suddhasīlassapi cittaṃ na samādhiyati,
tika-vin07t0:354_30: Katapāpamūlakena vippaṭisārenevettha cittassa asamādhiyanaṃ sandhāya “kammaṭṭhānaṃ na ghaṭiyatī”ti vuttaṃ,
tika-vin07t0:354_32: Attanāti cittena karaṇabhūtena puggalo kattā jānāti,
tika-vin07t0:357_2: saddo vattatīti āha “yena vā tena vā yutto”ti.
tika-vin07t0:357_3: Yena tenāti hi padadvayena aniyamato yaṃ-
tika-vin07t0:357_8: Gottavasena yena vā tena vā gottena yathāgotto vā tathāgotto vā hotūti sambandho.
tika-vin07t0:357_10: Atha khoti idaṃ kintūti imasmiṃ atthe.
tika-vin07t0:357_15: esā ariyānaṃ yācanā”ti evaṃ vuttāya, na,
tika-vin07t0:357_24: “Mayaṃ bhikkhū”ti appaṭijānantāpi hi bhikkhuvohāranimittassa liṅgassa gahaṇena ceva bhikkhūnaṃ dinnapaccayabhāgaggahaṇādinā
tika-vin07t0:358_0: “‘Abrahmacārī brahmacāripaṭiñño’ti aññe brahmacārino sunivatthe supārute sumbhakapattadhare gāmanigamajanapadarājadhānīsu
tika-vin07t0:358_1: piṇḍāya caritvā jīvikaṃ kappente disvā sayampi tādisena ākārena tathā paṭipajjanato ‘ahaṃ brahmacārī’ti
tika-vin07t0:358_3: ‘Ahaṃ bhikkhū’ti vatvā uposathaggādīni pavisanto pana brahmacāripaṭiñño hotiyeva,
tika-vin07t0:359_0: Tasmā evarūpehi paṭiññāya bhikkhūhi gotrabhupariyosānehi saddhiṃ sambhogaparibhogo na vaṭṭati,
tika-vin07t0:359_2: Sañcicca āpattiāpajjanādialajjīlakkhaṇaṃ pana ukkaṭṭhānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ vasena vuttaṃ sāmaṇerādīnampi alajjīvohāradassanato.
tika-vin07t0:359_5: Dussīlā liṅgaggahaṇato paṭṭhāya yathāvihitapaṭipattiyā abhāvato ekantā lajjinova mahāsaṅghikādinikāyantarikā viya,
tika-vin07t0:359_10: tesañca bhikkhusaṅghasaññāya dinnaṃ saṅghe dinnaṃ nāma hoti.
tika-vin07t0:360_2: tesu dussīlesu saṅghaṃ uddissa dānaṃ dassanti,
tika-vin07t0:361_0: Bhagavato saṅghaṃ uddissa dinnattā dakkhiṇā asaṅkhyeyyā appameyyā jātā.
tika-vin07t0:361_2: tesu saṅghaṃ uddissāti gotrabhūnaṃ paṭiggāhakattena parāmaṭṭhattā,
tika-vin07t0:361_3: itarathā “yesu kesuci gahaṭṭhesu vā pabbajitesu vā saṅghaṃ uddissā”ti vattabbatāpasaṅgato,
tika-vin07t0:361_6: Tasmā gotrabhūnampi abhāve saṅghaṃ uddissa dānaṃ natthi,
tika-vin07t0:361_7: heṭṭhimakoṭiyā tesupi dinnā saṅghagatā dakkhiṇā asaṅkhyeyyā,
tika-vin07t0:361_8: na tato paraṃ sijjhatīti tepi paṭiññāya bhikkhu evāti gahetabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:362_3: Saṃsāre bhayaikkhaka tassa bhayassa sabbaso vināsanatthaṃ tisaraṇaṃ,
tika-vin07t0:362_4: sāsanaṃ vā ehi manasā “tāṇaṃ leṇa”nti pavisa upagaccha.
tika-vin07t0:362_5: Upagantvāpi cara brahmacariyanti sāsanabrahmacariyaṃ maggabrahmacariyañca carassu.
tika-vin07t0:363_9: Paccupaṭṭhitaṃ bhavissatīti therādiupasaṅkamanato puretarameva tesu yaṃnūna me hirottappaṃ upaṭṭhitaṃ bhavissatīti attho.
tika-vin07t0:363_11: Aṭṭhiṃ katvāti attānaṃ tena dhammena aṭṭhikaṃ katvā,
tika-vin07t0:363_12: taṃ vā dhammaṃ “esa me attho”ti atthaṃ katvā.
tika-vin07t0:363_15: sikkhitabbanti ñāṇasotañca pasādasotañca odahitvā “dhammaṃ sakkaccameva suṇissāmī”ti evameva tayā sikkhitabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:363_16: Sātasahagatā ca me kāyagatāsatīti asubhesu ceva ānāpāne ca paṭhamajjhānavasena sukhasampayuttakāyagatāsati.
tika-vin07t0:363_18: ayameva therassa pabbajjā ca upasampadā ca ahosi.
tika-vin07t0:364_2: Imeti saññāsīsena niddiṭṭhā ime dve jhānadhammā.
tika-vin07t0:365_2: tassa ṭhānassa arahaṃ anucchavikanti vatthudosādivinimuttakammaṃ “ṭhānāraha”nti vuttaṃ vatthādidosayuttassa kammassa sabhāvato kammavācārahattābhāvā.
tika-vin07t0:365_3: Atha vā ṭhānanti nibbānappattihetuto sikkhattayasaṅgahaṃ sāsanaṃ vuccati,
tika-vin07t0:365_5: Yathāvihitalakkhaṇena hi kammena upasampannova sakalaṃ sāsanaṃ samādāya paripūretumarahati.
tika-vin07t0:365_6: Tasmā parisuddhakammavācāpariyosānaṃ sabbaṃ saṅghakiccaṃ ṭhānārahaṃ nāma,
tika-vin07t0:365_9: Ayaṃ imasmiṃ attheti ñatticatutthakammena upasampannasseva sabbasikkhāpadesu vuttattā kiñcāpi ehibhikkhūpasampadādīhi
tika-vin07t0:365_10: upasampannānaṃ suddhasattānaṃ paṇṇattivajjasikkhāpadavītikkamepi abhabbatā vā dosābhāvo vā saddato paññāyati,
tika-vin07t0:365_12: lokavajjesupi vā surāpānādilahukesu magguppattito pubbe asañciccādinā āpattiāpajjanaṃ sijjhatiyeva.
tika-vin07t0:365_13: Tathā hi “dve puggalā abhabbā āpattiṃ āpajjituṃ buddhā ca paccekabuddhā ca.
tika-vin07t0:365_14: Dve puggalā bhabbā āpattiṃ āpajjituṃ bhikkhū ca bhikkhuniyo cā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:365_15: Ñatticatutthena kammena upasampannoti idaṃ pana sabbasikkhāpadavītikkamārahe sabbakālike ca bhikkhū gahetvā yebhuyyavasena vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:367_0: Vivaṭṭūpanissayā sīlādayo lokiyehi abhivisiṭṭhattā adhisīlādivohārena vuttāti dassetuṃ katamaṃ panātiādi āraddhaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:367_1: Tattha pañcaṅgadasaṅgasīlanti abuddhuppādakāle sīlaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ tassa vivaṭṭūpanissayattābhāvā.
tika-vin07t0:367_2: Yaṃ pana buddhuppāde ratanattayaguṇaṃ tathato ñatvā sāsane suniviṭṭhasaddhāhi upāsakopāsikāhi ceva sāmaṇerasikkhamānāhi
tika-vin07t0:367_5: Vipassanāmagguppattinimittatāya hi pātimokkhasaṃvarasīlaṃ lokiyānaṃ sīlehi adhisīlaṃ jātaṃ adhicittaṃ viya.
tika-vin07t0:367_6: Na hi vipassanāmagganimittataṃ muñcitvā lokiyacittato adhicittassa añño koci viseso upalabbhati,
tika-vin07t0:367_9: taṃdosamūlaviddhaṃsanasamatthāya sīlacittabalopatthaddhāya vipassanāya ukkaṃseneva tassa saṃsāravaṭṭassa vigamañca,
tika-vin07t0:367_11: yāthāvato ñatvā paṭipannena samādāya sikkhitabbatāya vivaṭṭūpanissayaṃ jātaṃ,
tika-vin07t0:367_13: tañca vivaṭṭūpanissayattaṃ yadi sāsane pañcasīlādissāpi samānaṃ,
tika-vin07t0:367_15: Pañcasīlādimatte ṭhitānañhi anāthapiṇḍikādīnaṃ gahaṭṭhānampi maggo uppajjati.
tika-vin07t0:367_16: Na hi adhisīlādhicittaṃ vinā magguppatti hoti,
tika-vin07t0:367_17: tañca kiñcāpi kesañci anupanissayatāya tasmiṃ attabhāve magguppattiyā hetu na hoti,
tika-vin07t0:367_18: tathāpi bhavantare avassaṃ hotevāti adhisīlameva kālaṃ karontānaṃ kalyāṇaputhujjanānaṃ pātimokkhasaṃvarasīlaṃ viya,
tika-vin07t0:367_20: Vivaṭṭaṃ patthetvā rakkhiyamānampi pañcasīlādi buddhuppādeyeva pavattati.
tika-vin07t0:367_21: Na hi taṃ paññattintiādi pana ukkaṭṭhavasena sabbaṃ pātimokkhaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:367_23: Buddhāyeva vinaye pārājikasuttavibhaṅgādīsu āgatavasena sabbaso kāyavacīdvāresu magguppattiyā vibandhakaajjhācārasotaṃ
tika-vin07t0:367_24: vicchinditvā magguppattiyā padaṭṭhānabhāvena paññapetuṃ sakkonti, na aññe.
tika-vin07t0:368_0: Lokiyaaṭṭhasamāpatticittānīti sāsanasabhāvaṃ ajānantehi lokiyajanehi samāpajjitabbāni aṭṭha rūpārūpajjhānasampayuttacittāni sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:368_5: evaṃ kāmāvacarāni pana aṭṭha kusalacittānīti etthāpi lokiyavisesanaṃ kātabbameva.
tika-vin07t0:368_8: Evañca abuddhuppādepi sāsanasabhāvaṃ jānantānaṃ paccekabuddhādīnampi sīlacittānaṃ adhisīlādhicittatā samatthitā hoti.
tika-vin07t0:368_9: Na vinā buddhuppādāti idaṃ pana aññesaṃ abhisamayahetubhāvena paccekabuddhabodhisattādīnaṃ desanāsāmatthiyābhāvato vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:368_10: Āyatiṃ vāsanāhetuṃ pana sīlacittaṃ tepi desentiyeva,
tika-vin07t0:368_11: tañca maggahetutāya adhisīlādhicittampi hontaṃ appakatāya vipphārikatābāhujaññattābhāvena abbohārikanti
tika-vin07t0:368_14: upari adhipaññāniddese ca maggaphalasampayuttaadhicittaadhipaññānameva paṭikkhepato lokiyādhicittādhipaññānaṃ idha adhippetatā,
tika-vin07t0:368_15: taṃ dvayaṃ samāpannassāpi methunadhammasamāpajjanasabhāvo ca viññāyati,
tika-vin07t0:368_17: ayaṃ imasmiṃ atthe adhippetā sikkhā”ti vuttattā lokiyāpi adhicittādhipaññā anadhippetāti viññāyati.
tika-vin07t0:368_19: “methunaṃ dhammaṃ paṭisevissāmī”ti citte uppannamatte lokiyaṃ adhicittaṃ adhipaññā ca parihāyati,
tika-vin07t0:368_20: adhisīlaṃ pana cittuppādamattena na parihāyatīti pāḷiyaṃ adhisīlasikkhāva vuttā.
tika-vin07t0:368_21: Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana paṭiladdhalokuttaramaggassa bhikkhuno “methunaṃ paṭisevissāmī”ti cittampi na uppajjati sabbaso akuppadhammattā,
tika-vin07t0:368_22: puthujjanānaṃ samāpattilābhīnampi kenaci kāraṇena uppajjati kuppadhammattāti imaṃ visesaṃ dassetuṃ “na
tika-vin07t0:369_0: Atthi dinnanti ettha dinnanti dānacetanā adhippetā,
tika-vin07t0:369_2: Esa nayo atthi yiṭṭhanti etthāpi. Ādi-
tika-vin07t0:369_8: sabbepi vā akusalā dhammā anatthuppādanato na sakaṃ kammaṃ nāma,
tika-vin07t0:369_10: tadubhayampi vā kusalākusalaṃ kammassakomhītiādivacanato sati saṃsārappavattiyaṃ adhimuccanaṭṭhena sattānaṃ
tika-vin07t0:369_11: sakanti evaṃ kammassakatāya sakabhāve attano santakatāya uppajjanakañāṇaṃ kammassakataññāṇaṃ,
tika-vin07t0:369_13: Sāsananissitā pana sabbāpi vaṭṭagāminikusalapaññā kammassakataññāṇe paviṭṭhā.
tika-vin07t0:369_14: Sāsananissitā hi vivaṭṭagāminī sabbāpi paññā “saccānulomikañāṇa”nti vuccati.
tika-vin07t0:369_15: Sā eva ca adhipaññā tadavasesaṃ sabbaṃ kammassakataññāṇanti veditabbaṃ,
tika-vin07t0:369_16: teneva bhagavā “kammassakataññāṇaṃ saccānulomikañāṇaṃ maggasamaṅgissa ñāṇaṃ phalasamaṅgissa ñāṇa”nti sabbampi ñāṇacatukkeyeva saṅgahesi.
tika-vin07t0:369_17: Tilakkhaṇākāraparicchedakaṃ pana vipassanāñāṇanti idaṃ pana maggassa āsannapaccayatāya ukkaṭṭhavasena vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:369_18: Taditarāsañhi ratanattayānussaraṇādipaññānampi maggahetutāya adhipaññatā samānāvāti gahetabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:372_0: Dubbalye āvikateti yaṃnūnāhaṃ buddhaṃ paccakkheyyantiādinā dubbalabhāve pakāsite.
tika-vin07t0:372_2: Dirattatirattanti ettha yathā antarantarā sahaseyyāvasena tirattaṃ aggahetvā nirantarameva tisso rattiyo
tika-vin07t0:372_3: anupasampannena saddhiṃ sahaseyyāya aruṇuṭṭhāpanavasena tirattaggahaṇatthaṃ “dirattatiratta”nti abyavadhānena
tika-vin07t0:372_5: evamidhāpi dubbalyaṃ anāvikatvāti imassāpi gahaṇassa payojanamatthevāti dassetuṃ yasmā vā sikkhāpaccakkhānassātiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:373_0: Idāni dubbalyaṃ anāvikatvāti imassa purimapadasseva vivaraṇabhāvaṃ vināpi visuṃ atthasabbhāvaṃ dassetuṃ apicātiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:373_1: Visesāvisesanti ettha yena vākyena dubbalyāvikammameva hoti,
tika-vin07t0:373_12: anabhiratiyā vaje niruddhagogaṇo viya gamanamaggaṃ gavesanto puggalo ukkaṇṭho hoti,
tika-vin07t0:373_14: Anabhiratiṃ itotipi ukkaṇṭhitoti atthaṃ dassento āha –
tika-vin07t0:373_16: Sā ca ukkaṇṭhatā vikkhepenevāti vikkhittotiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:374_1: Bhāvavikappākārenāti bhikkhubhāvato cavitvā yaṃ yaṃ gihiādibhāvaṃ pattukāmo “ahaṃ assa”nti attano bhavanaṃ vikappeti,
tika-vin07t0:375_1: Pāḷiyaṃ yadi panāhanti ahaṃ yadi buddhaṃ paccakkheyyaṃ,
tika-vin07t0:375_4: “Hoti me buddhaṃ paccakkheyya”nti mama cittaṃ uppajjatīti vadati.
tika-vin07t0:376_1: Na ramāmīti pabbajjāya dukkhabahulatāya sukhābhāvaṃ dasseti.
tika-vin07t0:376_2: Nābhiramāmīti pabbajjāya vijjamānepi anavajjasukhe attano abhiratiabhāvaṃ dasseti.
tika-vin07t0:377_1: Teneva vacībhedenāti vacībhedaṃ katvāpi aññena kāyappayogena viññāpanaṃ nivatteti.
tika-vin07t0:377_2: Ayaṃ sāsanaṃ jahitukāmotiādinā bhāsākosallābhāvena sabbaso padatthāvabodhābhāvepi “ayaṃ attano pabbajitabhāvaṃ
tika-vin07t0:377_3: jahitukāmo imaṃ vākyabhedaṃ karotī”ti ettakaṃ adhippetatthamattaṃ cepi so tāva jānāti,
tika-vin07t0:377_8: Khettameva otiṇṇanti sikkhāpaccakkhānassa ruhanaṭṭhānabhūtaṃ khettameva otiṇṇaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:378_5: Niyamitāniyamitavasena vijānanabhedaṃ dassetumāha yadi ayameva jānātūtiādi.
tika-vin07t0:378_6: Ayañca vibhāgo vadati viññāpetīti ettha yassa vadati,
tika-vin07t0:378_7: tasseva vijānanaṃ adhippetanti iminā vuttanayena laddhoti daṭṭhabbaṃ,
tika-vin07t0:378_8: na hettha ekassa vadati aññassa viññāpetīti ayamattho sambhavati.
tika-vin07t0:378_9: “Tesu ekasmiṃ jānantepī”ti vuttattā “dveyeva jānantu eko mā jānātū”ti evaṃ dvinnampi janānaṃ niyametvā
tika-vin07t0:378_10: ārocitepi tesu ekasmimpi jānante paccakkhānaṃ hotiyevāti gahetabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:378_13: idha pana adhippāyamattajānanenāpi samayaññū nāma hoti,
tika-vin07t0:378_15: Tasmā buddhaṃ paccakkhāmītiādikhettapadānaṃ sabbaso atthaṃ ñatvāpi sace “bhikkhubhāvato cavitukāmatāya esa vadatī”ti adhippāyaṃ na jānāti,
tika-vin07t0:378_17: Atthaṃ pana ajānitvāpi “ukkaṇṭhito vadatī”ti taṃ jānāti,
tika-vin07t0:379_2: Upāligāthāsūti upālisutte upāligahapatinā dhīrassa vigatamohassātiādinā vuttagāthāsu.
tika-vin07t0:379_10: Tasmā svākkhātaṃ paccakkhāmītiādinā vutteyeva vevacanena paccakkhānaṃ nāma hoti. Dhamma-
tika-vin07t0:379_11: saddena saha yojetvā vutte pana yathārutavasena paccakkhānanti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:379_13: Kusalaṃ dhammantiādīnipi kusalā dhammā akusalā dhammātiādidhammameva sandhāya vuttanāmāni,
tika-vin07t0:380_1: Ācariyavevacanesu yo upajjhaṃ adatvā ācariyova hutvā pabbājesi,
tika-vin07t0:380_11: Asucisaṅkassarasamācāroti asuci hutvā “mayā kataṃ pare jānanti nu kho,
tika-vin07t0:380_13: “asukena nu kho idaṃ kata”nti parehi ca saṅkāya saritabbena anussaritabbena samācārena yutto.
tika-vin07t0:381_6: Garumedhassāti ārammaṇesu lahuppavattiyā abhāvato dandhagatikatāya garupaññassa,
tika-vin07t0:382_0: Idānettha sikkhāpaccakkhānavārassa pāḷiyaṃ aṭṭhakathāyañca vuttanayānaṃ sampiṇḍanatthavasena evaṃ vinicchayo veditabbo –
tika-vin07t0:382_1: tattha hi sāmaññā cavitukāmotiādīhi padehi cittaniyamaṃ dasseti.
tika-vin07t0:382_10: ummattako sikkhaṃ paccakkhāti ummattakassa santiketiādīhi puggalaniyamaṃ,
tika-vin07t0:382_11: so ca nappaṭivijānātītiādīhi vijānananiyamābhāvena paccakkhānābhāvaṃ dasseti,
tika-vin07t0:382_14: aviññussa sāveti viññussa na sāvetīti etehi yaṃ puggalaṃ uddissa sāveti,
tika-vin07t0:382_17: Sabbaso vā pana na sāveti appaccakkhātā hoti sikkhāti idaṃ pana cittādiniyameneva sikkhāpaccakkhānaṃ hoti,
tika-vin07t0:382_19: Tasmā cittakhettakālapayogapuggalavijānanavasena sikkhāya paccakkhānaṃ ñatvā tadabhāvena appaccakkhānaṃ veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:383_2: na davā vā ravā vā bhaṇantassa.
tika-vin07t0:383_5: Tathā buddhaṃ paccakkhāmītiādinā vuttānaṃ buddhādīnaṃ sabrahmacāripariyosānānaṃ catuddasannañceva gihīti
tika-vin07t0:383_6: maṃ dhārehītiādinā vuttānaṃ gihiādīnaṃ asakyaputtiyapariyosānānaṃ aṭṭhannañcāti imesaṃ dvāvīsatiyā khettapadānaṃ
tika-vin07t0:383_7: yassa kassaci savevacanassa vasena tesu yaṃ kiñci vattukāmassa yaṃ kiñci vadatopi sikkhāpaccakkhānaṃ hoti.
tika-vin07t0:383_10: Tattha yadetaṃ “paccakkhāmīti ca maṃ dhārehīti cā”ti vuttaṃ vattamānakālavacanaṃ,
tika-vin07t0:383_14: sumuttāhaṃ buddhenā”tiādinā nayena ākhyātavasena kālaṃ anāmasitvā purimehi cuddasahi padehi saddhiṃ yojetvā vuttāni alaṃ metiādīni cattāri padāni,
tika-vin07t0:383_15: tesaṃyeva ca savevacanānaṃ vasena paccakkhānaṃ hoti,
tika-vin07t0:383_21: Evaṃ vattamānakālavasena ceva anāmaṭṭhakālavasena ca paccakkhānaṃ hoti,
tika-vin07t0:383_24: tattha buddhaṃ paccakkhāmītiādinā nayena yāya kāyaci bhāsāya vacībhedaṃ katvā vācasikapayogeneva paccakkhānaṃ hoti,
tika-vin07t0:383_25: na akkharalikhanaṃ vā hatthamuddādidassanaṃ vā kāyapayogaṃ karontassa.
tika-vin07t0:384_0: Puggalo pana duvidho yo ca paccakkhāti,
tika-vin07t0:384_3: so sace ummattakakhittacittavedanaṭṭānaṃ aññataro na hoti,
tika-vin07t0:384_6: na ca ummattakādīnaṃ aññataro sammukhībhūto ca,
tika-vin07t0:384_8: Na hi asammukhībhūtassa dūtena vā paṇṇena vā ārocanaṃ ruhati.
tika-vin07t0:384_12: Tattha yassa yesaṃ vā niyametvā imassa imesaṃ vā ārocemīti vadati,
tika-vin07t0:384_13: sace te yathā pakatiyā loke manussā vacanaṃ sutvā āvajjanasamaye jānanti,
tika-vin07t0:384_15: “gihibhāvaṃ patthayatī”ti vā yena kenaci ākārena manussajātiko vacanatthaṃ jānāti,
tika-vin07t0:384_17: Atha aparabhāge “kiṃ iminā vutta”nti cintetvā jānanti,
tika-vin07t0:384_20: Aniyametvā ārocentassa pana sace vuttanayena yo koci manussajātiko vacanatthaṃ jānāti,
tika-vin07t0:384_24: Iti imesaṃ vuttappakārānaṃ cittādīnaṃ vaseneva sikkhāpaccakkhānaṃ hoti,
tika-vin07t0:387_3: evaṃ dassanādiduṭṭhulladhammaparivārattāpi duṭṭhullanti dassetuṃ yasmātiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:387_8: Idañca yebhuyyato vuttaṃ ubhosu aññatarassa rāgābhāvepi itarassa methunasevanasaṃsiddhito. Methuna-
tika-vin07t0:387_10: methunaṃ yugaḷaṃ yamakaṃ ubhayanti hi atthato ekaṃ,
tika-vin07t0:387_18: Allokāseti sabhāvena pihitassa nimittassa pakativātena asamphuṭṭhe tintappadese.
tika-vin07t0:387_19: Tādiso padeso sacepi kenaci vātādivikārena sukkhati,
tika-vin07t0:388_0: Vemajjhanti yathā cattāri passāni aphusanto paveseti,
tika-vin07t0:388_2: Purisanimitte pana majjhanti aggakoṭiṃ sandhāya vadati.
tika-vin07t0:388_3: Uparīti majjhimapabbena samiñjitvā pavesiyamānassa aṅgajātassa samiñjitaṅguliyā majjhimapabbapiṭṭhisadisaaggakoṭiyeva.
tika-vin07t0:388_4: Heṭṭhā pavesentoti itthinimittassa heṭṭhābhāgena chupiyamānaṃ pavesento,
tika-vin07t0:388_5: yathā itthinimittassa allokāsaṃ heṭṭhimatalaṃ tilabījamattampi attano nimittena chupati,
tika-vin07t0:388_12: Katthaci acchupantaṃ pavesetvā ākāsagatameva nīharantassa natthi pārājikaṃ,
tika-vin07t0:388_14: Majjheneva chupantaṃ pavesentoti aggakoṭiyā chupantaṃ pavesento.
tika-vin07t0:388_15: Majjhimapabbapiṭṭhiyā saṅkocetvāti nimittaṃ attano majjhimapabbapiṭṭhiyā samiñjitvā uparibhāgena chupantaṃ pavesentopi. Kiṃ viya?
tika-vin07t0:388_17: Atha vā majjhimapabbapiṭṭhiyā samiñjitaṅguli viyāti sambandho,
tika-vin07t0:388_18: samiñjitaṅguliṃ vā majjhimapabbapiṭṭhiyā pavesento viyātipi yojetabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:389_0: Idāni purisanimittassa heṭṭhā vuttesu chasu “uparī”ti vuttassa chaṭṭhassa ṭhānassa vasena visuṃ cattāri
tika-vin07t0:389_1: passāni gahetvā purisanimitte dasaṭṭhānabhedaṃ dassento tatthātiādimāha.
tika-vin07t0:389_2: Heṭṭhā pana agahitaggahaṇavasena cha ṭhānāni vuttāni.
tika-vin07t0:389_4: Cammakhīlanti eḷakādīnaṃ gīvāya viya nimitte jātaṃ cammaṅkuraṃ,
tika-vin07t0:389_6: “Upahatakāyappasāda”nti avatvā naṭṭhakāyappasādanti vacanena upādinnabhāve sati kenaci paccayena upahatepi
tika-vin07t0:389_8: Itthinimittassa pana naṭṭhepi upādinnabhāve sati matasarīre viya pārājikakkhettatā na vijahatīti veditabbā.
tika-vin07t0:389_9: Methunassādenāti idaṃ kāyasaṃsaggarāge sati saṅghādiseso hotīti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:390_0: Mukhaṃ apidhāyāti pamādena samuppannampi hāsaṃ bījaniyā paṭicchādanampi akatvā nisīdanaṃ agāravanti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:390_2: bījaniyā mukhaṃ paṭicchādetvā hasamānena na nisīditabbanti attho.
tika-vin07t0:392_0: Pārājikavatthubhūtāti yesaṃ tīsu maggesu tilabījamattampi nimittassa pavesokāso hoti,
tika-vin07t0:392_1: te itthipurisādibhedā sabbe saṅgayhanti, na itare.
tika-vin07t0:392_6: Kacchapamaṇḍūkānaṃ catuppadattepi odakatāsāmaññena apadehi saha gahaṇaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:392_10: āpatti thullaccayassā”ti imassa suttassa vasena veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:392_12: Etameva hi atthanti yo naṃ ajjhāpajjati,
tika-vin07t0:392_13: taṃ parājetīti imamatthaṃ vuttānaṃyeva pārājikādisaddānaṃ nibbacanappasaṅge imissā parivāragāthāya pavattattā.
tika-vin07t0:393_0: Pakatattehi bhikkhūhīti ettha pakatattā nāma pārājikaṃ anāpannā anukkhittā ca.
tika-vin07t0:393_1: Keci pana “pakatattehi bhikkhūhi ekato kattabbattāti aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttattā pakatattabhūtehi alajjīhipi
tika-vin07t0:393_7: na apakatattehīti evaṃ apakatattehi sahasaṃvāsapaṭikkhepaparaṃ idaṃ vacanaṃ,
tika-vin07t0:393_8: na pana pakatattehi sabbehi alajjīādīhi ekato saṅghakammaṃ kattabbamevāti.
tika-vin07t0:393_9: Evaṃ saṃvāsavidhānaparaṃ pakatattesupi sabhāgāpattiṃ āpannehi aññamaññañca alajjīhi ca saddhiṃ ekato kammakaraṇassa paṭikkhittattā.
tika-vin07t0:393_10: Vuttañhi “sace sabbo saṅgho sabhāgāpattiyā sati vuttavidhiṃ akatvā uposathaṃ karoti,
tika-vin07t0:393_13: dhammaparibhogopi tattha vaṭṭatī”ti alajjīhi saha paribhogo ca aṭṭhakathāyaṃ paṭikkhitto ekato kammakaraṇassāpi dhammaparibhogattā.
tika-vin07t0:393_14: Tasmā yathā hi pāḷiyaṃ pārājikāpattiāpajjanakapuggalaniyamatthaṃ yvāyaṃ ñatticatutthena kammena…pe…
tika-vin07t0:393_16: ayaṃ imasmiṃ atthe adhippeto bhikkhūti imasmiṃ vacane sabbepi ñatticatutthakammena upasampannā pārājikāpajjanakapuggalāyevāti
tika-vin07t0:393_17: niyamo na sijjhati pārājikānāpajjanakānampi sekkhādīnaṃ sambhavā,
tika-vin07t0:393_18: atha kho ñatticatutthakammena upasampannesuyeva pārājikāpattiāpajjanakā alajjī bālaputhujjanā labbhanti,
tika-vin07t0:393_19: na pana ehibhikkhuādīsūti evaṃ niyamo sijjhati,
tika-vin07t0:393_20: evamidhāpi pakatattesuyeva ekato kammakaraṇārahā anāpattikā lajjī kukkuccakā sikkhākāmā upalabbhanti,
tika-vin07t0:393_21: na apakatattesūti evameva niyamo sijjhati apakatattānaṃ gaṇapūraṇattābhāvena asaṃvāsikattaniyamato.
tika-vin07t0:393_22: Alajjino pana gaṇapūrakā hutvā kammassa sādhanato asaṃvāsikesu na gahitā kattabbavidhiṃ akatvā tehi saha
tika-vin07t0:393_23: madditvā kammaṃ karontānaṃ āpatti alajjitā ca na vigacchatīti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:393_25: teneva vakkhati “sabbepi lajjino etesu kammādīsu saha vasantī”tiādi.
tika-vin07t0:394_6: Tattha anatikkamanavasena uggahaparipucchādivasena ca lajjīpuggalehi samaṃ ekato sikkhitabbā samasikkhāti sikkhāpadāni vuttāni,
tika-vin07t0:394_7: tāsaṃ samasikkhanaṃ yathāvuttanayena lajjīhi sikkhitabbabhāvo samasikkhatā nāmāti adhippāyo.
tika-vin07t0:394_8: Yathāvuttesu ekakammādīsu alajjīnaṃ lajjidhamme anokkante lajjīhi saha saṃvāso natthi,
tika-vin07t0:394_9: tato bahiyeva te sandissantīti āha sabbepi lajjinotiādi.
tika-vin07t0:395_2: Vatthumeva na hotīti suvaṇṇādīhi kataitthirūpānaṃ aṅgajātesupi nimittavohāradassanato tattha pārājikāsaṅkānivattanatthaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:395_3: Teneva vinītavatthūsu lepacittādivatthūsu sañjātakukkuccassa pārājikena anāpatti vuttā.
tika-vin07t0:397_1: Assāti ākhyātapadanti tassa atthaṃ dassento “hotī”ti āha,
tika-vin07t0:398_1: Sādiyantassevāti ettha sādiyanaṃ nāma sevetukāmatācittassa uppādanamevāti āha “paṭisevanacittasamaṅgissā”ti.
tika-vin07t0:398_3: “Bhikkhūnaṃ paccatthikā bhikkhupaccatthikā”ti vutte upari vuccamānā rājapaccatthikādayopi idheva pavisantīti
tika-vin07t0:398_4: taṃ nivattanatthaṃ bhikkhū eva paccatthikāti rājapaccatthikānurūpena attho dassito.
tika-vin07t0:398_6: Aggato hi yāva mūlā pavesanakiriyāya vattamānakālo pavesanakkhaṇo nāma.
tika-vin07t0:398_10: Evaṃ paviṭṭhassa uddharaṇārambhato antarā ṭhitakāle ṭhitaṃ aṅgajātaṃ,
tika-vin07t0:398_12: aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana mātugāmassa sukkavissaṭṭhiṃ patvā sabbathā vāyāmato oramitvā ṭhitakālaṃ sandhāya “sukkavissaṭṭhisamaye”ti vuttaṃ,
tika-vin07t0:398_14: Uddharaṇaṃ nāma yāva aggā nīharaṇakiriyāya vattamānakāloti āha “nīharaṇakāle paṭisevanacittaṃ upaṭṭhāpetī”ti.
tika-vin07t0:399_0: Ettha ca yasmā parehi upakkamiyamānassa aṅgajātādikāyacalanassa vijjamānattā sevanacitte upaṭṭhitamatte
tika-vin07t0:399_1: tasmiṃ khaṇe cittajarūpena sañjāyamānaṃ aṅgajātādicalanaṃ iminā sevanacittena uppāditameva hoti.
tika-vin07t0:399_2: Apica sevanacitte uppanne parehi anupakkamiyamānassāpi aṅgajāte calanaṃ hoteva,
tika-vin07t0:399_4: tasmā kāyacittato samuṭṭhitaṃ pārājikāpattiṃ so āpajjatiyeva ubbhajāṇumaṇḍalikā viya.
tika-vin07t0:399_6: paṭipīḷanaṃ vā sādiyeyyā”ti sādiyanamatteyeva āpatti vuttā,
tika-vin07t0:399_7: bhikkhuno kāyasaṃsagge pana “kāyasaṃsaggaṃ samāpajjeyyā”ti attano upakkamassa āpattinimittabhāvena vuttattā
tika-vin07t0:399_8: itthiyā phusiyamānassa kāyasaṃsaggarāge ca itthiyā sañjanitakāyacalane ca vijjamānepi attano payogābhāvena
tika-vin07t0:399_10: Keci pana “paṭhamasaṅghādisesavisayepi parehi balakkārena hatthādīhi upakkamiyamānassa mocanassādo ca uppajjati,
tika-vin07t0:399_15: Itthiyā upakkamiyamāne asādiyanaṃ nāma na sabbesaṃ visayoti āha imañhītiādi.
tika-vin07t0:399_18: Catukkaṃ nīharitvā ṭhapesīti ettha ekapuggalavisayatāya ekopi anāpattivāro pavesanapaviṭṭhaṭhitauddharaṇasaṅkhaātānaṃ
tika-vin07t0:399_20: Paṭhamacatukkakathāti ettha pana anāpattivārena saddhiṃ pañcannaṃ vārānaṃ vuttanayena “pañca catukkā”ti
tika-vin07t0:399_21: vattabbepi ekamaggavisayatāya tesaṃ ekattaṃ āropetvā paṭhamacatukkatā vuttā.
tika-vin07t0:399_22: Teneva vakkhati tiṇṇaṃ maggānaṃ vasena tīṇi suddhikacatukkānītiādi.
tika-vin07t0:401_2: Akkhāyitanimittā idha uttarapadalopena akkhāyitasaddena vuttāti āha “akkhāyitanimitta”nti.
tika-vin07t0:401_7: Evaṃ vinayagarukānanti iminā upari upatissattherena vuccamānavinicchayassa garukaraṇīyatāya kāraṇaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:401_8: Sabbaṃ pariyādiyitvāti sabbaṃ pārājikakhettaṃ anavasesato gahetvā.
tika-vin07t0:401_10: alajjīnaṃ tattha lesena ajjhācārasoto pavattatīti āha “sotaṃ chinditvā”ti.
tika-vin07t0:401_13: Sahaseyyasikkhāpade hi kiñcāpi yebhuyyacchanne yebhuyyaparicchanne heṭṭhimaparicchedato pācittiyaṃ dassitaṃ,
tika-vin07t0:401_15: tathāpi sāvasesattā paññattiyā yebhuyyacchannaupaḍḍhaparicchannādīsupi aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pācittiyameva dassitaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:401_16: Idha pana niravasesattā paññattiyā bhagavatā dassitaṃ yebhuyyena akkhāyitanimittato heṭṭhā pārājikakkhettaṃ natthi,
tika-vin07t0:402_0: Upatissattherena vuttasseva vinicchayassa aññampi upatthambhakāraṇaṃ dassento apicātiādimāha.
tika-vin07t0:402_1: Nimitte appamattikāpi maṃsarāji sace avasiṭṭhā hoti,
tika-vin07t0:402_3: tato paraṃ pana sabbaso khāyite nimitte dukkaṭamevāti dassento āha “tato paraṃ thullaccayaṃ natthī”ti.
tika-vin07t0:402_4: Keci panettha vaccamaggādiṃ cattāro koṭṭhāse katvā “tesu dve koṭṭhāse atikkamma yāva tatiyakoṭṭhāsassa pariyosānā khāyitaṃ yebhuyyakkhāyitaṃ nāma,
tika-vin07t0:402_9: Matasarīrasmiṃyeva veditabbanti mataṃ yebhuyyena akkhāyitantiādivacanato vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:402_10: Yadipi nimittantiādi jīvamānakasarīrameva sandhāya vuttaṃ tasseva adhikatattā.
tika-vin07t0:402_11: Teneva mātikāṭṭhakathāyaṃ “jīvamānakasarīrassa vuttappakāre magge sacepi tacādīni anavasesetvā sabbaso chinne”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:402_12: Sabbaso khāyitanti nimittamaṃsaṃ sabbaṃ chinnanti attho.
tika-vin07t0:402_13: Nimittasaṇṭhānanti chinnamaṃsassa anto yāva muttavatthikosā chiddākāro abbhantarachavicammamatto itthinimittākāro,
tika-vin07t0:402_15: Nimittasaṇṭhānaṃ pana anavasesetvāti pavesanārahachiddākārena ṭhitaabbhantaramaṃsādiṃ anavasesetvā.
tika-vin07t0:402_18: Nimittato patitāya maṃsapesiyāti idaṃ nimittasaṇṭhānavirahitaṃ abbhantaramaṃsakhaṇḍaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:402_19: Nimittasaṇṭhānaṃ akopetvā samantato chinditvā uddhaṭamaṃsapesiyā pana matasarīre yebhuyyena akkhāyitanimitte viya upakkamantassa pārājikameva.
tika-vin07t0:403_0: Evaṃ jīvamānakamanussasarīre labbhamānavisesaṃ dassetvā idāni matasarīre dassetuṃ matasarīre panātiādimāha.
tika-vin07t0:403_2: “Navadvāro mahāvaṇo”tiādi vacanato manussānaṃ akkhināsādīni vaṇasaṅkhepena thullaccayakkhettānīti tesupi thullaccayaṃ vuttaṃ,
tika-vin07t0:403_8: Ettha ca akkhināsādithullaccayakkhettesu yebhuyyena akkhāyitesupi thullaccayaṃ,
tika-vin07t0:403_10: Sabbesampīti yathāvuttahatthiādīhi aññesaṃ tiracchānānaṃ saṅgaṇhanatthaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:403_11: Tiracchānagatānaṃ akkhikaṇṇavaṇesu dukkaṭaṃ pana aṭṭhakathāppamāṇena gahetabbaṃ,
tika-vin07t0:403_15: Yadi hi manussānaññeva vaṇesu thullaccayaṃ siyā,
tika-vin07t0:403_16: hatthiassādīnaṃ nāsavatthikosesupi paṭaṅgamukhamaṇḍūkassa mukhasaṇṭhānepi ca vaṇasaṅkhepato thullaccayaṃ na vattabbaṃ siyā, vuttañca.
tika-vin07t0:404_0: Methunarāgena vatthikosaṃ pavesentassa thullaccayaṃ vuttanti āha “vatthikosaṃ appavesento”ti.
tika-vin07t0:404_1: Methunarāgo ca nāma kāyasaṃsaggarāgaṃ mocanassādañca muñcitvā visuṃ dvayaṃdvayasamāpattiyā rāgo,
tika-vin07t0:404_3: tena ca apārājikakkhette itthisarīrepi upakkamantassa asucimhi muttepi saṅghādiseso na hoti,
tika-vin07t0:404_5: Appavesentoti iminā tīsu maggesu pavesanādhippāye asatipi methunarāgena bahi ghaṭṭanaṃ sambhavatīti dasseti,
tika-vin07t0:404_7: itarathā pavesanādhippāyena bahi chupantassa methunassa pubbapayogattā dukkaṭameva vattabbaṃ siyā.
tika-vin07t0:404_8: Nimittena nimittaṃ chupati thullaccayanti idañca “na ca,
tika-vin07t0:404_12: āpatti thullaccayassā”ti imassa cammakkhandhake āgatassa suttassa vasena vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:404_13: Tattha ca kesañci aññathāpi atthavikappassa bījaṃ dassento mahāaṭṭhakathāyaṃ panātiādimāha.
tika-vin07t0:404_14: Mukheneva chupanaṃ sandhāyāti oṭṭhajivhādimukhāvayavena chupanaṃ sandhāya.
tika-vin07t0:404_17: Suttañhi ajjhācāraṃ sandhāya paṭicca vuttattā “sandhāyabhāsita”nti vuccati.
tika-vin07t0:404_18: Suṭṭhusallakkhetvāti piṭṭhiṃ abhiruhantānaṃ aṅgajātamukheneva nimittachupanassa sambhavaṃ methunarāgīnañca
tika-vin07t0:404_19: aṅgajātena chupanasseva anurūpatañca sutte ca “mukhenā”ti avuttatañca aññañca nayaṃ yathābalaṃ suṭṭhu
tika-vin07t0:404_23: Itaramaggadvayaṃ pana nimittamukhena chupantassa vaṇasaṅkhepena thullaccayameva.
tika-vin07t0:404_25: Nimittamukhena pana vinā methunarāgena manussitthiyā vā tiracchānagatitthiyā vā passāvamaggaṃ pakatimukhena
tika-vin07t0:404_28: tañca na yuttaṃ khandhakasuttepi tathā avuttattā.
tika-vin07t0:404_29: Kāyasaṃsaggarāgena dukkaṭanti nimittamukhena vā pakatimukhādiṃ itarakāyena vā kāyasaṃsaggarāgena chupantassa dukkaṭameva.
tika-vin07t0:405_0: Ettha ca kāyasaṃsaggarāgena bahinimitte upakkamato ajānantasseva aṅgajātaṃ yadi pārājikakkhettaṃ chupati,
tika-vin07t0:405_4: Aññe pana “pavesanakkhaṇe phassassa sādiyanasambhavato balakkārena upakkamanakkhaṇe viya pārājikamevā”ti vadanti,
tika-vin07t0:405_6: Maggattayato hi aññasmiṃ padeseyeva kāyasaṃsaggādirāgabhedato āpattibhedo labbhati,
tika-vin07t0:405_8: Tattha pana yena kenaci ākārena phassassa sādiyanakkhaṇe pārājikameva,
tika-vin07t0:405_9: teneva paropakkamena pavesanādīsu rāgabhedaṃ anuddharitvā sādiyanamattena pārājikaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:407_3: Upādinnakena phusatīti upādinnakasarīrena phusīyatīti kammasādhanena attho daṭṭhabbo.
tika-vin07t0:407_4: Atha vā evaṃ karonto bhikkhu kiñci upādinnakaṃ upādinnakena na phusatīti attho.
tika-vin07t0:407_8: Santhatāyāti samudāye ekadesavohāro daḍḍhassa paṭassa chiddantiādīsu viya.
tika-vin07t0:407_9: Yathā hi paṭassa ekadesova vatthato daḍḍhoti vuccati,
tika-vin07t0:407_10: taṃ ekadesavohāraṃ samudāye paṭe upacārato āropetvā puna taṃ samudāyaṃ daḍḍhappadesasaṅkhātachiddasambandhībhāvena
tika-vin07t0:407_12: evamidhāpi itthiyā maggappadesavohāraṃ samudāyabhūtāya itthiyā āropetvā puna taṃ itthiṃ santhatamaggasambandhiniṃ
tika-vin07t0:407_15: taṃ na yuttaṃ avayavavohārena samudāyasseva patīyamānattā.
tika-vin07t0:407_16: Itarathā hi santhatāya vaccamaggenāti itthiliṅgatā maggasambandhitā ca na siyā,
tika-vin07t0:407_17: ekadese samudāyopacārassa pana ekadesova attho sākhāya chijjamānāya rukkho chijjatītiādīsu viya.
tika-vin07t0:408_0: Vatthādīni maggassa anto appavesetvā bahiyeva veṭhanaṃ sandhāya “paliveṭhetvā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:408_1: Samudāye avayavūpacāreneva bhikkhupi santhato nāmātiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:408_3: Akkhināsādīnaṃ santhatattepi yathāvatthukamevāti āha thullaccayakkhette thullaccayantiādi.
tika-vin07t0:408_4: Khāṇuṃ ghaṭṭentassa dukkaṭanti itthinimittassa anto khāṇuṃ pavesetvā samatalaṃ,
tika-vin07t0:408_5: atirittaṃ vā ṭhitaṃ khāṇuṃ sace ghaṭṭeti,
tika-vin07t0:408_7: Sace pana īsakaṃ anto allokāse pavesetvā ṭhitaṃ anupādinnameva khāṇusīsaṃ aṅgajātena chupati,
tika-vin07t0:408_10: Bahiddhā khāṇuketi anto pavesitaveḷupabbādikassa bahi nikkhantasīsaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:408_11: Yathā ca itthinimittetiādīsu yathā itthiyā passāvamagge khāṇuṃ katvā ghaṭṭanādikaṃ vuttaṃ,
tika-vin07t0:408_12: evaṃ sabbattha vaccamaggādīsupi lakkhaṇaṃ veditabbanti attho.
tika-vin07t0:410_2: Paṭhamaṃ itthidhuttameva dassetvā idāni itaradhuttepi saṅgahetvā dassetuṃ “itthidhuttasurādhuttādayo vā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:412_1: Paṭiññātakaraṇaṃ natthi sevetukāmatā maggena maggappaṭipattīti dvinnaṃ aṅgānaṃ siddhattā.
tika-vin07t0:412_2: Dūsitassa pana maggena maggappaṭipatti evamekaṃ aṅgaṃ siddhaṃ,
tika-vin07t0:412_7: “Lohitaṃ viyā”ti vuttattā kesādīnaṃ vinimuttaṭṭhāne sabbatthāti gahetabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:412_8: Niccameva ummattako hotīti yassa pittakosato pittaṃ calitvā sabbadā bahi nikkhantaṃ hoti,
tika-vin07t0:412_10: Yassa pana pittaṃ calitvā pittakoseyeva ṭhitaṃ hoti,
tika-vin07t0:412_12: sopi antarantarā saññaṃ paṭilabhati bhesajjena ca pakatiārogyaṃ paṭilabhatīti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:415_4: Sabbasaṅgāhakavasenāti sabbesaṃ sikkhāpadānaṃ saṅgāhakavasena “kāyo vācā kāyavācā kāyacittaṃ vācācittaṃ
tika-vin07t0:415_8: Taṃtaṃsikkhāpadassa niyataāpattiyā eva gahaṇatthaṃ pana sikkhāpadasīsena samuṭṭhānādīnaṃ kathanaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:415_11: imesu pana chasu samuṭṭhānesu purimāni tīṇi acittakāni,
tika-vin07t0:415_13: Samāsato taṃ imaṃ pakiṇṇakaṃ viditvā veditabbanti sambandho.
tika-vin07t0:416_1: Terasa hi samuṭṭhānasīsāni paṭhamapārājikasamuṭṭhānaṃ adinnādānasamuṭṭhānaṃ sañcarittasamuṭṭhānaṃ samanubhāsanasamuṭṭhānaṃ
tika-vin07t0:416_4: Tattha atthi chasamuṭṭhānanti iminā sañcarittasamuṭṭhānaṃ vuttaṃ,
tika-vin07t0:416_5: pañcasamuṭṭhānassa abhāvato “atthi pañcasamuṭṭhāna”nti avatvā “atthi catusamuṭṭhāna”nti vuttaṃ,
tika-vin07t0:416_11: Atthi tisamuṭṭhānanti iminā adinnādānasamuṭṭhānaṃ bhūtārocanasamuṭṭhānañca saṅgahitaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:416_16: Atthi kathinasamuṭṭhānantiādinā pana avasesasamauṭṭhānasīsavasena dvisamuṭṭhānaṃ ekasamuṭṭhānañca saṅgaṇhāti.
tika-vin07t0:416_37: Ettha ca pacchimesu tīsu sacittakasamuṭṭhānesu ekekasamuṭṭhānavasena ekasamuṭṭhānāni tividhāni.
tika-vin07t0:416_38: Dvisamuṭṭhānāni pana paṭhamacatutthehi vā dutiyapañcamehi vā tatiyachaṭṭhehi vā catutthachaṭṭhehi vā
tika-vin07t0:417_0: Evaṃ samuṭṭhānavasena sabbasikkhāpadāni terasadhā dassetvā idāni kiriyāvasena pañcadhā dassetuṃ tatrāpītiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:417_4: Kiriyākiriyatoti aññātikāya bhikkhuniyā hatthato cīvarapaṭiggahaṇādi viya.
tika-vin07t0:417_9: Vītikkamasaññāya abhāvena vimokkho assāti saññāvimokkhanti majjhepadalopīsamāso daṭṭhabbo.
tika-vin07t0:418_0: Kāyavacīdvārehi āpajjitabbampi kāyakamme vā vacīkamme vā saṅgayhati.
tika-vin07t0:418_1: Tattha bāhullavuttito adinnādānamusāvādādayo viyāti atthi sikkhāpadaṃ kāyakammantiādinā kāyakammaṃ vacīkammañcāti dukameva vuttaṃ,
tika-vin07t0:418_2: vibhāgato pana kāyavacīkammena saddhiṃ tikameva hoti.
tika-vin07t0:418_3: Teneva mātikāṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttaṃ “sabbā ca kāyakammavacīkammatadubhayavasena tividhā hontī”ti.
tika-vin07t0:418_4: Tatoyeva idhāpi adinnādānādīsu kāyakammavacīkammanti tadubhayavasena dassitaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:418_5: Atthi pana sikkhāpadaṃ kusalantiādi āpattisamuṭṭhāpakacittavasena kāriye kāraṇopacārena vuttaṃ,
tika-vin07t0:418_6: na pana āpattiyā kusalādiparamatthadhammatāvasena āpattiyā sammutisabhāvattā.
tika-vin07t0:418_7: Kusalākusalādiparamatthadhamme upādāya hi bhagavatā āpattisammuti paññattā.
tika-vin07t0:418_10: Na hi bhagavato āṇāyattā āpatti kusalādiparamatthasabhāvā hoti anupasampannānaṃ ādikammikānañca āpattippasaṅgato,
tika-vin07t0:418_12: Na hi kāraṇabalena uppajjamānā kusalādisabhāvā āpatti anupasampannādīsu nivattati,
tika-vin07t0:418_13: uppannāya ca tassā kenaci vināso na sambhavati.
tika-vin07t0:418_14: Sarasavināsato desanādinā ca āpatti vigacchatīti vacanamatthi,
tika-vin07t0:418_16: Pitughātādikammena hi pārājikaṃ āpannassa bhikkhuno gihiliṅgaṃ gahetvā bhikkhubhāvapariccāgena pārājikāpatti vigacchati,
tika-vin07t0:418_18: Tasmā dummaṅkūnaṃ niggahādidasaatthavase paṭicca bhagavatā yathāpaccayaṃ samuppajjamāne kusalākusalādināmarūpadhamme
tika-vin07t0:418_20: sā ca yathāvidhipaṭikammakaraṇena vigatā nāma hotīti veditabbaṃ,
tika-vin07t0:418_22: Āpattisamuṭṭhāpakatteneva hettha kusalādīnaṃ āpattito bhedo siddho.
tika-vin07t0:418_23: Na hi taṃsamuṭṭhitassa tato abhedo yutto samuṭṭhānasamuṭṭhitabhedabyavahārupacchedappasaṅgato.
tika-vin07t0:418_24: Sāratthadīpaniyaṃ pana āpattiyā paramatthato kusalattameva na sambhavati “āpattādhikaraṇaṃ siyā akusalaṃ,
tika-vin07t0:418_27: “akusalattaṃ pana abyākatattañca āpattiyā sambhavatī”ti saññāya kusalacittasamuṭṭhānakkhaṇepi rūpābyākatattaṃ
tika-vin07t0:418_30: itarehi itaranti imaṃ aṭṭhakathāvacanaṃ nissāya vuttaṃ “yaṃ kusalacittena āpajjatīti yaṃ sikkhāpadasīse gahitaṃ āpattiṃ kusalacittasamaṅgī āpajjati,
tika-vin07t0:418_31: iminā pana vacanena taṃ kusalanti āpattiyā vuccamāno kusalabhāvo pariyāyato,
tika-vin07t0:418_33: Kusalacittena hi āpattiṃ āpajjanto saviññattikaṃ aviññattikaṃ vā sikkhāpadavītikkamākārappavattaṃ rūpakkhandhasaṅkhātaṃ abyākatāpattiṃ āpajjatī”ti.
tika-vin07t0:418_34: Tattha yaṃ kusalacittena āpajjatīti imaṃ vacanaṃ uddissa “iminā pana vacanena taṃ kusalanti āpattiyā vuccamāno kusalabhāvo pariyāyato,
tika-vin07t0:418_36: evaṃ itarehi itaranti vacanena “yaṃ akusalacittena āpajjahi,
tika-vin07t0:418_39: taṃ abyākata”nti imassa atthassa vuttattā itarehīti vacanaṃ uddissa “imināpi vacanena itaranti āpattiyā
tika-vin07t0:418_40: vuccamāno akusalabhāvo abyākatabhāvo ca pariyāyato dassetī”ti vattabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:418_41: Evaṃ avatvā kusalapakkhe eva kathanassa kāraṇaṃ na passāma.
tika-vin07t0:418_42: Yaṃ pana āpattādhikaraṇaṃ siyā akusalantiādivacanaṃ kāraṇattena vuttaṃ,
tika-vin07t0:418_44: taṃ akusalantiādinā heṭṭhā vuttanayena akusalādibhāvassa pariyāyadesitattā,
tika-vin07t0:418_45: āpattiyā kusalavohārassa ayuttatāya natthi āpattādhikaraṇaṃ kusalanti vuttattā ca.
tika-vin07t0:418_46: Āpattiyā hi kusalacittasamuṭṭhitattepi bhagavatā paṭikkhittabhāvena sāvajjadhammattā kāraṇūpacārenāpi
tika-vin07t0:418_48: Yathā ākāsādisammutisaccānaṃ uppannatādivohāro viya jātijarābhaṅgānaṃ uppannatādivohāro anavaṭṭhānādidesato ayutto,
tika-vin07t0:418_52: Suttassāpi hi yathā suttasuttānulomādīhi virodho na hoti,
tika-vin07t0:419_0: Yaṃ pana vuttaṃ “kusalacittena hi āpattiṃ āpajjanto…pe…
tika-vin07t0:419_2: taṃ ayuttameva rūpakkhandhassa khaṇikatāya āpattiyāpi desanādipaṭikammaṃ vināva paṭipassaddhippasaṅgato.
tika-vin07t0:419_7: eteneva yaṃ vuttaṃ “nipajjitvā nirodhasamāpannassa sahaseyyavasena tathākārappavattarūpadhammasseva āpattibhāvato”tiādi,
tika-vin07t0:419_9: Idha pana nirodhasamāpannānaṃ rūpadhammameva paṭicca uppannattā āpatti acittā avedanā,
tika-vin07t0:419_12: Teneva duṭṭhadosasikkhāpadaṭṭhakathāyaṃ āpattiyā akusalādisabhāvaṃ paraparikappitaṃ nisedhetuṃ “ādikammikassa anāpattivacanato…pe…
tika-vin07t0:419_14: tasmā “taṃtaṃkusalādidhammasamuppattiyā bhagavatā paññattā āpattisammuti samuṭṭhitā”ti ca,
tika-vin07t0:419_17: Āpattiyā ca sammutisabhāvattepi hi sañcicca taṃ āpajjantassa,
tika-vin07t0:419_18: paṭikiriyaṃ akarontassa ca anādare akusalarāsi ceva saggamaggantarāyo ca hotīti lajjino yathāvidhiṃ nātikkamanti,
tika-vin07t0:419_19: anatikkamanappaccayā ca tesaṃ anantappabhedā sīlādayo dhammā parivaḍḍhantīti gahetabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:419_20: Dvattiṃsevāti niyamo āpattinimittānaṃ kāyavacīviññattīnaṃ eteheva samuppajjanato kato,
tika-vin07t0:419_22: Nipajjitvā niddāyantānañhi jhānanirodhasamāpannānañca aviññattijanakehi vipākaappanācittehi ceva rūpadhammehi ca sahaseyyādiāpatti sambhavati.
tika-vin07t0:420_1: Paññattiṃ ajānitvā iddhivikubbanādīsu abhiññānaṃ āpattisamuṭṭhāpakattaṃ veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:420_6: Kiriyāsamuṭṭhānanti parūpakkamena jāyamānaṃ aṅgajātādicalanaṃ sādiyanacittasaṅkhāte sevanacitte uppanne
tika-vin07t0:420_7: tena cittena samuppāditameva hotīti vuttaṃ itarathā “siyā kiriyasamuṭṭhānaṃ,
tika-vin07t0:421_0: Yaṃ pana sāratthadīpaniyaṃ vuttaṃ “kiriyasamuṭṭhānanti idaṃ yebhuyyavasena vuttaṃ parūpakkame sati sādiyantassa akiriyasamuṭṭhānabhāvato”tiādi,
tika-vin07t0:421_1: taṃ na gahetabbaṃ paṭhamapārājikassa akiriyasamuṭṭhānatāya pāḷiaṭṭhakathāsu avuttattā.
tika-vin07t0:421_3: Kathañhi nāma parūpakkamena methunaṃ sādiyanto attano aṅgajātādikāyacalanaṃ na sādiyeyya,
tika-vin07t0:421_4: sādiyanacittānuguṇameva pana sakalasarīre cittajarūpasamuppattiyā viññattipi sukhumā samuppannā eva hotīti daṭṭhabbaṃ,
tika-vin07t0:421_6: Cittaṃ panettha aṅgamattaṃ hotīti kāyaviññatti eva kāyakammabhāve kāraṇaṃ,
tika-vin07t0:424_2: Vinītāni āpattiṃ tvaṃ bhikkhu āpannotiādinā bhagavatā vinicchinitāni vatthūni vinītavatthūni.
tika-vin07t0:424_3: Taṃ taṃ vatthuṃ uddharitvā dānato dassanato uddānabhūtā gāthā uddānagāthā,
tika-vin07t0:424_6: Vatthu gāthāti tena kho pana samayena aññataro bhikkhūtiādikā vinītavatthupāḷiyeva tesaṃ tesaṃ vinītavatthūnaṃ ganthanato “vatthugāthā”ti vuttā,
tika-vin07t0:424_8: Uddānagāthānaṃ vatthu vatthugāthāti evaṃ vā ettha attho daṭṭhabbo.
tika-vin07t0:424_11: Yaṃ passitvā cittakārādayo sippikā cittakammādīni sikkhanti,
tika-vin07t0:425_2: Tānipi bhagavatā vinītabhāvena puna vinītavatthūsu pakkhittāni.
tika-vin07t0:425_3: Tattha tassa kukkuccaṃ ahosītiādi pana kiñcāpi tesaṃ paṭhamaṃ kukkuccaṃ na uppannaṃ,
tika-vin07t0:425_4: bhikkhūhi pana bhagavatā ca garahitvā vuttavacanaṃ sandhāya pacchā uppannattaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:425_5: Bhagavato etamatthaṃ ārocesuntiādi ca bhikkhūhi ānandattherena ca paṭhamaṃ bhagavato ārocite,
tika-vin07t0:425_6: bhagavatā ca tesaṃ pārājikatte pakāsite bhītā te sayampi gantvā attano kukkuccaṃ pacchā ārocenti eva.
tika-vin07t0:425_7: “Saccaṃ kira tva”ntiādinā bhagavatā puṭṭhā pana “saccaṃ bhagavā”ti paṭijānanavasenāpi ārocenti.
tika-vin07t0:425_8: Bhagavāpi āpattiṃ tvantiādinā tesaṃ pārājikattaṃ vinicchinoti eva.
tika-vin07t0:425_9: Anupaññattikathāyaṃ pana taṃ sabbaṃ avatvā anupaññattiyā anuguṇameva kiñcimattaṃ vuttaṃ,
tika-vin07t0:425_10: idhāpi tesaṃ vatthūnaṃ bhagavatā vinītabhāvadassanatthaṃ evaṃ vuttanti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:425_11: Keci imaṃ adhippāyaṃ amanasikatvā “aññānevetāni vatthūnī”ti vadanti.
tika-vin07t0:426_1: Vaṇṇapokkharatāyāti ettha pokkhalaṃ nāma samiddhaṃ sundarañca,
tika-vin07t0:427_1: Evarūpā parivattaliṅgā bhikkhuniyo atthato ekato upasampannāpi ubhatosaṅghe upasampannāsuyeva saṅgayhanti
tika-vin07t0:427_3: Pāḷiyaṃ “tāhi āpattīhi anāpatti”nti upayogavacanaṃ katvā anujānāmīti padena sambandhitabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:427_13: Kathanti āha tā sabbāpi bhikkhunīhi kātabbantiādi.
tika-vin07t0:427_14: Tena paṭicchannāyapi appaṭicchannāyapi garukāpattiyā pakkhamānattacaraṇādikaṃ vidhiṃ dasseti.
tika-vin07t0:428_2: Dubbalakusalenāti yathāvuttabalavākusalopahatasattinā tato eva dubbalabhūtena kusalena.
tika-vin07t0:428_4: Sugatiyaṃ bhāvadvayassa kusalakammajattā akusaleneva vināso kusaleneva uppattīti āha ubhayampītiādi.
tika-vin07t0:428_5: Duggatiyaṃ pana akusaleneva ubhinnampi uppatti ca vināso ca,
tika-vin07t0:429_0: “Ehi mayaṃ gamissāmā”ti bhikkhuniyā saddhiṃ saṃvidhāya ekaddhānagamane pācittiyāpattiparihāratthaṃ vuttaṃ “saṃvidahanaṃ parimocetvā”ti.
tika-vin07t0:429_1: Tena ekagāmakkhettepi bahigāmato antaragharaṃ saṃvidhāya gamanampi āpattikaramevāti dasseti.
tika-vin07t0:429_4: Dutiyikā bhikkhunī pakkantā vā hotītiādinā vuttaanāpattilakkhaṇaṃ anulometīti vuttaṃ “gāmantara…pe…
tika-vin07t0:429_8: labbhatīti liṅgaparivattanadukkhapīḷitassa saṅgahepi asati hīnāyāvattanampi bhaveyyāti “āpadāsū”ti vuttaanāpattianulomena vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:429_11: labbhatīti alajjinīhi saddhiṃ ekakammādisaṃvāse āpattisambhavato tā asantapakkhaṃ bhajantīti vuttaṃ,
tika-vin07t0:429_12: imināpetaṃ veditabbaṃ “alajjinīhi saddhiṃ paribhogo na vaṭṭatī”ti.
tika-vin07t0:429_14: tatopi dutiyikaṃ vinā gāmantaragamanādīsu āpatti eva siyā saṅgāhikattā tāsaṃ saṅgāhikalajjinigaṇato viya.
tika-vin07t0:429_16: vaṭṭatīti vadantīti iminā aṭṭhakathāsu anāgatabhāvaṃ dīpeti.
tika-vin07t0:429_17: Tatthāpi vissāsikañātikabhikkhuniyo vinā bhikkhunibhāve aramantassa mānapakatikassa āpadāṭṭhānasambhavena
tika-vin07t0:429_18: taṃ vacanaṃ appaṭikkhittampi tadaññesaṃ na vaṭṭatiyevāti gahetabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:430_5: bhikkhūnaṃ sannidhiṃ bhikkhunīhi ca paṭiggāhāpetvā paribhuñjitu”nti vacanato puna paṭiggahetvā paribhuñjituṃ vaṭṭatīti dassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:430_6: Sattame divaseti idañca nissaggiyaṃ anāpajjitvāva punapi sattāhaṃ paribhuñjituṃ vaṭṭatīti dassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:431_0: Sāmaṃ gahetvāna nikkhipeyyāti sahatthena paṭiggahetvāna nikkhipeyya.
tika-vin07t0:431_1: Paribhuñjantassa āpattīti liṅgaparivatte jāte puna appaṭiggahetvā paribhuñjantassa āpatti.
tika-vin07t0:432_0: Hīnāyāvattanenāti ettha keci “pakatattassa bhikkhuno sikkhaṃ appaccakkhāya ‘gihī bhavissāmī’ti gihiliṅgaggahaṇaṃ hīnāyāvattana”nti vadanti,
tika-vin07t0:432_1: taṃ na yuttaṃ tattakena bhikkhubhāvassa avijahanato.
tika-vin07t0:432_2: Aññe pana “pārājikaṃ āpannassa bhikkhupaṭiññaṃ pahāya gihiliṅgabhāvūpagamanampi hīnāyāvattana”nti vadanti,
tika-vin07t0:432_4: Pārājikaṃ āpanno hi taṃ paṭicchādetvā yāva bhikkhupaṭiñño hoti,
tika-vin07t0:432_5: tāva bhikkhu eva hoti bhikkhūnameva pārājikassa paññattattā.
tika-vin07t0:432_7: Tathā hi so saṃvāsaṃ sādiyantopi theyyasaṃvāsako na hoti,
tika-vin07t0:433_0: “Asuddho hoti puggalo aññataraṃ pārājikaṃ dhammaṃ ajjhāpanno,
tika-vin07t0:433_1: tañce suddhadiṭṭhi samāno okāsaṃ kārāpetvā akkosādhippāyo vadeti,
tika-vin07t0:434_0: Eke pana “pārājikaṃ āpannānaṃ dosaṃ paṭijānitvā gihiliṅgaggahaṇaṃ nāma sikkhāpaccakkhāne samodhānaṃ gacchati
tika-vin07t0:434_2: Teneva vinayavinicchayādīsu hīnāyāvattanaṃ sikkhāpaccakkhāne samodhānetvā visuṃ taṃ na vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:434_3: Tasmā bhikkhunīnaṃ vibbhamitukāmatāya gihiliṅgaggahaṇaṃ idha hīnāyāvattanaṃ tāsaṃ sikkhāpaccakkhānassa abhāvato.
tika-vin07t0:434_6: Tasmā pārājikānaṃ bhikkhunīnañca “uppabbajissāmī”ti gihiliṅgaggahaṇaṃ hīnāyāvattananti gahetabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:434_8: teneva taṃ khuddasikkhāyaṃ “acchedavissajjanagāhavibbhamā”ti adhiṭṭhānavijahane vibbhamanāmena vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:435_0: Anapekkhavissajjanenāti aññassa adatvāva anatthikasseva paṭiggahitavatthūnaṃ bahi chaḍḍanena.
tika-vin07t0:435_1: Keci “paṭiggahitavatthūsu sāpekkhassa pure paṭiggahitabhāvato parimocanatthaṃ tattha paṭiggahamattassa
tika-vin07t0:435_4: Yatheva hi cīvarādīsu anapekkhavissajjanena adhiṭṭhānavijahanaṃ vatvāpi visuṃ paccuddhāro ca vutto,
tika-vin07t0:435_6: yathā ca cīvarādīsu kāyapaṭibaddhesupi paccuddhārena adhiṭṭhānaṃ vigacchati,
tika-vin07t0:435_8: Idha pana paṭiggahitavatthusmiṃ anapekkhassāpi kāyato mutteyeva tasmiṃ paṭiggahaṇaṃ vijahati.
tika-vin07t0:435_11: Anapekkhavissajjanenāti ettha ca “anapekkhāyā”ti ettakameva vattabbaṃ anapekkhataṃ muñcitvā idha visuṃ vissajjanassa abhāvā.
tika-vin07t0:435_13: Apica paṭiggahaṇamattavissajjane sati pure paṭiggahitopi āhāro bhuñjitukamyatāya uppannāya paṭiggahaṇamattaṃ
tika-vin07t0:435_14: vissajjetvā puna paṭiggahetvā yathāsukhaṃ bhuñjitabbo siyāti,
tika-vin07t0:435_15: tathā ca sannidhikārakasikkhāpade vuttā sabbāpi vinicchayabhedā niratthakā eva siyuṃ.
tika-vin07t0:437_0: Tattha pana “paṭiggahaṇaṃ anapekkhacittena vissajjetvā bhuñjitabba”nti ettakameva vattabbaṃ,
tika-vin07t0:437_2: Katthaci īdisesu ca gaṇṭhikapattādīsu paṭiggahaṇe apekkhā kassacipi nattheva tappahānāya vāyāmato,
tika-vin07t0:437_3: tathāpi tatthagataāmise paṭiggahaṇaṃ na vigacchati. Kasmā?
tika-vin07t0:437_4: Bhikkhussa patte puna bhuñjitukāmatāpekkhāya vijjamānattā pattagatike āhārepi tassā vattanato.
tika-vin07t0:437_5: Na hi pattaṃ avissajjetvā taggatikaṃ āhāraṃ vissajjetuṃ sakkā,
tika-vin07t0:437_6: nāpi āhāraṃ avissajjetvā taggatikaṃ paṭiggahaṇaṃ vissajjetuṃ.
tika-vin07t0:438_5: anupasampannassa cattena vantena muttena anapekkho datvā paṭilabhitvā paribhuñjatī”ti –
tika-vin07t0:439_1: Ettha ca “antosattāhaṃ adhiṭṭhetī”ti bāhiraparibhogāya adhiṭṭhānavacanato vatthuṃ avissajjetvāpi kevalaṃ
tika-vin07t0:439_2: anajjhoharitukāmatāya suddhacittena bāhiraparibhogatthāya niyamanampi visuṃ ekaṃ paṭiggahaṇavijahanakāraṇameva,
tika-vin07t0:439_5: tathā ca “puna paṭiggahetvā paribhuñjissāmī”ti paṭiggahaṇavissajjanaṃ na vattabbaṃ siyā bāhiraparibhogādhiṭṭhānassa idhādhippetattā.
tika-vin07t0:440_0: Sāratthadīpaniyañhi “anapekkhavissajjanenāti ettha aññassa adatvāva anatthikatāya ‘natthi iminā kammaṃ na dāni naṃ paribhuñjissāmī’ti vatthūsu vā,
tika-vin07t0:440_1: ‘puna paṭiggahetvā paṭibhuñjissāmī’ti paṭiggahaṇe vā anapekkhavissajjanenā”ti evaṃ paribhuñjitukāmasseva
tika-vin07t0:440_5: Idaṃ pana aṭṭhakathāsu “anapekkhavissajjanasaṅkhāte vissajjetī”ti vuttapāḷipadatthe saṅgahetvā visuṃ na vuttaṃ. Nassati,
tika-vin07t0:440_7: vissāsaṃ vā gaṇhantīti imāni pana padāni acchinditvā gaṇhantīti imasmiṃ pade saṅgahitānīti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:441_0: Acchinditvā gahaṇenāti anupasampannānaṃ balakkārādinā acchinditvā gahaṇena.
tika-vin07t0:442_1: tammūlakānaṃ pañcānisaṃsānañca abhāvassa samānattā tattha vijjamānampi senāsanaggāhapaṭippassaddhiṃ adassetvā
tika-vin07t0:442_2: tattha bhikkhūhi kattabbaṃ saṅgahameva dassetuṃ sace pacchimikāyātiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:442_4: chārattaṃ mānattameva dātabbanti idaṃ paṭicchannāya sādhāraṇāpattiyā parivasantassa asamādinnaparivāsassa
tika-vin07t0:442_5: vā liṅge parivatte pakkhamānattaṃ carantassa vasena vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:442_6: Sace panassa pakkhamānatte asamādinne eva puna liṅgaṃ parivattati,
tika-vin07t0:442_7: parivāsaṃ datvā parivutthaparivāsasseva chārattaṃ mānattaṃ dātabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:442_12: Pārājikaṃ āpannānaṃ itthipurisānaṃ liṅge parivattepi pārājikattassa ekasmiṃ attabhāve avijahanato puna upasampadā na dātabbāti gahetabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:443_1: Tathevāti muccatu vā mā vāti imamatthaṃ atidisati.
tika-vin07t0:443_3: Tesañhi īdise ṭhāne asādiyanaṃ dukkaraṃ sotāpannādiariyānaṃ tattha dukkarattābhāvā.
tika-vin07t0:444_1: Suphusitāti uparimāya dantapantiyā heṭṭhimā dantapanti āhacca ṭhitā,
tika-vin07t0:444_4: Uppāṭite pana oṭṭhamaṃse dante suyeva upakkamantassa thullaccayanti nimittena bahinimitte chupanattā vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:444_6: Nijjhāmataṇhikā nāma lomakūpehi samuṭṭhitaaggijālāhi daḍḍhasarīratāya ativiya tasitarūpā. Ādi-
tika-vin07t0:444_7: saddena khuppipāsāsurā aṭṭhicammāvasiṭṭhā bhayānakasarīrā petiyo saṅgahitā.
tika-vin07t0:444_8: Visaññaṃ katvāti yathā so katampi upakkamaṃ na jānāti,
tika-vin07t0:444_10: Tena ca visaññī ahutvā sādiyantassa pārājikamevāti dasseti.
tika-vin07t0:444_14: Appavesetukāmatāya eva nimittena nimittachupane thullaccayaṃ vuttaṃ,
tika-vin07t0:444_15: sevetukāmassa pana tatthāpi dukkaṭamevāti āha “dukkhaṭameva sāmanta”nti.
tika-vin07t0:445_1: saddena sumanapupphapariyāyena tannissayo gumbo adhippetoti āha “jātipupphagumbāna”nti.
tika-vin07t0:445_2: Tena ca jātiyā upalakkhitaṃ vanaṃ jātiyāvananti aluttasamāsoti dasseti.
tika-vin07t0:446_4: Tattha yaṃ ubhosu passesu rukkhathambhe nikhanitvā tattha majjhe vijjhitvā dve tisso rukkhasūciyo pavesetvā karonti,
tika-vin07t0:446_6: Pavesananikkhamanakāle pana apanetvā thakanakayoggena kaṇṭakasākhāpaṭalena yuttaṃ dvāraṃ kaṇṭakadvāraṃ nāma.
tika-vin07t0:446_7: Gāmadvārassa pidhānatthaṃ padarena kaṇṭakasākhādīhi vā katassa kavāṭassa udukkhalapāsarahitatāya ekena
tika-vin07t0:446_8: saṃvarituṃ vivarituñca asakkuṇeyyassa heṭṭhā ekaṃ cakkaṃ yojenti,
tika-vin07t0:446_9: yena parivattamānena taṃ kavāṭaṃ sukhathakanaṃ hoti,
tika-vin07t0:446_11: Cakkameva hi lātabbaṭṭhena saṃvaraṇavivaraṇatthāya gahetabbaṭṭhena cakkalakaṃ,
tika-vin07t0:446_14: Mahādvāresu pana dve tīṇipi cakkalakāni yojentīti āha phalakesūtiādi.
tika-vin07t0:446_19: Ekaṃ dussasāṇidvāramevāti ettha kilañjasāṇidvārampi saṅgahaṃ gacchati taggatikattā.
tika-vin07t0:446_21: nisinnā hontīti idaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ sannihitabhāvadassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:446_23: nipajjitvā niddāyante pana ābhogaṃ kātuṃ na vaṭṭati asantapakkhe ṭhitattā.
tika-vin07t0:446_24: Raho nisajjāya viya dvārasaṃvaraṇaṃ nāma mātugāmānaṃ pavesananivāraṇatthaṃ anuññātanti āha bhikkhuniṃ vātiādi.
tika-vin07t0:446_25: Nisseṇiṃ āropetvāti idaṃ heṭṭhimatalassa sadvārabandhatāya vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:446_26: Catūsu disāsu parikkhittassa kuṭṭassa ekābaddhatāya “ekakuṭṭake”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:446_27: Pacchimānaṃ bhāroti pāḷiyā āgacchante sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:446_28: Yena kenaci parikkhitteti ettha parikkhepassa ubbedhato pamāṇaṃ sahaseyyappahonake vuttasadisameva.
tika-vin07t0:447_5: Pabujjhitvā puna supati āpattīti aruṇe uggate pabujjhitvā aruṇuggamanaṃ ñatvā vā añatvā vā anuṭṭhahitvā
tika-vin07t0:447_6: sayitasantānena supati uṭṭhahitvā kattabbassa dvārasaṃvaraṇādino akatattā akiriyasamuṭṭhānā āpatti hoti
tika-vin07t0:447_9: divā asaṃvaritvā nipajjanakkhaṇe kiriyā ca acittakā cāti veditabbā.
tika-vin07t0:447_10: Purāruṇā pabujjhitvāpi yāva aruṇuggamanā sayantassāpi purimanayena āpattiyeva.
tika-vin07t0:447_12: āpattiyevāti ettha kadā tassa āpattīti? Vuccate –
tika-vin07t0:447_13: na tāva rattiyaṃ “divā āpajjati no ratti”nti vuttattā.
tika-vin07t0:447_14: “Anādariyadukkaṭā na muccatī”ti vuttadukkaṭaṃ pana divāsayanadukkaṭameva na hoti anādariyadukkaṭattā.
tika-vin07t0:447_15: Evaṃ aruṇuggamane pana acittakaṃ akiriyasamuṭṭhānaṃ āpattiṃ āpajjatīti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:447_16: So sace dvāraṃ saṃvaritvā “aruṇe uggate vuṭṭhahissāmī”ti nipajjati,
tika-vin07t0:447_17: dvāre ca aññehi aruṇuggamanakāle vivaṭepi tassa anāpattiyeva dvārapidahanassa rattidivābhāgesu visesābhāvā.
tika-vin07t0:447_21: Divā saṃvaritvā nipannassa kenaci vivaṭepi dvāre anāpattiyeva.
tika-vin07t0:447_22: Attanāpi anuṭṭhahitvāva sati paccaye vivaṭepi anāpattīti vadanti.
tika-vin07t0:447_23: Yathāparicchedameva ca na vuṭṭhātīti aruṇe uggateyeva uṭṭhāti.
tika-vin07t0:447_25: anādariyaāpatti pana purāruṇā uṭṭhitassāpi tassa hoteva “dukkaṭā na muccatī”ti vuttattā,
tika-vin07t0:447_26: dukkaṭā na muccatīti ca purāruṇā uṭṭhahitvā mūlāpattiyā muttopi anādariyadukkaṭā na muccatīti adhippāyo.
tika-vin07t0:448_1: pādānaṃ pana bhūmito amocitattā ayaṃ nipanno nāma na hoti,
tika-vin07t0:448_3: Apassāya supantassāti kaṭiṭṭhito uddhaṃ piṭṭhikaṇṭake appamattakampi padesaṃ bhūmiṃ aphusāpetvā thambhādiṃ apassāya supantassa.
tika-vin07t0:448_4: Kaṭiṭṭhiṃ pana bhūmiṃ phusāpentassa sayanaṃ nāma hoti.
tika-vin07t0:448_6: Dīghavandanādīsupi tiriyaṃ piṭṭhikaṇṭakānaṃ pasāritattā nipajjanamevāti āpatti pariharitabbāva “vandāmīti
tika-vin07t0:448_12: Tattheva sayati na vuṭṭhātīti iminā visayepi akaraṇaṃ dasseti,
tika-vin07t0:449_0: Ekabhaṅgenāti ubho pāde bhūmito amocetvāva ekapassena sarīraṃ bhañjitvā nipanno.
tika-vin07t0:449_3: Tattha supantassāpi avisayattamatthīti mahāpadumattherena “avisayattā pana āpatti na dissatī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:449_4: Ācariyā pana supantassa visaññattābhāvena visayattā anāpattiṃ na kathayanti.
tika-vin07t0:449_9: Ekabhaṅgena nipanno pana anipannattā āpattito muccatiyevāti gahetabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:454_0: Adutiyenāti asadisena jinena yaṃ dutiyaṃ pārājikaṃ pakāsitaṃ,
tika-vin07t0:454_2: tasmā assa dutiyassa ayaṃ saṃvaṇṇanā hotīti yojanā.
tika-vin07t0:456_4: Aññepettha pakāreti susaṃvihitārakkhattā rājūnaṃ gahaṃ gehabhūtanti rājagahantiādike pakāre.
tika-vin07t0:456_6: vasantakāle kīḷāya yebhuyyattā pana vasantavananti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:457_4: sāmampi kātabbanti iminā nāvāsatthavaje ṭhapetvā aññattha “asenāsaniko aha”nti ālayakaraṇamattena upagamanaṃ na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin07t0:457_5: Senāsanaṃ pariyesitvā vacībhedaṃ katvā vassaṃ upagantabbamevāti dasseti. “Na,
tika-vin07t0:457_7: asenāsanikenā”tiādinā hi pāḷiyaṃ “nālakapaṭipadaṃ paṭipannenāpī”ti aṭṭhakathāyañca avisesena daḷhaṃ katvā vuttaṃ,
tika-vin07t0:457_10: nāvāya vassaṃ upagantu”ntiādinā asatipi senāsane ālayakaraṇavasena vassūpagamanaṃ anuññātaṃ,
tika-vin07t0:457_13: Katikavattānīti bhassārāmatādiṃ vihāya sabbadā appamattehi bhavitabbantiādikatikavattāni.
tika-vin07t0:457_14: Khandhakavattānīti “āgantukādikhandhakavattaṃ pūretabba”nti evaṃ khandhakavattāni ca adhiṭṭhahitvā.
tika-vin07t0:458_0: Vassaṃvutthāti padassa aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “purimikāya upagatā mahāpavāraṇāya pavāritā pāṭipadadivasato paṭṭhāya
tika-vin07t0:458_1: ‘vutthavassā’ti vuccantī”ti vuttattā mahāpavāraṇādivase pavāretvā vā appavāretvā vā aññattha gacchantehi
tika-vin07t0:458_6: vassaṃ upagantvā purimaṃ vā temāsaṃ pacchimaṃ vā temāsaṃ avasitvā cārikā pakkamitabbā”ti ca vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:458_12: vassaṃvutthānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ tīhi ṭhānehi pavāretunti pavāraṇākammassa pubbeyeva vassaṃvutthānanti vutthavassatāya
tika-vin07t0:458_13: vuttattā mahāpavāraṇādivase sattāhakaraṇīyanimittaṃ vināpi yathāsukhaṃ gantuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti vadanti,
tika-vin07t0:458_16: na pana pavāraṇādivase avasitvā pakkamitabbanti dassanatthaṃ tadatthassa idha pasaṅgābhāvā,
tika-vin07t0:458_17: pavāraṇaṃ kātuṃ anucchavikānaṃ pavāraṇā idha vidhīyati,
tika-vin07t0:458_18: ye ca vassaṃ upagantvā vassacchedañca akatvā yāva pavāraṇādivasā vasiṃsu,
tika-vin07t0:458_19: te tattakena pavāraṇākammaṃ pati pariyāyato vutthavassāti vuccanti,
tika-vin07t0:458_20: appakaṃ ūnamadhikaṃ vā gaṇanūpagaṃ na hotīti ñāyato,
tika-vin07t0:458_25: vassaṃvutthānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ kathinaṃ attharitu”nti idaṃ pana “na,
tika-vin07t0:458_27: vassaṃ upagantvā purimaṃ vā temāsaṃ pacchimaṃ vā temāsaṃ avasitvā cārikā pakkamitabbā”tiādi ca nippariyāyato
tika-vin07t0:458_28: mahāpavāraṇāya anantarapāṭipadadivasato paṭṭhāya kathinatthāraṃ pakkamanañca sandhāya vuttaṃ,
tika-vin07t0:458_29: parivāre ca “kathinassa atthāramāso jānitabbo”ti vatvā “vassānassa pacchimo māso jānitabbo”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:458_33: Yadaggena hi pavāraṇādivase kathinatthāro na vaṭṭati,
tika-vin07t0:458_34: tadaggena bhikkhūpi vutthavassā na honti pavāraṇādivasassa avutthattā.
tika-vin07t0:459_0: Yaṃ pana sāratthadīpaniyaṃ “ekadesena avutthampi taṃ divasaṃ vutthabhāgāpekkhāya vutthameva hotī”tiādi vuttaṃ,
tika-vin07t0:459_2: taṃdivasapariyosāne aruṇuggamanakāle vasantova hi taṃ divasaṃ vuttho nāma hoti parivāsaaraññavāsādīsu viya,
tika-vin07t0:459_3: ayañca vicāraṇā upari vassūpanāyikakkhandhake āvi bhavissatīti tattheva taṃ pākaṭaṃ karissāma.
tika-vin07t0:460_0: Mahāpavāraṇāya pavāritāti purimikāya vassaṃ upagantvā acchinnavassatādassanaparaṃ etaṃ kenaci antarāyena appavāritānampi vutthavassattā.
tika-vin07t0:460_4: Anavayoti ettha anusaddo vicchāyaṃ vattatīti āha anu anu avayotiādi.
tika-vin07t0:461_2: saddappayoge anāgatappaccayavidhānaṃ sandhāya tassa lakkhaṇantiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:461_4: anupaparikkhitvā karaṇena pana bahūnaṃ pāṇānaṃ maraṇattā pāṇe byābādhentassātiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:461_6: Pāṇātipātaṃ karontānanti therena akatepi pāṇātipāte pāṇakānaṃ maraṇamattena pacchimānaṃ lesena gahaṇākāraṃ dasseti,
tika-vin07t0:461_7: tena ca “mama tādisaṃ akusalaṃ natthī”ti pacchimānaṃ vipallāsalesaggahaṇanimittakiccaṃ na kattabbanti dīpitaṃ hoti.
tika-vin07t0:461_12: Kataṃ labhitvā tattha vasantānampi dukkaṭamevāti idaṃ bhagavatā kuṭiyā bhedāpanavacanena siddhaṃ,
tika-vin07t0:461_13: sāpi tiṇadabbasambhārehi tulāthambhādīhi amissā suddhamattikāmayāpi iṭṭhakāhi katā vaṭṭati.
tika-vin07t0:461_14: Keci hi iṭṭhakāhiyeva thambhe cinitvā tadupari iṭṭhakāhiyeva vitānādisaṇṭhānena tulādidārusambhāravirahitaṃ
tika-vin07t0:461_17: Giñjakāvasathasaṅkhepena katāti ettha giñjakā vuccanti iṭṭhakā,
tika-vin07t0:461_24: saddena attanā vuttakāraṇadvayampi mahāaṭṭhakathāyameva vuttanti dasseti.
tika-vin07t0:461_25: Yasmā sabbamattikāmayā kuṭi sītakāle atisītā uṇhakāle ca uṇhā sukarā ca hoti corehi bhindituṃ,
tika-vin07t0:461_26: tasmā tattha ṭhapitapattacīvarādikaṃ sītuṇhacorādīhi vinassatīti vuttaṃ “pattacīvaraguttatthāyā”ti.
tika-vin07t0:461_27: Chindāpeyya vā bhindāpeyya vā anupavajjoti idaṃ ayaṃ kuṭi viya sabbathā anupayogārahaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:463_0: Chattadaṇḍaggāhakaṃ salākapañjaranti ettha yo pañjarasalākānaṃ majjhaṭṭho bunde puthulo ahicchattakasadiso
tika-vin07t0:463_1: agge sachiddo yattha daṇḍantaraṃ pavesetvā chattaṃ gaṇhanti,
tika-vin07t0:463_2: yo vā sayameva dīghatāya gahaṇadaṇḍo hoti,
tika-vin07t0:463_4: tassa aparigaḷanatthāya chattasalākānaṃ mūlappadesadaṇḍassa samantato daḷhapañjaraṃ katvā suttehi vinandhanti,
tika-vin07t0:463_7: Na vaṇṇamaṭṭhatthāyāti iminā thirakaraṇatthameva ekavaṇṇasuttena vinandhiyamānaṃ yadi vaṇṇamaṭṭhaṃ hoti,
tika-vin07t0:464_4: Paṭṭamukheti dvinnaṃ paṭṭānaṃ saṅghaṭitaṭṭhānaṃ sandhāyetaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:464_9: veṇiṃ vā saṅkhalikaṃ vā karontīti pakatena sambandho.
tika-vin07t0:464_14: Koṇasuttapiḷakāti gaṇṭhikapāsakapaṭṭānaṃ koṇehi bahi niggatasuttānaṃ piḷakākārena ṭhapitakoṭiyoti keci vadanti,
tika-vin07t0:464_15: te piḷake chinditvā duviññeyyā kātabbāti tesaṃ adhippāyo.
tika-vin07t0:464_16: Keci pana “koṇasuttā ca piḷakāti dveyevā”ti vadanti,
tika-vin07t0:464_17: tesaṃ matena gaṇṭhikapāsakapaṭṭānaṃ koṇato koṇehi nīhatasuttā koṇasuttā nāma.
tika-vin07t0:464_18: Samantato pana pariyantena katā caturassasuttā piḷakā nāma.
tika-vin07t0:464_19: Taṃ duvidhampi keci cīvarato visuṃ paññāyanatthāya vikārayuttaṃ karonti,
tika-vin07t0:464_21: na pana sabbathā acakkhugocarabhāvena sibbanatthāya tathāsibbanassa asakkuṇeyyattā.
tika-vin07t0:464_24: Rajanakammato pubbe paññāyamānopi viseso cīvare ratte ekavaṇṇatāya na paññāyatīti āha “cīvare ratte”ti.
tika-vin07t0:464_26: aṃsavaddhakakāyabandhanādikaṃ pana acīvarattā saṅkhādīhi ghaṃsituṃ vaṭṭatīti vadanti.
tika-vin07t0:464_27: Kaṇṇasuttakanti cīvarassa dīghato tiriyañca sibbitānaṃ catūsu kaṇṇesu koṇesu ca nikkhantānaṃ suttasīsānametaṃ nāmaṃ,
tika-vin07t0:464_31: taṃ pana nāmena sadisampi ito aññamevāti dassetuṃ yaṃ panātiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:465_0: Thālake vāti tambādimaye puggalike tividhepi kappiyathālake.
tika-vin07t0:465_5: cittāni pattamaṇḍalāni dhāretabbāni rūpakākiṇṇāni bhittikammakatānī”ti vuttattā “bhittikammaṃ na vaṭṭatī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:465_8: makaradantakaṃ chinditu”nti vuttattā “makaradantakaṃ pana vaṭṭatī”ti vuttaṃ,
tika-vin07t0:465_9: idaṃ pana pāḷiyā laddhampi idha pāḷiyā muttattā pāḷimuttakanaye vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:466_0: Lekhā na vaṭṭatīti āraggena dinnalekhāva na vaṭṭati,
tika-vin07t0:467_2: Ekameva vaṭṭatīti ettha ekarajjukaṃ diguṇaṃ tiguṇaṃ katvāpi bandhituṃ na vaṭṭati,
tika-vin07t0:467_3: ekameva pana satavārampi sarīraṃ parikkhipitvā bandhituṃ vaṭṭati,
tika-vin07t0:467_4: bahurajjuke ekato katvā ekena nirantaraṃ veṭhetvā kataṃ “bahurajjuka”nti na vattabbaṃ “vaṭṭatī”ti vuttattā,
tika-vin07t0:467_6: Murajañhi nānāvaṇṇehi suttehi murajavaṭṭisaṇṭhānaṃ veṭhetvā kataṃ,
tika-vin07t0:467_7: idaṃ pana murajaṃ maddavīṇasaṅkhātaṃ pāmaṅgasaṇṭhānañca dasāsu vaṭṭati “kāyabandhanassa dasā jīranti;
tika-vin07t0:468_0: Vidheti dasāpariyosāne thirabhāvāya dantavisāṇasuttādīhi kattabbe vidhe.
tika-vin07t0:468_1: Aṭṭha maṅgalāni nāma saṅkho cakkaṃ puṇṇakumbho gayā sirīvaccho aṅkuso dhajaṃ sovattikanti vadanti.
tika-vin07t0:468_3: Paricchedalekhāmattanti dantādīhi katavidhassa ubhosu koṭīsu kataparicchedarājimattaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:469_0: “Ujukamevā”ti vuttattā caturassādisaṇṭhānāpi añjanī vaṅkagatikā na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin07t0:469_7: Valitakanti nakhacchedanakāle daḷhaggahaṇatthaṃ valīhi yuttameva karonti.
tika-vin07t0:469_8: Tasmā taṃ vaṭṭatīti iminā yaṃ aññampi vikāraṃ daḷhīkammādiatthāya karonti,
tika-vin07t0:469_11: tena ca kattaradaṇḍakoṭiyaṃ aññamaññampi ghaṭṭanena saddaniccharaṇatthāya kataṃ ayovalayādikaṃ saṃyuttampi kappiyato upapannaṃ hoti.
tika-vin07t0:469_14: ubhosu vā passesu ekapasse vāti vacanaseso.
tika-vin07t0:469_15: Vāsidaṇḍassa ubhosu passesu daṇḍakoṭīnaṃ acalanatthaṃ bandhitunti attho.
tika-vin07t0:470_0: Āmaṇḍasāraketi āmalakaphalāni pisitvā tena kakkena katatelabhājane.
tika-vin07t0:470_1: Tattha kira pakkhittaṃ telaṃ sītalaṃ hoti.
tika-vin07t0:470_5: vaṭṭatīti yathāvuttesu mañcādīsu itthipurisarūpampi vaṭṭati telabhājanesuyeva itthipurisarūpānaṃ paṭikkhittattā,
tika-vin07t0:470_6: telabhājanena saha agaṇetvā visuṃ mañcādīnaṃ gahitattā cāti vadanti,
tika-vin07t0:470_8: etesaṃ pana mañcādīnaṃ hatthena āmasitabbabhaṇḍattā itthirūpamevettha na vaṭṭatīti gahetabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:470_10: Rājavallabhehīti lajjīpesalādīnaṃ uposathādiantarāyakarā alajjino bhinnaladdhikā ca bhikkhū adhippetā tehi saha uposathādikaraṇāyogā,
tika-vin07t0:470_12: Tesaṃ lajjīparisāti tesaṃ sīmāsāmikānaṃ anubalaṃ dātuṃ samatthā lajjīparisā.
tika-vin07t0:470_13: Bhikkhūhi katanti yaṃ alajjīnaṃ senāsanabhedanādikaṃ lajjībhikkhūhi kataṃ,
tika-vin07t0:471_2: Ujjhāyanatthoti bhikkhuno theyyakammanindanattho “kathañhi nāma adinnaṃ ādiyissatī”ti,
tika-vin07t0:471_7: Bimbisāroti tassa nāmanti ettha bimbīti suvaṇṇaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:471_9: Porāṇasatthānurūpaṃ uppādito vīsatimāsappamāṇauttamasuvaṇṇagghanako lakkhaṇasampanno nīlakahāpaṇoti veditabbo.
tika-vin07t0:471_12: Yasmiṃ pana dese nīlakahāpaṇā na santi,
tika-vin07t0:471_13: tatthāpi kāḷakavirahitassa niddhantasuvaṇṇassa pañcamāsagghanakena bhaṇḍena pādaparicchedo kātabbo.
tika-vin07t0:471_15: Pārājikavatthumhi vātiādi pārājikānaṃ sabbabuddhehi paññattabhāvena vuttaṃ,
tika-vin07t0:471_16: saṅghādisesādīsu pana itarāpattīsupi tabbatthūsu ca nānattaṃ nattheva,
tika-vin07t0:471_19: Na hi kadācipi sammāsambuddhā yathāparādhaṃ atikkamma ūnamadhikaṃ vā sikkhāpadaṃ paññapenti.
tika-vin07t0:473_1: Punapi “āgantukāmā”ti vuttattā ca sabbathā manussehi anivutthapubbe abhinavamāpite,
tika-vin07t0:473_2: “puna na pavisissāmā”ti nirālayehi pariccatte ca gāme gāmavohārābhāvā gāmappavesanāpucchanādikiccaṃ natthīti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:473_3: Araññaparicchedadassanatthanti gāmagāmūpacāresu dassitesu tadaññaṃ araññanti araññaparicchedo sakkā ñātunti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:473_4: Mātikāyaṃ pana gāmaggahaṇeneva gāmūpacāropi gahitoti daṭṭhabbo.
tika-vin07t0:473_7: Asatipi indakhīle indakhīlaṭṭhāniyattā “vemajjhameva indakhīloti vuccatī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:474_0: Majjhimassa purisassa suppapāto vātiādi mātugāmassa kākuṭṭhāpanavasena gahetabbaṃ,
tika-vin07t0:474_1: na baladassanavasena “mātugāmo bhājanadhovanaudakaṃ chaḍḍetī”ti upari vuccamānattā,
tika-vin07t0:474_3: Kurundaṭṭhakathāyaṃ mahāpaccariyañca gharūpacārova gāmoti adhippāyena “gharūpacāre ṭhitassa leḍḍupāto gāmūpacāro”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:474_4: Kataparikkhepoti iminā parikkhepato bahi upacāro na gahetabboti dasseti.
tika-vin07t0:474_9: Yassa pana gharassa samantato pākārādīhi parikkhepo kato hoti,
tika-vin07t0:475_2: Vikāle gāmappavesane “parikkhittassa gāmassa parikkhepaṃ atikkamantassa āpatti pācittiyassa.
tika-vin07t0:475_3: Aparikkhittassa gāmassa upacāraṃ okkamantassa āpatti pācittiyassā”ti vuttattā gāmagāmūpacārānaṃ asaṅkaratā icchitabbāti āha asaṅkarato cātiādi.
tika-vin07t0:475_4: Keci panettha pāḷiyaṃ “aparikkhittassa gāmassa upacāraṃ okkamantassāti idaṃ parikkhepārahaṭṭhānaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ,
tika-vin07t0:475_8: taṃ na gahetabbaṃ “gharūpacāre ṭhitassa majjhimassa purisassa leḍḍupātabbhantaraṃ gāmo nāma.
tika-vin07t0:475_9: Tato aññassa leḍḍupātassa abbhantaraṃ gāmūpacāro nāmā”ti idheva aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttattā.
tika-vin07t0:475_10: Vikāle gāmappavesanasikkhāpadaṭṭhakathāyañhi aparikkhittassa gāmassa upacāro adinnādāne vuttanayeneva veditabboti ayameva nayo atidisito.
tika-vin07t0:475_11: Teneva mātikāṭṭhakathāyampi “yvāyaṃ aparikkhittassa gāmassa upacāro dassito,
tika-vin07t0:475_12: tassa vasena vikāle gāmappavesanādīsu āpatti paricchinditabbā”ti vuttaṃ,
tika-vin07t0:475_14: aparikkhittassa gāmassa gharūpacārato paṭṭhāya dutiyaleḍḍupātasaṅkhātaṃ gāmūpacāraṃ okkamantassa vikāle gāmappavesanāpatti hoti,
tika-vin07t0:475_15: mātikāyañca vikāle gāmaṃ paviseyyāti gāmaggahaṇeneva gāmūpacāropi gahitoti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:476_0: Nikkhamitvā bahi indakhīlāti indakhīlato bahi nikkhamitvā ṭhitaṃ yaṃ ṭhānaṃ sabbametaṃ araññanti yojanā.
tika-vin07t0:477_0: Kappiyanti anurūpavasena vuttaṃ akappiyassāpi appaṭiggahitassa paribhoge pācittiyattā.
tika-vin07t0:477_1: Pariccāgādimhi akate “idaṃ mayhaṃ santaka”nti vatthusāminā aviditampi pariggahitameva bālummattādīnaṃ santakaṃ viya,
tika-vin07t0:477_2: tādisaṃ avaharantopi ñātakādīhi pacchā ñatvā vatthusāminā ca anubandhitabbato pārājikova hoti.
tika-vin07t0:477_6: Eko cittakoṭṭhāsoti ṭhānācāvanapayogasamuṭṭhāpako eko cittakoṭṭhāsoti attho.
tika-vin07t0:478_1: Saviññāṇakenevāti idaṃ saviññāṇakānaññeva āveṇikavinicchayaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:478_2: Pāṇo apadantiādīsu hi “padasā nessāmī”ti paṭhamaṃ pādaṃ saṅkāmeti,
tika-vin07t0:478_4: bhikkhu dāsaṃ disvā sukhadukkhaṃ pucchitvā vā apucchitvā vā “gaccha,
tika-vin07t0:478_7: dutiyapadavāre pārājikantiādinā aṭṭhakathāyañca yo saviññāṇakānaññeva āveṇiko vinicchayo vutto,
tika-vin07t0:478_8: so ārāmādiaviññāṇakesu na labbhatīti tādisaṃ sandhāya “saviññāṇakenevā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:478_10: so yasmā saviññāṇakesu alabbhanako nāma natthi,
tika-vin07t0:478_13: Yasmā cettha aviññāṇakeneva ādiyanādīni chapi padāni na sakkā yojetuṃ iriyāpathavikopanassa saviññāṇakavaseneva yojetabbato,
tika-vin07t0:478_14: tasmā “aviññāṇakenevā”ti tatiyaṃ pakāraṃ na vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:479_0: Ārāmanti idaṃ upalakkhaṇamattaṃ dāsādisaviññāṇakassāpi idha saṅgahetabbato,
tika-vin07t0:479_3: Suṅkaghātanti ettha maggaṃ gacchantehi satthikehi attanā nīyamānabhaṇḍato rañño dātabbabhāgo suṅko nāma,
tika-vin07t0:479_4: so ettha haññati adatvā gacchantehi avaharīyati,
tika-vin07t0:479_5: taṃ vā hanti ettha rājapurisā adadantānaṃ santakaṃ balakkārenāti suṅkaghāto,
tika-vin07t0:479_6: “ettha paviṭṭhehi suṅko dātabbo”ti rukkhapabbatādisaññāṇena niyamitappadesassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:481_3: garuko ca hoti parikkhāro pañcamāsako vā atirekapañcamāsako vā,
tika-vin07t0:481_5: ṭhānā cāvetī”ti vuttapañcaavahāraṅgāni ekaṃ pañcakanti dassitaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:481_6: Dve pañcakāni dassitānīti “chahi ākārehi adinnaṃ ādiyantassa āpatti pārājikassa.
tika-vin07t0:481_10: garuko ca hoti parikkhāro pañcamāsako vā atirekapañcamāsako vā,
tika-vin07t0:481_13: āpatti pārājikassā”ti evaṃ vuttesu chasu padesu ekaṃ apanetvā sesāni pañca padāni ekaṃ pañcakaṃ katvā
tika-vin07t0:481_14: heṭṭhā vuttapañcakañca gahetvā dve pañcakāni dassitāni.
tika-vin07t0:481_16: Sabbehipi padehīti parapariggahitañca hotītiādīhi sabbehi pañcahi padehi.
tika-vin07t0:482_8: theyyāvahārapañcake labbhamānassa parikappāvahārapadassa ca vasena yojetabbanti attho.
tika-vin07t0:483_3: āpatti pārājikassā”ti vuttattā pana suddhacittena gahitaparabhaṇḍassa theyyacittena gumbādipaṭicchannaṭṭhāne
tika-vin07t0:483_5: Kiriyāsiddhito puretarameva pārājikāpattisaṅkhātaṃ atthaṃ sādhetīti atthasādhako.
tika-vin07t0:483_6: Atha vā attano vattamānakkhaṇe avijjamānampi kiriyāsiddhisaṅkhātaṃ atthaṃ avassaṃ āpattiṃ sādhetītipi atthasādhako.
tika-vin07t0:483_7: Asukaṃ nāma bhaṇḍaṃ yadā sakkosīti idaṃ nidassanamattaṃ parassa telakumbhiyā upāhanādīnaṃ nikkhepapayogassāpi atthasādhakattā.
tika-vin07t0:484_2: Tattha sace paro anantarāyiko hutvā taṃ avaharati,
tika-vin07t0:484_4: Parassa vā pana telakumbhiyā pādagghanakatelaṃ avassaṃ pivanakāni upāhanādīni pakkhipati,
tika-vin07t0:485_0: Imassa atthasādhakassa āṇattiyā ca ko visesoti?
tika-vin07t0:485_2: kālantarena gahaṇatthaṃ niyogo atthasādhakoti ayaṃ nesaṃ viseso.
tika-vin07t0:485_4: Dhuranikkhepo pana upanikkhittabhaṇḍavasena veditabboti idaṃ nidassanamattaṃ,
tika-vin07t0:485_6: Bhaṇḍaggahaṇappayogato āṇattiyā pubbattā āha “āṇattivasena pubbapayogo veditabbo”ti.
tika-vin07t0:485_7: Payogena saha vattamāno avahāro sahapayogoti āha “ṭhānācāvanavasenā”ti,
tika-vin07t0:485_8: idañca nidassanamattaṃ khīlasaṅkamanādīsupi asati ṭhānācāvane sahapayogattā.
tika-vin07t0:485_9: Vuttañhi mātikāṭṭhakathāyaṃ “ṭhānācāvanavasena khīlādīni saṅkāmetvā khettādiggahaṇavasena ca sahapayogo veditabbo”ti.
tika-vin07t0:486_5: Attano santakaṃ katvā etasseva bhikkhuno dehīti idaṃ ubhinnampi kukkuccavinodanatthaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:486_8: itarassa ca “mayā paṭhamaṃ dhuranikkhepaṃ katvā pacchā adinnaṃ gahita”nti kukkuccaṃ uppajjeyyāti.
tika-vin07t0:487_2: Ekadivasaṃ dantakaṭṭhacchedanādinā yā ayaṃ agghahāni vuttā,
tika-vin07t0:487_3: sā sabbā bhaṇḍasāminā kiṇitvā gahitameva sandhāya vuttā.
tika-vin07t0:488_2: tattha nisīditvā vajjāvajjaṃ nirūpayantīti “akkhadassā”ti vuccanti dhammavinicchanakā.
tika-vin07t0:488_3: Hananaṃ nāma hatthapādādīhi pothanañceva hatthanāsādicchedanañca hotīti āha “haneyyunti potheyyuñceva chindeyyuñcā”ti.
tika-vin07t0:489_0: Padabhājanīyañca “hatthena vā pādena vā kasāya vā vettena vā aḍḍhadaṇḍakena vā chajjāya vā haneyyu”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:489_8: thenosī”ti ettha paribhāseyyunti padaṃ ajjhāharitvā attho veditabboti āha “corosi…pe…
tika-vin07t0:490_1: Yattha yattha ṭhitanti bhūmiyādīsu yattha yattha ṭhitaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:490_2: Yathā yathā ādānaṃ gacchatīti yena yena ākārena gahaṇaṃ upagacchati.
tika-vin07t0:492_3: Pāḷiyaṃ sesaaṭṭhakathāsu ca kudālaṃ vā piṭakaṃ vāti idameva dvayaṃ vatvā vāsipharasūnaṃ avuttattā tesampi
tika-vin07t0:493_0: Aṭṭhavidhaṃ hetantiādīsu etaṃ dukkaṭaṃ nāma therehi dhammasaṅgāhakehi imasmiṃ ṭhāne samodhānetvā aṭṭhavidhanti dassitanti yojanā.
tika-vin07t0:493_1: Sabbesampi dukkaṭānaṃ imesuyeva aṭṭhasu saṅgahetabbabhāvato pana itarehi sattahi dukkaṭehi vinimuttaṃ vinayadukkaṭeyeva saṅgahetabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:493_2: Dasavidhaṃ ratananti “muttā maṇi veḷuriyo saṅkho silā pavāḷaṃ rajataṃ jātarūpaṃ lohitako masāragalla”nti evamāgataṃ dasavidhaṃ ratanaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:498_1: Sattavidhaṃ dhaññanti sāli vīhi yavo kaṅgu kudrūsaṃ varako godhumoti imaṃ sattavidhaṃ dhaññaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:498_5: Durūpaciṇṇadukkaṭanti “akattabba”nti vāritassa katattā duṭṭhu upaciṇṇaṃ caritanti durūpaciṇṇaṃ,
tika-vin07t0:498_8: Ekādasa samanubhāsanā nāma bhikkhupātimokkhe cattāro yāvatatiyakā saṅghādisesā ariṭṭhasikkhāpadanti pañca,
tika-vin07t0:498_9: bhikkhunīpātimokkhe ekaṃ yāvatatiyakapārājikaṃ cattāro saṅghādisesā caṇḍakāḷīsikkhāpadanti cha.
tika-vin07t0:499_0: Sahapayogato paṭṭhāya cettha purimapurimā āpattiyo paṭippassambhantīti āha atha dhuranikkhepaṃ akatvātiādi.
tika-vin07t0:499_1: “Dhuranikkhepaṃ akatvā”ti vuttattā dhuranikkhepaṃ katvā puna khaṇantassa purimāpattiyo na paṭippassambhantīti vadanti.
tika-vin07t0:499_2: “Chedanapaccayā dukkaṭaṃ desetvā muccatī”ti vatvā pubbapayoge āpattīnaṃ desetabbatāya avuttattā sahapayoge
tika-vin07t0:500_0: Aparaddhaṃ viraddhaṃ khalitanti sabbametaṃ yañca dukkaṭanti ettha vuttassa dukkaṭassa pariyāyavacanaṃ,
tika-vin07t0:500_6: phandāpane thullaccayañca visuṃ visuṃ āmasanaphandāpanapayogaṃ karontasseva hoti,
tika-vin07t0:500_9: ekapayogena gaṇhantassāpi āmasanaphandāpanānampi labbhamānattā taṃ na gahetabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:500_10: Na hi sakkā anāmasitvā aphandāpetvā ca kiñci gahetuṃ.
tika-vin07t0:500_11: “Ekameva desetvā muccatī”ti paṃsukhaṇanādisamānapayogepi purimā āpatti uttaramuttaraṃ āpattiṃ patvā paṭippassambhantīti
tika-vin07t0:500_13: itaraṭṭhakathāsu pana khaṇanapayogabhedehi payoge payoge āpannā āpattiyo uttaramuttaraṃ patvā na paṭippassambhanti
tika-vin07t0:500_14: aññamaññaṃ sadisattā viyūhanaṃ patvā tā sabbāpi paṭippassambhanti visadisapayogattāti iminā adhippāyena
tika-vin07t0:500_16: Iminā hi avahārakassa āsannaṃ orimantaṃ parāmasati.
tika-vin07t0:501_2: Ekaṭṭhāne ṭhitāya kumbhiyā ṭhānā cāvanaṃ chahi ākārehi veditabbanti sambandho.
tika-vin07t0:501_3: Ekaṭṭhāneti ca saṅkhalikabaddhabhāvena ekasmiṃ patiṭṭhitokāsaṭṭhāneti attho.
tika-vin07t0:501_4: Khāṇukaṃ kesaggamattampi ṭhānā cāvetīti khāṇukaṃ attano patiṭṭhitaṭṭhānato pañcahi ākārehi ṭhānā cāveti.
tika-vin07t0:501_8: Apabyūhantoti ṭhitaṭṭhānato apanayanavasena viyūhanto rāsiṃ karonto.
tika-vin07t0:501_9: Evaṃ katvāti bhājanamukhavaṭṭiyā kumbhigatena bhājanagatassa ekābaddhabhāvaṃ viyojetvāti attho.
tika-vin07t0:501_14: Kaṇṭhena pana paricchinnakāleti mukhagataṃ ajjhohaṭakāleti attho.
tika-vin07t0:502_0: Yopi theyyacittena parassa kumbhiyā pādagghanakaṃ sappiṃ vā telaṃ vā avassaṃ pivanakaṃ yaṃ kiñci dukūlasāṭakaṃ
tika-vin07t0:502_2: hatthato muttamatte pārājikanti ettha avahāro vīmaṃsitabbo.
tika-vin07t0:502_3: Yadi ca dukūlādīsu sappitelānaṃ pavisanaṃ sandhāya pārājikaṃ bhaveyya,
tika-vin07t0:502_4: tattha paviṭṭhatelādino kumbhigatena ekābaddhatāya na tāva avahāro bhājanantaraṃ pavesetvā gahaṇakāle viya.
tika-vin07t0:502_6: “bhājanaṃ pana nimujjāpetvā gaṇhantassa yāva ekābaddhaṃ hoti,
tika-vin07t0:502_11: tathā ca pādagghanakaṃ telādiṃ pītaṃ dukūlādiṃ uddharantassāpi pārājikaṃ na siyā tattha paviṭṭhassa telādino
tika-vin07t0:502_15: Sabbaaṭṭhakathāsu ca dukūlādīnaṃ pakkhipane hatthato muttamatte pārājikassa vuttattā na taṃ paṭikkhipituṃ sakkā.
tika-vin07t0:502_17: yutti panettha paṇḍitehi pubbāparaṃ saṃsanditvā uddhāretabbā.
