tika-vin07t0:503_6: Bahigataṃ nāma hotīti tato paṭṭhāya telassa aṭṭhānato adhomukhabhāvato ca bahigataṃ nāma hoti.
tika-vin07t0:503_7: Anto paṭṭhāya chidde kariyamāne telassa nikkhamitvā gatagataṭṭhānaṃ bhājanasaṅkhyameva gacchatīti āha “bāhirantato pādagghanake gaḷite pārājika”nti.
tika-vin07t0:503_8: Yathā tathā vā katassāti bāhirantato vā abbhantarantato vā paṭṭhāya katassa.
tika-vin07t0:503_9: Majjhe ṭhapetvā katachiddeti majjhe thokaṃ kapālaṃ ṭhapetvā pacchā taṃ chindantena katachidde.
tika-vin07t0:504_0: Patthīnassa khādanaṃ itarassa pānañca sappiādīnaṃ paribhogoti āha “akhāditabbaṃ vā apātabbaṃ vā karotī”ti.
tika-vin07t0:504_1: Kasmā panettha dukkaṭaṃ vuttanti āha “ṭhānācāvanassa natthitāya dukkaṭa”nti.
tika-vin07t0:504_6: chaḍḍanaṃ mātikāya ujukaraṇena ca saddhiṃ ekasabhāvaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:504_8: Ettha evaṃ vinicchayaṃ vadantīti etasmiṃ mahāaṭṭhakathāyaṃ vutte atthe eke ācariyā evaṃ vinicchayaṃ vadanti.
tika-vin07t0:504_9: Pacchimadvayaṃ sandhāya vuttanti ettha purimapadadvaye vinicchayo heṭṭhā vuttānusārena sakkā viññātunti
tika-vin07t0:504_10: tattha kiñci avatvā pacchimapadadvayaṃ sandhāya “ṭhānācāvanassa natthitāya dukkaṭa”nti idaṃ vuttanti
tika-vin07t0:504_12: Theyyacittenāti attano vā parassa vā kātukāmatāvasena uppannatheyyacittena.
tika-vin07t0:504_13: Vināsetukāmatāyāti hatthapādādīni chindanto viya kevalaṃ vināsetukāmatāya.
tika-vin07t0:504_14: Vuttanayena bhindantassa vā chaḍḍentassa vāti muggarena pothetvā bhindantassa vā udakaṃ vā vālikaṃ vā ākiritvā uttarāpentassa vāti attho.
tika-vin07t0:504_15: Ayuttanti ceti pāḷiyaṃ purimadvayepi dukkaṭasseva vuttattā “purimadvaye pārājika”nti idaṃ ayuttanti yadi tumhākaṃ siyāti attho.
tika-vin07t0:504_16: Nāti ayuttabhāvaṃ nisedhetvā tattha kāraṇamāha “aññathā gahetabbatthato”ti.
tika-vin07t0:505_0: Evameke vadantīti heṭṭhā vuttassa atthanayassa attanā anabhimatabhāvaṃ dassetvā sayaṃ aññathāpi pāḷiṃ
tika-vin07t0:505_1: aṭṭhakathañca saṃsanditvā atthaṃ dassetukāmo ayaṃ panettha sārotiādimāha.
tika-vin07t0:505_4: Idañhi theyyacittapakkhaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ nāsetukāmatāpakkhassa vakkhamānattā.
tika-vin07t0:505_6: Itarathāpi yujjatīti theyyacittābhāvā ṭhānā cāvetukāmassāpi dukkaṭaṃ yujjatīti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-vin07t0:508_3: Aparikkhitte pana vatthumhi gāme vā ṭhitaṭṭhānameva ṭhānaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:508_5: rakkhatīti tena payogena tassa icchitaṭṭhānaṃ āgatattā rakkhati.
tika-vin07t0:508_7: Kapiñjaro nāma aññamaññaṃ yujjhāpanatthāya bālajanehi posāvaniyapakkhijāti.
tika-vin07t0:510_1: Vehāsaṭṭhakathāyaṃ chinnamatte muttamatteti yathā chinnaṃ muttañca pakatiṭṭhāne na tiṭṭhati,
tika-vin07t0:512_1: Udakaṭṭhakathāyaṃ sandamānaudake nikkhittaṃ na tiṭṭhatīti āha “asandanake udake”ti.
tika-vin07t0:512_2: Anāpattīti hatthavārapadavāresu dukkaṭāpattiyā abhāvaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:512_5: Na udakaṃ ṭhānanti attanā kataṭṭhānassa aṭṭhānattā.
tika-vin07t0:512_7: Kalāpabandhanti hatthakavasena khuddakaṃ katvā baddhaṃ kalāpabaddhaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:512_10: Pattaṃ vā pupphaṃ vāti idaṃ kaddamassa anto pavisitvā ṭhitaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:512_13: Avahārena so na kāretabboti iminā pāṇaṃ jīvitā voropane āpattiyā sabbattha na muccatīti dīpeti.
tika-vin07t0:512_16: tiṭṭhantīti ettha matamacchānaṃyeva tesaṃ santakattā amate gaṇhantassa natthi avahāro.
tika-vin07t0:514_1: Nāvaṭṭhakathāyaṃ thullaccayampi pārājikampi hotīti ettha paṭhamaṃ ṭhānā acāvetvā mutte thullaccayaṃ,
tika-vin07t0:514_2: paṭhamaṃ pana ṭhānā cāvetvā mutte pārājikanti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:514_3: Pāse baddhasūkaro viyātiādinā vuttaṃ sandhāyāha “tattha yutti pubbe vuttāevā”ti.
tika-vin07t0:514_5: bhijjitvā vā vināsaṃ patvā udake nimujjitvā heṭṭhā bhūmitalaṃ appatvā sāmikehi ca apariccattālayā vuccati.
tika-vin07t0:514_6: Balavā ca vāto āgammāti iminā asati vāte ayaṃ payogo katoti dasseti.
tika-vin07t0:514_7: Puggalassa natthi avahāroti sukkhamātikāyaṃ ujukaraṇanayena vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:514_8: Taṃ attano pādena anakkamitvā hatthena ca anukkhipitvā aññasmiṃ daṇḍādīsu bandhitvā ṭhapite yujjati,
tika-vin07t0:514_9: attano pādena akkamitvā hatthena ca ukkhipitvā ṭhitassa pana balavavātena chattacīvarādīsu pahaṭesu pakatiṃ
tika-vin07t0:514_10: vijahitvā daḷhataraṃ akkamanagahaṇādipayogo abhinavo kātabbo siyā.
tika-vin07t0:514_14: Tasmā īdise abhinavappayoge sati avahārena bhavitabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:514_15: Sukkhamātikāyaṃ ujukatāya udakāgamanakāle kātabbakiccaṃ natthīti taṃ idha nidassanaṃ na hoti.
tika-vin07t0:514_16: Dāsaṃ pana pakatiyā palāyantaṃ “sīghaṃ yāhī”ti vatvā pakatigamanato turitagamanuppādanādinā idha nidassanena bhavitabbanti amhākaṃ khanti,
tika-vin07t0:514_18: Vāte āgatepi yattha atilahukattā nāvāya kañci payogaṃ akatvā pakatiyā avahārako tiṭṭhati,
tika-vin07t0:516_1: Yānaṭṭhakathāyaṃ ubhosu passesūti catunnaṃ thambhānaṃ upari caturassaṃ dārusaṅghāṭaṃ āropetvā tassa vāmadakkhiṇapassesu
tika-vin07t0:516_2: ubhosu vātātapādiparissayavinodanatthaṃ garuḷapakkhino ubho pakkhā viya katā sandamānikā.
tika-vin07t0:516_5: Kappakatāti dvinnaṃ sikhānaṃ sandhiṭṭhāne gosiṅgāni viya dve koṭiyo ṭhapetvā upatthambhanī kappakatā nāma,
tika-vin07t0:516_8: Tīṇi vā cattāri vā ṭhānānīti akappakatāya upatthambhaniyā ca dvinnaṃ cakkānañca vasena tīṇi ṭhānāni,
tika-vin07t0:516_10: tathā pathaviyaṃ ṭhapitassa tīṇi ṭhānānīti sambandho.
tika-vin07t0:516_12: Akkhuddhīhīti akkhadārunā sampaṭicchakā heṭṭhimabhāge kappakatā dve dārukhaṇḍā akkhuddhiyo nāma,
tika-vin07t0:516_13: tāsaṃ kappakatānaṃ dvinnaṃ kappasīsāni cattāri idha “akkhuddhiyo”ti vuccanti,
tika-vin07t0:516_15: Tāhi patiṭṭhitāhi patiṭṭhitaṭṭhānāni cattāri dhurena patiṭṭhitaṭṭhānaṃ ekanti pañca ṭhānāni honti.
tika-vin07t0:516_17: uddhikhāṇukānaṃ abhāve akkhasīsānaṃ patiṭṭhānokāsaṃ dassento āha samameva bāhaṃ katvātiādi.
tika-vin07t0:516_18: Tattha samamevāti uddhiyo heṭṭhā anolambetvā bāhuno heṭṭhimabhāgaṃ samaṃ katvā dvinnaṃ bāhudārūnaṃ majjhe
tika-vin07t0:516_19: akkhasīsappamāṇena chiddaṃ katvā tattha akkhasīsāni pavesitāni honti,
tika-vin07t0:516_20: tena bāhānaṃ heṭṭhābhāgaṃ sabbaṃ bhūmiṃ phusitvā tiṭṭhati,
tika-vin07t0:516_22: Sesaṃ nāvāyaṃ vuttasadisanti iminā yadi pana taṃ evaṃ gacchantaṃ pakatigamanaṃ pacchinditvā aññaṃ disābhāgaṃ neti,
tika-vin07t0:516_24: Sayameva yaṃ kiñci ṭhānaṃ sampattaṃ ṭhānā acālentova vikkiṇitvā gacchati,
tika-vin07t0:516_26: bhaṇḍadeyyaṃ pana hotīti imaṃ nayaṃ atidisati.
tika-vin07t0:518_1: Bhāraṭṭhakathāyaṃ bhāraṭṭhanti mātikāpadassa bhāro nāmāti idaṃ atthadassananti āha “bhāroyeva bhāraṭṭha”nti.
tika-vin07t0:518_5: Sāmikehi anāṇattoti idaṃ yadi sāmikehi “imaṃ bhāraṃ netvā asukaṭṭhāne dehī”ti āṇatto bhaveyya,
tika-vin07t0:518_7: tañca theyyacittena sīsādito oropentassāpi avahāro na siyā,
tika-vin07t0:518_8: sāmikānaṃ pana dhuranikkhepe eva siyāti tato upanikkhittabhaṇḍabhāvato viyojetuṃ vuttaṃ,
tika-vin07t0:520_1: Ārāmaṭṭhakathāyaṃ ārāmaṃ abhiyuñjatīti idaṃ abhiyogakaraṇaṃ paresaṃ bhūmaṭṭhabhaṇḍādīsupi kātuṃ vaṭṭatiyeva.
tika-vin07t0:520_2: Ārāmādithāvaresu pana yebhuyyena abhiyogavaseneva gahaṇasambhavato ettheva pāḷiyaṃ abhiyogo vutto,
tika-vin07t0:520_3: iti iminā nayena sabbatthāpi sakkā ñātunti gahetabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:520_7: “Kiṃ karomi kiṃ karomī”ti evaṃ kiṅkārameva paṭissuṇanto viya caratīti kiṅkārapaṭissāvī,
tika-vin07t0:520_12: Ayaṃ vatthusāmītiādikassa ubhinnaṃ dhuranikkhepakaraṇahetuno payogassa karaṇakkhaṇeva pārājikaṃ hotīti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:520_13: Sace pana sāmikassa vimati ca dhuranikkhepo ca kamena uppajjanti,
tika-vin07t0:520_19: Dhuranikkhepavaseneva parājayoti sāmiko “ahaṃ na muccāmī”ti dhuraṃ anikkhipanto aṭṭo parājito nāma na hotīti dasseti.
tika-vin07t0:522_2: Pariveṇanti tassa vihārassa abbhantare visuṃ visuṃ pākārādiparicchinnaṭṭhānaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:522_4: Gaṇasantake paricchinnasāmikattā sakkā dhuraṃ nikkhipāpetunti āha “dīghabhāṇakādibhedassa pana gaṇassā”ti.
tika-vin07t0:522_5: Idhāpi sace ekopi dhuraṃ na nikkhipati,
tika-vin07t0:524_1: Khettaṭṭhakathāyaṃ nirumbhitvā vātiādīsu gaṇhantassāti paccekaṃ yojetabbaṃ,
tika-vin07t0:524_2: tattha nirumbhitvā gahaṇaṃ nāma vīhisīsaṃ acchinditvā yathāṭhitameva hatthena gahetvā ākaḍḍhitvā bījamattasseva gahaṇaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:524_4: Yasmiṃ bīje vātiādi nirumbhitvā gahaṇādīsu yathākkamaṃ yojetabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:524_5: “Tasmiṃ bandhanā mocitamatte”ti vacanato tasmiṃ bījādimhi bandhanā mutte sati tato anapanītepi ṭhānantarassa abhāvā pārājikameva.
tika-vin07t0:524_6: Yassa pana sīsādikassa santarādinā saha saṃsibbanaṃ vā ekābaddhatā vā hoti,
tika-vin07t0:524_12: Ettha ca khīlasaṅkamanādīsu sahapayogo dhuranikkhepo cāti ubhayaṃ sambhavati.
tika-vin07t0:524_14: Tasmiñca kate yadi sāmikā dhuraṃ na nikkhipanti puna gaṇhitukāmāva honti,
tika-vin07t0:524_16: “khīlaṃ saṅkāmetvā khettādiṃ asuko rājavallabho bhikkhu gaṇhitukāmo”ti ñatvā tassa balaṃ kakkhaḷādibhāvañca
tika-vin07t0:524_17: nissāya khīlasaṅkamanādikiriyāniṭṭhānato paṭhamameva sāmikā dhuraṃ nikkhipanti,
tika-vin07t0:524_18: na avahāro etassa payoganiṭṭhānato puretarameva dhurassa nikkhittattā.
tika-vin07t0:524_22: Khīlādīnaṃ saṅkamitabhāvaṃ ajānitvā sāmikānaṃ sampaṭicchanampettha dhuranikkhepoti veditabbo.
tika-vin07t0:524_26: tasmiṃ āgate pārājikanti sace dārūni nikhaṇitvā tattakeneva gaṇhitukāmo hoti,
tika-vin07t0:524_28: Sace tattha kaṇṭakasākhādīhi pādānaṃ antaraṃ paṭicchādetvā kassaci appavesārahaṃ katvā gahetukāmo hoti,
tika-vin07t0:524_31: dārūni ca nikhaṇitvā sākhāparivārañca katvā eva attano santakaṃ kātuṃ sakkotīti attho.
tika-vin07t0:526_0: 105. Vatthuṭṭhakathāyaṃ tiṇṇaṃ pākārānanti iṭṭhakasilādārūnaṃ vasena tiṇṇaṃ pākārānaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:527_0: 106. Gāmaṭṭhakathāyaṃ “gāmo nāmā”ti pāḷiyaṃ na vuttaṃ sabbaso gāmalakkhaṇassa pubbe vuttattā.
tika-vin07t0:529_2: Lakkhaṇacchinnassāti araññasāmikānaṃ hatthato kiṇitvā gaṇhantehi kataakkharādisaññāṇassa.
tika-vin07t0:529_3: Challiyā pariyonaddhanti iminā sāmikānaṃ nirāpekkhatāya cirachaḍḍitabhāvaṃ dīpeti,
tika-vin07t0:529_7: Tāni katāni ajjhāvutthāni ca hontīti tāni gehādīni katāni pariniṭṭhitāni manussehi ca ajjhāvutthāni ca honti.
tika-vin07t0:529_10: te ca yadi gahaṇakāle disvā sālayā hutvā vārenti,
tika-vin07t0:529_12: “Dehī”ti vutte dātabbamevāti “dehī”ti vutte “dassāmī”ti ābhogaṃ katvā gacchantassa “dehī”ti avutte adatvā gamane āpatti natthi.
tika-vin07t0:530_2: Ārakkhaṭṭhānampi suddhacittena atikkamitvā theyyacitte uppannepi avahāro natthi ārakkhaṭṭhānassa atikkantattā.
tika-vin07t0:530_3: Keci pana “yattha katthaci nītānampi dārūnaṃ araññasāmikānaññeva santakattā puna theyyacittaṃ uppādetvā gacchati,
tika-vin07t0:530_7: sahasā taṃ ṭhānaṃ atikkamatītiādinā ca ārakkhaṭṭhānātikkameyeva āpattiyā vuccamānattā,
tika-vin07t0:530_8: ārakkhaṭṭhānātikkamameva sandhāya “idaṃ pana theyyacittena pariharantassa ākāsena gacchatopi pārājikamevā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:530_9: Yañca “yattha katthaci nītānampi dārūnaṃ araññasāmikānaññeva santakattā”ti kāraṇaṃ vuttaṃ,
tika-vin07t0:530_10: tampi ārakkhaṭṭhānato bahi pārājikāpajjanassa kāraṇaṃ na hoti bhaṇḍadeyyabhāvasseva kāraṇattā.
tika-vin07t0:530_11: Tesaṃ santakatteneva hi bahi katassāpi bhaṇḍadeyyaṃ jātaṃ,
tika-vin07t0:530_12: itarathā ca bhaṇḍadeyyampi na siyā suṅkaghātātikkame viya.
tika-vin07t0:530_13: Addhikehi dinnameva suṅkikānaṃ santakaṃ hoti, nādinnaṃ,
tika-vin07t0:530_14: tena taṃ ṭhānaṃ yato kutoci paccayato suddhacittena atikkantassa bhaṇḍadeyyampi na hoti.
tika-vin07t0:530_15: Idha pana araññasāmikānaṃ santakattā sabbatthāpi bhaṇḍadeyyameva hoti,
tika-vin07t0:530_16: tenevetaṃ araññe ārakkhaṭṭhānaṃ suṅkaghātatopi garutaraṃ jātaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:530_17: Yadi hi ārakkhaṭṭhānato bahipi theyyacitte sati avahāro bhaveyya,
tika-vin07t0:530_18: ārakkhaṭṭhānaṃ patvātiādinā ṭhānaniyamo niratthako siyā yattha katthaci theyyacitte uppanne pārājikanti vattabbato.
tika-vin07t0:530_19: Tasmā ārakkhaṭṭhānato bahi theyyacittena gacchantassa avahāro na bhavati evāti niṭṭhamettha gantabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:530_20: Idaṃ pana theyyacittena pariharantassāti yasmiṃ padese atikkante tesaṃ araññaṃ ārakkhaṭṭhānañca atikkanto nāma hoti,
tika-vin07t0:530_21: taṃ padesaṃ ākāsenāpi atikkamanavasena gacchantassāpīti attho.
tika-vin07t0:532_6: Taḷākarakkhaṇatthāyāti “mahodakaṃ āgantvā taḷākamariyādaṃ mā chindī”ti taḷākarakkhaṇatthaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:532_7: Nibbahanaudakanti ettha taḷākassa ekena unnatena passena adhikajalaṃ nibbahati nigacchati etenāti “nibbahana”nti adhikajalanikkhamanamātikā vuccati.
tika-vin07t0:532_9: Niddhamanatumbanti sassādīnaṃ atthāya iṭṭhakādīhi kataṃ udakanikkhamanapanāḷi.
tika-vin07t0:532_10: Mariyādaṃ dubbalaṃ katvāti ettha dubbalaṃ akatvāpi yathāvuttappayoge kate mariyādaṃ chinditvā nikkhantaudakagghānurūpena avahārena kattabbameva.
tika-vin07t0:532_11: Yattakaṃ tappaccayā sassaṃ uppajjatīti bījakasikammādibbayaṃ ṭhapetvā yaṃ adhikalābhaṃ uppajjati,
tika-vin07t0:532_13: Na hi tehi kātabbaṃ vayakaraṇampi etassa dātabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:532_14: Idañca taruṇasasse jāte udakaṃ vināsentassa yujjati,
tika-vin07t0:532_15: sasse pana sabbathā akateyeva udakaṃ vināsentena ca udakagghameva dātabbaṃ,
tika-vin07t0:532_16: na tappaccayā sakalaṃ sassaṃ tena vināsitabhaṇḍasseva bhaṇḍadeyyattā,
tika-vin07t0:532_17: itarathā vāṇijjādiatthāya parehi ṭhapitabhaṇḍaṃ avaharantassa tadubhayampi gahetvā bhaṇḍagghaṃ kātabbaṃ siyā,
tika-vin07t0:532_19: Sāmikānaṃ dhuranikkhepenāti ettha ekassa santake taḷāke khette ca jāte tasseva dhuranikkhepena pārājikaṃ,
tika-vin07t0:533_3: Asampattevāti taḷākato nikkhamitvā mahāmātikāyaṃ eva ṭhite.
tika-vin07t0:533_4: Anikkhante baddhā subaddhāti taḷākato anikkhante bhaṇḍadeyyampi na hoti sabbasādhāraṇattā udakassāti adhippāyo.
tika-vin07t0:533_5: Nikkhante pana pāṭipuggalikaṃ hotīti āha “nikkhante baddhā bhaṇḍadeyya”nti.
tika-vin07t0:533_6: Idha pana khuddakamātikāyaṃ appaviṭṭhattā avahāro na jāto,
tika-vin07t0:533_7: “taḷākato aniggate paresaṃ mātikāmukhaṃ asampattevā”ti heṭṭhā vuttassa vikappadvayassa “anikkhante baddhā subaddhā,
tika-vin07t0:533_8: nikkhante baddhā bhaṇḍadeyya”nti idaṃ dvayaṃ yathākkamena yojanatthaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:533_13: na sametīti ettha taḷākagataudakassa sabbasādhāraṇattā parasantakavatthu na hotīti adhippāyo.
tika-vin07t0:535_1: Dantakaṭṭhakathāyaṃ tato paṭṭhāya avahāro natthīti “yathāsukhaṃ bhikkhusaṅgho paribhuñjatū”ti abhājetvāva
tika-vin07t0:535_2: yāvadicchakaṃ gahaṇatthameva ṭhapitattā arakkhitattā sabbasādhāraṇattā ca aññaṃ saṅghikaṃ viya na hotīti
tika-vin07t0:535_4: puna sāmaṇerā āharissantīti keci therā vadeyyunti yojetabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:537_1: Vanappatikathāyaṃ sandhāritattāti chinnassa rukkhassa patituṃ āraddhassa sandhāraṇamattena vuttaṃ,
tika-vin07t0:537_2: na pana maricavalliādīhi pubbe veṭhetvā ṭhitabhāvena.
tika-vin07t0:537_3: Tādise hi chinnepi avahāro natthi araññaṭṭhakathāyaṃ veṭhitavalliyaṃ viya.
tika-vin07t0:537_4: Ujukameva tiṭṭhatīti iminā sabbaso chindanameva valliādīhi asambaddhassa rukkhassa ṭhānācāvanaṃ pubbe
tika-vin07t0:537_5: viya ākāsādīsu phuṭṭhasakalapadesato mocananti āveṇikamidha ṭhānācāvanaṃ dasseti.
tika-vin07t0:537_6: Keci pana “rukkhabhārena kiñcideva bhassitvā ṭhitattā hotiyeva ṭhānācāvana”nti vadanti, tanna,
tika-vin07t0:537_7: rukkhena phuṭṭhassa sakalassa ākāsapadesassa pañcahi chahi vā ākārehi anatikkamitattā.
tika-vin07t0:537_8: Vātamukhaṃ sodhetīti yathā vāto āgantvā rukkhaṃ pāteti,
tika-vin07t0:537_9: evaṃ vātassa āgamanamaggaṃ rundhitvā ṭhitāni sākhāgumbādīni chinditvā apanento sodheti.
tika-vin07t0:537_10: Maṇḍūkakaṇṭakaṃ vāti maṇḍūkānaṃ naṅguṭṭhe aggakoṭiyaṃ ṭhitakaṇṭakanti vadanti,
tika-vin07t0:539_3: pārājikamevāti “antaṃ na gaṇhissāmī”ti asallakkhitattā sāmaññato “gaṇhissāmi eta”nti sallakkhitasseva
tika-vin07t0:539_4: paṭassa ekadesatāya tampi gaṇhitukāmovāti pārājikaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:539_10: Ekamantaṃ paṭikkammāti bhayeneva anupagantvā maggato sayaṃ paṭikkamma.
tika-vin07t0:539_11: Santajjetvāti pharusavācāya ceva āvudhaparivattanādikāyavikārena ca santajjetvā.
tika-vin07t0:539_13: Ālayena anadhimuttampi bhaṇḍaṃ anajjhāvutthakaṃ nāma hotīti āha “āharāpente dātabba”nti,
tika-vin07t0:539_14: iminā paṭhamaṃ pariccattālayānampi yadi pacchāpi sakasaññā uppajjati,
tika-vin07t0:539_16: balakkārenāpi sakasaññāya tassa gahaṇe doso natthi,
tika-vin07t0:539_21: balakkārena gahetuṃ na vaṭṭati sakasaññābaleneva puna gahetabbabhāvassa āpannattā.
tika-vin07t0:539_22: “Adentassa pārājika”nti vacanato corassa sakasaññāya vijjamānāyapi sāmikesu sālayesu adātuṃ na vaṭṭatīti dīpitaṃ hoti.
tika-vin07t0:539_24: Vicāraṇāyeva natthīti iminā tatthāpi paṭikkhepābhāvato ayameva atthoti dasseti.
tika-vin07t0:541_1: Upanidhikathāyaṃ saṅgopanatthāya attano hatthe nikkhittassa bhaṇḍassa guttaṭṭhāne paṭisāmanappayogaṃ
tika-vin07t0:541_2: vinā nāhaṃ gaṇhāmītiādinā aññasmiṃ payoge akate rajjasaṅkhobhādikāle “na dāni tassa dassāmi,
tika-vin07t0:541_3: na mayhaṃ dāni dassatī”ti ubhohipi sakasakaṭṭhāne nisīditvā dhuranikkhepe katepi avahāro natthi.
tika-vin07t0:541_8: “na dāni tassa dassāmī”ti theyyacittuppattikkhaṇe pana sāmino dhuranikkhepacittuppattiyā hetubhūto kāyavacīpayogo natthi,
tika-vin07t0:541_12: rakkhati tāvāti avahāraṃ sandhāya avuttattā nāhaṃ gaṇhāmītiādinā musāvādakaraṇe pācittiyameva hoti,
tika-vin07t0:541_13: na dukkaṭaṃ theyyacittābhāvena sahapayogassāpi abhāvatoti gahetabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:541_16: na tāva paṭhamena bhaṇḍapaṭisāmanappayogena tadā theyyacittābhāvā,
tika-vin07t0:541_17: nāpi “dassāmī”ti kathanappayogena tadā theyyacitte vijjamānepi payogassa kappiyattāti? Vuccate –
tika-vin07t0:541_18: sāminā “dehī”ti bahuso yāciyamānopi adatvā yena payogena attano adātukāmataṃ sāmikassa ñāpeti,
tika-vin07t0:541_19: yena ca so “adātukāmo ayaṃ vikkhipatī”ti ñatvā dhuraṃ nikkhipati,
tika-vin07t0:541_21: Na hettha upanikkhittabhaṇḍe pariyāyena mutti atthi.
tika-vin07t0:541_23: kattha te dinnantiādipariyāyavacanenāpi sāmikassa dhure nikkhipāpite āpattiyeva.
tika-vin07t0:541_27: Parasantakassa parehi gaṇhāpane eva pariyāyato mutti,
tika-vin07t0:541_29: Attano hatthe nikkhittattāti ettha attano hatthe sāminā dinnatāya bhaṇḍāgārikaṭṭhāne ṭhitattā ca ṭhānācāvanepi natthi avahāro,
tika-vin07t0:541_30: theyyacittena pana gahaṇe dukkaṭato na muccatīti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:542_0: Eseva nayoti uddhāreyeva corassa pārājikaṃ, kasmā?
tika-vin07t0:542_2: Aññaṃ tādisameva gaṇhante yujjatīti saññāṇato okāsato ca tena sadisameva aññaṃ gaṇhante yujjati,
tika-vin07t0:542_3: corena sallakkhitappadesato taṃ apanetvā kehici tattha tādise aññasmiṃ patte ṭhapite taṃ gaṇhanteyeva yujjatīti adhippāyo,
tika-vin07t0:542_4: tena corena divā sallakkhitapattaṃ aññattha apanetvā tadaññe tādise patte tattha ṭhapitepi corassa pacchā
tika-vin07t0:542_5: rattibhāge uppajjamānaṃ theyyacittaṃ divā sallakkhitappadese ṭhapitaṃ aññaṃ tādisaṃ pattameva ālambitvā
tika-vin07t0:542_7: Padavārenāti therena nīharitvā dinnaṃ pattaṃ gahetvā gacchato corassa padavārena.
tika-vin07t0:542_8: Atādisameva gaṇhante yujjatīti atādisassa therena gahaṇakkhaṇe avahārābhāvato pacchā hatthapattaṃ “ta”nti
tika-vin07t0:542_9: vā “añña”nti vā saññāya “idaṃ gahetvā gacchāmī”ti gamane padavāreneva avahāro yujjatīti adhippāyo.
tika-vin07t0:543_0: Pārājikaṃ natthīti padavārepi pārājikaṃ natthi upanidhibhaṇḍe viyāti gahetabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:543_1: Gāmadvāranti bahigāme vihārassa patiṭṭhitattā gāmappavesassa ārambhappadesadassanavasena vuttaṃ,
tika-vin07t0:543_3: Dvinnampi uddhāreyeva pārājikanti therassa abhaṇḍāgārikattā vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:543_6: upanikkhittabhaṇḍe ca theyyacittena gaṇhatopi na tāva therassa avahāro hoti,
tika-vin07t0:543_8: Ubhinnampi dukkaṭanti therassa attano santakatāya corassa sāmikena dinnattā avahāro na jāto,
tika-vin07t0:544_0: Āṇattiyā gahitattāti “pattacīvaraṃ gaṇhā”ti evaṃ therena kataāṇattiyā gahitattā.
tika-vin07t0:544_3: asukaṃ nāma gāmaṃ gantvā piṇḍāya carissāmā”ti therena vihārato paṭṭhāya gāmamaggepi sakalepi gāme vicaraṇassa
tika-vin07t0:544_4: niyamitattā maggato okkamma gacchantasseva padavārena āpatti vuttā.
tika-vin07t0:544_5: Vihārassa hi parabhāge upacārato paṭṭhāya yāva tassa gāmassa parato upacāro,
tika-vin07t0:544_6: tāva sabbaṃ daharassa therāṇattiyā sañcaraṇūpacārova hoti,
tika-vin07t0:544_11: Aṭṭhatvā anisīditvāti ettha vihāraṃ pavisitvā sīsādīsu bhāraṃ bhūmiyaṃ anikkhipitvā tiṭṭhanto vā nisīdanto
tika-vin07t0:544_12: vā vissamitvā theyyacitte vūpasante puna theyyacittaṃ uppādetvā gacchati ce,
tika-vin07t0:544_14: Sace bhūmiyaṃ nikkhipitvā puna taṃ gahetvā gacchati,
tika-vin07t0:544_18: “Asukaṃ nāma gāma”nti aniyametvā “antogāmaṃ gamissāmā”ti avisesena vutte vihārasāmantā pubbe piṇḍāya
tika-vin07t0:544_21: Purimasadisamevāti anāṇattiyā gahitepi sāmikassa kathetvā gahitattā heṭṭhā vuttavihārūpacārādi sabbaṃ khettamevāti katvā vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:544_22: Eseva nayoti antarāmagge theyyacittaṃ uppādetvātiādinā vuttaṃ nayaṃ atidisati.
tika-vin07t0:545_0: Nimitte vā kateti cīvaraṃ me kiliṭṭhaṃ,
tika-vin07t0:545_1: ko nu kho rajitvā dassatītiādinā nimitte kate.
tika-vin07t0:545_2: Vuttanayenevāti anāṇattassa therena saddhiṃ pattacīvaraṃ gahetvā gamanavāre vuttanayeneva.
tika-vin07t0:545_3: Ekapasseti vihārassa mahantatāya attānaṃ adassetvā ekasmiṃ passe.
tika-vin07t0:545_4: Theyyacittena paribhuñjanto jīrāpetīti theyyacitte uppanne ṭhānācāvanaṃ akatvā nivatthapārutanīhāreneva paribhuñjanto jīrāpeti,
tika-vin07t0:545_5: ṭhānā cāventassa pana theyyacitte sati pārājikameva sīse bhāraṃ khandhe karaṇādīsu viya.
tika-vin07t0:545_6: Yathā vā tathā vā nassatīti aggiādinā nassati,
tika-vin07t0:545_7: añño vā kocīti iminā yena ṭhapitaṃ,
tika-vin07t0:546_1: Itaraṃ gaṇhato uddhāre pārājikanti ettha “pavisitvā tava sāṭakaṃ gaṇhāhī”ti imināva upanidhibhāvato mocitattā,
tika-vin07t0:546_2: sāmikassa itaraṃ gaṇhato attano sāṭake ālayassa sabbhāvato ca “uddhāre pārājika”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:546_3: Sāmiko ce “mama santakaṃ idaṃ vā hotu, aññaṃ vā, kiṃ tena,
tika-vin07t0:546_4: alaṃ mayhaṃ iminā”ti evaṃ suṭṭhu nirālayo hoti,
tika-vin07t0:546_6: Na jānantīti tena vuttavacanaṃ asuṇantā na jānanti.
tika-vin07t0:546_7: Eseva nayoti ettha sace jānitvāpi cittena na sampaṭicchanti,
tika-vin07t0:546_9: Paṭikkhipantīti ettha cittena paṭikkhepopi saṅgahitovāti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:546_10: Upacāre vijjamāneti bhaṇḍāgārassa samīpe uccārapassāvaṭṭhāne vijjamāne.
tika-vin07t0:546_11: Mayi ca mate saṅghassa ca senāsane vinaṭṭheti ettha “taṃ māressāmā”ti ettake vuttepi vivarituṃ vaṭṭati gilānapakkhe ṭhitattā avisayoti vuttattā.
tika-vin07t0:546_12: Maraṇato hi paraṃ gelaññaṃ avisayattañca natthi.
tika-vin07t0:546_13: “Dvāraṃ chinditvā parikkhāraṃ harissāmā”ti ettake vuttepi vivarituṃ vaṭṭatiyeva.
tika-vin07t0:546_14: Sahāyehi bhavitabbanti tehipi bhikkhācārādīhi pariyesitvā attano santakepi kiñci kiñci dātabbanti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-vin07t0:546_15: Ayaṃ sāmīcīti bhaṇḍāgāre vasantānaṃ idaṃ vattaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:547_5: Corānaṃ paṭipathaṃ gatesūti corānaṃ āgamanaṃ ñatvā “paṭhamataraññeva gantvā saddaṃ karissāmā”ti corānaṃ abhimukhaṃ gatesu,
tika-vin07t0:547_6: “corehi haṭabhaṇḍaṃ āharissāmā”ti tadanupathaṃ gatesupi eseva nayo.
tika-vin07t0:547_7: Nibaddhaṃ katvāti “asukakule yāgubhattaṃ vihāravārikānaññevā”ti evaṃ niyamanaṃ katvā.
tika-vin07t0:547_8: Dve tisso yāgusalākā cattāri pañca salākabhattāni ca labhamānovāti idaṃ nidassanamattaṃ,
tika-vin07t0:547_9: tato ūnaṃ vā hotu adhikaṃ vā attano veyyāvaccakarassa ca yāpanamattaṃ labhanameva pamāṇanti gahetabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:547_10: Nissitake jaggentīti tehi vihāraṃ jaggāpentīti attho.
tika-vin07t0:547_12: Attadutiyassāti appicchassa attā sarīrameva dutiyo assa nāññoti attadutiyo.
tika-vin07t0:547_14: etena sabbena ekekassa vāro na pāpetabboti dassitanti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:547_17: Taṃ gahetvāti taṃ ārāmikādīhi diyyamānaṃ bhāgaṃ gahetvā.
tika-vin07t0:547_18: Na gāhāpetabboti ettha abbhokāsikassāpi attano adhikaparikkhāro vā ṭhapito atthi,
tika-vin07t0:549_1: Suṅkaghātakathāyaṃ suṅkaṃ yattha rājapurisā hananti adadantānaṃ santakaṃ acchinditvāpi gaṇhanti,
tika-vin07t0:549_2: taṃ ṭhānaṃ suṅkaghātanti evampi attho daṭṭhabbo.
tika-vin07t0:549_4: Dutiyaṃ pādaṃ atikkāmetīti ettha paṭhamapādaṃ paricchedato bahi ṭhapetvā dutiyapāde uddhaṭamatte pārājikaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:549_5: Uddharitvā bahi aṭṭhapitepi bahi ṭhito eva nāma hotīti katvā evaṃ sabbattha padavāresupīti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:549_7: pārājikanti idaṃ sayaṃ bahi ṭhatvā paṭhamaṃ abbhantarimaṃ ukkhipitvā vā samakaṃ ukkhipitvā vā parivattanaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:549_8: Bahi ṭhatvā ukkhittamatte hi sabbaṃ bahigatameva hotīti.
tika-vin07t0:549_9: Sace pana so bahi ṭhatvāpi bāhirapuṭakaṃ paṭhamaṃ anto ṭhapetvā pacchā abbhantarimaṃ ukkhipitvā bahi ṭhapeti,
tika-vin07t0:549_10: tadāpi ekābaddhatāya avijahitattā avahāro na dissati.
tika-vin07t0:549_11: Keci pana “bhūmiyaṃ patitvā vattantaṃ puna anto pavisati,
tika-vin07t0:549_12: pārājikamevāti vuttattā bāhirapuṭake antopaviṭṭhepi bahigatabhāvato na muccati,
tika-vin07t0:549_14: pacchā eva vā bahi ṭhapitamatte vā pārājikamevā”ti vadanti,
tika-vin07t0:549_16: Bahi bhūmiyaṃ pātitassa kenaci saddhiṃ ekābaddhatāya abhāvena antopaviṭṭhepi pārājikamevāti vattuṃ yuttaṃ,
tika-vin07t0:549_17: idaṃ pana ekābaddhattā tena saddhiṃ na sameti.
tika-vin07t0:549_18: Tasmā yathā antobhūmigatena ekābaddhatā na hoti,
tika-vin07t0:549_19: evaṃ ubhayassāpi bahigatabhāve sādhiteyeva avahāroti viññāyati,
tika-vin07t0:549_21: Ye pana parivattitvāti imassa nivattitvāti atthaṃ vadanti,
tika-vin07t0:549_22: tehi pana abbhantarimaṃ bahi ṭhapetīti ayamattho gahito hotīti tattha saṅkāyeva natthi.
tika-vin07t0:549_23: Ekābaddhanti kājakoṭiyaṃ rajjuyā bandhanaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:549_25: pārājikanti bahi gahitakājakoṭiyaṃ ṭhapitaṃ yadi pādaṃ agghati,
tika-vin07t0:549_29: ṭhapetīti suṅkaghātaṃ pavisitvā appavisitvā vā ṭhapeti.
tika-vin07t0:549_30: Suṅkaṭṭhānassa bahi ṭhitanti yānādīhi nīhaṭattā bahi ṭhitaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:549_31: Keci pana “bahi ṭhapita”nti pāṭhaṃ vikappetvā suṅkaṭṭhānato pubbeva bahi ṭhapitanti atthaṃ vadanti,
tika-vin07t0:549_33: suṅkaṭṭhāne pavisitvā yāne ṭhapitepi pavattitvā gate viya dosābhāvato.
tika-vin07t0:549_34: Yo pana suṅkaṭṭhānassa antova pavisitvā “suṅkaṭṭhāna”nti ñatvā theyyacittena āgatamaggena paṭinivattitvā gacchati,
tika-vin07t0:549_35: tassāpi yadi tena disābhāgena gacchantānampi hatthato suṅkaṃ gaṇhanti,
tika-vin07t0:551_1: Pāṇakathāyaṃ āṭhapitoti mātāpitūhi iṇaṃ gaṇhantehi “yāva iṇadānā ayaṃ tumhākaṃ santike hotū”ti iṇadāyakānaṃ niyyātito.
tika-vin07t0:551_2: Avahāro natthīti mātāpitūhi puttassa apariccattattā mātāpitūnañca asantakattā avahāro natthi.
tika-vin07t0:551_3: Dhanaṃ pana gataṭṭhāne vaḍḍhatīti iminā āṭhapetvā gahitadhanaṃ vaḍḍhiyā saha āṭhapitaputtahārakassa gīvāti dassitanti vadanti.
tika-vin07t0:551_5: Dāsikucchiyaṃ pana adāsassa jātopi ettheva saṅgahito.
tika-vin07t0:551_7: Sukhaṃ jīvāti vadatīti theyyacittena sāmikānaṃ santikato palāpetukāmatāya vadati,
tika-vin07t0:551_8: tathā pana acintetvā kāruññena “sukhaṃ gantvā jīvā”ti vadantassa natthi avahāro,
tika-vin07t0:551_12: Anāpatti pārājikassāti tassa vacanena vegavaḍḍhane akatepi dukkaṭā na muccatīti dasseti.
tika-vin07t0:551_13: “Adinnaṃ theyyasaṅkhātaṃ ādiyeyyā”ti ādānasseva vuttattā vuttapariyāyena muccatīti.
tika-vin07t0:553_1: Catuppadakathāyaṃ pāḷiyaṃ āgatāvasesāti pāḷiyaṃ āgatehi hatthi ādīhi aññe pasu-
tika-vin07t0:553_3: Bhiṅkacchāpanti “bhiṅkā bhiṅkā”ti saddāyanato evaṃ laddhanāmaṃ hatthipotakaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:553_6: aparikkhittanagare pana antonagare ṭhitassāpi ṭhitaṭṭhānameva ṭhānaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:553_8: Eko nipannoti etthāpi bandhoti ānetvā sambandhitabbaṃ,
tika-vin07t0:553_10: Ghātetīti ettha theyyacittena vināsentassa sahapayogattā dukkaṭamevāti vadanti.
tika-vin07t0:555_1: Ocarakakathāyaṃ pariyāyena hi adinnādānato muccatīti idaṃ āṇattikapayogaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ,
tika-vin07t0:555_2: sayameva pana abhiyuñjanādīsu pariyāyenapi mokkho natthi.
tika-vin07t0:557_2: Oṇirakkhassa santike ṭhapitabhaṇḍaṃ upanidhi viya guttaṭṭhāne ṭhapetvā saṅgopanatthāya anikkhipitvā yathāṭhapitaṭṭhāne
tika-vin07t0:557_3: eva muhuttamattaṃ olokanatthāya ṭhapitattā tassa bhaṇḍassa ṭhānācāvanamattena oṇirakkhakassa pārājikaṃ hoti.
tika-vin07t0:559_1: Tena nesaṃ dukkaṭāpattiyoti āṇattivasena pārājikāpattiyā asambhave satīti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:559_2: Yadi hi tena āṇattā yathāṇattivasena haranti,
tika-vin07t0:559_5: āpatti sabbesaṃ pārājikassā”ti etthāpi āṇāpakānaṃ āṇattikkhaṇeyeva āpatti,
tika-vin07t0:559_8: tassuddhāre sabbesaṃ pārājikantiādīsupi evameva attho gahetabbo.
tika-vin07t0:559_9: Sāhatthikaṃ vā āṇattikassa āṇattikaṃ vā sāhatthikassa aṅgaṃ na hotīti bhinnakālikattā aññamaññassa aṅgaṃ na hoti.
tika-vin07t0:559_10: Tathā hi sahatthā avaharantassa ṭhānācāvanakkhaṇe āpatti,
tika-vin07t0:561_1: Saṅketakammakathāyaṃ ocarake vuttanayenevāti ettha avassaṃ hāriye bhaṇḍetiādinā vuttanayeneva.
tika-vin07t0:561_2: Pāḷiyaṃ “taṃ saṅketaṃ pure vā pacchā vā”ti tassa saṅketassa pure vā pacchā vāti attho.
tika-vin07t0:561_3: “Taṃ nimittaṃ pure vā pacchā vā”ti etthāpi eseva nayo.
tika-vin07t0:563_2: tasmā taṅkhaṇeyeva taṃ bhaṇḍaṃ avaharituṃ na sakkā.
tika-vin07t0:563_3: Nimittakammānantarameva gaṇhituṃ āraddhattā teneva nimittena avaharatīti vuccati.
tika-vin07t0:563_4: Yadi evaṃ purebhattappayogova esoti vādo pamāṇabhāvaṃ āpajjatīti?
tika-vin07t0:563_6: Na hi saṅketakammaṃ viya nimittakammaṃ kālaparicchedayuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:563_9: “Taṃ nimittaṃ pure vā pacchā vā taṃ bhaṇḍaṃ avaharati,
tika-vin07t0:563_10: mūlaṭṭhassa anāpattī”ti idaṃ pana nimittakaraṇato pure gaṇhantassa ceva nimittakamme ca katepi gaṇhituṃ
tika-vin07t0:563_11: anārabhitvā pacchā sayameva gaṇhantassa ca vasena vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:565_1: Āṇattikathāyaṃ asammohatthanti yasmā saṅketakammanimittakammāni karonto na kevalaṃ purebhattādikālasaṅketakammaṃ
tika-vin07t0:565_6: so aññassa pāvadatūtiādinā puggalapaṭipāṭiyā ca āṇāpeti,
tika-vin07t0:565_7: tasmā pubbaṇhādikālavasena akkhinikhaṇanādikiriyāvasena bhaṇḍapuggalapaṭipāṭivasena ca āṇatte etesu saṅketakammanimittakammesu
tika-vin07t0:565_10: Yaṃ āṇāpakena nimittasaññaṃ katvā vuttanti pubbaṇhādīsu akkhinikhaṇanādīsu vā gahaṇatthaṃ āṇāpentena
tika-vin07t0:565_11: īdisavaṇṇasaṇṭhānādiyuttaṃ gaṇhāti evaṃ gahaṇassa nimittabhūtasaññāṇaṃ katvā yaṃ bhaṇḍaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:565_12: Ayaṃ yutti sabbatthāti heṭṭhā vuttesu upari vakkhamānesu ca sabbattha āṇattippasaṅgesu āṇattikkhaṇeyeva pārājikādīnaṃ bhāvasaṅkhātā vinayayutti,
tika-vin07t0:565_13: sā ca āṇattassa kiriyāniṭṭhāpanakkhaṇe āṇāpakassa payoge theyyacittānaṃ abhāvā āṇattikkhaṇe ekā eva āpatti
tika-vin07t0:565_14: hotīti evaṃ upapattiyā pavattattā yuttīti vuttā.
tika-vin07t0:565_15: “Mūlaṭṭhassa thullaccaya”nti vuttattā saṅgharakkhitena paṭiggahitepi buddharakkhitadhammarakkhitānaṃ dukkaṭameva,
tika-vin07t0:565_16: kasmā panettha ācariyassa thullaccayanti āha “mahājano hī”tiādi.
tika-vin07t0:565_19: Idañca mūlaṭṭhassa thullaccayābhāvadassanatthaṃ paṭhamaṃ āṇattikkhaṇe dukkaṭaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ,
tika-vin07t0:565_20: na pana saṅgharakkhitassa paṭiggahaṇapaccayā puna dukkaṭasambhavaṃ sandhāya.
tika-vin07t0:565_21: Na hi so ekapayogena dukkaṭadvayaṃ āpajjati.
tika-vin07t0:565_23: āpatti dukkaṭassā’ti sāmaññena vuttattā idaṃ saṅgharakkhitassa dukkaṭaṃ sandhāya vutta”nti vadanti,
tika-vin07t0:565_26: Na hi tassa paṭiggahaṇappayoge anāpatti hotīti.
tika-vin07t0:565_27: Imināva heṭṭhā āgatavāresupi paṭiggaṇhantānaṃ dukkaṭaṃ veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:565_28: “Paṇṇe vā silādīsu vā ‘coriyaṃ kātabba’nti likhitvā ṭhapite pārājikamevā”ti keci vadanti,
tika-vin07t0:565_29: taṃ pana “asukassa gehe bhaṇḍa”nti evaṃ niyametvā likhite yujjati,
tika-vin07t0:565_31: Maggānantaraphalasadisāti iminā yathā ariyapuggalānaṃ maggānantare phale uppanne kilesapaṭippassaddhipariyosānaṃ bhāvanākiccaṃ nipphannaṃ nāma hoti,
tika-vin07t0:565_32: evametissā atthasādhakacetanāya uppannāya āṇattikiccaṃ nipphannamevāti dasseti,
tika-vin07t0:568_3: Āmasati phandāpeti ṭhānā cāvetīti imehi tīhi padehi pubbapayogasahitaṃ pañcamaṃ avahāraṅgaṃ vuttaṃ,
tika-vin07t0:568_5: Āṇattikādayo sabbepi payogā dhuranikkhepo ca idha saṅgahetabbāvāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:569_1: Ṭhānācāvananti idaṃ pāḷianusārato vuttaṃ dhuranikkhepassāpi saṅgahetabbato.
tika-vin07t0:569_3: Tattha hi na ca sakasaññīti iminā parapariggahitatā vuttā,
tika-vin07t0:569_4: na ca vissāsaggāhī na ca tāvakālikanti imehi parapariggahitasaññitā,
tika-vin07t0:569_5: tīhi vā etehi parapariggahitatā parapariggahitasaññitā ca vuttāti veditabbā.
tika-vin07t0:569_7: Chaḍḍitanti paṭhamaṃ pariggahetvā pacchā anatthikatāya chaḍḍitaṃ yaṃ kiñci.
tika-vin07t0:569_8: Chinnamūlakanti naṭṭhaṃ pariyesitvā ālayasaṅkhātassa mūlassa chinnattā chinnamūlakaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:569_9: Assāmikanti anajjhāvutthakādīhi tīhi ākārehi dassitaṃ assāmikavatthu.
tika-vin07t0:571_1: Tasmiṃyeva attabhāve nibbattāti tasmiṃyeva matasarīre petattabhāvena nibbattā.
tika-vin07t0:571_2: Rukkhādīsu laggitasāṭake vattabbameva natthīti manussehi agopitaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ,
tika-vin07t0:571_3: sace panetaṃ devālayacetiyarukkhādīsu niyuttehi purisehi rakkhitagopitaṃ hoti,
tika-vin07t0:571_6: gahetuṃ vaṭṭatīti idaṃ adinnādānābhāvaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:571_7: Jighacchitapāṇinā khādiyamānamaṃsassa acchinditvā khādanaṃ nāma kāruññahānito lolabhāvato ca asāruppameva.
tika-vin07t0:571_8: Teneva hi ariyavaṃsikā attano patte bhattaṃ khādantampi sunakhādiṃ tajjetvā na vārenti,
tika-vin07t0:571_9: tiracchānānaṃ āmisadāne kusalaṃ viya tesaṃ āmisassa acchindanepi akusalamevāti gahetabbaṃ,
tika-vin07t0:573_0: Bahu ekato dāruādibhāriyassa ekassa bhaṇḍassa ukkhipanakāle “gaṇhatha ukkhipathā”ti vacīpayogena saddhiṃ
tika-vin07t0:573_3: ahaṃ añña”nti evaṃ pavatte pana avahāre attanā gahitaṃ sāhatthikameva,
tika-vin07t0:573_5: teneva tadubhayagghena pañcamāsepi pārājikaṃ na hoti,
tika-vin07t0:573_7: Vuttañhi “sāhatthikaṃ vā āṇattikassa aṅgaṃ na hotī”tiādi.
tika-vin07t0:573_8: Upanikkhittabhaṇḍaṃ bhaṇḍadeyyañca adātukāmatāya “demi dammī”ti vikkhipanto tuṇhībhāvena viheṭhentopi
tika-vin07t0:573_9: tena tena kāyavikārādikiriyāya parassa dhuraṃ nikkhipāpesīti “kiriyāsamuṭṭhānañcā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:576_1: Vinītavatthūsu niruttiyeva taṃtaṃatthaggahaṇassa upāyatāya pathoti niruttipatho,
tika-vin07t0:576_3: Yathākammaṃ gatoti tato petattabhāvato matabhāvaṃ dasseti.
tika-vin07t0:576_8: Sīse vātiādi adhakkhake ubbhajāṇumaṇḍale padese cittavikārappattiṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ,
tika-vin07t0:576_10: Matasarīrampi hi yena kenaci ākārena sañcicca phusantassa anāmāsadukkaṭamevāti vadanti,
tika-vin07t0:576_12: Na hi apārājikavatthukepi cittādiitthirūpe bhavantaṃ dukkaṭaṃ pārājikavatthubhūte matitthisarīre nivattati.
tika-vin07t0:578_3: gaṇhissāmīti anāgatavacanaṃ pasibbakaggahaṇato puretaraṃ samuppannaparikappadassanavasena vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:578_5: gaṇhāmī”ti pasibbakaṃ gaṇhātīti evamettha adhippāyo gahetabbo,
tika-vin07t0:578_6: na pana bahi nīharitvā sāṭakabhāvaṃ ñatvā gahessāmīti,
tika-vin07t0:578_9: pacchā andhakāre jāte vijānanakāle vā gaṇhissāmi,
tika-vin07t0:578_10: idāni olokento viya hatthagataṃ karomī”ti gaṇhantassāpi gahaṇakkhaṇe avahāro bhaveyya,
tika-vin07t0:578_11: na ca taṃ yuttaṃ tadā gahaṇe sanniṭṭhānābhāvā.
tika-vin07t0:578_13: Na hi “pacchā vadhissāmī”ti pāṇaṃ gaṇhantassa tadeva tasmiṃ matepi pāṇātipāto hoti vadhakacetanāya payogassa akatattā,
tika-vin07t0:578_14: evamidhāpi atthaṅgate sūriye avaharissāmītiādinā kālaparikappanavasena ṭhānā cāvitepi tadāpi avahāro na hoti okāsaparikappe viya,
tika-vin07t0:578_15: tasmiṃ pana yathāparikappitaṭṭhāne kāle āgate bhaṇḍaṃ bhūmiyaṃ anikkhipitvāpi theyyacittena gacchato padavārena avahāroti khāyati.
tika-vin07t0:578_16: Tasmā bhaṇḍaparikappo okāsaparikappo kālaparikappoti tividhopi parikappo gahetabbo.
tika-vin07t0:578_17: Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana okāsaparikappe samodhānetvā kālaparikappo visuṃ na vuttoti amhākaṃ khanti,
tika-vin07t0:578_19: Padavārena kāretabboti bhūmiyaṃ anikkhipitvā vīmaṃsitattā vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:579_1: na tadā tesaṃ matena avahāroti dasseti.
tika-vin07t0:579_2: Disvā haṭattā parikappāvahāro na dissatīti pacchā pana bahi vīmaṃsitvā sāṭakabhāvaṃ ñatvā tato pacchā
tika-vin07t0:579_3: theyyacittena haṭattā pubbe katassa parikappassa avahārānaṅgattā “sutta”nti ñatvā haraṇe viya theyyāvahāro eva siyā.
tika-vin07t0:579_5: Sāṭako ce bhavissatītiādikassa parikappassa tadā avijjamānattā kevalaṃ avahāro eva,
tika-vin07t0:579_10: taṃ adiṭṭhaṃ parikappitabhāve ṭhitaṃyeva uddharantassa avahāro”ti.
tika-vin07t0:579_11: Yadi evaṃ kasmā okāsapaappāvahāro bhaṇḍaṃ disvā avaharantassa parikappāvahāro siyāti?
tika-vin07t0:579_13: pubbeva disvā ñātabhaṇḍasseva hi okāsaparikappo vutto.
tika-vin07t0:579_14: Taṃ maññamāno taṃ avaharīti idaṃ suttaṃ kiñcāpi “taññeveta”nti niyametvā gaṇhantassa vasena vuttaṃ,
tika-vin07t0:579_15: tathāpi “tañce gaṇhissāmī”ti evaṃ pavatte imasmiṃ parikappepi “gaṇhissāmī”ti gahaṇe niyamasabbhāvā avahāratthasādhakaṃ hotīti uddhaṭaṃ,
tika-vin07t0:581_1: Kusaṃ pātetvāti vilīvamayaṃ vā tālapaṇṇādimayaṃ vā katasaññāṇaṃ pātetvā.
tika-vin07t0:581_2: Parakoṭṭhāsato kuse uddhaṭepi na tāva kusassa parivattanaṃ jātanti vuttaṃ “uddhāre rakkhatī”ti.
tika-vin07t0:581_3: Hatthato muttamatte pārājikanti iminā ṭhānācāvanaṃ dhuranikkhepañca vinā kusasaṅkāmanaṃ nāma visuṃ ekoyaṃ avahāroti dasseti.
tika-vin07t0:581_4: Sabbepi hi avahārā sāhatthikāṇattikādhippāyayogehi nipphādiyamānā atthato ṭhānācāvanadhuranikkhepakusasaṅkāmanesu tīsu samosarantīti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:581_6: uddhāre pārājikanti purimassa attano koṭṭhāse ālayassa avigatattā vuttaṃ,
tika-vin07t0:581_7: ālaye pana sabbathā asati avahāro na hoti,
tika-vin07t0:582_1: saddena tattha vematikopi hutvā theyyacittena gaṇhantopi saṅgayhati.
tika-vin07t0:583_2: Tasmiṃ pācittiyanti adinnādānabhāvena sahapayogassāpi abhāvā dukkaṭaṃ na vuttanti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:583_5: Bhaṇḍadeyyanti sammatādīhi dinnattā na parājikaṃ jātaṃ,
tika-vin07t0:583_6: asantaṃ puggalaṃ vatvā gahitattā pana bhaṇḍadeyyaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:583_7: Aññena diyyamānanti sammatādīhi catūhi aññena diyyamānaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:583_9: Aparassāti asantaṃ puggalaṃ adassetvā pana “aparaṃ bhāgaṃ dehī”ti vā kūṭavassāni gaṇetvā vā gaṇhato gihisantake
tika-vin07t0:583_10: sāminā ca “imassa dehī”ti evaṃ āṇattena ca dinne bhaṇḍadeyyampi na hoti,
tika-vin07t0:583_11: saṅghasantake pana hotīti imaṃ visesaṃ dassetuṃ asammatena vā anāṇattena vātiādi puna vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:583_12: Itarehi diyyamānanti sammatena āṇattena vā diyyamānaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:583_13: Evaṃ gaṇhatoti “aparampi bhāgaṃ dehī”ti vatvā kūṭavassāni gaṇetvā vā gaṇhato.
tika-vin07t0:583_16: tena “aparampi bhāgaṃ dehī”ti vā kūṭavassāni gaṇetvā vā gaṇhante sāmikena sayaṃ dente vā dāpente vā viseso atthīti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-vin07t0:583_18: Heṭṭhā pana sāmikena tena āṇattena vā diyyamānaṃ gihisantakaṃ “aparassa bhāgaṃ dehī”ti vatvā gaṇhato
tika-vin07t0:583_19: aparassa abhāvato sāmisantakameva hotīti bhaṇḍadeyyaṃ jātaṃ,
tika-vin07t0:583_20: idha pana tehiyeva diyyamānaṃ “aparampi bhāgaṃ dehī”ti vatvā vā kūṭavassāni gaṇetvā vā gaṇhato “dehī”ti
tika-vin07t0:583_21: vuttattā aññātakaviññattimattaṃ ṭhapetvā bhaṇḍadeyyaṃ na hotīti sudinnamevāti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:583_22: Assāmikena pana āṇattena dinnaṃ bhaṇḍaṃ gaṇhato bhaṇḍadeyyamevāti vadanti,
tika-vin07t0:583_24: saṅghasantake pana “dehī”ti vuttepi sāmikassa kassaci abhāvā sammatena dinnepi bhaṇḍadeyyaṃ vuttanti gahetabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:584_1: Āharāpentesu bhaṇḍadeyyanti “gahite attamano hotī”ti vacanato anattamanassa santakaṃ gahitampi puna dātabbamevāti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:584_2: “Sammukhībhūtehi bhājetabba”nti vacanato bhājanīyabhaṇḍaṃ upacārasīmaṭṭhānameva pāpuṇātīti āha “antoupacārasīmāyaṃ ṭhitasseva gahetuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti.
tika-vin07t0:584_3: Bhaṇḍadeyyanti ubhinnaṃ sālayabhāvepi corassa adatvā sāmikasseva dātabbaṃ corenāpi sāmikasseva dātabbato.
tika-vin07t0:585_6: theyyacitte pana sati kulasaṅgahaṇatthāya gaṇhatopi pārājikameva.
tika-vin07t0:585_8: Senāsanatthāya niyamitanti idaṃ issaravatāya dadato thullaccayadassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:585_9: Itarapaccayatthāya dinnampi atheyyacittena issaravatāya kulasaṅgahaṇatthāya vā ñātakādīnaṃ vā dadato dukkaṭaṃ bhaṇḍadeyyañca hoteva.
tika-vin07t0:585_12: Thullaccayanti kulasaṅgahaṇatthāya vā aññathā vā kāraṇena dadato senāsanatthāya niyamitassa garubhaṇḍatāya thullaccayaṃ bhaṇḍadeyyañca.
tika-vin07t0:585_13: Gīvāti ettha senāsanatthāya niyamite thullaccayena saddhiṃ gīvā,
tika-vin07t0:585_15: Sukhāditamevāti antoupacārasīmāyaṃ ṭhatvā bhājetvā attano santakaṃ katvā khāditattā vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:585_16: Saṅghikañhi vihārapaṭibaddhaṃ vebhaṅgiyaṃ bahiupacārasīmaṭṭhaṃ bhaṇḍaṃ antoupacāraṭṭhehi bhikkhūhi eva bhājetabbaṃ,
tika-vin07t0:586_1: “Vutto vajjemī”ti vuttabhikkhusmiṃ “vutto vajjehī”ti vuttassa pacchā uppajjanakapārājikādidosāropanato,
tika-vin07t0:586_2: gahaṭṭhānaṃ vā “bhadantā aparicchedaṃ katvā vadantī”ti evaṃ dosāropanato.
tika-vin07t0:587_1: Chātajjhattanti tena chātena jighacchāya udaragginā jhattaṃ,
tika-vin07t0:587_5: bhaṇḍadeyyanti ettha ekasūkaragghanakabhaṇḍaṃ dātabbaṃ ekasmiṃ bandhe aññesaṃ tattha abajjhanato.
tika-vin07t0:587_7: yena ajjhotthaṭattā migā palāyituṃ na sakkonti.
tika-vin07t0:587_8: Pacchā gacchatīti tena katapayogena agantvā pacchā sayameva gacchati,
tika-vin07t0:587_9: heṭṭhā vuttesupi īdisesu ṭhānesu eseva nayo.
tika-vin07t0:587_10: Rakkhaṃ yācitvāti rājapurisānaṃ santikaṃ gantvā anuddissa rakkhaṃ yācitvā.
tika-vin07t0:588_7: Tesupi āgantukā anissarāti senāsane nirantaraṃ vasantānaṃ cīvaratthāya dāyakehi bhikkhūhi vā niyametvā dinnattā bhājetvā khādituṃ anissarā,
tika-vin07t0:588_8: āgantukehipi icchantehi tasmiṃ vihāre vassānādīsu pavisitvā cīvaratthāya gahetabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:588_9: Tesaṃ katikāya ṭhātabbanti sabbāni phalāphalāni abhājetvā “ettakesu rukkhesu phalāni bhājetvā paribhuñjissāma,
tika-vin07t0:588_12: “kiñcipi abhājetvā catupaccayatthāyeva upanemā”ti vā evaṃ sammā upanentānaṃ āvāsikānaṃ katikāya āgantukehi ṭhātabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:589_1: Ekaṃ vā dve vā varasenāsanāni ṭhapetvāti vuttamevatthaṃ puna byatirekamukhena dassetuṃ “mūlavatthucchedaṃ pana katvā na upanetabba”nti vuttaṃ,
tika-vin07t0:589_2: senāsanasaṅkhātavatthuno mūlacchedaṃ katvā sabbāni senāsanāni na vissajjetabbānīti attho.
tika-vin07t0:589_3: Keci panettha “ekaṃ vā dve vā varasenāsanāni ṭhapetvā lāmakato paṭṭhāya vissajjentehipi senāsanabhūmiyo
tika-vin07t0:589_5: tampi yuttameva imassāpi atthassa avassaṃ vattabbato,
tika-vin07t0:589_6: itarathā keci saha vatthunāpi vissajjetabbaṃ maññeyyuṃ.
tika-vin07t0:590_0: Paṇṇaṃ āropetvāti “ettake rukkhe rakkhitvā tato ettakaṃ gahetabba”nti paṇṇaṃ āropetvā.
tika-vin07t0:590_2: Dārakāti tesaṃ puttanattādayo ye keci gopenti,
tika-vin07t0:590_6: Taṃ sabbampi āharitvāti anāpucchitvāpi tāvakālikaṃ āharitvā.
tika-vin07t0:590_7: Ayameva bhikkhu issarotiādito paṭṭhāya attano santakehi dārusambhārādīhi ca kārāpitattā paṭijaggitattā
tika-vin07t0:590_8: ca saṅghikasenāsane bhāgitāya ca ayameva issaro,
tika-vin07t0:590_9: na ca so tato vuṭṭhāpetabboti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-vin07t0:590_17: Tato āharitvā senāsanaṃ kataṃ hotīti sāmantagāmavāsīhi bhikkhūhi chaḍḍitavihārato dārusambhārādiṃ āharitvā senāsanaṃ kataṃ hoti.
tika-vin07t0:591_1: “Puggalikaparibhogena paribhuñjatī”ti vuttamatthaṃyeva pākaṭaṃ kātuṃ “āgatāgatānaṃ vuḍḍhatarānaṃ na detī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:591_5: pārājikassā”ti sāmikehi thullanandaṃ uddissa etissā hatthe dinnattā,
tika-vin07t0:592_1: Tassa kulassa anukampāya pasādānurakkhaṇatthāyātiādinā kulasaṅgahatthaṃ nākāsīti dasseti.
tika-vin07t0:592_3: tāva pāsādo tesaṃ santike hotū”ti pubbe kālaparicchedaṃ katvā adhiṭṭhitattā eva yathākālaparicchedameva tattha tiṭṭhati,
tika-vin07t0:592_4: tato paraṃ pāsādo sayameva yathāṭhānaṃ gacchati,
tika-vin07t0:592_5: tathāgamanañca iddhivissajjanena sañjātaṃ viya hotīti vuttaṃ “thero iddhiṃ paṭisaṃharī”ti.
tika-vin07t0:592_6: Yasmā evaṃ iddhividhañāṇena karontassa kāyavacīpayogā na santi theyyacittañca natthi pāsādasseva vicāritattā,
tika-vin07t0:592_7: tasmā “ettha avahāro natthī”ti thero evamakāsīti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:592_8: Atha vā dārakesu anukampāya ānayanatthameva pāsāde upanīte pāse baddhasūkarādīnaṃ āmisaṃ dassetvā ṭhānācāvanaṃ
tika-vin07t0:592_9: viya karamarānītesu dārakesu pāsādaṃ āruḷhesupi puna paṭisaṃharaṇe ca idha avahāro natthi kāruññādhippāyattā,
tika-vin07t0:592_11: Kāyavacīpayoge satiyeva hi āpatti bhaṇḍadeyyaṃ vā hoti,
tika-vin07t0:592_18: iddhicittassa visaye āpatti nāma natthīti adhippāyo gahetabbo.
tika-vin07t0:592_19: Kiṃ pana paṭikkhittaṃ iddhipāṭihāriyaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭatīti codanaṃ sandhāyāha “īdisāya adhiṭṭhāniddhiyā anāpattī”ti.
tika-vin07t0:592_22: iddhimassa iddhivisaye”ti hi imināyeva suttena adhiṭṭhāniddhiyā appaṭikkhittabhāvo sijjhati.
tika-vin07t0:592_24: “ekopi hutvā bahudhā hotī”ti āgatañca adhiṭṭhānavasena nipphannattā adhiṭṭhāniddhi nāma,
tika-vin07t0:592_27: vividhampi senābyūhaṃ dassetī”ti evaṃ āgatā iddhi pakativaṇṇavijahanavikāravasena pavattattā vikubbaniddhi nāma.
tika-vin07t0:592_28: Attano pana pakatirūpaṃ yathāsabhāvena ṭhapetvāva bahi hatthiādidassanaṃ vikubbaniddhi nāma na hoti,
tika-vin07t0:592_29: attano rūpameva hatthiādirūpena nimmānaṃ vikubbaniddhīti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:593_3: tena dutiyapārājikasikkhāpadena samaṃ aññaṃ anekanayavokiṇṇaṃ gambhīratthavinicchayaṃ kiñci sikkhāpadaṃ na vijjatīti yojanā.
tika-vin07t0:593_8: Vatthumhi otiṇṇeti codanāvasena vā attanāva attano vītikkamārocanavasena vā saṅghamajjhe adinnādānavatthusmiṃ otiṇṇe.
tika-vin07t0:593_11: Kappiyepi ca vatthusminti attanā gahetuṃ yutte mātāpitādīnaṃ santakepi.
tika-vin07t0:599_1: Yā ayaṃ heṭṭhā taṃ panetaṃ buddhakāle ca cakkavattikāle ca nagaraṃ hotītiādinā rājagahassa buddhuppādeyeva vepullappatti vuttā,
tika-vin07t0:599_2: sā etthāpi samānāti dassetuṃ “idampi ca nagara”nti vuttaṃ,
tika-vin07t0:599_3: tena ca na kevalaṃ rājagahādayo evāti dasseti.
tika-vin07t0:599_5: dīghabhāṇakā pana “himavantena saddhiṃ ekābaddhaṃ hutvā ṭhitaṃ mahāvana”nti vadanti.
tika-vin07t0:599_11: “Kesalomādi”nti saṅkhepato vuttamatthaṃ vibhāgena dassetuṃ yepi hītiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:599_12: Pañcapañcappabhedenāti ettha pañca pañca pabhedā etassa pariyāyassāti pañcapañcappabhedo,
tika-vin07t0:599_13: tena pañcapañcappabhedenāti evaṃ bāhiratthasamāsavasena pariyāyavisesanatā daṭṭhabbā.
tika-vin07t0:600_7: Tividhakalyāṇaṃ dasalakkhaṇasampannanti ettha pana jhānassa ādimajjhapariyosānānaṃ vasena tividhakalyāṇatā,
tika-vin07t0:600_8: tesaṃyeva ādimajjhapariyosānānaṃ lakkhaṇavasena dasalakkhaṇasampannatā ca veditabbā.
tika-vin07t0:600_9: Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana “dasalakkhaṇavibhāvaneneva tannissayabhūtā tividhakalyāṇatāpi jhānassa pākaṭā hotīti tatrimānītiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:601_0: Tatrāyaṃ pāḷīti tasmiṃ dasalakkhaṇavibhāvanavisaye ayaṃ pāḷi.
tika-vin07t0:601_1: Paṭipadāvisuddhīti gotrabhupariyosānāya pubbabhāgapaṭipadāya jhānassa nīvaraṇādiparibandhato visuddhi,
tika-vin07t0:601_2: sāyaṃ yasmā upekkhānubrūhanādīnampi paccayattena padhānā purimakāraṇasiddhā ca,
tika-vin07t0:601_4: Upekkhānubrūhanāti visodhetabbatādīnaṃ abhāvato tatramajjhattupekkhāya kiccanipphattiyā anubrūhanā,
tika-vin07t0:601_5: sā pana paribandhavisuddhisamakālavibhāvinīpi tabbisuddhiyāva nipphannāti dīpanatthamāha “upekkhānubrūhanā majjhe”ti.
tika-vin07t0:601_6: Sampahaṃsanāti vatthudhammādīnaṃ anativattanādisādhakassa ñāṇassa kiccanipphattivasena pariyodapanā,
tika-vin07t0:601_7: sā pana yasmā kattabbassa sabbakiccassa nipphattiyāva siddhā nāma hoti,
tika-vin07t0:601_9: Tīṇipi cetāni kalyāṇāni ekakkhaṇe labbhamānānipi paccayapaccayuppannatādivasena pavattantīti dassanatthaṃ ādimajjhapariyosānabhāvena vuttāni,
tika-vin07t0:601_10: na pana jhānassa uppādādikkhaṇattaye yathākkamaṃ labbhamānattāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:601_11: Majjhimaṃ samādhinimittaṃ paṭipajjatītiādīsu majjhimaṃ samādhinimittaṃ nāma samappavatto appanāsamādhiyeva.
tika-vin07t0:601_12: So hi līnuddhaccasaṅkhātānaṃ ubhinnaṃ antānaṃ anupagamanena majjhimo,
tika-vin07t0:601_13: savisesaṃ cittassa ekattārammaṇe ṭhapanato samādhiyeva uparivisesānaṃ kāraṇabhāvato “samādhinimitta”nti vuccati,
tika-vin07t0:601_15: Evaṃ paṭipannattā majjhimena samādhinimittena tattha ekattārammaṇe appanāgocare pakkhandati upatiṭṭhati,
tika-vin07t0:601_16: evaṃ visuddhassa pana tassa cittassa puna visodhetabbābhāvato visodhane byāpāraṃ akaronto puggalo visuddhaṃ cittaṃ ajjhupekkhati nāma.
tika-vin07t0:601_17: Samathabhāvūpagamanena samathapaṭipannassa puna samādhāne byāpāraṃ akaronto samathapaṭipannaṃ ajjhupekkhati,
tika-vin07t0:601_18: samathapaṭipannabhāvato evamassa kilesasaṃsaggaṃ pahāya ekattena upaṭṭhitassa puna ekattupaṭṭhāne byāpāraṃ
tika-vin07t0:602_0: Tattha jātānantiādīsu ye pana te evaṃ upekkhānubrūhite tasmiṃ jhānacitte jātā samādhipaññāsaṅkhātā yuganaddhadhammā,
tika-vin07t0:602_1: tesaṃ aññamaññaṃ anativattanasabhāvena sampahaṃsanā visodhanā pariyodapanā ca,
tika-vin07t0:602_2: saddhādīnaṃ indriyānaṃ kilesehi vimuttattā vimuttirasena ekarasatāya sampahaṃsanā ca,
tika-vin07t0:602_3: yañcetaṃ tadupagaṃ tesaṃ anativattanaekarasabhāvānaṃ anucchavikaṃ vīriyaṃ,
tika-vin07t0:602_4: tassa tadupagavīriyassa vāhanaṭṭhena pavattanaṭṭhena sampahaṃsanā ca,
tika-vin07t0:602_5: tasmiṃ khaṇe yathāvuttadhammānaṃ āsevanaṭṭhena sampahaṃsanā ca,
tika-vin07t0:602_6: pariyodapanā ca pariyodapanakassa ñāṇassa kiccanipphattivaseneva ijjhatīti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:602_7: Evaṃ tividhattagataṃ cittantiādīni tasseva cittassa thomanavacanāni.
tika-vin07t0:602_9: Cittassa adhiṭṭhānasampannanti tasmiññeva ārammaṇe cittassa nirantarappavattisaṅkhātena samādhinā sampannaṃ,
tika-vin07t0:604_1: Vaggumudāti ettha “vaggumatā”ti vattabbe lokikā “mudā”ti vohariṃsūti dassento āha “vaggumatā”ti.
tika-vin07t0:605_6: “Ayaṃ samaṇakuttako yathāsamuppannasaṃvegamūlakena samaṇabhāvūpagamanena atikkamituṃ sakkhissatī”ti cintetvā avoca,
tika-vin07t0:605_7: na pana “arahattappattiyā tīsu bhavesu appaṭisandhikatāya taṃ atikkamituṃ sakkhissatī”ti maraṇeneva sattānaṃ saṃsāramocanaladdhikattā devatāya.
tika-vin07t0:605_8: Na hi matānaṃ katthaci paṭisandhi gacchati.
tika-vin07t0:605_9: Iminā atthena evameva bhavitabbanti iminā paresaṃ jīvitā voropanatthena evameva saṃsāramocanasabhāveneva bhavitabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:605_11: aññamaññampi jīvitā voropentī”ti vuttattā sabbānipi tāni pañcabhikkhusatāni jīvitā voropesīti idaṃ yebhuyyavasena vuttanti gahetabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:605_12: Tasmā ye attanāpi attānaṃ aññamaññañca jīvitā voropesuṃ,
tika-vin07t0:605_13: te puthujjanabhikkhū ṭhapetvā tadavasese ca puthujjanabhikkhū,
tika-vin07t0:605_14: sabbe ca ariye ayaṃ jīvitā voropesīti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:606_2: Uddesaṃ paripucchaṃ gaṇhantīti attano attano ācariyānaṃ santike gaṇhanti,
tika-vin07t0:606_3: gahetvā ca ācariyehi saddhiṃ bhagavantaṃ upaṭṭhahanti.
tika-vin07t0:606_4: Tadā pana uddesādidāyakā tanubhūtehi bhikkhūhi bhagavantaṃ upagatā,
tika-vin07t0:608_1: Dasānussatīsu antogadhāpi ānāpānassati tadā bhikkhūnaṃ bahūnaṃ sappāyataṃ dassetuṃ puna gahitā.
tika-vin07t0:608_2: Tathā hi taṃ bhagavā tesaṃ desesi.
tika-vin07t0:608_4: cattāro pana āruppā ādikammikānaṃ ananurūpāti tesaṃ idha aggahaṇaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:608_7: Assāsavasenāti assāsaṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvāti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-vin07t0:608_8: Upaṭṭhānaṃ satīti appamussanatāya tameva assāsaṃ passāsañca upagantvā ṭhānaṃ,
tika-vin07t0:608_10: Idāni sativaseneva puggalaṃ niddisitukāmena yo assasatītiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:608_12: tassa sati assāsaṃ upagantvā tiṭṭhatītiādinā attho gahetabbo.
tika-vin07t0:608_15: Ariyamaggassa pādakabhūto ayaṃ samādhi anukkamena vaḍḍhitvā ariyamaggabhāvaṃ upagato viya hotīti āha “ariyamaggavuḍḍhippatto”ti.
tika-vin07t0:609_0: Bāhirakā ānāpānassatiṃ jānantā ādito catuppakārameva jānanti,
tika-vin07t0:609_2: Evamassetaṃ senāsananti ettha evanti bhāvanāsatiyā yathāvuttanayena ārammaṇe cittassa nibandhane satiyeva,
tika-vin07t0:609_4: tena muṭṭhassatissa araññavāso niratthako ananurūpoti dasseti.
tika-vin07t0:609_5: Avasesasattavidhasenāsananti “pabbataṃ kandaraṃ giriguhaṃ susānaṃ vanapatthaṃ abbhokāsaṃ palālapuñja”nti evaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:609_6: Ututtayānukūlaṃ dhātucariyānukūlanti gimhānādiututtayassa semhādidhātuttayassa mohādicariyattayassa ca anukūlaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:609_11: Pariggahitaniyyānaṃ satinti sabbathā gahitaṃ sammosapaṭipakkhato niggamanasaṅkhātaṃ satiṃ katvā,
tika-vin07t0:610_1: Bāttiṃsāya ākārehīti catūsu catukkesu āgatāni dīgharassādīni soḷasa padāni assāsapassāsavasena dvidhā vibhajitvā vuttehi dvattiṃsākārehi.
tika-vin07t0:610_5: Cittassa ekaggataṃ avikkhepanti vikkhepapaṭipakkhabhāvato “avikkhepo”ti laddhanāmaṃ cittassa ekaggabhāvaṃ pajānato.
tika-vin07t0:610_10: tato antomukhaṃ paṭisasanaṃ passāsoti āha assāsoti bahinikkhamanavātotiādi,
tika-vin07t0:610_11: suttantaṭṭhakathāsu pana ākaḍḍhanavasena anto sasanaṃ assāso,
tika-vin07t0:610_12: bahi paṭisasanaṃ passāsoti katvā uppaṭipāṭiyā vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:611_1: tassa ca paṭhamaṃ abbhantaravāto nikkhamatīti iminā sambandho.
tika-vin07t0:611_2: “Sabbesampi gabbhaseyyakānantiādinā dārakānaṃ pavattikkamena assāso bahinikkhamanavātoti gahetabbanti dīpetī”ti keci vadanti.
tika-vin07t0:611_3: Suttanayo eva cettha “assāsādimajjhapariyosānaṃ satiyā anugacchato ajjhattaṃ vikkhepagatena cittena kāyopi
tika-vin07t0:611_4: cittampi sāraddhā ca honti iñjitā ca phanditā ca passāsādimajjhapariyosānaṃ satiyā anugacchato bahiddhā
tika-vin07t0:611_5: vikkhepagatena cittena kāyopi cittampi sāraddhā ca honti iñjitā ca phanditā cā”ti imāya pāḷiyā sametīti
tika-vin07t0:611_10: Tattha yathā hītiādinā desaddhānaṃ upamāvasena dassitaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:611_11: Idāni tabbisiṭṭhakāladdhānavasena assāsapassāsānaṃ dīgharassataṃ upameyyavasena vibhāvetuṃ evantiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:611_13: Ettha ca hatthiādisarīre sunakhādisarīre ca assāsapassāsānaṃ desaddhānavisiṭṭhakāladdhānavaseneva dīgharassatā
tika-vin07t0:611_14: vuttāti veditabbā attabhāvasaṅkhātaṃ dīghaṃ addhānaṃ saṇikaṃ pūretvātiādivacanato.
tika-vin07t0:611_18: Navahākārehīti bhāvanamanuyuñjantassa pubbenāparaṃ aladdhavisesassa kevalaṃ addhānavasena ādito vuttā tayo ākārā,
tika-vin07t0:611_21: kassaci tadubhayampi upaṭṭhātīti tiṇṇaṃ puggalānaṃ vasena vuttā,
tika-vin07t0:612_0: Addhānasaṅkhāteti dīghe okāsaddhānasaṅkhāte attabhāve kāladdhānepi vā,
tika-vin07t0:612_2: Chando uppajjatīti bhāvanāya pubbenāparaṃ visesaṃ āvahantiyā laddhassādattā tattha sātisayo kattukāmatālakkhaṇo kusalacchando uppajjati.
tika-vin07t0:612_4: Pāmojjaṃ uppajjatīti assāsapassāsānaṃ sukhumatarabhāve ārammaṇassa santataratāya,
tika-vin07t0:612_5: kammaṭṭhānassa ca vīthipaṭipannatāya bhāvanācittasahagato pamodo khuddakādibhedā taruṇā pīti uppajjati.
tika-vin07t0:612_6: Cittaṃ vivattatīti paṭibhāganimitte uppanne pakatiassāsapassāsato cittaṃ nivattati.
tika-vin07t0:612_7: Upekkhā saṇṭhātīti tasmiṃ paṭibhāganimitte upacārappanābhede samādhimhi uppanne puna jhānanibbattanatthaṃ byāpārābhāvato ajjhupekkhanaṃ hoti,
tika-vin07t0:612_10: vipassanāvasena assāsapassāsamukhena tannissayanāmarūpassa anupassanā ca ñāṇaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:612_11: Kāyo upaṭṭhānanti assāsapassāsasaṅkhāto kāyo upagantvā tiṭṭhati ettha satīti upaṭṭhānaṃ, no sati,
tika-vin07t0:612_12: sati pana sarasato upatiṭṭhanaṭṭhena saraṇaṭṭhena ca upaṭṭhānañceva sati ca.
tika-vin07t0:612_14: tannissayabhūte karajakāye ca kāyasseva anupassanā niccādibhāvaṃ vā itthipurisasattajīvādibhāvaṃ vā ananupassitvā
tika-vin07t0:612_16: tāya kāyānupassanāya satisaṅkhātassa paṭṭhānassa bhāvanā vaḍḍhanā kāye kāyānupassanā satipaṭṭhānabhāvanāti ayaṃ saṅkhepattho.
tika-vin07t0:613_5: Tasmāti yasmā “ādimajjhapariyosānavasena sabbaṃ assāsapassāsakāyaṃ viditaṃ pākaṭaṃ karissāmī”ti pubbe
tika-vin07t0:613_6: pavattaābhogavasena pacchā tathā samuppannena ñāṇasampayuttacittena taṃ assāsapassāsakāyaṃ evaṃ viditaṃ
tika-vin07t0:613_7: pākaṭaṃ karonto assasati ceva passasati ca,
tika-vin07t0:613_8: tasmā evaṃbhūto sabbakāyapaṭisaṃvedī assasissāmi passasissāmīti sikkhati nāma,
tika-vin07t0:613_9: na pana “anāgate evaṃ karissāmī”ti cintanamattena so evaṃ vuccatīti adhippāyo.
tika-vin07t0:613_12: Na aññaṃ kiñcīti sabbakāyaṃ viditaṃ karissāmītiādikaṃ pubbābhogaṃ sandhāya vadati.
tika-vin07t0:613_16: So hi cittasamuṭṭhānopi samāno karajakāyapaṭibaddhavuttitāya tena saṅkharīyatīti kāyasaṅkhāroti vuccati.
tika-vin07t0:613_19: Nisīdati pallaṅkaṃ ābhujitvā ujuṃ kāyaṃ paṇidhāyāti hi iminā kāyapariggaho,
tika-vin07t0:613_20: parimukhaṃ satiṃ upaṭṭhapetvāti iminā cittapariggaho vutto.
tika-vin07t0:613_24: Adhimattaṃ hutvā pavattatīti kiriyāvisesanaṃ vā etaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:614_0: Mahābhūtapariggahe sukhumoti catudhātumukhena vipassanābhinivesaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:615_5: Assāsapassāso sabbathā abhāvaṃ upaneti ceti codakassa adhippāyo.
tika-vin07t0:615_6: Vātūpaladdhiyāti assāsapassāsavātassa abhāvena tabbisayāya upaladdhiyā bhāvanācittassa uppādo vaḍḍhi ca na hotīti attho.
tika-vin07t0:615_7: Na ca nanti ettha nanti nipātamattaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:615_8: Puna iti kirātiādi yathāvuttāya codanāya vissajjanā,
tika-vin07t0:615_9: tattha iti kira sikkhatīti mayā vuttākārena yadi sikkhatīti attho.
tika-vin07t0:615_10: Pabhāvanā hotīti yadipi oḷārikā kāyasaṅkhārā paṭippassambhanti,
tika-vin07t0:615_11: sukhumā pana atthevāti bhāvanāyapi vaḍḍhi hotevāti adhippāyo.
tika-vin07t0:616_3: Ahaṃ sīlaṃ rakkhāmīti ubhatovibhaṅgapariyāpannaṃ sīlaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:616_9: So upacchinditabboti visuddhimagge vuttena tassa tassa palibodhassa upacchedappakārena upacchinditabbo.
tika-vin07t0:616_11: Aṭṭhatiṃsārammaṇesūti ālokākāsakasiṇadvayaṃ vajjetvā pāḷiyaṃ āgatānaṃ aṭṭhannaṃ kasiṇānaṃ vasena vuttaṃ,
tika-vin07t0:616_13: Yathāvutteneva nayenāti yogānuyogakammassa padaṭṭhānattāti imamatthaṃ atidisati.
tika-vin07t0:616_15: Mahāhatthipathaṃ nīharanto viyāti kammaṭṭhānavīthiṃ mahāhatthimaggaṃ katvā dassento viya.
tika-vin07t0:617_0: Vuttappakāramācariyanti “imināva kammaṭṭhānena catutthajjhānaṃ nibbattetvā vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā arahattaṃ
tika-vin07t0:617_8: Kammaṭṭhānassa upaṭṭhānanti evaṃ bhāvanamanuyuñjantassa evamidha nimittaṃ upatiṭṭhatīti upadhāraṇaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:617_10: Kammaṭṭhānassa lakkhaṇanti gaṇanānubandhanāphusanānaṃ vasena bhāvanaṃ ussukkāpetvā ṭhapanāvasena matthakappatti
tika-vin07t0:618_0: Aṭṭhārasasenāsanadosavivajjitanti mahattaṃ navattaṃ jiṇṇattaṃ panthanissitattaṃ soṇḍipaṇṇapupphaphalayuttatā
tika-vin07t0:618_1: patthanīyatā nagaradārukhettasannissitatā visabhāgānaṃ puggalānaṃ atthitā paṭṭanasannissitatā paccantasannissitatā
tika-vin07t0:618_2: rajjasīmasannissitatā asappāyatā kalyāṇamittānaṃ alābhoti imehi aṭṭhārasahi senāsanadosehi vivajjitaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:619_2: senāsanaṃ nātidūraṃ hoti nāccāsannaṃ gamanāgamanasampannaṃ divā appākiṇṇaṃ rattiṃ appasaddaṃ appanigghosaṃ appaḍaṃsamakasavātātapasarīsapasamphassaṃ,
tika-vin07t0:619_3: tasmiṃ kho pana senāsane viharantassa appakasirena uppajjanti cīvarapiṇḍapātasenāsanagilānapaccayabhesajjaparikkhārā,
tika-vin07t0:619_4: tasmiṃ kho pana senāsane therā bhikkhū viharanti …pe… evaṃ kho,
tika-vin07t0:620_0: Evaṃ bhagavatā vuttehi pañcahi senāsanaṅgehi samannāgataṃ,
tika-vin07t0:620_5: therānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ nivāso ekanti evaṃ pañcaṅgāni veditabbāni.
tika-vin07t0:621_0: Upacchinnakhuddakapalibodhenāti dīghānaṃ kesādīnaṃ haraṇena pattacīvarādīnaṃ pacanatunnakaraṇarajanādikaraṇehi ca upacchinnā khuddakā palibodhā yena, tena.
tika-vin07t0:622_0: Anuvahanāti assāsapassāsānaṃ anugamanavasena satiyā nirantaraṃ anuppavattanā.
tika-vin07t0:622_1: Yasmā pana gaṇanādivasena viya phusanāvasena visuṃ manasikāro natthi,
tika-vin07t0:622_2: phuṭṭhaphuṭṭhaṭṭhāne eva gaṇanādi kātabbanti dassetuṃ idha phusanāgahaṇanti dīpento “phusanāti phuṭṭhaṭṭhāna”nti āha.
tika-vin07t0:622_6: Pavattato nimittato ca vinivaṭṭanato vinivaṭṭanā maggo.
tika-vin07t0:622_9: Khaṇḍanti “ekaṃ tīṇi pañcā”ti ekantarikādibhāvena gaṇanāya khaṇḍanaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:622_10: Atha vā khaṇḍanti antarantarā katipayakālaṃ agaṇetvā puna gaṇanavasena antarā odhiparicchedo na dassetabbo.
tika-vin07t0:622_11: Tathā khaṇḍaṃ dassentassa hi “kammaṭṭhānaninnaṃ pavattati nu kho me cittaṃ,
tika-vin07t0:622_14: idañca evaṃ khaṇḍaṃ dassetvā cirataraṃ gaṇanāya manasikarontassa vasena vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:622_15: So hi tathā laddhaṃ avikkhepamattaṃ nissāya evaṃ maññeyya.
tika-vin07t0:622_17: taṃ gahetvāti idaṃ assāsapassāsesu yassa ekova paṭhamaṃ upaṭṭhāti,
tika-vin07t0:622_21: Yo upaṭṭhātīti imināva dvīsu nāsāpuṭavātesu yo pākaṭo hoti,
tika-vin07t0:622_22: so gahetabboti ayampi attho dīpitoti gahetabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:622_23: Paṭhamaṃ ekekasmiṃ upaṭṭhitepi upalakkhetvā gaṇantasseva kamena ubhopi pākaṭā hontīti āha “assāsapassāsā pākaṭā hontī”ti.
tika-vin07t0:622_25: Evaṃ sīghagaṇanārambhassa okāsaṃ dassetuṃ imassāpi purimanayena gaṇayatotiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:622_27: pākaṭā hutvāti iminā dandhagaṇanāya āraddhakāle cittassa avisadatāya sukhumassāsādīnaṃ apākaṭataṃ,
tika-vin07t0:622_28: pacchā visadakāle pākaṭatañca tesu ca pākaṭesu dandhagaṇanaṃ pahāya sīghagaṇanā kātabbāti dasseti.
tika-vin07t0:622_32: Anto pavisantaṃ vātaṃ manasikaronto anto cittaṃ paveseti nāma.
tika-vin07t0:623_4: Phusanāṭhapanāvasena visuṃ manasikāro natthīti iminā yathā gaṇanāya phusanāya ca manasikaroti,
tika-vin07t0:623_5: evaṃ anubandhanaṃ vinā kevalaṃ ṭhapanāya ca phusanāya ca manasikāropi natthīti dassentena gaṇanaṃ paṭisaṃharitvā yāva appanā uppajjati,
tika-vin07t0:623_6: tāva anubandhanāya ca phusanāya ca manasikaroti,
tika-vin07t0:623_7: appanāya pana uppannāya anubandhanāya ṭhapanāya ca manasikaroti nāmāti dīpitaṃ hoti,
tika-vin07t0:623_8: aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana anubandhanāya vinā ṭhapanāya manasikāro natthīti dassanatthaṃ “anubandhanāya ca phusanāya
tika-vin07t0:623_9: ca ṭhapanāya ca manasikarotīti vuccatī”ti ettakameva vuttanti gahetabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:623_10: Yā accantāya na minoti na vinicchanati,
tika-vin07t0:623_11: sā mānassa samīpeti upamānaṃ siddhasādisena sādhyasādhanaṃ yathā go viya gavayoti.
tika-vin07t0:623_19: Anārammaṇamekacittassāti assāsapassāsānaṃ ekakkhaṇe appavattanato ekassa cittassa tayopi ārammaṇaṃ na honti,
tika-vin07t0:623_20: nimittena saha assāso passāso vāti dveyeva ekakkhaṇe ārammaṇaṃ hontīti attho.
tika-vin07t0:623_21: Ajānato ca tayo dhammeti nimittaṃ assāso passāsoti ime tayo dhamme ārammaṇakaraṇavasena avindantassa, ca-
tika-vin07t0:623_23: tena evañca sati ayaṃ aniṭṭhappasaṅgoti byatirekaṃ dasseti.
tika-vin07t0:624_1: visesamadhigacchatīti idaṃ parihāragāthāya vuttamevatthaṃ kakacopamāya vivarituṃ pucchāṭhapanaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:624_13: Nāsikagge vā mukhanimitte vāti dīghanāsiko nāsikagge,
tika-vin07t0:624_14: itaro mukhaṃ nimiyati chādiyati etenāti mukhanimittanti laddhanāme uttaroṭṭhe.
tika-vin07t0:625_0: Idaṃ padhānanti yena vīriyārambhena kāyopi cittampi bhāvanākammassa arahaṃ idha padhānanti phalena hetuṃ dasseti.
tika-vin07t0:625_3: nīvaraṇappahānena vā paṭhamajjhānādhigamaṃ dassetvā vitakkūpasamāpadesena dutiyajjhānādīnamadhigamamāha.
tika-vin07t0:625_4: Ayaṃ payogoti ayaṃ jhānādhigamassa hetubhūto kammaṭṭhānānuyogasaṅkhāto payogo.
tika-vin07t0:625_5: Saṃyojanā pahīyantīti dasapi saṃyojanāni maggapaapāṭiyā samucchedavasena pahīyanti.
tika-vin07t0:625_6: Byantī hontīti tathā sattapi anusayā bhaṅgamattassapi anavasesato vigatantā honti.
tika-vin07t0:625_7: Ayaṃ visesoti imaṃ samādhiṃ nissāya anukkamena labbhamāno ayaṃ saṃyojanappahānādiko imassa samādhissa visesoti attho.
tika-vin07t0:625_9: Paripuṇṇāti soḷasannaṃ vatthūnaṃ pāripūriyā sabbaso puṇṇā.
tika-vin07t0:626_5: Vicārādīhīti pana vattabbaṃ nippariyāyena vitakkassa appanābhāvato.
tika-vin07t0:626_9: vitakkasampayogato vā jhānaṅgesu padhānabhūto samādhi appanāti katvā “avasesajhānaṅgapaṭimaṇḍitā appanāsaṅkhātā ṭhapanā ca sampajjatī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:626_10: Kassaci pana gaṇanāvaseneva manasikārakālato pabhutīti ettha “anukkamato…pe…
tika-vin07t0:626_11: pattaṃ viya hotī”ti upari vakkhamāno gantho purāṇapotthakesu dissati,
tika-vin07t0:627_0: Oḷārike assāsapassāse niruddhetiādi heṭṭhā vuttanayampi vicetabbākārappattassa kāyasaṅkhārassa vicayanavidhiṃ dassetuṃ ānītaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:627_2: Nimittaṃ paṭṭhapetabbanti pubbe gahitākāranimittaggāhikā saññā phusanaṭṭhāne paṭṭhapetabbā.
tika-vin07t0:627_3: Imameva hi atthavasanti imaṃ anupaṭṭhahantassa ārammaṇassa upaṭṭhānavidhisaṅkhātaṃ kāraṇaṃ paṭicca.
tika-vin07t0:628_7: yathāvuttanayena nimitte eva cittassa ṭhapane satīti attho.
tika-vin07t0:628_13: Nimittuppattito paṭṭhāya hi te ākārā amanasikaroto antarahitā viya honti.
tika-vin07t0:628_14: Assāsapassāseti assāse passāse ca yo nānākāro,
tika-vin07t0:628_15: taṃ vibhāvayaṃ assāsapassāsasambhūte vā nimitte cittaṃ ṭhapayaṃ sakaṃ cittaṃ nibandhati nāmāti yojanā.
tika-vin07t0:628_16: Keci pana vibhāvayanti etassa vibhāvento viditaṃ pākaṭaṃ karontoti atthaṃ vadanti,
tika-vin07t0:628_19: assāsapassāse nānākāraṃ vibhāvento pajānanto tattha yaṃ laddhaṃ nimittaṃ,
tika-vin07t0:628_20: tasmiṃ cittaṃ ṭhapento anukkamena sakaṃ cittaṃ nibandhati appetīti.
tika-vin07t0:629_11: Sesesu āvāsādīsu yattha yattha asamāhitaṃ cittaṃ samādhiyati,
tika-vin07t0:629_14: Yassa pana evaṃ sattavidhaṃ asappāyaṃ vajjetvā sappāyameva sevantassapi appanā na hoti,
tika-vin07t0:629_15: tena sampādetabbaṃ dasavidhaṃ appanākosallaṃ dassento vatthuvisadakiriyātiādimāha.
tika-vin07t0:629_16: Tattha vatthuvisadakiriyā nāma kesanakhacchedanādīhi ajjhattikassa sarīravatthussa,
tika-vin07t0:629_21: Yasmiṃ samaye cittaṃ niggahetabbantiādīsu yasmiṃ samaye cittaṃ accāraddhatādīhi kāraṇehi uddhatatāya niggahetabbaṃ,
tika-vin07t0:629_22: tadā dhammavicayasambojjhaṅgādayo tayo abhāvetvā passaddhādīnaṃ tiṇṇaṃ bhāvanena cittassa niggaṇhanā hoti.
tika-vin07t0:629_24: tadā passaddhisambojjhaṅgādayo tayo abhāvetvā dhammavicayādīnaṃ tiṇṇaṃ bhāvanena cittassa paggaṇhanaṃ hoti.
tika-vin07t0:629_26: tadā tassa cittassa aṭṭhasaṃvegavatthupaccavekkhaṇādinā sampahaṃsanasaṅkhātā saṃvejanā hoti.
tika-vin07t0:629_27: Yadā panassa evaṃ paṭipajjanato alīnaṃ anuddhataṃ anirassādaṃ ārammaṇe samappavattaṃ samathavīthipaṭipannañca cittaṃ hoti,
tika-vin07t0:629_28: tadā tassa paggahaniggahasampahaṃsanesu abyāpāratāsamāpajjanena ajjhupekkhanā hoti.
tika-vin07t0:631_0: Pārisuddhiṃ pattukāmoti phalaṃ adhigantukāmo samāpajjitukāmo ca.
tika-vin07t0:631_2: Tato paraṃ sallakkhaṇavasena phalasamāpattiṃ samāpajjitukāmopīti evamattho gahetabbo.
tika-vin07t0:631_4: vasippattanti ettha paṭiladdhajhānato vuṭṭhāya vitakkādīsu jhānaṅgesu ekekaṃ āvajjayato bhavaṅgaṃ upacchinditvā
tika-vin07t0:631_8: Taṃ pana jhānaṃ samāpajjitukāmatānantaraṃ sīghaṃ samāpajjanasamatthatā samāpajjanavasī nāma.
tika-vin07t0:631_9: Accharāmattaṃ vā dasaccharāmattaṃ vā khaṇaṃ jhānaṃ ṭhapetuṃ samatthatā adhiṭṭhānavasī nāma.
tika-vin07t0:631_10: Tatheva lahuṃ khaṇaṃ jhānasamaṅgī hutvā jhānato bhavaṅguppattivasena vuṭṭhātuṃ samatthatā vuṭṭhānavasī nāma.
tika-vin07t0:631_12: “ettakameva khaṇaṃ jhānasamaṅgī hutvā jhānato vuṭṭhahissāmī”ti ca pavattapubbaparikammabhedenettha adhiṭṭhānavuṭṭhānavasiyo bhinnā,
tika-vin07t0:631_17: Paccavekkhaṇavīthiyañhi sīghaṃ āvajjanuppattiyā āvajjanavasī tadanantarānaṃ javanānaṃ samuppattiyā paccavekkhaṇavasīti
tika-vin07t0:631_18: āvajjanavasīsiddhiyāva paccavekkhaṇavasī siddhā eva hotīti veditabbā.
tika-vin07t0:631_19: Jhānaṅgāni pariggahetvāti jhānacittasampayuttāni jhānaṅgāni lakkhaṇādivasena pariggahetvā.
tika-vin07t0:631_20: Tesañca nissayanti tesaṃ vatthunissayānaṃ bhūtānaṃ nissayaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:631_21: Idañca karajakāyassa vatthudasakassa bhūtanissayattā suttantanayena vuttaṃ,
tika-vin07t0:631_23: Na hi kalāpantaragatāni bhūtāni kalāpantaragatānaṃ bhūtānaṃ nissayapaccayā honti,
tika-vin07t0:631_25: Paṭṭhāne hi asaṅgahitā sabbe paccayā suttantikanayena upanissayapaccaye saṅgayhantīti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:631_27: Yathāpariggahitarūpavatthudvārārammaṇaṃ vāti ettha yathāpariggahitakesādirūpārammaṇaṃ tato pubbe vuttanayavatthārammaṇañca
tika-vin07t0:631_33: Kaṅkhaṃ vitaratīti ahosiṃ nu kho ahaṃ atītamaddhānantiādinayappavattaṃ soḷasavatthukaṃ vicikicchaṃ atikkamati.
tika-vin07t0:631_34: Kalāpasammasanavasenāti yaṃ kiñci rūpaṃ atītānāgatapaccuppannantiādinā pañcasu khandhesu atītādikoṭṭhāsaṃ
tika-vin07t0:631_38: Obhāsādayoti obhāso ñāṇaṃ pīti passaddhi sukhaṃ adhimokkho paggaho upekkhā upaṭṭhānaṃ nikanti ca.
tika-vin07t0:631_42: Ettha ca obhāsādayo nava nikantisaṅkhātataṇhupakkilesavatthutāya upakkilesā vuttā,
tika-vin07t0:631_49: Ekūnavīsatibhedassāti catunnaṃ maggavīthīnaṃ anantaraṃ paccekaṃ uppajjantassa maggaphalanibbānapahīnāvasiṭṭhakilesānaṃ
tika-vin07t0:632_0: Sappītike dve jhāneti pītisahagatāni catukkanaye dve paṭhamadutiyajjhānāni.
tika-vin07t0:632_5: Ārammaṇe hi vidite tabbisayā cittacetasikā dhammā sayaṃ attano paṭisaṃviditā nāma hoti salakkhaṇato sāmaññalakkhaṇato ca pacchā gahaṇe sandehābhāvato.
tika-vin07t0:632_7: Evaṃ pītiṃ aniccādivasena gahaṇameva asammohato pītipaṭisaṃvedanaṃ nāma.
tika-vin07t0:633_0: Dīghaṃ assāsavasenāti dīghassa assāsassa ārammaṇabhūtassa vasena,
tika-vin07t0:633_1: pajānato sā pīti paṭisaṃviditā hotīti sambandho.
tika-vin07t0:633_2: Cittassa ekaggataṃ avikkhepaṃ pajānatoti jhānapariyāpannaṃ avikkhepāpannaṃ nāma cittassekaggataṃ taṃsampayuttāya paññāya pajānato.
tika-vin07t0:633_3: Yatheva hi ārammaṇamukhena pīti paṭisaṃviditā hoti,
tika-vin07t0:633_5: Sati upaṭṭhitā hotīti dīghaṃ assāsavasena jhānasampayuttā sati tassa ārammaṇe upaṭṭhitā tadārammaṇajjhānepi upaṭṭhitā nāma hotīti.
tika-vin07t0:633_6: Dīghaṃ passāsavasenātiādīsupi imināva nayena attho veditabbo.
tika-vin07t0:633_7: Evaṃ dassitaṃ pītipaṭisaṃvedanaṃ ārammaṇato asammohato ca vibhāgato dassetuṃ āvajjatotiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:633_11: tassa sā pīti paṭisaṃviditā hotīti sambandho.
tika-vin07t0:633_12: Passatoti dassanabhūtena ñāṇena jhānato vuṭṭhāya passantassa.
tika-vin07t0:633_14: Cittaṃ adhiṭṭhahatoti “ettakaṃ velaṃ jhānasamaṅgī bhavissāmī”ti jhānacittaṃ adhiṭṭhahantassa.
tika-vin07t0:633_15: Evaṃ pañcannaṃ vasibhāvānaṃ vasena jhānassa pajānanamukhena ārammaṇato pītiyā paṭisaṃvedanā dassitā.
tika-vin07t0:633_19: Abhiññeyyanti visiṭṭhāya paññāya jānitabbaṃ catusaccaṃ vipassanāpaññāpubbaṅgamāya maggapaññāya abhijānatotiādi yojanā.
tika-vin07t0:634_3: Vipassanābhūmidassanatthanti kāyikasukhādisīsena pakiṇṇakasaṅkhāradassanato vuttaṃ samathe kāyikasukhābhāvato.
tika-vin07t0:634_5: Vuttanayenāti imassa hi bhikkhuno pubbe apariggahitakāletiādinā kāyasaṅkhāre vuttanayena.
tika-vin07t0:634_6: Pītisīsena vedanā vuttāti pītiapadesena vedanā vuttā,
tika-vin07t0:634_8: Dvīsu cittasaṅkhārapadesūti “cittasaṅkhārapaṭisaṃvedī passambhayaṃ cittasaṅkhāra”nti imesu dvīsu koṭṭhāsesu.
tika-vin07t0:634_10: Cittapaṭisaṃveditā veditabbāti ārammaṇato asammohatotiādinā vuttanayaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:636_1: Yadipi ariyā neva attanāva attānaṃ aññamaññaṃ vā jīvitā voropenti,
tika-vin07t0:636_3: tathāpi yathāvuttehi tīhi pakārehi matānaṃ puthujjanānaṃ antare migalaṇḍikena māritānaṃ ariyapuggalānampi atthitāya “ariyapuggalamissakattā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:636_4: Atha vā puthujjanakāle attanāva attānaṃ ghātetvā maraṇasamaye vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā ariyamaggaṃ paṭilabhitvā
tika-vin07t0:638_1: Byañjane ādaraṃ akatvāti jānitvā sañjānitvātiādinā byañjanānurūpaṃ avuttattā vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:638_2: Pāṇoti jānantoti idaṃ manussoti ajānitvāpi kevalaṃ sattasaññāya eva pārājikabhāvadassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:638_7: Sikhāppatto atthoti sañciccāti pubbakālakiriyāvasena vuttassapi vītikkamabhūtassa aparakālakiriyāyuttadassanena koṭippatto attho.
tika-vin07t0:638_10: Tato vā uddhanti dutiyasattāhādīsu abbudādibhāvappattaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:638_11: Parihīnavegassa santānassa paccayo hotīti sahakārīpaccayo hoti,
tika-vin07t0:638_13: Kammameva hi khaṇe khaṇe uppajjamānānaṃ kammajarūpānaṃ janakapaccayo,
tika-vin07t0:638_14: tañca pavattiyaṃ pubbe uppajjitvā ṭhitaṃ anupahataṃ catusantatirūpaṃ sahakārīpaccayaṃ labhitvāva kātuṃ sakkoti,
tika-vin07t0:638_16: yena kenaci virodhipaccayena niruddhacakkhādippasādānaṃ puggalānaṃ vijjamānampi kammaṃ cakkhādikaṃ janetuṃ na sakkotīti siddhameva hoti.
tika-vin07t0:639_2: Saraseneva patanasabhāvassa saṇikaṃ patituṃ adatvā atīva pātanaṃ sīghapātanaṃ atipāto,
tika-vin07t0:639_6: Mantaṃ payojentīti aloṇabhojanadabbasayanasusānagamanādīhi payogehi mantaṃ parivattenti,
tika-vin07t0:639_15: Vijjaṃ parivattetvāti gandhāravijjādikaṃ attano vijjaṃ katūpacāraṃ mantapaṭhanakkamena parijappitvā.
tika-vin07t0:639_24: Taṃ tesaṃ icchāmattanti suttatthato na sametīti adhippāyo.
tika-vin07t0:640_0: Itarathāti pariyeseyyāti padassa gavesanamattameva yathārutavasena attho siyā,
tika-vin07t0:640_1: tadā pariyiṭṭhamattena pariyesitvā satthādīnaṃ laddhamattenāti attho.
tika-vin07t0:640_2: Sasanti hiṃsanti etenāti satthanti vadhopakaraṇassa pāsāṇarajjuādino sabbassāpi nāmanti āha laguḷātiādi.
tika-vin07t0:640_5: Parato vuttanayattāti parato nigamanavasena vuttassa dutiyapadassa padabhājane vuttanayattā.
tika-vin07t0:640_7: saddassa vicittādianekatthavisayattā itarehi nivattetvā viññāṇatthaṃ niyametuṃ vutto.
tika-vin07t0:641_4: Pacchā vā tena rogenāti etena anāgatampi jīvitindriyaṃ ārabbha pāṇātipātassa pavattiṃ dasseti.
tika-vin07t0:641_6: tadā taṃ jīvitā voropehī”ti āṇattiyā cirena samiddhiyampi āṇattikkhaṇeyeva pāṇātipāto.
tika-vin07t0:641_7: Opātakhaṇanādithāvarapayogesu payogakaraṇato pacchā gahitapaṭisandhikassāpi sattassa maraṇe pāṇātipāto ca anāgatārammaṇo upapanno hoti.
tika-vin07t0:641_8: Yaṃ pana sikkhāpadavibhaṅge “pañca sikkhāpadāni paccuppannārammaṇāyevā”ti vuttaṃ,
tika-vin07t0:641_12: Dutiyappahārena maratīti paṭhamappahāraṃ vinā dutiyeneva maratīti attho.
tika-vin07t0:641_14: Kiñcāpi paṭhamappahāro sayameva na sakkoti māretuṃ,
tika-vin07t0:641_15: dutiyaṃ pana labhitvā sakkonto jīvitavināsahetu hoti,
tika-vin07t0:641_16: tasmā paṭhamappahāraṃ vinā maraṇassa asiddhattā “payogo tena ca maraṇa”nti iminā saṃsandanato paṭhamappahāreneva kammabaddho yutto,
tika-vin07t0:641_20: Yadi pana dutiyappahāradāyakassāpi puggalassa vadhakacetanā atthi,
tika-vin07t0:641_21: tassāpi attano payogenāpi matattā payogakkhaṇe pāṇātipātoti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:642_1: “Eḷakaṃ māremī”ti viparītaggahaṇepi “ima”nti yathānipannasseva paramatthato gahitattā yathāvatthukaṃ kammabaddho hotiyevāti āha imaṃ vatthuntiādi.
tika-vin07t0:642_2: Ghātako ca hotīti pāṇātipātakammena baddhoti attho.
tika-vin07t0:642_3: Mātādiguṇamahante ārabbha pavattavadhakacetanāya mahāsāvajjatāya vuttaṃ “idha pana cetanā dāruṇā hotī”ti.
tika-vin07t0:643_2: Yathādhippāyaṃ gateti yodhaṃ vijjhitvā pitari viddhe,
tika-vin07t0:643_3: yodhaṃ pana avijjhitvā kevalaṃ pitari viddhepi visaṅketo natthiyeva pitaripi vadhakacittassa atthitāya,
tika-vin07t0:643_5: Ānantariyaṃ pana natthīti pituvisayaṃ pāṇātipātakammaṃ natthīti attho.
tika-vin07t0:644_0: Evaṃ vijjhāti evaṃ pādehi bhūmiyaṃ ṭhatvā evaṃ dhanuṃ gahetvā ākaḍḍhitvātiādinā vijjhanappakārasikkhāpanamukhena āṇāpetīti attho.
tika-vin07t0:644_1: Evaṃ paharāti daḷhaṃ asiṃ gahetvā evaṃ pahara.
tika-vin07t0:644_2: Evaṃ ghātehīti evaṃ kammakāraṇaṃ katvā mārehi.
tika-vin07t0:644_3: Tattakā ubhinnaṃ pāṇātipātāti anuddisitvā yesaṃ kesañci māraṇatthāya ubhohi payogassa katattā vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:644_4: Sace hi āṇāpako “evaṃ viddhe asuko evaṃ maratī”ti saññāya “evaṃ vijjhā”ti āṇāpeti,
tika-vin07t0:644_6: Sace āṇatto “asuka”nti niyametvā uddissa saraṃ khipati,
tika-vin07t0:645_3: evaṃ ghātehī”ti kiriyāvisesassa parāmaṭṭhattā ācariyaparamparā āgataṃ kiriyāvisesampi pāḷisaṃsandanato gahetvā dassento aparo nayotiādimāha.
tika-vin07t0:645_7: Saṅkhamuṇḍakanti sīsakaṭāhe cammaṃ saha kesehi uppāṭetvā thūlasakkharāhi sīsakaṭāhaṃ ghaṃsitvā saṅkhavaṇṇakaraṇavasena saṅkhamuṇḍakammakaraṇaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:645_10: Ure paharitvā piṭṭhiyaṃ paharitvā gīvāyaṃ paharitvātiādinā sarīrāvayavappadesesu paharaṇavijjhanādiniyamopi
tika-vin07t0:645_11: kiriyāviseseyeva saṅgayhati aṭṭhakathāsu saṅkhamuṇḍakādisarīrappadesavisayāyapi ghātanāya tattha pavesitattā,
tika-vin07t0:645_12: yaṃ pana sāratthadīpaniyaṃ purato paharitvā mārehītiādikassa aṭṭhakathāpāṭhassa “purimapassādīnampi vatthusabhāgato
tika-vin07t0:645_13: vatthuggahaṇeneva gahaṇanti āha purato paharitvātiādī”ti evamadhippāyakathanaṃ,
tika-vin07t0:645_14: taṃ saṅkhamuṇḍakādikassa sarīrappadese kammakāraṇākaraṇassa aṭṭhakathāya kiriyāvisesavisaye vuttattā na yujjati.
tika-vin07t0:645_21: idaṃ pana yathāṇattavatthusmimpi kiriyāvisesavisaṅketena kammabaddhābhāvaṃ dassetuṃ vuttanti paññāyati.
tika-vin07t0:645_22: Tena “vatthuṃ avisaṃvādetvā mārentī”ti ettakameva avatvā “yathāṇattiyā”ti kiriyāvisesaniyamopi dassito,
tika-vin07t0:645_24: Vatthuniddese ca “vatthūti māretabbo satto”ti ettakameva vuttaṃ,
tika-vin07t0:645_26: Tasmā purato paharaṇādipi kiriyāvisese eva saṅgayhatīti amhākaṃ khanti,
tika-vin07t0:646_0: Yadā kadāci pubbaṇheti āṇattadivasato aññassapi yassa kassaci divasassa pubbaṇhe.
tika-vin07t0:646_1: Etaṃ gāme ṭhitanti gāmo puggalaniyamanatthaṃ vutto,
tika-vin07t0:646_5: etena kālokāsaāvudhaiayāpathakiriyāvisesānaṃ niyamicchāya asati yena kenaci pakārena maraṇameva icchantassa
tika-vin07t0:646_6: āṇāpakassa mukhāruḷhavasena vuttassa desakālādiniyamassa visaṅketepi kammabaddhoyevāti ñāpitaṃ hoti.
tika-vin07t0:646_7: Yo pana cittena yattha katthaci yadā kadāci yena kenaci pakārena maraṇameva icchantopi kālādivisaṅketena
tika-vin07t0:646_8: akusalato codanato vā muccitukāmo lesena kālādiniyamaṃ karoti,
tika-vin07t0:646_9: tassa manussaviggahapārājikato pariyāyena amuccanato kālādivisaṅketepi kammabaddhovāti gahetvā vicāraṇato gahetabbaṃ,
tika-vin07t0:647_0: “Dīghaṃ mārehī”ti vuttepi dīghasaṇṭhānānaṃ bahubhāvato “itthannāmaṃ evarūpañca dīgha”nti aññesaṃ asādhāraṇalakkhaṇena
tika-vin07t0:647_3: Ettha ca cittena bahūsu dīghasaṇṭhānesu ekaṃ niyametvā vuttepi vācāya aniyamitattā aññasmiṃ tādise mārite natthi visaṅketoti vadanti.
tika-vin07t0:647_4: Attānaṃ muñcitvā parapāṇimhi pāṇasaññitālakkhaṇassa aṅgassa abhāvato nevatthi pāṇātipātoti āha “āṇāpako muccatī”ti.
tika-vin07t0:647_5: Attānaṃ uddissa “asukaṭṭhāne nisinna”nti okāsaniyame tasmiṃ padese nisinnassa yassa kassaci jīvitindriyaṃ
tika-vin07t0:647_6: ārabbha vadhakacittaṃ uppajjatīti vuttaṃ “neva vadhako muccati na āṇāpako”ti.
tika-vin07t0:647_7: Okāsañhi niyametvā niddisanto tasmiṃ okāse nisinnaṃ māretukāmo hoti,
tika-vin07t0:647_9: tasmā okāsena saha tattha nisinnasseva jīvitindriyaṃ ārammaṇaṃ hoti,
tika-vin07t0:647_11: Sace pana sayaṃ tattheva nisīditvā attano nisinnaṭṭhānameva niyametvā “mārehī”ti vuttepi añño tattha nisinno māriyati,
tika-vin07t0:647_12: tassāpi attanopi jīvitaṃ ārabbha vadhakacetanā pavattati,
tika-vin07t0:647_13: parasmiṃ tattha mārite āṇāpakassa kammabaddhoti gahetabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:647_15: na aññesaṃ visayoti āha “tasmā ettha na anādariyaṃ kātabba”nti.
tika-vin07t0:648_0: Evaṃ āṇāpentassa ācariyassa tāva dukkaṭanti sace āṇattiko yathādhippāyaṃ na gacchati,
tika-vin07t0:648_10: idañca yathāṇattivasena saṅgharakkhitassa jīvitā voropane asati yujjati,
tika-vin07t0:648_16: tadā ācariyassa āṇattikkhaṇeyeva thullaccayaṃ hotīti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:649_3: evaṃ mahāaṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttanayena atthe satīti attho.
tika-vin07t0:649_4: Paṭiggahaṇe āpattiyeva na siyāti vadhakassa “sādhu suṭṭhū”ti maraṇapaṭiggahaṇe dukkaṭāpatti neva siyā,
tika-vin07t0:649_6: kimaṅgaṃ pana maraṇapaṭiggahaṇeti dassanatthaṃ sañcarittapaṭiggahaṇādi nidassitaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:649_7: “Aho vata itthannāmo hato assā”ti evaṃ maraṇābhinandanadassanatthaṃ sañcarittapaṭiggahaṇādibhinandane
tika-vin07t0:649_8: dukkaṭe sati pageva “ahaṃ taṃ māressāmī”ti maraṇapaṭiggahaṇeti adhippāyo.
tika-vin07t0:649_9: Paṭiggaṇhantassevetaṃ dukkaṭanti avadhāraṇena saṅgharakkhitassa paṭiggahaṇapaccayā mūlaṭṭhassa nattheva āpattīti dasseti,
tika-vin07t0:649_12: taṃ na yuttaṃ ekena payogena dvinnaṃ dukkaṭānaṃ asambhavā.
tika-vin07t0:649_15: Okāsābhāvenāti mūlaṭṭhassa thullaccayassa vuccamānattā paṭiggaṇhantassa dukkaṭaṃ na vuttaṃ okāsābhāvena,
tika-vin07t0:650_2: Vācāya vācāya dukkaṭanti “yo koci mama vacanaṃ sutvā imaṃ māretū”ti iminā adhippāyena avatvā kevalaṃ
tika-vin07t0:650_3: maraṇābhinandanavaseneva vuttattā corāpi nāma taṃ na hanantītiādivācāyapi dukkaṭameva vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:650_6: Ubho uddissa maraṇaṃ saṃvaṇṇentassa payogasamuṭṭhāpikāya cetanāya ekattepi “dve pāṇātipātā”ti vattabbatāsaṅkhātaṃ
tika-vin07t0:650_9: Tattakā pāṇātipātāti yattakā saṃvaṇṇanaṃ sutvā marissanti,
tika-vin07t0:650_10: tattakānampi vattamānaṃ anāgatañca jīvitindriyaṃ sabbaṃ ālambitvāva cetanāya pavattanato tattakā pāṇātipātā honti,
tika-vin07t0:650_11: tattakāhi cetanāhi dātabbaṃ pavattivipākaṃ ekāva sā cetanā dātuṃ sakkotīti attho,
tika-vin07t0:650_12: paṭisandhivipākaṃ pana sayañca pubbāparacetanā ca ekekameva dātuṃ sakkotīti gahetabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:651_2: idañca bhikkhuno rūpiyamūlassa abhāvaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ,
tika-vin07t0:651_5: mūlaṃ pana aggahetvāpi potthakassa potthakasāmino santakattāpādanamevettha pamāṇanti gahetabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:651_6: Lekhādassanakotūhalakāti sundarakkharaṃ disvā vā “kīdisaṃ nu kho potthaka”nti vā oloketukāmā.
