tika-vin07t0:1650_1: Kheḷena cettha siṅghāṇikāpi saṅgahitāti ettha udakagaṇḍusakaṃ katvā ucchukacavarādiñca mukheneva harituṃ udakesu chaḍḍetuṃ vaṭṭatīti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:1660_4: tīhi saraṇagamanehi upasampannāti bhikkhunī”ti idaṃ bhikkhuvibhaṅgapāḷiyā samadassanatthaṃ aṭṭhagarudhammappaṭiggahaṇena
tika-vin07t0:1660_5: laddhūpasampadaṃ mahāpajāpatigotamiñceva tāya saha nikkhantā bhagavato āṇāya bhikkhūnaññeva santike ekatoupasampannā
tika-vin07t0:1660_7: Tā hi bhagavatā ānandattherassa yācanāya pabbajjaṃ anujānantena “etha bhikkhuniyo,
tika-vin07t0:1660_8: mama sāsane tumhepi pavisathā”ti vuttā viya jātā.
tika-vin07t0:1660_9: Sākiyāniyo eva saraṇasīlāni datvā kammavācāya upasampāditattā “tīhi saraṇagamanehi upasampannā”ti vuttā.
tika-vin07t0:1660_10: Na hi etāhi aññā ehibhikkhunibhāvādinā upasampannā nāma santi.
tika-vin07t0:1662_0: ‘Ehi bhadde’ti maṃ avoca, sā me āsūpasampadā”ti. –
tika-vin07t0:1666_2: upasampadañca gaṇhāhī”ti bhagavato āṇā upasampadāya kāraṇattā upasampadā ahosīti imamatthaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:1666_4: bhikkhunupassayaṃ gantvā bhikkhunīnaṃ santike pabbajja upasampajjassūti maṃ avaca āṇāpesi,
tika-vin07t0:1666_5: sā satthu āṇā mayhaṃ upasampadāya kāraṇattā upasampadā āsi ahosī”ti.
tika-vin07t0:1667_2: pana aññāni ca sādhāraṇasikkhāpadāni yasmā bhikkhuvibhaṅge vuttanidānavatthādīsu eva sādhāraṇavasena paññattāni,
tika-vin07t0:1667_3: pacchā pana tāni bhikkhunīnaṃ pātimokkhuddesaṃ anujānantena bhagavatā tāsaṃ sikkhāpaccakkhānābhāvena
tika-vin07t0:1667_4: “yā pana bhikkhunī chandaso methunaṃ dhammaṃ paṭiseveyyā”tiādinā tadanurūpavasena parivattetvā asādhāraṇasikkhāpadehi
tika-vin07t0:1667_6: Yasmā ca nesaṃ bhikkhuvibhaṅge vuttanayeneva sabbopi vinicchayo sakkā ñātuṃ,
tika-vin07t0:1667_7: tasmā tāni vajjetvā asādhāraṇānaṃ eva idha vibhaṅgo vuttoti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:1668_1: Bhikkhūnaṃ “kāyasaṃsaggaṃ sādiyeyyā”ti avatvā “samāpajjeyyā”ti vuttattā “bhikkhu āpattiyā na kāretabbo”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:1668_3: etena akiriyāsamuṭṭhānāpi ayaṃ āpatti hotīti dasseti.
tika-vin07t0:1668_5: mayaṃ panettha evaṃ takkayāma “kāyasaṃsaggakkhaṇe sādiyantiyā kiriyāya abhāvepi tato pubbe pavattitānaṃ
tika-vin07t0:1668_7: parehi magge kariyamānupakkamena niccalassa sādiyato sukkavissaṭṭhi viya pubbapayogābhāvepi vā tasmiññeva
tika-vin07t0:1668_8: khaṇe parūpakkamena janiyamānāya attano kāyacalanādisaṅkhātāya kiriyāya,
tika-vin07t0:1668_9: sā hi sādiyamānena tassā cittenāpi samuṭṭhitā kiriyā nāma hoti avāyamitvā parūpakkamena methunasādiyane viya,
tika-vin07t0:1668_10: bhikkhūnaṃ pana parūpakkamajanitaṃ kiriyaṃ abbohārikaṃ katvā attanā kariyamānapayogavaseneva ‘kāyasaṃsaggaṃ
tika-vin07t0:1668_11: samāpajjeyyā’ti evaṃ visesetvāva sikkhāpadassa paññattattā sādiyamānepi na doso.
tika-vin07t0:1668_12: Itarathā hi tabbahulanayenettha kiriyatte gayhamāne aññesampi kiriyākiriyasikkhāpadānaṃ kiriyattaggahaṇappasaṅgo siyā”ti.
tika-vin07t0:1671_1: Dutiye purimenātiādi sundarīnandāya vajjapaṭicchādane paññattataṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:1671_3: “Dhuraṃ nikkhittamatte”ti vuttattā paṇṇattiṃ ajānantiyāpi “idaṃ vajjaṃ na pakāsessāmī”ti chandena dhuraṃ nikkhepakkhaṇe pārājikanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:1671_4: Taṃ pana paṭicchādanaṃ yasmā “pesalā ñatvā garahissantī”ti bhayeneva hoti,
tika-vin07t0:1671_7: Yaṃ pana sāratthadīpaniyaṃ “kiñcāpi vajjapaṭicchādanaṃ pemavasena hoti,
tika-vin07t0:1671_8: tathāpi sikkhāpadavītikkamacittaṃ domanassitameva hotī”ti evaṃ paṇṇattivītikkamacitteneva chādanaṃ domanassatte kāraṇaṃ vuttaṃ,
tika-vin07t0:1675_1: Catutthe lokassādasaṅkhātaṃ mittehi aññamaññaṃ kātabbaṃ santhavaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:1676_0: Tissitthiyo methunaṃ taṃ na seveti yā tisso itthiyo,
tika-vin07t0:1676_1: tāsu vuttaṃ taṃ methunaṃ na seveyya.
tika-vin07t0:1676_3: tayo paṇḍake ca upasaṅkamitvā methunaṃ na seveti attho.
tika-vin07t0:1677_2: “Methunadhammassa pubbabhāgattā paccayo hotī”ti iminā kāriyopacārena kāyasaṃsaggo methunadhammoti vuttoti dasseti.
tika-vin07t0:1682_1: Saṅghādisesakaṇḍe “dutiyassa ārocetī”ti etthāpi dvīsupi aḍḍakārakesu yassa kassaci dutiyassa kathaṃ yo
tika-vin07t0:1682_2: koci ārocetīti evamattho gahetabboti āha “eseva nayo”ti.
tika-vin07t0:1684_1: Tesaṃ anatthakāmatāyāti “coro”ti vuttaṃ mama vacanaṃ sutvā keci daṇḍissanti jīvitā voropessantīti evaṃ saññāya.
tika-vin07t0:1684_2: Etena kevalaṃ bhayena vā parikkhāraggahaṇatthaṃ vā sahasā “coro”ti vutte daṇḍitepi na dosoti dasseti.
tika-vin07t0:1684_3: Rājapurisānañhi “coro aya”nti uddissa kathane eva gīvā,
tika-vin07t0:1684_5: pana ārāmikādīnaṃ vā sammukhā “asuko coro evamakāsī”ti kenaci vuttavacanaṃ nissāya ārāmikādīsu rājapurisānaṃ
tika-vin07t0:1684_6: vatvā daṇḍāpentesupi bhikkhussa na gīvā rājapurisānaṃ avuttattā.
tika-vin07t0:1684_9: “Tvaṃ etassa santakaṃ acchindā”ti āṇattopi hi sace aññena acchindāpeti,
tika-vin07t0:1684_13: mā cassa daṇḍaṃ karohī”ti uddissa vadantassāpi daṇḍe gahitepi na gīvā eva daṇḍaggahaṇassa paṭikkhittattā,
tika-vin07t0:1684_14: “asukabhaṇḍaṃ avaharā”ti āṇāpetvā vippaṭisāre uppanne puna paṭikkhipane viya.
tika-vin07t0:1685_0: Dāsādīnaṃ sampaṭicchane viya tadatthāya aḍḍakaraṇe bhikkhūnampi dukkaṭanti āha “akappiyaaḍḍo nāma na vaṭṭatī”ti.
tika-vin07t0:1685_1: Kenaci pana bhikkhunā khettādiatthāya vohārikānaṃ santikaṃ gantvā aḍḍe katepi taṃ khettādisampaṭicchane
tika-vin07t0:1685_2: viya sabbesaṃ akappiyaṃ na hoti pubbe eva saṅghassa santakattā,
tika-vin07t0:1685_4: Dāsādīnampi pana atthāya rakkhaṃ yācituṃ vohārikena puṭṭhena saṅghassa uppannaṃ kappiyakkamaṃ vattuṃ,
tika-vin07t0:1685_5: ārāmikādīhi ca aḍḍaṃ kārāpetuñca vaṭṭati eva.
tika-vin07t0:1685_6: Vihāravatthādikappiyaaḍḍaṃ pana bhikkhuno sayampi kātuṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin07t0:1686_0: Bhikkhunīnaṃ vuttoti rakkhaṃ yācantīnaṃ bhikkhunīnaṃ vutto uddissaanuddissavasena rakkhāyācanavinicchayo,
tika-vin07t0:1689_1: Pāḷiyaṃ dutiye mallagaṇabhaṭiputtagaṇādikantiādīsu mallarājūnaṃ gaṇo mallagaṇo.
tika-vin07t0:1689_5: Tathā kumārabhattiko ca gaṇo bhaṭiputtagaṇo”tipi vadanti.
tika-vin07t0:1690_4: taṃ ñatvā ananuññātakāraṇā vuṭṭhāpananti dve aṅgāni.
tika-vin07t0:1693_1: Tatiye parikkhepaṃ atikkāmentiyāti gāmantarassa parikkhepaṃ atikkāmentiyā.
tika-vin07t0:1693_4: pāḷiyaṃ vuttattā gāmaṃ pavisantiyā gharūpacāre ṭhitassa dutiyaleḍḍupātasaṅkhātassa upacārassa atikkamo
tika-vin07t0:1693_5: nāma paṭhamaleḍḍupātaṭṭhānasaṅkhātassa parikkhepārahaṭṭhānassa atikkamo evāti āha “parikkhepārahaṭṭhānaṃ

tika-vin07t0:1825_3: Attano paccakkhato adhigatattā na paraṃ pacceti,
tika-vin07t0:1825_4: parassa saddhāya ettha na pavattatīti aparappaccayo.
tika-vin07t0:1825_9: Keci pana “sammā dukkhassa antakiriyāyāti vacanapariyosāne eva upasampadā sijjhati,
tika-vin07t0:1825_10: aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana ‘ehi bhikkhūti bhagavato vacanenā’ti idaṃ ehibhikkhusaddopalakkhitavacanaṃ ehibhikkhuvacanantiādipadavasena
tika-vin07t0:1825_14: cara brahmacariyaṃ sammā dukkhassa antakiriyāyā”ti iminā vacanena sameti.
tika-vin07t0:1825_18: asekkhānaṃ pana “cara brahmacariya”nti pariyosānanti daṭṭhabbaṃ sikkhattayasamiddhito.
tika-vin07t0:1827_4: Virajjatīti catunnaṃ maggānaṃ vasena na rajjati.
tika-vin07t0:1827_8: Karaṇīyaṃ catūsu saccesu catūhi maggehi paccekaṃ kattabbaṃ pariññādivasena soḷasavidhaṃ kiccaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:1827_10: kilesakkhayāya vā aparaṃ puna maggabhāvanākiccaṃ me natthīti pajānāti.
tika-vin07t0:1827_11: Atha vā itthattāyāti itthabhāvato vattamānakkhandhasantānato aparaṃ khandhasantānaṃ mayhaṃ na bhavissatīti attho.
tika-vin07t0:1829_4: Susānaṃ maññeti susānaṃ viya addasa sakaṃ parijananti sambandho.
tika-vin07t0:1830_1: Idaṃ kho yasāti bhagavā nibbānaṃ sandhāyāha.
tika-vin07t0:1830_8: Sāmaṃ attanāva ukkaṃso ukkhipanaṃ etissanti sāmukkaṃsikā,
tika-vin07t0:1831_0: 27. Assadūteti assaāruḷhe dūte. Iddhābhisaṅkhāranti iddhikiriyaṃ. Abhisaṅkharesi akāsi.
tika-vin07t0:1832_1: Yathādiṭṭhanti paṭhamamaggena diṭṭhaṃ catussaccabhūmiṃ sesamaggattayena paccavekkhantassa,
tika-vin07t0:1832_3: Mātu no jīvitanti ettha noti nipātamattaṃ,
tika-vin07t0:1832_7: cara brahmacariya”nti ettakeneva bhagavā upasampadaṃ adāsi.
tika-vin07t0:1832_8: Khīṇāsavānañhi ettakeneva upasampadā anuññātā pubbeva dukkhassa parikkhīṇattā.
tika-vin07t0:1832_9: Cara brahmacariyanti sāsanabrahmacariyasaṅkhātaṃ sikkhāpadapūraṇaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ,
tika-vin07t0:1833_1: Seṭṭhānuseṭṭhīnanti seṭṭhino ca anuseṭṭhino ca paveṇīvasena āgatā yesaṃ kulānaṃ santi,
tika-vin07t0:1834_1: Mā ekena dveti ekena maggena dve bhikkhū mā agamittha.
tika-vin07t0:1835_1: Ye dibbā ye ca mānusāti ye dibbakāmaguṇanissitā,
tika-vin07t0:1836_0: Antalikkhe carante pañcābhiññepi bandhatīti antalikkhacaro, rāgapāso.
tika-vin07t0:1837_0: Jānāti manti so kira “mahānubhāvo añño devaputto nivāretīti bhīto nivattissati nu kho”tisaññāya vatvā
tika-vin07t0:1837_1: “nihato tvamasi antakā”ti vutte “jānāti ma”nti dummano palāyi.
tika-vin07t0:1838_1: Parivitakko udapādīti yasmā ehibhikkhubhāvāya upanissayarahitānampi pabbajitukāmatā uppajjissati,
tika-vin07t0:1838_3: tasmā tesampi pabbajjāvidhiṃ dassento evaṃ parivitakkesīti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:1838_4: Upanissayasampannā pana bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā ehibhikkhubhāveneva pabbajanti.
tika-vin07t0:1838_6: Sayaṃ pabbājetabboti ettha “kesamassuṃ ohāretvā”tiādivacanato kesacchedanakāsāyacchādanasaraṇadānāni pabbajjā nāma,
tika-vin07t0:1838_11: Bhikkhūnañhi anārocetvā ekasīmāya “etassa kese chindā”ti aññaṃ āṇāpetumpi na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin07t0:1838_12: Pabbājetvāti kesādicchedanameva sandhāya vuttaṃ “kāsāyāni acchādetvā”ti visuṃ vuttattā.
tika-vin07t0:1838_13: Pabbājetuṃ na labhatīti saraṇadānaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ,
tika-vin07t0:1838_14: anupasampannena bhikkhuāṇattiyā dinnampi saraṇaṃ na ruhati.
tika-vin07t0:1839_1: Nijjīvanissattabhāvanti “kesā nāma imasmiṃ sarīre pāṭiyekko koṭṭhāso acetano abyākato suñño nissatto thaddho pathavīdhātū”tiādinayaṃ saṅgaṇhāti,
tika-vin07t0:1840_1: paṭiggāhāpetabboti ettha “sabbadukkhanissaraṇatthāya imaṃ kāsāvaṃ gahetvā”ti vā “taṃ kāsāvaṃ datvā”ti vā vatvā “pabbājetha maṃ, bhante,
tika-vin07t0:1840_2: anukampaṃ upādāyā”ti evaṃ yācanapubbakaṃ cīvaraṃ paṭicchāpeti.
tika-vin07t0:1840_6: athāpīti ca atha vāti attho”ti vadanti.
tika-vin07t0:1840_7: “Adinnaṃ na vaṭṭatī”ti iminā pabbajjā na ruhatīti dasseti.
tika-vin07t0:1841_1: Dūre vandantopi hi pāde vandatīti vuccati.
tika-vin07t0:1841_2: Upajjhāyena vāti ettha yassa santike upajjhaṃ gaṇhāti,
tika-vin07t0:1841_4: Ābhisamācārikesu vinayanatthaṃ yaṃ ācariyaṃ katvā niyyātenti,
tika-vin07t0:1841_6: Sace pana upajjhāyo sayameva sabbaṃ sikkhāpeti,
tika-vin07t0:1841_9: yathā upasampadākāle sayameva kammavācaṃ vācento upajjhāyova kammavācācariyopi hoti.
tika-vin07t0:1842_0: Anunāsikantaṃ katvā dānakāle antarā vicchedo na kātabboti āha “ekasambandhānī”ti.
tika-vin07t0:1847_2: kiṃ amhākaṃ padhānenā”ti vāsanādosena vosānaṃ anāpajjitvā pantesu senāsanesu phalasamāpattiyāva vītināmanatthaṃ,
tika-vin07t0:1847_3: taṃ disvā aññesampi diṭṭhānugatisamāpajjanatthañca ovadatīti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:1850_1: Idaṃ nesaṃ pubbakammanti tesaṃ tiṃsajanānaṃ ekato abhisamayassa pubbakammaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:1853_1: Pāḷiyaṃ agarūti bhāriyaṃ na siyāti attho.
tika-vin07t0:1853_3: Patte pakkhipīti taṃ nāgaṃ nihatatejaṃ dhammadesanāya santappetvā saraṇasīlāni datvā sakalarattiṃ bhagavantaṃ
tika-vin07t0:1853_4: payirupāsitvā ṭhitaṃ jaṭilānaṃ dassanatthaṃ patte pakkhipi,
tika-vin07t0:1854_3: Sumanānaṃ buddhānaṃ manasā sadiso mano assāti sumanamanaso.
tika-vin07t0:1854_8: Ahaṃ te dhuvabhattena paṭimānanaṃ karissāmīti seso.
tika-vin07t0:1856_4: taṃ taṃ vā sattahitaṃ paṭicca haritabbaṃ pavattetabbanti paṭihāriyaṃ,
tika-vin07t0:1857_1: Paṃsukūlaṃ uppannaṃ hotīti puṇṇāya dāsiyā sarīraṃ parikkhipitvā chaḍḍitaṃ sāṇamayaṃ kimikulākulaṃ pariyesanavasena uppannaṃ hoti,
tika-vin07t0:1857_2: yaṃ bhagavā bhūmiṃ kampento pārupitvā pacchā mahākassapattherassa adāsi,
tika-vin07t0:1857_4: Kattha nu khotiādiparivitakko jaṭilānaṃ vividhapāṭihāriyadassanatthaṃ kato.
tika-vin07t0:1857_5: Pāṇinā khaṇanto viya iddhiyā mattikaṃ apanetvā dinnattā vuttaṃ “pāṇinā pokkharaṇiṃ khaṇitvā”ti.
tika-vin07t0:1858_0: 46. Phāliyantu, kassapa, kaṭṭhānīti uruvelakassapena nivedite evamavocāti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Evaṃ sesesupi.
tika-vin07t0:1859_1: Antaraṭṭhakāsu himapātasamayeti ettha māghamāsassa avasāne catasso,
tika-vin07t0:1859_2: phagguṇamāsassa ādimhi catassoti evaṃ ubhinnaṃ māsānaṃ antare aṭṭharattiyo antaraṭṭhakā nāma.
tika-vin07t0:1860_5: Idaṃ nu tvaṃ mahāsamaṇāti idha nu tvaṃ. Dha-
tika-vin07t0:1860_8: “Imasmiṃ padese tvaṃ nu kho ṭhitosī”ti pucchi.
tika-vin07t0:1861_2: Kesamissaṃ sabbaṃ parikkhāraṃ udake pavāhetvātipi yojetabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:1862_2: “Aḍḍhuḍḍhāni pāṭihāriyasahassānī”ti idaṃ nāgadamanādīni pannarasa pāṭihāriyāni vajjetvā vuttaṃ appakamadhikaṃ gaṇanūpagaṃ na hotīti.
tika-vin07t0:1863_1: Gayāyanti gayānāmikāya nadiyā adūrabhavattā gāmo itthiliṅgavasena gayā nāma jāto, tassaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:1864_1: sukhaṃ vā”tiādinā cakkhuviññāṇavīthicittesu somanassadomanassaupekkhāvedanāmukhena sesārūpakkhandhānampi ādittataṃ dasseti.
tika-vin07t0:1867_2: Upadhīsūti ettha dukkhasukhādīnaṃ adhiṭṭhānaṭṭhena cattāro upadhī kāmakhandhakilesaabhisaṅkhārūpadhīnaṃ vasena.
tika-vin07t0:1867_3: Tesu khandhūpadhi idhādhippetoti āha “khandhūpadhīsu malanti ñatvā”ti.
tika-vin07t0:1869_2: bhikkhu pañcaṅgavippahīno hoti chaḷaṅgasamannāgato ekārakkho caturāpasseno paṇunnapaccekasacco samavayasaṭṭhesano
tika-vin07t0:1870_2: Chaḷaṅgasamannāgatoti iṭṭhādīsu chasu ārammaṇesu somanassitādipaṭipakkhā chaḷaṅgupekkhā vuttā.
tika-vin07t0:1870_4: Saṅkhāyasevanā adhivāsanā parivajjanā vinodanāsaṅkhātāni cattāri apassenā nissayā etassāti caturāpasseno,
tika-vin07t0:1870_6: Paṇunnāni apanītāni diṭṭhigatikehi paccekaṃ gahitāni diṭṭhisaccāni yassa,
tika-vin07t0:1870_9: Kāmesanā bhavesanābrahmacariyesanāsaṅkhātā esanā sammadeva avayā anūnā saṭṭhā nisaṭṭhā anenāti samavayasaṭṭhesano.
tika-vin07t0:1870_15: Ete hi ariyā vasanti etthāti ariyavāsāti vuccanti.
tika-vin07t0:1870_16: Te pana vāsā vutthā vasitā sampāditā yena,
tika-vin07t0:1873_1: tesu sabbajeṭṭhānaṃ dasannaṃ chaddantānaṃ balāni bhagavato kāyassa dasabalāni nāma.
tika-vin07t0:1873_3: majjhimapurisānaṃ pana dasannaṃ koṭisahassānañca balaṃ hoti,
tika-vin07t0:1874_2: tathāgato ṭhānañca ṭhānato aṭṭhānañca aṭṭhānato yathābhūtaṃ pajānātī”tiādinā vuttāni ṭhānāṭhānañāṇabalaṃ,
tika-vin07t0:1874_13: Dasahi asekkhehi aṅgehīti arahattaphalasampayuttehi pāḷiyaṃ “asekkhā sammādiṭṭhi…pe…
tika-vin07t0:1874_16: asekkhā sammāvimuttī”ti evaṃ vuttehi dasahi asekkhadhammehi samannāgato.
tika-vin07t0:1874_17: Ettha ca dassanaṭṭhena vuttā sammādiṭṭhi eva jānanaṭṭhena sammāñāṇantipi vuttā,
tika-vin07t0:1874_18: vuttāvasesā pana phalacittasampayuttā sabbe phassādidhammā sammāvimuttīti vuttāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:1877_10: Upasaddo ca upagamanattho maggasaddenapi sambandhitabboti dasseti.
tika-vin07t0:1877_12: yasmā piṭṭhito piṭṭhito anubandhanaṃ nāma atthikehi upaññātaṃ upagatañāṇañceva hoti,
tika-vin07t0:1877_15: Upaññātaṃ nibbānanti upapattiyā anumānena ñātaṃ nibbānaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:1877_17: anumānena ñātaṃ paccakkhato dassanatthāya gavesantoti attho.
tika-vin07t0:1878_0: Nirodho ca nirodhūpāyo ca ekasesena nirodhoti vuttoti dassento “atha vā”tiādimāha.
tika-vin07t0:1879_0: Ito uttarīti ito mayā laddhasotāpattito uttari itaramaggattayaṃ yadipi natthi,
tika-vin07t0:1879_1: tathāpi eso eva mayā gavesito nibbānadhammoti attho.
tika-vin07t0:1880_2: Tesaṃ āyasmantānanti saparisānaṃ tesaṃ dvinnaṃ parisānaṃ tasmiṃyeva khaṇe bhagavato dhammaṃ sutvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇi,
tika-vin07t0:1880_3: aggasāvakā pana attano ñāṇakiccassa mahantatāya katipāhaccayena.
tika-vin07t0:1883_3: Uttiṭṭhapattanti ettha uttiṭṭhaṃ nāma piṇḍāya caraṇaṃ vuccati “uttiṭṭhe nappamajjeyyā”tiādīsu viya.
tika-vin07t0:1883_6: Tassa upanāme ko dosoti āha “tasmiṃ hī”tiādi.
tika-vin07t0:1883_7: Tasmāti yasmā manussā etasmiṃyeva ete bhuñjantīti uttiṭṭhapatte ucchiṭṭhasaññino,
tika-vin07t0:1883_13: yācanavacanena tassa anumatiṃ gahetunti vā attho.
tika-vin07t0:1884_5: paraṃ jeṭṭhaṃ katvā tassovāde vattanatāti attho.
tika-vin07t0:1884_14: Kāyenāti etadatthaviññāpakaṃ hatthamuddādiṃ dassento kāyena viññāpeti.
tika-vin07t0:1884_15: Sādhūti sampaṭicchanaṃ sandhāyāti upajjhāyena “sāhū”tiādīsu vuttesu saddhivihārikassa “sādhū”ti sampaṭicchanaṃ
tika-vin07t0:1885_4: Ito paṭṭhāyāti “na upajjhāyassa bhaṇamānassā”ti ettha na-
tika-vin07t0:1885_8: Sabbattha dukkaṭāpattīti āpadāummattakhittacittavedanaṭṭatādīhi vinā paṇṇattiṃ ajānitvāpi vadantassa gilānassapi dukkaṭameva.
tika-vin07t0:1885_9: Āpadāsu hi antarantarā kathā vattuṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin07t0:1885_13: Pāḷiyaṃ “heṭṭhāpīṭhaṃ vā parāmasitvā”ti idaṃ pubbe tattha ṭhapitapattādinā asaṅghaṭṭanatthāya vuttaṃ,
tika-vin07t0:1885_14: cakkhunā oloketvāpi aññesaṃ abhāvaṃ ñatvāpi ṭhapetuṃ vaṭṭati eva.
tika-vin07t0:1886_5: Jantāgharañhi nāma himapātabahulesu desesu tappaccayarogapīḷādinivāraṇatthaṃ sarīrasedāpanaṭṭhānaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:1886_6: Tattha kira andhakārapaṭicchannatāya bahūpi ekato pavisitvā cīvaraṃ nikkhipitvā aggitāpaparihārāya mattikāya
tika-vin07t0:1886_7: mukhaṃ limpitvā sarīraṃ yāvadatthaṃ sedetvā cuṇṇādīhi ubbaṭṭetvā nahāyanti.
tika-vin07t0:1887_0: Aññattha netabboti yattha viharato sāsane anabhirati uppannā,
tika-vin07t0:1887_2: Visabhāgapuggalānanti lajjino vā alajjino vā upajjhāyassa avaḍḍhikāme sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:1887_3: Sace pana upajjhāyo alajjī ovādampi na gaṇhāti,
tika-vin07t0:1887_5: tattha upajjhāyaṃ vihāya lajjīheva saddhiṃ āmisādiparibhogo kātabbo.
tika-vin07t0:1887_9: upacārasīmato bahi gantukāmena anāpucchā gantuṃ na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin07t0:1890_1: Saddhivihārikavattakathāyaṃ saṅgahetabbo anuggahetabbotiādīsu anādariyaṃ paṭicca dhammāmisehi asaṅgaṇhantānaṃ
tika-vin07t0:1893_1: Nasammāvattanādikathāyaṃ vattaṃ na pūreyyāti “vattakaraṇakālo”ti vatthuvijānanavasena ñatvā mānakosajjādivasena
tika-vin07t0:1893_2: vā upajjhāyādīsu anādarena vā “akātuṃ na vaṭṭatī”ti ajānanatāya vā na kareyya,
tika-vin07t0:1893_4: Asañcicca asatiyātiādīhi ca akarontassa pana anāpatti.
tika-vin07t0:1893_6: tasmā sekhiyesu vuttanayenevettha sabbopi vinicchayo veditabbo.
tika-vin07t0:1894_0: Sādiyanaṃ vā asādiyanaṃ vā na jānātīti “mayi sādiyante akarontānaṃ āpatti hoti,
tika-vin07t0:1894_1: paṭikkhipitvā asādiyante āpatti na hotī”ti evaṃ na jānātīti attho.
tika-vin07t0:1894_3: tesaṃ anāpattī”ti vacanato sace koci “tumhākaṃ saddhivihārike,
tika-vin07t0:1897_4: Katavedinoti attano kataṃ upakāraṃ paṭikiriyāya ñāpakā.
tika-vin07t0:1898_2: Pāḷiyaṃ piṇḍiyālopabhojananti jaṅghapiṇḍimaṃsabalena caritvā ālopālopavasena pariyiṭṭhabhojanaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:1901_5: Taṃyeva titthāyatananti diṭṭhisaṅkhātatitthameva āyatanaṃ dukkhuppattiṭṭhānanti titthāyatanaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:1901_6: Āyasmato nissāya vacchāmīti āyasmantaṃ nissāya vasissāmīti attho.
tika-vin07t0:1904_2: teneva lakkhaṇena nissayantevāsikassa āpatti na veditabbāti sambandhayojanā daṭṭhabbā.
tika-vin07t0:1904_3: Potthakesu pana “na teneva lakkhaṇenā”ti ettha na-
tika-vin07t0:1904_4: kāraṃ chaḍḍetvā “teneva lakkhaṇena nissayantevāsikassa āpatti veditabbā”ti likhanti,
tika-vin07t0:1904_6: Tathā hi teneva lakkhaṇena āpattibhāve gayhamāne nissayamuttakassāpi amuttakassāpi āpatti evāti vuttalakkhaṇena āpattiṃ āpajjeyya.
tika-vin07t0:1904_7: Tathā ca “nissayantevāsikena hi yāva ācariyaṃ nissāya vasati,
tika-vin07t0:1904_8: tāva sabbaṃ ācariyavattaṃ kātabba”nti iminā anantaravacanena virodho siyā.
tika-vin07t0:1906_2: kāraṃ ānetvā teneva saddhivihārikassa vutteneva lakkhaṇena nissayantevāsikassa āpatti na veditabbāti evamattho gahetabbo.
tika-vin07t0:1909_2: tassa santike nissayo gahetabbo”ti iminā lajjīsu eva nissayaggahaṇaṃ niyojeti alajjīsu paṭikkhittattā.
tika-vin07t0:1909_3: Ettha ca paribhogasaddena ekakammādiko saṃvāso gahito paccayaparibhogassa sambhoga-
tika-vin07t0:1909_5: etena ca sambhogasaṃvāsānaṃ alajjīhi saddhiṃ na kattabbataṃ dasseti.
tika-vin07t0:1909_16: Sabhāgataṃ olokemīti pana leso na kātabbo.
tika-vin07t0:1910_1: kenaci antarāyena cirāyatīti saññāya sati labbhateva parihāro.
tika-vin07t0:1911_0: Ekadivasampi parihāro natthīti gamane nirussāhaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:1911_1: Saussāhassa pana senāsanapaṭisāmanādivasena katipāhe gatepi na doso.
tika-vin07t0:1912_0: Tatreva vasitabbanti tatra sabhāgaṭṭhāne eva nissayaṃ gahetvā vasitabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:1912_2: vasituṃ vaṭṭatī”ti iminā upajjhāye saṅgaṇhanteyeva taṃsamodhāne nissayapaṭippassaddhi vuttā,
tika-vin07t0:1912_3: tasmiṃ pana kodhena vā gaṇanirapekkhatāya vā asaṅgaṇhante aññesu gahito nissayo na paṭippassambhatīti dasseti.
tika-vin07t0:1913_0: Ācariyamhā nissayapaṭippassaddhiyaṃ vutto “koci ācariyo”tiādiko nayo upajjhāyapakkamanādīsupi netvā tattha ca vutto idhāpi netvā yathārahaṃ yojetabbo.
tika-vin07t0:1914_0: Dve leḍḍupāte atikkamma aññasmiṃ vihāre vasantīti upacārasīmato bahi aññasmiṃ vihāre antevāsikānaṃ vasanaṭṭhānato dve leḍḍupāte atikkamma vasanti.
tika-vin07t0:1914_1: Tena bahiupacārepi antevāsikādīnaṃ vasanaṭṭhānato dvinnaṃ leḍḍupātānaṃ antare āsannapadese vasati,
tika-vin07t0:1914_3: Antoupacārasīmāyaṃ pana dve leḍḍupāte atikkamitvā vasato nissayo na paṭippassambhateva.
tika-vin07t0:1917_1: Upajjhācariyalakkhaṇakathāyaṃ na sāmaṇero upaṭṭhāpetabboti upajjhāyena hutvā na pabbājetabbo.
tika-vin07t0:1918_3: Pacchimāni tīṇīti na paṭibalo uppannaṃ kukkuccaṃ dhammato vinodetuṃ,
tika-vin07t0:1918_5: āpattiyā vuṭṭhānaṃ na jānātīti imāni tīṇi.
tika-vin07t0:1918_6: Kukkuccassa hi pāḷiaṭṭhakathānayasaṅkhātadhammato vinodetuṃ apaṭibalatā nāma abyattatā eva hotīti sāpi āpattiaṅgameva vuttā.
tika-vin07t0:1919_2: Taṃ ārabbha paññattā khandhakasikkhāpadasaṅkhātā sikkhā ābhisamācārikā.
tika-vin07t0:1919_3: Sikkhāpadampi hi taṃ tattha paṭipūraṇatthikehi uggahaṇādivasena sikkhitabbato “sikkhā”ti vuccati.
tika-vin07t0:1922_1: Titthiyaparivāsakathāyaṃ ājīvakassa vātiādīsu akiriyavādī ājīvako nāma,
tika-vin07t0:1922_2: kiriyavādino pana nigaṇṭhāpi aññepi naggatitthikā acelakapade saṅgahitā.
tika-vin07t0:1922_4: So ca teneva naggavesena bhikkhūnaṃ santikaṃ āgatassa,
tika-vin07t0:1922_5: na paṭicchādetvā āgatassāti dassetuṃ “sace sopī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:1923_2: Vesiyā gocaro bahulaṃ pavattiṭṭhānaṃ assāti vesiyāgocaro.
tika-vin07t0:1923_4: Yobbannātītāti anividdhā eva mahallikabhāvaṃ pattā thullakumārī evāti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:1926_6: vaṭṭatī”ti vuttattā appaṭicchannaṭṭhāne tādisampi na vaṭṭati,
tika-vin07t0:1926_7: paṭicchannaṭṭhānepi ca vaḍḍhanakapakkhe ṭhitopi na vaṭṭatīti siddhameva hoti.
tika-vin07t0:1926_8: Pākaṭaṭṭhānepi pana nakhapiṭṭhippamāṇato ūnataraṃ avaḍḍhanakaṃ vaṭṭatīti ye gaṇheyyuṃ,
tika-vin07t0:1926_9: tesaṃ taṃ gahaṇaṃ paṭisedhetuṃ “mukhe panā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:1927_1: Avaḍḍhanakapakkhe ṭhitopi na vaṭṭatīti ettha pi-
tika-vin07t0:1927_2: saddena kolaṭṭhimattato khuddakataropi gaṇḍo na vaṭṭatīti dasseti.
tika-vin07t0:1928_2: aññattha na kiñcipi vaṭṭatīti vuttanayaṃ dasseti.
tika-vin07t0:1928_4: Yakkhummāroti kadāci kadāci āgantvā bhūmiyaṃ pātetvā hatthamukhādikaṃ avayavaṃ bhūmiyaṃ ghaṃsanako yakkhova rogo.
tika-vin07t0:1931_1: Na dānāhaṃ devassa bhaṭoti āpucchatīti raññā eva dinnaṭṭhānantaraṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:1931_4: tena taṃ taṃ amaccādimpi āpucchituṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin07t0:1934_3: bhikkhūnaṃ pana sikkhāpadaṃ paññapento evamāhāti adhippāyo.
tika-vin07t0:1939_1: Palātopīti iṇasāmikānaṃ āgamanaṃ ñatvā bhayena palāto.
tika-vin07t0:1939_2: Gīvā hotīti iṇāyikabhāvaṃ ñatvā anādarena iṇamuttake bhikkhubhāve pavesitattā.
tika-vin07t0:1939_4: Dātabbamevāti iṇāyikena dhanaṃ sampaṭicchatu vā mā vā,
tika-vin07t0:1939_6: Aññehi ca bhikkhūhi “mā dhuraṃ nikkhipāhī”ti vatvā sahāyakehi bhavitabbanti dasseti.
tika-vin07t0:1942_1: “Dāsacārittaṃ āropetvā kīto”ti iminā dāsabhāvaparimocanatthāya kītakaṃ nivatteti.
tika-vin07t0:1942_3: Tattha tattha cārittavasenāti tasmiṃ tasmiṃ janapade dāsapaṇṇajjhāpanādinā adāsakaraṇaniyāmena.
tika-vin07t0:1943_1: na vaṭṭatīti tā bhujissitthiyo “mayampi vaṇṇadāsiyo homā”ti attano rakkhaṇatthāya sayameva rājūnaṃ dāsipaṇṇe attano nāmaṃ likhāpenti,
tika-vin07t0:1943_4: Tehi adinnā na pabbājetabbāti yattakā tesaṃ sāmino,
tika-vin07t0:1944_0: Bhujisse pana katvā pabbājetuṃ vaṭṭatīti yassa vihārassa te ārāmikā dinnā,
tika-vin07t0:1944_1: tasmiṃ vihāre saṅghaṃ ñāpetvā phātikammena dhanāni datvā bhujisse katvā pabbājetuṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin07t0:1944_2: Takkaṃ sīse āsittakasadisāva hontīti kesuci janapadesu adāse karontā takkaṃ sīse āsiñcanti,
tika-vin07t0:1944_5: Tathā dinnepi saṅghassa ārāmikadāso evāti “neva pabbājetabbo”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:1944_6: “Tāvakāliko nāmā”ti vuttattā kālaparicchedaṃ katvā vā pacchāpi gahetukāmatāya vā dinnaṃ sabbaṃ tāvakālikamevāti gahetabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:1944_7: Nissāmikadāso nāma yassa sāmikulaṃ aññātikaṃ maraṇena parikkhīṇaṃ,
tika-vin07t0:1944_9: so pana samānajātikehi vā nivāsagāmavāsīhi vā issarehi vā bhujisso katova pabbājetabbo.
tika-vin07t0:1944_11: Te hi katthaci dese rājadāsā honti,
tika-vin07t0:1944_14: Dāsampi pabbājetvā sāmike disvā paṭicchādanatthaṃ apanento padavārena adinnādānāpattiyā kāretabbo,
tika-vin07t0:1947_1: Bhaṇḍukammāpucchānādikathāyaṃ kammārabhaṇḍūti daharatāya amoḷibandho muṇḍikasīso kammāradārako eva vutto.
tika-vin07t0:1947_2: Tulādhāramuṇḍakoti ettha tulādhārāti tambasuvaṇṇādīnaṃ tulaṃ hatthena dhāretīti kammārā “tulādhārā”ti vuttā,
tika-vin07t0:1947_5: Ekāva sikhā pañca veṇiyo katvā bandhanena pañcasikhāti vuccati,
tika-vin07t0:1947_7: tassa sikhaṃ chindantā kañci bhikkhuṃ ajānāpetvāva pabbājesuṃ.
tika-vin07t0:1947_16: pabbājentassapi anāpattī”ti vuttattā sañcicca anāpucchā kese ohārentassa dukkaṭamevāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:1947_18: Ekasikhāmattadharoti ettha ekena kesena sikhā ekasikhāti vadanti,
tika-vin07t0:1947_20: Ekakesampi pana anāpucchā chindituṃ na vaṭṭatiyeva.
tika-vin07t0:1949_1: Nissayamuccanakassa vattesu pañcakachakkesu pana “ubhayāni kho panassa pātimokkhāni…pe…
tika-vin07t0:1949_2: anubyañjanaso”ti ettha sabbopi cāyaṃ pabhedo mātikāṭṭhakathāyaṃ ñātāyaṃ ñāto hoti.
tika-vin07t0:1949_4: anāpattiṃ jānātī”ti idañca attanā ñātaṭṭhānesu āpattādiṃ sandhāya vuttanti na gahetabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:1952_1: Pokkharavassanti pokkhare padumagacche viya atemitukāmānaṃ sarīrato pavaṭṭanakavassaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:1952_2: Tasmiṃ kira vassante temitukāmāva tementi, na itare.
tika-vin07t0:1952_3: “Bhikkhaṃ gaṇhathā”ti vatvā gato nāma natthīti attano santake rajje sabbampi sāpateyyaṃ sayameva paribhuñjissatīti
tika-vin07t0:1952_5: gantvā pana gehe sakalarattiṃ mahādānañceva buddhappamukhassa saṅghassa āsanapaññattiṭṭhānālaṅkārañca saṃvidahantova vītināmesi.
tika-vin07t0:1953_1: pattaṃ vā aggahesīti bhagavā attano pitu nivesanameva gamissatītisaññāya naggahesi.
tika-vin07t0:1953_4: Bhikkhāya cāro caraṇaṃ etassāti bhikkhācāro, khattiyo.
tika-vin07t0:1954_0: Uttiṭṭheti uttiṭṭhitvā paresaṃ gharadvāre uddissa ṭhatvā gahetabbapiṇḍe.
tika-vin07t0:1954_1: Nappamajjeyyāti nimantanādivasena labbhamānapaṇītabhojanaṃ paṭikkhipitvā piṇḍāya caraṇavasena tattha nappamajjeyya.
tika-vin07t0:1954_2: Dhammanti anesanaṃ pahāya sapadānaṃ caranto tameva bhikkhācariyadhammaṃ sucaritaṃ careyya.
tika-vin07t0:1954_3: Sukhaṃ setīti catūhi iriyāpathehi sukhaṃ viharatīti attho.
tika-vin07t0:1955_0: Dutiyagāthāyaṃ na naṃ duccaritanti vesiyādibhede agocare caraṇavasena taṃ yathāvuttaṃ dhammaṃ duccaritaṃ na ca care.
tika-vin07t0:1955_2: Imaṃ pana gāthaṃ sutvāti nivesane nisinnena bhagavatā ñātisamāgame attano piṇḍāya caraṇaṃ nissāya pavattāya gāthāya vuttaṃ imaṃ dutiyagāthaṃ sutvā.
tika-vin07t0:1956_0: Dhammapālajātakantiādīsu pana tato parakālesupi rañño pavatti parinibbānaṃ pāpetvā yathāpasaṅgavasena dassetuṃ vuttā.
tika-vin07t0:1956_2: Sirigabbhaṃ gantvāti ettha yadi hi bhagavā tadaheva gantvā na passeyya,
tika-vin07t0:1956_3: sā hadayena phalitena mareyyāti agamāsīti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:1957_1: Dhammapadaṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana “satthā kapilapuraṃ gantvā tatiyadivase nandaṃ pabbājesī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:1957_8: Janapadakalyāṇīti janapadamhi kalyāṇī parehi asādhāraṇehi pañcakalyāṇādīhi sahitattā sā evaṃ vuttā.
tika-vin07t0:1957_11: vācāya pana bhagavatā “pabbajissasi nandā”ti vutte gāravena paṭikkhipituṃ avisahanto “āmā”ti avoca.
tika-vin07t0:1958_2: Nivattetuṃ na visahīti “mā naṃ nivattayitthā”ti bhagavatā vuttattā nāsakkhi.
tika-vin07t0:1960_0: Sutadhanañca cāgo ca, paññā ve sattamaṃ dhana”nti. –
tika-vin07t0:1961_1: Adhimattaṃ rāhuleti rāhule pabbajite nandapabbajjāya uppannadukkhatopi adhikataraṃ dukkhaṃ ahosīti attho.
tika-vin07t0:1961_2: Ito pacchāti ito vuttasokuppattito aparadivasesu anāgāmīnaṃ ñātisinehapaṭighacittuppādābhāvā.
tika-vin07t0:1961_3: Pāḷiyaṃ puttapemantiādi raññā puttasinehassa tibbabhāvaṃ dassetuṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:1961_4: Puttasineho hi attanā sahajātapītivegasamuṭṭhitānaṃ rūpadhammānaṃ sakalasarīraṃ khobhetvā pavattanavasena “chaviṃ…pe…
tika-vin07t0:1964_4: Tassa atipātanaṃ pabandhavasena pavattituṃ adatvā satthādīhi atikkamma abhibhavitvā pātanaṃ pāṇātipāto.
tika-vin07t0:1964_6: So pana atthato pāṇe pāṇasaññino jīvitindriyupacchedakaupakkamasamuṭṭhāpikā vadhakacetanāva.
tika-vin07t0:1964_8: verahetutāya verasaṅkhātaṃ pāṇātipātādipāpadhammaṃ maṇati nīharatīti virati “veramaṇī”ti vuccati,
tika-vin07t0:1964_9: viramati etāyāti vā “viramaṇī”ti vattabbe niruttinayena “veramaṇī”ti samādānavirati vuttā.
tika-vin07t0:1965_5: tassa vādo abhūtataṃ ñatvāva bhūtato viññāpanacetanā musāvādo.
tika-vin07t0:1966_0: Aruṇuggamanato paṭṭhāya yāva majjhanhikā ayaṃ ariyānaṃ bhojanassa kālo nāma,
tika-vin07t0:1966_2: Bhuñjitabbaṭṭhena bhojananti idha sabbaṃ yāvakālikaṃ vuccati,
tika-vin07t0:1966_5: vikāle vā yāvakālikassa bhojanaṃ ajjhoharaṇaṃ vikālabhojanantipi attho gahetabbo,
tika-vin07t0:1967_0: Sāsanassa ananulomattā visūkaṃ paṭāṇībhūtaṃ dassanaṃ visūkadassanaṃ,
tika-vin07t0:1967_2: Dassananti cettha pañcannampi viññāṇānaṃ yathāsakaṃ visayassa ālocanasabhāvatāya dassana-
tika-vin07t0:1967_5: saddehi cettha attano naccanagāyanādīnipi saṅgahitānīti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:1968_0: Mālāti baddhamabaddhaṃ vā antamaso suttādimayampi alaṅkāratthāya piḷandhiyamānaṃ “mālā”tveva vuccati.
tika-vin07t0:1968_1: Gandhanti vāsacuṇṇādivilepanato aññaṃ yaṃ kiñci gandhajātaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:1970_1: Pāḷiyaṃ sabbaṃ saṅghārāmaṃ āvaraṇaṃ karontīti sabbasaṅghārāme pavesanivāraṇaṃ karonti.
tika-vin07t0:1970_2: Saṅghārāmo āvaraṇaṃ kātabboti saṅghārāmo āvaraṇo kātabbo,
tika-vin07t0:1970_6: “Yattha vā vasatī”ti iminā sāmaṇerassa vassaggena laddhaṃ vā sakasantakameva vā nibaddhavasanakasenāsanaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:1970_7: Yattha vā paṭikkamatīti ācariyupajjhāyānaṃ vasanaṭṭhānaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:1973_3: tathā tesaṃ niggahaṃ akarontesu aññehi āvaraṇādiniggahakammaṃ kātabbameva.
tika-vin07t0:1973_4: Saṅgaṇhantīti “paraparisato bhinditvā gaṇhissāmī”ti dānādicatūhi saṅgahavatthūhi upalāḷanavasena saṅgaṇhanti.
tika-vin07t0:1973_7: Bhinditvā gaṇhituṃ na vaṭṭatīti bhinditumpi na vaṭṭati,
tika-vin07t0:1973_9: Ādīnavaṃ pana vattuṃ vaṭṭatīti sāsanagāravena vā parānuddayatāya vā vattuṃ vaṭṭati,
tika-vin07t0:1974_1: Upasampannānampi pārājikasamāpattiyā saraṇagamanādisāmaṇerabhāvassāpi vinassanato senāsanaggāho ca paṭippassambhati,
tika-vin07t0:1974_3: Purimikāya puna saraṇāni gahitānīti saraṇaggahaṇena saha tadahevassa vassūpagamanampi dasseti.
tika-vin07t0:1974_6: pacchāpi vā vassāvāsikañca cīvaramāsesu saṅghe uppannaṃ kālacīvarañca purimikāya upagantvā avipannasīlo sāmaṇero labhati eva.
tika-vin07t0:1974_7: Sace pacchimikāya gahitānīti pacchimikāya vassūpagamanañca chinnavassatañca dasseti.
tika-vin07t0:1974_8: Tassa hi kālacīvare bhāgo na pāpuṇāti.
tika-vin07t0:1975_0: Vassāvāsikalābho pana yadi senāsanasāmikā dāyakā senāsanaguttatthāya pacchimikāya upagantvā vattaṃ katvā
tika-vin07t0:1975_1: attano senāsane vasantassapi vassāvāsikaṃ dātabbanti vadanti,
tika-vin07t0:1975_3: Yaṃ pana sāratthadīpaniyaṃ “pacchimikāya vassāvāsikaṃ lacchatīti pacchimikāya puna vassaṃ upagatattā lacchatī”ti vuttaṃ,
tika-vin07t0:1975_4: tampi vassāvāsike dāyakānaṃ imaṃ adhippāyaṃ nissāya vuttañce, sundaraṃ.
tika-vin07t0:1976_2: akusalaṃ pana surāpānaveramaṇisīlabhedo ca hoti mālādidhāraṇādīsu viyāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:1976_4: Tānipi hi sañcicca vītikkamantassa taṃ taṃ bhijjati eva,
tika-vin07t0:1976_5: itarītaresaṃ pana abhijjamānena nāsanaṅgāni na honti.
tika-vin07t0:1977_1: accagamā”tiādinā saṅghamajjhe desāpetvā saraṇasīlaṃ dātabbanti adhippāyo pārājikattā tesaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:1977_3: Ayameva hi nāsanā idha adhippetāti liṅganāsanākāraṇehi pāṇātipātādīhi avaṇṇabhāsanādīnaṃ saha patitattā vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:1978_3: ko imesaṃ bhedoti codanaṃ manasi nidhāyāha “sassatucchedānañhi aññataradiṭṭhiko”ti.
tika-vin07t0:1978_5: yo hi “attā issaro vā nicco dhuvo”tiādinā vā “attā ucchijjissati vinassissatī”tiādinā vā titthiyaparikappitaṃ
tika-vin07t0:1978_6: yaṃ kiñci sassatucchedadiṭṭhiṃ daḷhaṃ gahetvā voharati,
tika-vin07t0:1978_9: Yo pana īdisaṃ diṭṭhiṃ aggahetvā sāsanikova hutvā kevalaṃ buddhavacanādhippāyaṃ viparītato gahetvā bhikkhūhi
tika-vin07t0:1978_11: tassa sā diṭṭhi pārājikaṃ na hoti,
tika-vin07t0:1981_2: te ca kilesapariyuṭṭhānassa balavatāya napuṃsakapaṇḍakasadisattā “paṇḍakā”ti vuttā.
tika-vin07t0:1981_3: Tesu āsittausūyapaṇḍakānaṃ dvinnaṃ kilesapariyuṭṭhānaṃ yonisomanasikārādīhi vītikkamato nivāretumpi sakkā,
tika-vin07t0:1981_5: Pakkhapaṇḍakassa pana kāḷapakkhesu ummādo viya kilesapariḷāho avattharanto āgacchati,
tika-vin07t0:1981_7: Tasmā so tasmiṃ pakkhe na pabbājetabboti vutto.
tika-vin07t0:1981_9: Tattha āsittassāti mukhe āsittassa attanopi asucimuccanena pariḷāho vūpasammati.
tika-vin07t0:1981_10: Usūyāya uppannāyāti usūyāya vasena attano sevetukāmatārāge uppanne asucimuttiyā pariḷāho vūpasammati.
tika-vin07t0:1982_0: “Bījāni apanītānī”ti vuttattā bījesu ṭhitesu nimittamatte apanīte paṇḍako na hoti.
tika-vin07t0:1982_3: bījesu pana apanītesu aṅgajātampi rāgena kammaniyaṃ na hoti,
tika-vin07t0:1982_8: Yadi evaṃ kasmā bījuddharaṇe pārājikaṃ na paññattanti?
tika-vin07t0:1982_13: Keci pana “yasmā bījuddharaṇakkhaṇe paṇḍako na hoti,
tika-vin07t0:1982_14: tasmā tasmiṃ khaṇe pārājikaṃ na paññattaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:1982_15: Yasmā pana so uddhaṭabījo bhikkhu aparena samayena vuttanayena paṇḍakattaṃ āpajjati,
tika-vin07t0:1982_19: tasmā esa paṇḍakattupagamanakālato paṭṭhāya jātiyā napuṃsakapaṇḍakena saddhiṃ yojetvā ‘upasampanno nāsetabbo’ti abhabboti vutto,
tika-vin07t0:1982_22: bhāvakkhayena panassa ahetukasadisatāya maggopi na uppajjatī”ti vadanti.
tika-vin07t0:1982_23: Apare pana “pabbajjato pubbe upakkamena paṇḍakabhāvamāpannaṃ sandhāya ‘upasampanno nāsetabbo’ti vuttaṃ,
tika-vin07t0:1982_24: upasampannassa pana pacchā upakkamena upasampadāpi na vigacchatī”ti,
tika-vin07t0:1982_26: Yadaggena hi pabbajjato pubbe upakkamena abhabbo hoti,
tika-vin07t0:1983_1: Pabbajjā na vāritāti ettha pabbajjāgahaṇeneva upasampadāpi gahitā.
tika-vin07t0:1983_3: Tasmiṃyevassa pakkhe pabbajjā vāritāti ettha pana apaṇḍakapakkhepi pabbajjāmattameva labhati,
tika-vin07t0:1983_5: paṇḍakapakkhe pana āgate liṅganāsanāya nāsetabboti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:1986_3: taṃ vā jānanti kolaññāti ñātakānaṃ nāmaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:1986_4: Theyyāya liṅgaggahaṇamattampi idha saṃvāso evāti āha “tayo theyyasaṃvāsakā”ti.
tika-vin07t0:1987_0: Yathāvuḍḍhaṃ vandananti attanā musāvādena dassitavassakkamena bhikkhūnaṃ vandanaṃ sādiyati,
tika-vin07t0:1987_2: daharabhikkhu ca vuḍḍhānaṃ vandanaṃ sādiyantopi theyyasaṃvāsako na hoti.
tika-vin07t0:1988_1: sayameva pana pabbajitvā sāmaṇeravassāni gaṇentopi ubhayatthenako eva.
tika-vin07t0:1988_6: upasampannesu eva paññattāpattiṃ paṭicca ādikammikā vuttā,
tika-vin07t0:1989_3: Yāva so suddhamānasoti “iminā liṅgena bhikkhū vañcetvā tehi saṃvasissāmī”ti asuddhacittābhāvena suddhacitto.
tika-vin07t0:1989_4: Tena hi asuddhacittena liṅge gahitamatte pacchā bhikkhūhi saha saṃvasatu vā mā vā,
tika-vin07t0:1989_7: Tasmā ubhayatthenakopi liṅgatthenake eva pavisatīti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:1989_8: Yo pana rājādibhayena suddhacittova liṅgaṃ gahetvā vicaranto pacchā “bhikkhuvassāni gaṇetvā jīvissāmī”ti asuddhacittaṃ uppādeti,
tika-vin07t0:1989_9: so cittuppādamattena theyyasaṃvāsakopi na hoti suddhacittena gahitaliṅgattā.
tika-vin07t0:1989_10: Sace pana so bhikkhūnaṃ santikaṃ gantvā sāmaṇeravassagaṇanādiṃ karoti,
tika-vin07t0:1989_13: Yaṃ pana parato saha dhuranikkhepena “ayampi theyyasaṃvāsako,
tika-vin07t0:1989_15: taṃ bhikkhūhi saṅgamma saṃvāsādhivāsanavasena dhuranikkhepaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:1989_17: Tassa tāva theyyasaṃvāsako nāma na vuccatīti sambandho daṭṭhabbo.
tika-vin07t0:1989_18: Ettha ca corādibhayaṃ vināpi kīḷādhippāyena liṅgaṃ gahetvā bhikkhūnaṃ santike pabbajitālayaṃ dassetvā
tika-vin07t0:1989_19: vandanādiṃ asādiyantopi “sobhati nu kho me pabbajitaliṅga”ntiādinā suddhacittena gaṇhantopi theyyasaṃvāsako
tika-vin07t0:1990_1: idañca bhikkhūnaññeva niyamitabhattagahaṇe saṃvāsopi sambhaveyyāti sabbasādhāraṇabhattaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:1990_2: Saṃvāsaṃ pana asādiyitvā abhikkhukavihārādīsu vihārabhattādīni bhuñjantopi theyyasaṃvāsako na hoti eva.
tika-vin07t0:1991_1: so theyyasaṃvāsako nāma hotī”ti idaṃ nidassanamattaṃ,
tika-vin07t0:1991_2: “theyyasaṃvāsako”ti pana nāmaṃ ajānantopi “evaṃ kātuṃ na vaṭṭatī”ti vā “evaṃ karonto samaṇo nāma na hotī”ti vā “yadi ārocessāmi,
tika-vin07t0:1991_3: chaḍḍessanti ma”nti vā “yena kenaci pabbajjā me na ruhatī”ti jānāti,
tika-vin07t0:1991_5: Yo pana paṭhamaṃ “pabbajjā evaṃ me gahitā”tisaññī kevalaṃ antarā attano setavatthanivāsanādivippakāraṃ pakāsetuṃ lajjanto na katheti,
tika-vin07t0:1991_7: Anupasampannakāleyevāti ettha avadhāraṇena upasampannakāle theyyasaṃvāsakalakkhaṇaṃ ñatvā vañcanāyapi nāroceti,
tika-vin07t0:1991_9: So parisuddhacittena gahitaliṅgattā liṅgatthenako na hoti,
tika-vin07t0:1991_10: laddhūpasampadattā tadanuguṇasseva saṃvāsassa sāditattā saṃvāsatthenakopi na hoti.
tika-vin07t0:1991_12: saṃvāsārahassa liṅgassa gahitattā saṃvāsasādiyanamattena saṃvāsatthenako hoti.
tika-vin07t0:1992_1: Theyyasaṃvāsako na hotīti bhikkhūhi dinnaliṅgassa apariccattattā liṅgatthenako na hoti,
tika-vin07t0:1992_3: Yaṃ pana mātikāṭṭhakathāyaṃ “liṅgānurūpassa saṃvāsassa sāditattā na saṃvāsatthenako”ti kāraṇaṃ vuttaṃ,
tika-vin07t0:1992_5: Itarathā sāmaṇerassapi bhikkhuvassagaṇanādīsu liṅgānurūpasaṃvāso eva sāditoti saṃvāsatthenakatā na siyā
tika-vin07t0:1992_8: evaṃ sāmaṇeropi pārājikaṃ samāpanno sāmaṇerapaṭiññāya apariccattattā saṃvāsatthenako na hotīti veditabbo.
tika-vin07t0:1992_9: Sobhatīti sampaṭicchitvāti kāsāvadhāraṇe dhuraṃ nikkhipitvā gihibhāvaṃ sampaṭicchitvā.
tika-vin07t0:1993_0: Yo koci vuḍḍhapabbajitoti sāmaṇeraṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:1993_2: etena vihāre bhikkhūhi saddhiṃ vassagaṇanādīnaṃ akaraṇaṃ dasseti.
tika-vin07t0:1996_0: Titthiyapakkantakādikathāsu tesaṃ liṅge ādinnamatteti vīmaṃsādiadhippāyaṃ vinā “titthiyo bhavissāmī”ti sanniṭṭhānavasena liṅge kāyena dhāritamatte.
tika-vin07t0:1996_1: Sayamevāti titthiyānaṃ santikaṃ agantvā sayameva saṅghārāmepi kusacīrādīni nivāseti.
tika-vin07t0:1996_3: gacchatīti ājīvakānaṃ santike tesaṃ pabbajanavidhinā “ājīvako bhavissāmī”ti gacchati.
tika-vin07t0:1996_4: Tassa hi titthiyabhāvūpagamanaṃ pati sanniṭṭhāne vijjamānepi “gantvā bhavissāmī”ti parikappitattā padavāre dukkaṭameva vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:1996_5: Dukkaṭanti pāḷiyā avuttepi methunādīsu vuttapubbapayogadukkaṭānulomato vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:1996_6: Etena ca sanniṭṭhānavasena liṅge sampaṭicchite pārājikaṃ,
tika-vin07t0:1996_8: thullaccayakkhaṇe nivattantopi āpattiṃ desāpetvā muccati evāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:1996_10: evaṃ saṅghabhedepi lohituppādepi bhikkhūnaṃ pubbapayogādīsu dukkaṭathullaccayapārājikāhi muccanasīmā ca veditabbā.
tika-vin07t0:1996_13: aññe ca pārājikakaṇḍe visuṃ sikkhāpadena pārājikādiṃ adassetvā idha abhabbesu eva vuttāti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:1997_0: Taṃ laddhinti titthiyavese seṭṭhabhāvaggahaṇameva sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:1997_1: Tesañhi titthiyānaṃ sassatādiggāhaṃ gaṇhantopi liṅge asampaṭicchite titthiyapakkantako na hoti,
tika-vin07t0:1997_2: taṃ laddhiṃ aggahetvāpi “etesaṃ vatacariyā sundarā”ti liṅgaṃ sampaṭicchanto titthiyapakkantako hoti eva.
tika-vin07t0:1997_3: Laddhiyā abhāvenāti bhikkhubhāve sālayatāya titthiyabhāvūpagamanaladdhiyā abhāvena,
tika-vin07t0:1997_4: etena ca āpadāsu kusacīrādiṃ pārupantassāpi naggassa viya anāpattiṃ dasseti.
tika-vin07t0:1998_0: Upasampannabhikkhunā kathitoti ettha saṅghabhedakopi upasampannabhikkhunāva kathito,
tika-vin07t0:2001_2: Vissarabhayenāti nāgassa sarīraṃ disvā bhikkhuno viravanabhayena.
tika-vin07t0:2001_3: Kapimiddhādīsu nāgasarīraṃ nuppajjatīti taduppattisīmaṃ dassento āha “vissaṭṭho”tiādi.
tika-vin07t0:2004_2: Tiracchānādiamanussajātito manussajātikānaññeva puttesu mettādayopi tikkhavisadā honti lokuttaraguṇā viyāti āha “manussitthibhūtā janikā mātā”ti.
tika-vin07t0:2004_5: Ānantariyenāti ettha cutianantaraṃ niraye paṭisandhiphalaṃ anantaraṃ nāma,
tika-vin07t0:2004_6: tasmiṃ anantare janakattena niyuttaṃ ānantariyaṃ, tena.
tika-vin07t0:2004_8: kulitthiyā aticāriniyā puttopi attano pitaraṃ ajānitvā ghātento pitughātakova hoti.
tika-vin07t0:2005_0: 114. Avasesanti anāgāmiādikaṃ. Yaṃ panettha vattabbaṃ, taṃ manussaviggahapārājike vuttameva.
tika-vin07t0:2006_1: Ayaṃ saṅghabhedakoti pakatattaṃ bhikkhuṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:2006_2: Pubbe eva pārājikaṃ samāpanno vā vatthādidosena vipannopasampado vā saṅghaṃ bhindantopi anantariyaṃ na phusati,
tika-vin07t0:2007_1: Lohitaṃ uppādetīti tathāgatassa verīhi abhejjakāyatāya kenaci balakkārena cammādichedaṃ katvā bahi lohitaṃ paggharāpetuṃ na sakkā,
tika-vin07t0:2007_2: āvudhādipahārena pana lohitaṃ ṭhānato calitvā kuppamānaṃ ekattha sañcitaṃ hoti,
tika-vin07t0:2007_3: ettakena pana pahāradāyako lohituppādako nāma hoti devadatto viya.
tika-vin07t0:2007_4: Cetiyaṃ pana bodhiṃ vā paṭimādiṃ vā bhindato ānantariyaṃ na hoti,
tika-vin07t0:2007_6: Bodhirukkhassa pana ojoharaṇasākhā ceva sadhātukaṃ cetiyaṃ bādhayamānā ca chinditabbā,
tika-vin07t0:2010_3: Ekassa hi bhāvadvayaṃ saha nuppajjati yamake paṭikkhittattā.
tika-vin07t0:2010_4: Dutiyabyañjanaṃ pana kammasahāyena akusalacitteneva bhāvavirahitaṃ uppajjati.
tika-vin07t0:2010_6: na bhāvo tassa kenaci paccayena paccayattassa paṭṭhāne avuttattā.
tika-vin07t0:2010_7: Kevalaṃ bhāvasahitānaṃyeva byañjanaliṅgānaṃ pavattidassanatthaṃ aṭṭhakathāsu “itthindriyaṃ paṭicca itthiliṅgādīnī”tiādinā
tika-vin07t0:2010_9: idha pana akusalabalena indriyaṃ vināpi byañjanaṃ uppajjatīti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:2010_10: Ubhinnampi cesaṃ ubhatobyañjanakānaṃ yadā itthiyā rāgo uppajjati,
tika-vin07t0:2010_16: Tattha vicāraṇakkamoti paṭisandhikkhaṇe eva itthipurisaliṅgānampi pātubhāvappakāsake kurundivacane ayuttatāpakāsanatthaṃ atthavicāraṇakkamo.
tika-vin07t0:2010_17: Aṭṭhasāliniyañhi “itthiliṅgādīni pana itthindriyaṃ paṭicca pavatte samuṭṭhitānī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:2013_3: anupajjhāyako upasampādetabbo”ti idheva paññāpiyamānasikkhāpadaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:2013_4: “Kammaṃ pana na kuppatī”ti idaṃ upajjhāyābhāvepi “itthannāmassa upasampadāpekkho,
tika-vin07t0:2013_5: itthannāmena upajjhāyenā”ti matassa vā vibbhamantassa vā purāṇaupajjhāyassa,
tika-vin07t0:2013_6: aññassa vā yassa kassaci avijjamānassāpi nāmena sabbattha upajjhāyakittanassa katattā vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:2013_10: Aṭṭhakathāyampissa “upajjhāyaṃ akittetvā”ti avatvā “upajjhāyaṃ agāhāpetvā sabbena sabbaṃ upajjhāyavirahitaṃ”icceva atthoti vutto.
tika-vin07t0:2013_11: Pāḷiyaṃ saṅghena upajjhāyenāti “ayaṃ itthannāmo saṅghassa upasampadāpekkho,
tika-vin07t0:2013_12: itthannāmo saṅghaṃ upasampadaṃ yācati saṅghena upajjhāyenā”ti evaṃ kammavācāya saṅghameva upajjhāyaṃ kittetvāti attho.
tika-vin07t0:2013_13: Evaṃ gaṇena upajjhāyenāti etthāpi “ayaṃ itthannāmo gaṇassa upasampadāpekkho”tiādinā yojanā veditabbā,
tika-vin07t0:2013_14: evaṃ vuttepi kammaṃ na kuppati eva dukkaṭasseva vuttattā.
tika-vin07t0:2013_17: Tattha paṇḍakādīhi upajjhāyehi kariyamānesu kammesu paṇḍakādike vināva yadi pañcavaggādigaṇo pūrati,
tika-vin07t0:2016_1: Apattacīvaravatthūsupi pattacīvarānaṃ abhāvepi “paripuṇṇassa pattacīvara”nti kammavācāya sāvitattā kammakopaṃ avatvā dukkaṭameva vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:2016_2: Itarathā sāvanāya hāpanato kammakopo eva siyā.
tika-vin07t0:2016_3: Keci pana “paṭhamaṃ anuññātakammavācāya upasampannā viya idānipi ‘paripuṇṇassa pattacīvara’nti avatvā
tika-vin07t0:2016_6: Anuññātakālato paṭṭhāya hi aparāmasanaṃ sāvanāya hāpanavipatti eva hoti “itthannāmo saṅghaṃ upasampadaṃ yācatī”ti padassa hāpane viya.
tika-vin07t0:2016_8: upasampadaṃ yācāmī”tiādivākyena ayācetvā tampi upasampādento “ayaṃ itthannāmo saṅghaṃ upasampadaṃ yācatī”ti vatvāva yadi kammavācaṃ karoti,
tika-vin07t0:2016_11: Sabbapacchā hi anuññātakammavācato kiñcipi parihāpetuṃ na vaṭṭati,
tika-vin07t0:2016_13: Aññe vā bhikkhū dātukāmā hontīti sambandho.
tika-vin07t0:2017_1: Sāmaṇerabhāgasamakoti ettha kiñcāpi sāmaṇerānampi āmisabhāgassa samakameva diyyamānattā visuṃ sāmaṇerabhāgo nāma natthi,
tika-vin07t0:2017_2: pattacīvaraparikammamattapaṭibaddhapabbajjatāya pana sāmaṇerasadisā ete paṇḍupalāsāti dassanatthaṃ evaṃ vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:2017_10: Bhesajjantiādinā pana gihīnaṃ bhesajjakaraṇādidoso ettha na hotīti dasseti.
tika-vin07t0:2020_1: Hatthacchinnādivatthūsu kaṇṇamūleti sakalassa kaṇṇassa chedaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:2020_3: Yassa pana kaṇṇāviddheti heṭṭhā kuṇḍalādiṭhapanacchiddaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:2020_7: Sakkā hoti sandhetunti avirūpasaṇṭhānaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ,
tika-vin07t0:2021_0: Khujjasarīroti vaṅkasarīro. Brahmuno viya ujukaṃ gattaṃ sarīraṃ yassa, so brahmujjugatto, bhagavā.
tika-vin07t0:2022_0: Parivaṭumoti samantato vaṭṭakāyo, etena evarūpā eva vāmanakā na vaṭṭantīti dasseti.
tika-vin07t0:2023_0: Kūṭakūṭasīsoti anekesu ṭhānesu piṇḍikamaṃsataṃ dassetuṃ āmeḍitaṃ kataṃ.
tika-vin07t0:2023_3: Anupubbatanukena sīsenāti cetiyathūpikā viya kamena kisena sīsena,
tika-vin07t0:2023_4: thūlaveḷupabbaṃ viya ādito paṭṭhāya yāvapariyosānaṃ samathūlena uccena sīsena samannāgato nāḷisīso nāma.
tika-vin07t0:2025_5: Oṭṭhacchinnakoti ubhosu oṭṭhesu yattha katthaci jātiyā vā pacchā vā satthādinā apanītamaṃsena oṭṭhena samannāgato.
tika-vin07t0:2026_4: Ettha ca vinicchayo kuṭṭhādīsu vutto evāti āha “vinicchayo”tiādi.
tika-vin07t0:2027_10: etena aggapādo ca paṇhi ca sadisoti dasseti.
tika-vin07t0:2028_2: Piṭṭhipādaggena caṅkamantoti “pādassa bāhirantenāti ca abbhantarantenā”ti ca idaṃ pādatalassa ubhohi pariyantehi caṅkamanaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:2029_2: Yo ca karaṇasampannopi ekamevakkharaṃ hikkārabahuso vadati,
tika-vin07t0:2029_4: Yo vā pana hikkaṃ niggahetvāpi anāmeḍitakkharameva siliṭṭhavacanaṃ vattuṃ samattho,
tika-vin07t0:2030_0: Āpattito na muccatīti ñatvā karontova na muccati.
tika-vin07t0:2033_1: Nissayapaṭisaṃyuttavatthūsu bhikkhūhi samāno bhāgo diṭṭhisīlādiguṇakoṭṭhāso assāti bhikkhusabhāgo,
tika-vin07t0:2036_2: so karaṇīyo yassāti visesanassa paranipāto daṭṭhabbo.
tika-vin07t0:2036_4: anāpattīti gamanasaussāhatāya tathā vasantopi addhiko eva,
tika-vin07t0:2036_6: Etena ca parissamādiabhāve senāsanādisampadaṃ paṭicca vasato āpattīti dasseti.
tika-vin07t0:2036_7: Tañca agamanapaccayā divase divase āpajjatīti vadanti.
tika-vin07t0:2036_13: anāpattī”ti vuttattā evarūpaṃ avidheyyataṃ vinā nissayadāyakarahitaṭṭhāne vassaṃ upagantuṃ na vaṭṭatīti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:2037_2: tattha gantabbanti ettha pana sacepi “asuko thero ettha āgamissati āgamissatī”ti āgamentasseva vassūpanāyikadivaso hoti. Hotu,
tika-vin07t0:2037_3: vasitaṭṭhāne vassaṃ anupagamma yattha nissayo labbhati,
tika-vin07t0:2038_1: Gottenapīti “āyasmato pippalissa upasampadāpekkho”ti evaṃ nāmaṃ avatvā gottanāmenapīti attho,
tika-vin07t0:2038_2: tena “konāmo te upajjhāyo”ti puṭṭhena gottanāmena “āyasmā kassapo”ti vattabbanti siddhaṃ hoti.
tika-vin07t0:2038_3: Tasmā aññampi kiñci tassa nāmaṃ pasiddhaṃ,
tika-vin07t0:2038_4: tasmiṃ vā khaṇe sukhaggahaṇatthaṃ nāmaṃ paññāpitaṃ,
tika-vin07t0:2038_9: Tasmimpi khaṇe “ayaṃ tisso”ti vā “nāgo”ti vā nāmaṃ karontehi anusāsakasammutito paṭhamameva kātabbaṃ,
tika-vin07t0:2038_13: upajjhāyo me bhante tisso nāmā”tiādinā viññāpentena ubhinnampi citte “mamedaṃ nāma”nti yathā saññā uppajjati,
tika-vin07t0:2038_15: Sace pana tasmiṃ khaṇe pakatināmena vatvā pacchā tissa-
tika-vin07t0:2039_0: Tattha ca kiñcāpi upajjhāyasseva nāmaṃ aggahetvā yena kenaci nāmena “tissassa upasampadāpekkho”tiādināpi
tika-vin07t0:2039_1: puggale parāmaṭṭhe kammaṃ sukatameva hoti anupajjhāyakādīnaṃ upasampadākammaṃ viya upajjhāyassa abhāvepi
tika-vin07t0:2039_2: abhabbattepi kammavācāya puggale parāmaṭṭhe kammassa sijjhanato.
tika-vin07t0:2039_3: Upasampadāpekkhassa pana yathāsakaṃ nāmaṃ vinā aññena nāmena anussāvite kammaṃ kuppati,
tika-vin07t0:2039_5: Tattha ṭhito añño anupasampanno viya gahitanāmassa vatthupuggalassa tattha abhāvā,
tika-vin07t0:2039_7: Tasmā upasampadāpekkhassa pakatināmaṃ parivattetvā anupubbena nāgādināmena anussāvetukāmena paṭikacceva
tika-vin07t0:2039_8: “tvaṃ nāgo”tiādinā viññāpetvā anusāsanaantarāyikadhammapucchanakkhaṇesupi tassa ca saṅghassa ca yathā
tika-vin07t0:2040_0: Yaṃ pana upasampadāpekkhaupajjhāyānaṃ ekattha gahitaṃ nāmaṃ,
tika-vin07t0:2040_3: Gahitato hi aññasmiṃ gahite byañjanaṃ bhinnaṃ nāma hoti,
tika-vin07t0:2040_5: hi byañjanato ca abhinnā eva ñatti,
tika-vin07t0:2041_0: Pāḷiyaṃ pana kiñcāpi “itthannāmassa āyasmato”ti pacchato “āyasmato”ti padaṃ vuttaṃ,
tika-vin07t0:2041_1: tathāpi “āyasmā sāriputto atthakusalo”tiādinā nāmassa purato āyasmanta-
tika-vin07t0:2041_3: Tañca ekattha yojetvā aññattha ayojitepi ekattha purato yojetvā aññattha pacchato yojanepi sāvanāya hāpanaṃ nāma na hoti nāmassa ahāpitattā.
tika-vin07t0:2041_4: Teneva pāḷiyampi “itthannāmassa āyasmato”ti ekattha yojetvā “itthannāmena upajjhāyenā”tiādīsu “āyasmato”ti na yojitanti vadanti.
tika-vin07t0:2041_6: tathāpi sabbaṭṭhānepi ekeneva pakārena yojetvā eva vā ayojetvā vā anussāvanaṃ pasatthataranti gahetabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:2044_1: Ekato saheva ekasmiṃ khaṇe anussāvanaṃ etesanti ekānussāvanā,
tika-vin07t0:2044_6: Ekena vāti dvinnampi ekasmiṃ khaṇe ekāya eva kammavācāya anussāvane ekenācariyenāti attho.
tika-vin07t0:2044_7: “Ayaṃ buddharakkhito ca ayaṃ dhammarakkhito ca āyasmato saṅgharakkhitassa upasampadāpekkho”tiādinā nayena
tika-vin07t0:2044_8: ekena ācariyena dvinnaṃ ekasmiṃ khaṇe anussāvananayo daṭṭhabbo.
tika-vin07t0:2044_9: Imināva nayena tiṇṇampi ekena ācariyena ekakkhaṇe anussāvanaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:2045_1: aññena itarassā”tiādinā pubbe vuttanayena dvinnaṃ dvīhi vā,
tika-vin07t0:2045_3: ekakena vā ācariyena tayopi ekato anussāvane kātunti attho,
tika-vin07t0:2045_5: “Na tveva nānupajjhāyenā”ti idaṃ ekena ācariyena dvīhi vā tīhi vā upajjhāyehi dve vā tayo vā upasampadāpekkhe
tika-vin07t0:2045_6: ekakkhaṇe ekāya anussāvanāya ekānussāvane kātuṃ na vaṭṭatīti paṭikkhepapadaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:2045_7: Na pana nānācariyehi nānupajjhāyehi tayo ekānussāvane kātuṃ na vaṭṭatīti āha “sace pana nānācariyā nānupajjhāyā…pe…
tika-vin07t0:2045_10: sumanatthero tissattherassa saddhivihārika”nti evaṃ upajjhāyehi aññamaññaṃ saddhivihārikānaṃ anussāvanakaraṇaṃ vuttaṃ,
tika-vin07t0:2045_16: Sace pana upajjhāyo sayameva attano saddhivihārikaṃ anussāvetīti ettha vattabbameva natthi,
tika-vin07t0:2045_18: Anupajjhāyakassapi yena kenaci anussāvite upasampadā hoti,
tika-vin07t0:2045_19: kimaṅgaṃ pana saupajjhāyakassa upajjhāyeneva anussāvaneti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:2048_4: saddo eva vā upajjhā upayogapaccattavacanesu ya-
tika-vin07t0:2048_5: kāralopaṃ katvā evaṃ vutto karaṇavacanādīsu upajjhā-
tika-vin07t0:2048_7: Pāḷiyaṃ attanāva attānaṃ sammannitabbanti attanāva kattubhūtena karaṇabhūtena attānameva kammabhūtaṃ pati sammananakiccaṃ kātabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:2048_11: aññatrāpi terasasammutiādīsu imināva lakkhaṇena attanāva attā sammannitabbova.
tika-vin07t0:2048_12: Apica sayaṃ kammārahattā attānaṃ muñcitvā catuvaggādiko gaṇo sabbattha icchitabbo.
tika-vin07t0:2049_0: Saccakāloti “nigūhissāmī”ti vañcanaṃ pahāya saccasseva te icchitabbakālo.
tika-vin07t0:2049_1: Bhūtakāloti vañcanāya abhāvepi manussattādivatthuno bhūtatāya avassaṃ icchitabbakālo,
tika-vin07t0:2050_0: Sabbakammavācāsu atthakosallatthaṃ panettha upasampadākammavācāya evamattho daṭṭhabbo –
tika-vin07t0:2050_2: Tañca kiñcāpi yo saṅgho savanakiriyāya niyojīyati,
tika-vin07t0:2050_5: saddasannidhāne paṭhamapurisapayogova saddavidhūhi samāciṇṇo bhagavantaāyasmantādisaddasannidhānesu viya “adhivāsetu me bhavaṃ gotamo.
tika-vin07t0:2050_12: Garuṭṭhānīyesu hi gāravavasena majjhimapurisapayoguppattiyampi paṭhamapurisapayogaṃ payujjanti “desetu sugato dhamma”ntiādīsu viyāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:2050_14: āvusoti sadde apekkhitvā idha paṭhamapurisapayogo”ti vadanti,
tika-vin07t0:2050_15: taṃ na yuttaṃ “ācariyo me bhante hohi,
tika-vin07t0:2050_17: imaṃ pabbajitaṃ anuyuñjāhī”tiādīsu tappayogepi majjhimapurisapayogasseva dassanato.
tika-vin07t0:2051_7: Idha pana paccantimesu janapadesu pañcavaggato paṭṭhāya,
tika-vin07t0:2051_8: majjhimesu janapadesu dasavaggato paṭṭhāya saṅghoti gahetabbo.
tika-vin07t0:2051_12: Sace pana anussāvako sabbehi bhikkhūhi vuḍḍhataro hoti,
tika-vin07t0:2051_18: Keci pana “ekattha ‘āvuso’ti vatvā aññattha ‘bhante’ti vuttepi natthi doso ubhayenāpi ālapanassa sijjhanato”ti vadanti.
tika-vin07t0:2052_0: Idāni yamatthaṃ ñāpetukāmo “suṇātū”ti saṅghaṃ savane niyojeti,
tika-vin07t0:2052_3: Tena ca hatthapāse ṭhitasseva upasampadā ruhatīti sijjhati hatthapāsato bahi ṭhitassa “aya”nti na vattabbato.
tika-vin07t0:2052_4: Teneva anusāsakasammutiyaṃ so hatthapāsato bahi ṭhitattā “aya”nti na vutto.
tika-vin07t0:2052_8: So ca imasmiṃ paṭhamanāmapayoge evāti gahetabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:2052_13: Tassa ca upajjhāyataṃ samaṅgibhāvena dassetuṃ “itthannamassa āyasmato”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:2052_14: Etena “ayaṃ buddharakkhito āyasmato dhammarakkhitassa saddhivihārikabhūto upasampadāpekkho”ti evamādinā nayena nāmayojanāya saha attho dassitoti.
tika-vin07t0:2052_15: Ettha ca “āyasmato”ti padaṃ avatvāpi “ayaṃ buddharakkhito dhammarakkhitassa upasampadāpekkho”ti vattuṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin07t0:2052_16: Teneva pāḷiyaṃ “itthannāmena upajjhāyenā”ti ettha “āyasmato”ti padaṃ na vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:2053_0: Nanu cettha upajjhāyopi upasampadāpekkho viya hatthapāse ṭhito eva icchitabbo,
tika-vin07t0:2053_1: atha kasmā “ayaṃ itthannāmo imassa itthannāmassa upasampadāpekkho”ti evaṃ upajjhāyaparāmasanepi ima-
tika-vin07t0:2053_4: Kevalañhi kammanipphattiyā santapadavasena avijjamānassapi upajjhāyassa nāmakittanaṃ anupajjhāyassa upasampadādīsupi karīyati.
tika-vin07t0:2053_5: Tasmā upajjhāyassa asannihitatāyapi tapparāmasanamatteneva kammasiddhito “imassā”ti niddisituṃ na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin07t0:2054_0: Parisuddho antarāyikehi dhammehīti abhabbatādikehi upasampadāya avatthukarehi ceva pañcābādhahatthacchinnādīhi
tika-vin07t0:2054_2: Evaṃ vutto eva ca āpattimattakarehi pañcābādhādīhi aparimuttassapi upasampadā ruhati, nāññathā.
tika-vin07t0:2054_4: Evaṃ vutte eva apattacīvarassāpi upasampadā ruhati, nāññathā.
tika-vin07t0:2054_7: Evaṃ tena saṅghe ayācitepi “itthannāmo saṅghaṃ upasampadaṃ yācatī”ti vutte eva kammaṃ avipannaṃ hoti, nāññathā.
tika-vin07t0:2054_8: Upajjhāyenāti upajjhāyena karaṇabhūtena itthannāmaṃ upajjhāyaṃ katvā kammabhūtaṃ upasampadaṃ dātuṃ nipphādetuṃ kattubhūtaṃ saṅghaṃ yācatīti attho.
tika-vin07t0:2055_0: Yadi saṅghassa pattakallanti ettha patto kālo imassāti pattakālaṃ,
tika-vin07t0:2055_7: Yo hi koci tattha apattakallataṃ maññissati,
tika-vin07t0:2055_9: Imameva hi atthaṃ sandhāya anussāvanāsu “yassāyasmato khamati…pe…
tika-vin07t0:2056_0: Tattha vatthusampadā nāma yathāvuttehi ekādasahi abhabbapuggalehi ceva antimavatthuajjhāpannehi ca añño
tika-vin07t0:2056_2: etasmiṃ puggale sati eva idaṃ saṅghassa upasampadākammaṃ pattakallaṃ nāma hoti, nāsati.
tika-vin07t0:2057_0: Antarāyikehi dhammehi cassa parisuddhatā nāma yathāvuttasseva upasampadāvatthubhūtassa puggalassa ye
tika-vin07t0:2057_1: ime bhagavatā paṭikkhittā pañcābādhaphuṭṭhatādayo mātāpitūhi ananuññātatāpariyosānā ceva hatthacchinnatādayo
tika-vin07t0:2057_2: ca dosadhammā kārakasaṅghassa āpattādiantarāyahetutāya “antarāyikā”ti vuccanti tehi antarāyikehi dosadhammehi
tika-vin07t0:2057_4: imissā ca sati eva idaṃ kammaṃ pattakallaṃ nāma hoti, nāsati.
tika-vin07t0:2057_5: Kataṃ pana kammaṃ sukatameva hoti ṭhapetvā ūnavīsativassapuggalaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:2058_0: Sīmāsampadā pana uposathakkhandhake vakkhamānanayena sabbadosavirahitāya baddhābaddhavasena duvidhāya sīmāya vaseneva veditabbā.
tika-vin07t0:2058_1: Tādisāya hi sīmāya sati eva idaṃ kammaṃ pattakallaṃ nāma hoti, nāsati.
tika-vin07t0:2059_0: Parisasampadā pana ye ime upasampadākammassa sabbantimena paricchedena kammappattā dasahi vā pañcahi vā anūnā pārājikaṃ anāpannā,
tika-vin07t0:2059_6: vajjanīyapuggalānaṃ saṅghassa hatthapāse abhāvo cāti imehi catūhi aṅgehi saṅgahitā.
tika-vin07t0:2059_7: Evarūpāya ca parisasampadāya sati eva idaṃ pattakallaṃ nāma hoti, nāsati.
tika-vin07t0:2059_8: Tattha purimānaṃ tiṇṇaṃ aṅgānaṃ aññatarassapi abhāve kataṃ kammaṃ vipajjati,
tika-vin07t0:2060_0: Pubbakiccaniṭṭhāpanaṃ nāma yānimāni “paṭhamaṃ upajjhaṃ gāhāpetabbo”tiādinā pāḷiyaṃ vuttāni “upajjhaṃ gāhāpanaṃ,
tika-vin07t0:2060_2: tato taṃ hatthapāsato bahi ṭhapetvā anusāsakasammutikammakaraṇaṃ,
tika-vin07t0:2060_4: tena ca paṭhamataraṃ āgantvā saṅghassa ñāpetvā upasampadāpekkhaṃ ‘āgacchāhī’ti hatthapāse eva abbhānaṃ,
tika-vin07t0:2060_5: tena ca bhikkhūnaṃ pāde vandāpetvā upasampadāyācāpanaṃ,
tika-vin07t0:2060_7: sammatena ca pucchana”nti imāni aṭṭha pubbakiccāni,
tika-vin07t0:2060_9: Etasmiñca pubbakammaniṭṭhāpane sati eva idaṃ saṅghassa upasampadākammaṃ pattakallaṃ nāma hoti, nāsati.
tika-vin07t0:2060_10: Etesu pana pubbakammesu akatesupi kataṃ kammaṃ yathāvuttavatthusampattiādīsu vijjamānesu akuppameva hoti.
tika-vin07t0:2060_11: Tadevamettha pattakallaṃ imehi pañcahi aṅgehi saṅgahitanti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:2060_13: vakkhamānesu ca sabbesu kammesu pattakallatā yathārahaṃ yojetvā ñātabbā.
tika-vin07t0:2061_0: Itthannāmaṃ upasampādeyyāti upasampadānipphādanena taṃsamaṅgiṃ kareyya karotūti patthanāyaṃ,
tika-vin07t0:2061_2: Yathā hi “devadattaṃ sukhāpeyyā”ti vutte sukhamassa nipphādetvā taṃ sukhasamaṅginaṃ kareyyāti attho hoti,
tika-vin07t0:2061_3: evamidhāpi upasampadamassa nipphādetvā taṃ upasampadāsamaṅginaṃ kareyyāti attho.
tika-vin07t0:2061_4: Payojakabyāpāre cetaṃ yathā sukhayantaṃ kañci suddhakattāraṃ koci hetukattā sukhahetunipphādanena sukhāpeyyāti vuccati,
tika-vin07t0:2061_5: evamidhāpi upasampajjantaṃ suddhakattāraṃ puggalaṃ hetukattubhūto saṅgho upasampadāhetunipphādanena upasampādeyyāti vutto.
tika-vin07t0:2061_6: Etena ca sukhaṃ viya sukhadāyakena saṅghena puggalassa diyyamānā tathāpavattaparamatthadhamme upādāya
tika-vin07t0:2061_7: ariyajanapaññattā upasampadā nāma sammutisaccatā atthīti samatthitaṃ hoti.
tika-vin07t0:2061_8: Ettha ca “itthannāmo saṅghaṃ upasampadaṃ yācatī”ti vuttattā parivāsādīsu viya yācanānuguṇaṃ “itthannāmassa
tika-vin07t0:2061_9: upasampadaṃ dadeyyā”ti avatvā “itthannāmaṃ upasampādeyyā”ti vuttattā idaṃ upasampadākammaṃ dāne asaṅgahetvā
tika-vin07t0:2062_5: kāre vuttamatte eva ñattikammaṃ niṭṭhitaṃ hotīti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:2062_7: Upasampadāti saṅghena diyyamānā nipphādiyamānā upasampadā yassa khamati.
tika-vin07t0:2062_11: Khamati saṅghassa itthannāmassa upasampadāti pakatena sambandho.
tika-vin07t0:2062_15: so bhāseyyā”ti tikkhattuṃ vuccamānopi saṅgho tuṇhī niravo ahosi,
tika-vin07t0:2062_18: Tuṇhībhāvenevetaṃ saṅghassa ruccanabhāvaṃ dhārayāmi bujjhāmi pajānāmīti attho. Iti-
tika-vin07t0:2065_1: Ekaporisā vātiādi sattānaṃ sarīracchāyaṃ pādehi minitvā jānanappakāradassanaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:2065_3: Idañca utuppamāṇācikkhanādi ca āgantukehi saddhiṃ vīmaṃsitvā vuḍḍhanavabhāvaṃ ñatvā vandanavandāpanādikaraṇatthaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:2065_6: sova pamiyate anena saṃvaccharanti pamāṇanti āha “utuyeva utuppamāṇa”nti.
tika-vin07t0:2065_10: Tenāha “yattakehi divasehi yassa yo utu aparipuṇṇo,
tika-vin07t0:2065_12: Tattha yassa taṃ khaṇaṃ laddhūpasampadassa puggalassa sambandhī yo utu yattakehi divasehi aparipuṇṇo,
tika-vin07t0:2066_0: Chāyādikameva sabbaṃ saṅgahetvā gāyitabbato kathetabbato saṅgītīti āha “idamevā”tiādi.
tika-vin07t0:2066_2: Tvaṃ kiṃ labhasīti tvaṃ upasampādanakāle kataravassaṃ,
tika-vin07t0:2066_6: Idañca saṃvaccharācikkhanaṃ vinā vuttampi na ñāyatīti iminā utuācikkhaneneva sāsanavassesu vā kaliyugavassādīsu
tika-vin07t0:2066_7: vā sahassime vā satime vā asukaṃ utuṃ labhāmīti dassitanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:2066_9: Vattabbakamato pana kaliyugavassādīsu sabbadesapasiddhesu asukavasse asukautumhi asukamāse asuke kaṇhe
tika-vin07t0:2066_10: vā sukke vā pakkhe asukatithivāravisesayutte nakkhatte pubbaṇhādidivasabhāge ettake chāyāpamāṇe,
tika-vin07t0:2066_11: nāḍikāpamāṇe vā mayā upasampadā laddhāti vadeyyāsīti evaṃ ācikkhitabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:2066_12: “Idaṃ suṭṭhu uggahetvā āgantukehi vuḍḍhapaṭipāṭiṃ ñatvā paṭipajjāhī”ti vattabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:2066_13: Pāḷiyaṃ kissa tvanti kiṃ tvaṃ ettakaṃ kālaṃ akāsīti attho.
tika-vin07t0:2067_1: Upasampadaṃ yācīti pabbajjañca upasampadañca yācīti attho.
tika-vin07t0:2067_4: “Osāretabbo”ti iminā purimo ukkhittabhāvo vibbhamitvā puna laddhūpasampadampi na muñcati.
tika-vin07t0:2067_5: Tena ca sambhuñjanādīsupi bhikkhūnaṃ pācittiyamevāti dasseti.
tika-vin07t0:2067_6: Anāpatti sambhoge saṃvāseti ettha sahaseyyāpi saṅgahitāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:2067_10: Yo pana āpattiṭṭhāne anāpattidiṭṭhitāya āpattiṃ na passati,
tika-vin07t0:2067_12: so yasmā ettāvatā alajjī nāma na hoti.
tika-vin07t0:2067_13: Paṇṇattiṃ ñatvā vītikkamaṃ karonto eva hi alajjī nāma hoti.
tika-vin07t0:2067_16: Tena sāpettha āpatti na vuttāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:2067_17: Yo panettha imaṃ adhippāyaṃ asallakkhentena kenaci “anāpatti sambhoge saṃvāse”ti iminā pācittiyena anāpatti vuttā,
tika-vin07t0:2067_18: alajjisambhogapaccayā dukkaṭaṃ pana āpajjati evāti āpattiniyamo vutto,
tika-vin07t0:2068_3: lajjīnaṃ paggahesu ca pesalānaṃ sukhāvahe mahante vinayamhi yathā atthakārī atthānuguṇaṃ karontova yasmā yoniso paṭipajjati nāma hoti,
tika-vin07t0:2074_0: 132. Uposathakkhandhake taranti otaranti etthāti titthaṃ, laddhi. Itoti sāsanaladdhito.
tika-vin07t0:2075_1: Āpajjitvā vā vuṭṭhitoti ettha desanārocanānampi saṅgaho.
tika-vin07t0:2075_2: Teneva mātikāṭṭhakathāyaṃ “vuṭṭhitā vā desitā vā ārocitā vā āpatti…pe…
tika-vin07t0:2076_0: Manujenāti āsannena saha. Pareti dūraṭṭhepi parapuggale sandhāya giraṃ no ca bhaṇeyyāti yojanā.
tika-vin07t0:2077_0: “Āvikatā hissa phāsu hotī”ti vuttattā garukāpattipi āvikaraṇamattena vuṭṭhātīti keci vadanti,
tika-vin07t0:2077_3: yathābhūtañhi attānamāvikarontaṃ pesalā bhikkhū “akāmā parivatthabba”ntiādivacanaṃ nissāya anicchamānampi
tika-vin07t0:2077_4: naṃ upāyena parivāsādīni datvā avassaṃ suddhante patiṭṭhāpessanti,
tika-vin07t0:2077_5: tato tassa avippaṭisārādīnaṃ vasena phāsu hoti.
tika-vin07t0:2077_9: pubbe paññattampi pana pārājikādisikkhāpadaṃ sabbaṃ bhagavā “tatrime cattāro pārājikā dhammā uddesaṃ
tika-vin07t0:2077_10: āgacchantī”tiādinā pārājikuddesādivasena vinayamātikaṃ katvā nidānuddesena saha sayameva saṅgahetvā “pātimokkha”nti
tika-vin07t0:2078_0: 136. Etaṃ 34 veditabbanti yasmiṃ tasmiṃ cātuddase vā pannarase vāti evaṃ atthajātaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:2081_2: Tassaṃ pana disāyaṃ nimitte asati yattha atthi,
tika-vin07t0:2081_4: dakkhiṇāya disāyā”tiādinā samantā vijjamānaṭṭhānesu nimittāni kittetvā puna “puratthimāya anudisāyā”ti paṭhamakittitaṃ kittetuṃ vaṭṭati,
tika-vin07t0:2081_6: Tikkhattuṃ sīmāmaṇḍalaṃ sambandhantenāti vinayadharena sayaṃ ekasmiṃyeva ṭhāne ṭhatvā kevalaṃ nimittakittanavacaneneva
tika-vin07t0:2081_7: sīmāmaṇḍalaṃ samantā nimittena nimittaṃ bandhantenāti attho.
tika-vin07t0:2081_8: Taṃ taṃ nimittaṭṭhānaṃ agantvāpi hi kittetuṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin07t0:2081_9: Tiyojanaparamāya sīmāya samantato tikkhattuṃ anuparigamanassa ekadivasena dukkarattā vinayadharena sayaṃ
tika-vin07t0:2081_10: adiṭṭhampi pubbe bhikkhūhi yathāvavatthitaṃ nimittaṃ “pāsāṇo bhante”tiādinā kenaci vuttānusārena sallakkhetvā
tika-vin07t0:2082_0: Suddhapaṃsupabbatoti na kenaci kato sayaṃjātova vutto.
tika-vin07t0:2082_3: Hatthippamāṇatoti ettha bhūmito uggatappadesena hatthippamāṇaṃ gahetabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:2082_4: Catūhi vā tīhi vāti sīmābhūmiyaṃ catūsu,
tika-vin07t0:2082_6: Ekissā eva pana disāya ṭhitehi tato bahūhipi sammannituṃ na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin07t0:2082_7: Dvīhi pana dvīsu disāsu ṭhitehipi na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin07t0:2082_8: Tasmāti yasmā ekena na vaṭṭati, tasmā.
tika-vin07t0:2082_9: Taṃ bahiddhā katvāti kittitanimittassa asīmattā antosīmāya karaṇaṃ ayuttanti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:2083_4: Atimahantopīti bhūmito hatthippamāṇaṃ anuggantvā heṭṭhābhūmiyaṃ otiṇṇaghanato anekayojanappamāṇopi.
tika-vin07t0:2083_5: Sace hi tato hatthippamāṇaṃ kūṭaṃ uggacchati,
tika-vin07t0:2084_0: Antosārānanti tasmiṃ khaṇe taruṇatāya sāre avijjamānepi pariṇāmena bhavissamānasārepi sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:2084_3: Etena ca sārarukkhamissampi vanaṃ vaṭṭatīti dasseti.
tika-vin07t0:2084_5: Vanamajjhe vihāraṃ karontīti rukkhaghaṭāya antare rukkhe acchinditvā vatiādīhi vihāraparicchedaṃ katvāva
tika-vin07t0:2084_6: antorukkhantaresu eva pariveṇapaṇṇasālādīnaṃ karaṇavasena yathā antovihārampi vanameva hoti,
tika-vin07t0:2084_8: Yadi hi sabbaṃ rukkhaṃ chinditvā vihāraṃ kareyyuṃ,
tika-vin07t0:2084_9: vihārassa avanattā taṃ parikkhipitvā ṭhitaṃ vanaṃ ekattha kittetabbaṃ siyā.
tika-vin07t0:2084_10: Idha pana antopi vanattā “vanaṃ na kittetabba”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:2084_12: “nimittassa upari vihāro hotī”tiādinā anantare vuttadosaṃ āpajjati.
tika-vin07t0:2084_14: rukkhavirahitaṭṭhāne katavihārassa ekapasse ṭhitavanassa ekadesanti attho.
tika-vin07t0:2085_2: Mātikāṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana avebhaṅgiyavinicchaye “yo koci aṭṭhaṅgulasūcidaṇḍakamattopi veḷu…pe…
tika-vin07t0:2085_3: garubhaṇḍa”nti vuttattā tanutaro veḷudaṇḍoti ca sūcidaṇḍoti ca gahetabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:2085_4: Vaṃsanaḷakasarāvādīsūti veḷupabbe vā naḷapabbe vā kapallakādimattikabhājanesu vāti attho.
tika-vin07t0:2085_5: Taṅkhaṇampīti taruṇapotake amilāyitvā viruhanajātike sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:2085_6: Ye pana pariṇatā samūlaṃ uddharitvā ropitāpi chinnasākhā viya milāyitvā cirena navamūlaṅkuruppattiyā jīvanti,
tika-vin07t0:2086_1: Koṇanti sīmāya catūsu koṇesu dvinnaṃ dvinnaṃ maggānaṃ sambandhaṭṭhānaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:2086_2: Parabhāge kittetuṃ vaṭṭatīti tesaṃ catunnaṃ koṇānaṃ bahi nikkhamitvā ṭhitesu maggesu ekissā disāya ekaṃ,
tika-vin07t0:2086_3: aññissā disāya cāparanti evaṃ cattāropi maggā catūsu disāsu kittetuṃ vaṭṭatīti adhippāyo.
tika-vin07t0:2086_4: Evaṃ pana kittitamattena kathaṃ ekābaddhatā vigacchatīti viññāyatīti.
tika-vin07t0:2086_5: Parato gataṭṭhānepi ete eva te cattāro maggā.
tika-vin07t0:2087_0: “Uttarantiyā bhikkhuniyā”ti idañca pāḷiyaṃ bhikkhunīnaṃ nadīpāragamane nadilakkhaṇassa āgatattā vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:2087_2: “Nadicatukkepi eseva nayo”ti iminā ekattha kittetvā aññattha parato gataṭṭhānepi kittetuṃ na vaṭṭatīti dasseti.
tika-vin07t0:2087_3: Teneva ca “assammissanadiyo catassopi kittetuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti asammissa-
tika-vin07t0:2087_6: Nadiṃ bhinditvāti yathā udakaṃ anicchantehi kassakehi mahoghe nivattetuṃ na sakkā,
tika-vin07t0:2089_4: “Nimittānaṃ satenāpī”ti iminā ekissāya eva disāya bahunimittāni “puratthimāya disāya kiṃ nimittaṃ?
tika-vin07t0:2089_13: Sīmāya upacāraṃ ṭhapetvāti āyatiṃ bandhitabbāya sīmāya nesaṃ vihārānaṃ paricchedato bahi sīmantarikappahonakaṃ upacāraṃ ṭhapetvā.
tika-vin07t0:2089_17: Baddhasīmāsadisānīti yathā baddhasīmāsu ṭhitā aññamaññaṃ chandādiṃ anapekkhitvā paccekaṃ kammaṃ kātuṃ labhanti,
tika-vin07t0:2090_2: Idañca kammārahena saha abbhānakārakānampi pahonakatthaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:2090_3: “Nimittupagā pāsāṇā ṭhapetabbā”ti idaṃ yathārucitaṭṭhāne rukkhanimittādīnaṃ dullabhatāya vaḍḍhitvā ubhinnaṃ
tika-vin07t0:2090_4: baddhasīmānaṃ saṅkarakaraṇato ca pāsāṇanimittassa ca tadabhāvato yattha katthaci ānetvā ṭhapetuṃ sukaratāya
tika-vin07t0:2090_7: Caturaṅgulappamāṇāpīti yathā khandhasīmāparicchedato bahi nimittapāsāṇānaṃ caturaṅgulamattaṭṭhānaṃ samantā nigacchati,
tika-vin07t0:2090_9: evaṃ tesupi ṭhapitesu caturaṅgulamattā sīmantarikā hotīti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:2091_1: Te pana kittentena padakkhiṇato anupariyāyanteneva kittetabbā. Kathaṃ?
tika-vin07t0:2091_2: Khaṇḍasīmato hi pacchimāya disāya puratthābhimukhena ṭhatvā “puratthimāya disāya kiṃ nimitta”nti tattha
tika-vin07t0:2091_3: sabbāni nimittāni anukkamena kittetvā tathā uttarāya disāya dakkhiṇābhimukhena ṭhatvā “dakkhiṇāya disāya
tika-vin07t0:2091_4: kiṃ nimitta”nti anukkamena kittetvā tathā puratthimāya disāya pacchimābhimukhena ṭhatvā “pacchimāya disāya
tika-vin07t0:2091_5: kiṃ nimitta”nti anukkamena kittetvā tathā dakkhiṇāya disāya uttarābhimukhena ṭhatvā “uttarāya disāya
tika-vin07t0:2091_6: kiṃ nimitta”nti tattha sabbāni nimittāni anukkamena kittetvā puna pacchimāya disāya puratthābhimukhena
tika-vin07t0:2091_8: Evaṃ bahūnampi khaṇḍasīmānaṃ sīmantarikapāsāṇā paccekaṃ kittetabbā.
tika-vin07t0:2091_11: Ubhinnampi na kopentīti ubhinnampi kammaṃ na kopenti.
tika-vin07t0:2092_2: Nimittaṃ na kātabbanti taṃ rājiṃ vā udukkhalaṃ vā nimittaṃ na kātabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:2092_3: Idañca yathāvuttesu nimittesu anāgatattena na vaṭṭatīti siddhampi avinassakasaññāya koci mohena nimittaṃ
tika-vin07t0:2092_5: Evaṃ upari “bhittiṃ akittetvā”tiādīsupi siddhamevatthaṃ punappunaṃ kathane kāraṇaṃ veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:2092_6: Sīmāvipatti hi upasampadādisabbakammavipattimūlanti tassā sabbaṃ dvāraṃ sabbathā pidahanavasena vattabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:2092_7: Sabbaṃ vatvāva idha ācariyā vinicchayaṃ ṭhapesunti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:2093_1: Silāmayāya pana bhittiyā nimittupagaṃ ekaṃ pāsāṇaṃ taṃtaṃdisāya kittetuṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin07t0:2093_2: Anekasilāhi cinitaṃ sakalabhittiṃ kittetuṃ na vaṭṭati “eso pāsāṇo nimitta”nti ekavacanena vattabbato.
tika-vin07t0:2093_3: Antokuṭṭamevāti ettha antokuṭṭepi nimittānaṃ ṭhitokāsato anto eva sīmāti gahetabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:2093_4: Pamukhe nimittapāsāṇe ṭhapetvāti gabbhābhimukhepi bahipamukhe gabbhavitthārappamāṇe ṭhāne pāsāṇe ṭhapetvā sammannitabbā.
tika-vin07t0:2093_5: Evañhi gabbhapamukhānaṃ antare ṭhitakuṭṭampi upādāya anto ca bahi ca caturassasaṇṭhānāva sīmā hoti.
tika-vin07t0:2094_0: Anto ca bahi ca sīmā hotīti majjhe ṭhitabhittiyā saha caturassasīmā hoti.
tika-vin07t0:2095_0: “Uparipāsādeyeva hotī”ti iminā gabbhassa ca pamukhassa ca antarā ṭhitabhittiyā ekattā tattha ca ekavīsatiyā
tika-vin07t0:2095_3: Heṭṭhimatale kuṭṭoti heṭṭhimatale catūsu disāsu ṭhitakuṭṭo.
tika-vin07t0:2095_5: tīsu vā disāsu eva kuṭṭo tiṭṭheyya,
tika-vin07t0:2095_7: Heṭṭhāpi otaratīti catunnampi bhittīnaṃ anto bhittīhi saha ekavīsatiyā bhikkhūnaṃ pahonakattā vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:2095_9: catunnaṃ pana bhittīnaṃ bāhirantaraparicchede heṭṭhābhūmibhāge udakapariyantaṃ katvā otarati.
tika-vin07t0:2095_10: Na pana bhittīnaṃ bahi kesaggamattampi ṭhānaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:2095_12: Otaraṇānotaraṇaṃ vuttanayeneva veditabbanti uparisīmappamāṇassa antogadhānaṃ heṭṭhimatale catūsu disāsu
tika-vin07t0:2095_13: kuṭṭānaṃ tulārukkhehi ekasambandhataṃ tadanto pacchimasīmappamāṇatādiñca sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:2095_14: Kiñcāpettha niyyūhakādayo nimittānaṃ ṭhitokāsatāya bajjhamānakkhaṇe sīmā na honti,
tika-vin07t0:2095_15: baddhāya pana sīmāya sīmaṭṭhāva hontīti daṭṭhabbā.
tika-vin07t0:2095_17: “Uparimatalena sambaddho hotī”ti idaṃ kuṭṭānaṃ antarā sīmaṭṭhānaṃ thambhānaṃ abhāvato vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:2095_19: kuṭṭe uparimatalena asambandhepi sīmaṭṭhatthambhānaṃ upari ṭhito pāsādo sīmaṭṭhova hoti.
tika-vin07t0:2096_0: Sace pana bahūnaṃ thambhapantīnaṃ upari katapāsādassa heṭṭhā pathaviyaṃ sabbabāhirāya thambhapantiyā anto nimittapāsāṇe ṭhapetvā sīmā baddhā hoti,
tika-vin07t0:2096_2: Etthāpi yaṃ tāva sīmaṭṭhatthambheheva dhāriyamānānaṃ tulānaṃ uparimatalaṃ,
tika-vin07t0:2096_6: asīmaṭṭhāya bāhiratthambhapantiyā ca samadhuraṃ dhāriyamānānaṃ tulānaṃ uparimatalaṃ,
tika-vin07t0:2096_10: Tasmā kammaṃ karontehi garuke nirāsaṅkaṭṭhāne ṭhatvā sabbaṃ taṃ āsaṅkaṭṭhānaṃ sodhetvāva kammaṃ kātabbaṃ,
tika-vin07t0:2097_0: Tālamūlakapabbateti tālakkhandhamūlasadise heṭṭhā thūlo hutvā kamena kiso hutvā uggato hi tālasadiso nāma hoti.
tika-vin07t0:2097_2: Paṇavasaṇṭhānoti majjhe tanuko heṭṭhā ca upari ca vitthiṇṇo.
tika-vin07t0:2097_3: Heṭṭhā vā majjhe vāti mudiṅgasaṇṭhānassa heṭṭhā,
tika-vin07t0:2098_4: “So ca pāsāṇo sīmaṭṭho”ti iminā īdisehi susirapāsāṇaleṇakuṭṭādīhi paricchinne bhūmibhāge eva sīmā patiṭṭhāti,
tika-vin07t0:2098_8: Sace pana so susirapāsāṇo bhūmiṃ anāhacca ākāsagatova olambati,
tika-vin07t0:2098_10: Susirapāsāṇā pana sayaṃ sīmāpaṭibaddhattā sīmā honti.
tika-vin07t0:2098_11: Kathaṃ pana pacchimappamāṇarahitehi etehi susirapāsāṇādīhi sīmā na otaratīti idaṃ saddhātabbanti?
tika-vin07t0:2099_0: Apicettha susirapāsāṇabhittianusārena mūsikādīnaṃ viya sīmāya heṭṭhimatale otaraṇakiccaṃ natthi.
tika-vin07t0:2099_1: Heṭṭhā pana pacchimasīmappamāṇe ākāse dvaṅgulamattabahalehi pāsāṇabhittiādīhipi uparimatalaṃ āhacca ṭhitehi sabbaso,
tika-vin07t0:2099_2: yebhuyyena vā paricchinne sati upari bajjhamānā sīmā tehi pāsāṇādīhi antaritāya tapparicchinnāya heṭṭhābhūmiyāpi
tika-vin07t0:2099_3: uparimatalena saddhiṃ ekakkhaṇe patiṭṭhāti nadipārasīmā viya nadiantaritesu ubhosu tīresu,
tika-vin07t0:2099_4: leṇādīsu apanītesupi heṭṭhā otiṇṇā sīmā yāva sāsanantaradhānā na vigacchati.
tika-vin07t0:2099_5: Paṭhamaṃ pana upari sīmāya baddhāya pacchā leṇādīsu katesupi heṭṭhābhūmiyaṃ sīmā otarati eva.
tika-vin07t0:2099_7: Evaṃ ubhayattha patiṭṭhitā ca sā sīmā ekāva hoti gottādijāti viya byattibhedesūti gahetabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:2099_9: abaddhasīmā ca attano attano pakatinissayabhūte gāmāraññanadiādike khette yathāparicchedaṃ sabbattha
tika-vin07t0:2099_10: sākalyena ekasmiṃ khaṇe byāpinī paramatthato avijjamānāpi te te nissayabhūte paramatthadhamme,
tika-vin07t0:2099_11: taṃ taṃ kiriyāvisesampi vā upādāya lokiyehi,
tika-vin07t0:2099_12: sāsanikehi ca yathārahaṃ ekattena paññattatāya nissayekarūpā eva.
tika-vin07t0:2099_13: Tathā hi eko gāmo araññaṃ nadī jātassaro samuddoti evaṃ loke,
tika-vin07t0:2101_1: Na hi paramatthato ekassa anekadhammesu byāpanamatthi.
tika-vin07t0:2102_3: Tameva puna leṇaṃ pañcahi pakārehi vikappetvā otaraṇānotaraṇavinicchayaṃ dassetuṃ āha “sace pana heṭṭhā”tiādi.
tika-vin07t0:2102_9: saddaṃ sīmāparicchedena visesetuṃ “uparimassa sīmāparicchedassa pārato”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:2102_10: Pabbatapādaṃ pana apekkhitvā “orato”ti vattabbepi sīmānissayaṃ pabbataggaṃ sandhāya “pārato”ti vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:2102_13: Bahi sīmā na otaratīti ettha bahīti pabbatapāde leṇaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ,
tika-vin07t0:2102_14: leṇassa bahibhūte uparisīmāparicchedassa heṭṭhābhāge sīmā na otaratīti attho.
tika-vin07t0:2102_15: Anto sīmāti leṇassa ca pabbatapādassa ca anto attano otaraṇārahaṭṭhāne na otaratīti attho.
tika-vin07t0:2102_17: anto sīmā na otaratī”ti cettha attano otaraṇārahaṭṭhāne leṇābhāvena sīmāya sabbathā anotaraṇameva dassitanti gahetabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:2102_19: “Bahi patitaṃ asīmā”tiādinā uparipāsādādīsu athiranissayesu ṭhitā sīmāpi tesaṃ vināsena vinassatīti dassitanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:2103_1: sīmāyevāti ettha sace heṭṭhā umaṅganadisīmappamāṇato anūnā paṭhamameva ca pavattā hoti.
tika-vin07t0:2103_2: Sīmā ca pacchā baddhā nadito upari eva hoti,
tika-vin07t0:2103_3: nadiṃ āhacca pokkharaṇiyā ca khatāya sīmā vinassatīti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:2104_1: “Vaṭarukkho”ti idaṃ pārohopatthambhena atidūrampi gantuṃ samatthasākhāsamaṅgitāya vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:2104_5: Mahāsīmāya pathavitalanti ettha āsannatarampi gāmasīmaṃ aggahetvā baddhasīmāya eva gahitattā gāmasīmābaddhasīmānaṃ
tika-vin07t0:2104_10: Yassā hi sīmāya saddhiṃ sambandhe doso bhaveyya,
tika-vin07t0:2104_14: Teneva “sace pana rukkhassa sākhā vā tato nikkhantapāroho vā bahinaditīre vihārasīmāya vā gāmasīmāya
tika-vin07t0:2104_15: vā patiṭṭhito”tiādinā udakukkhepasīmāya attano anissayabhūtagāmasīmādīhi eva sambandhadoso dassito,
tika-vin07t0:2105_0: Mahāsīmaṃ vā sodhetvāti mahāsīmāgatānaṃ sabbesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ hatthapāsānayanabahikaraṇādivasena sakalaṃ mahāsīmaṃ sodhetvā.
tika-vin07t0:2105_1: Etena sabbavipattiyo mocetvā pubbe suṭṭhu baddhānampi dvinnaṃ baddhasīmānaṃ pacchā rukkhādisambandhena
tika-vin07t0:2105_2: uppajjanako īdiso pāḷimuttako sambhedadoso atthīti dasseti.
tika-vin07t0:2105_5: sīmāya sīmā sambhinditabbā”tiādinā baddhasīmānaṃ aññamaññaṃ sambhedajjhottharaṇaṃ paṭikkhipitvā “anujānāmi,
tika-vin07t0:2105_7: sīmaṃ sammannantena sīmantarikaṃ ṭhapetvā sīmaṃ sammannitu”nti ubhinnaṃ baddhasīmānamantarā sīmantarikaṃ
tika-vin07t0:2105_8: ṭhapetvāva bandhituṃ anujānantena sambhedajjhottharaṇaṃ viya tāsaṃ aññamaññaṃ phusitvā tiṭṭhanavasena
tika-vin07t0:2105_9: bandhanampi na vaṭṭatīti siddhattā baddhānampi tāsaṃ pacchā aññamaññaṃ ekarukkhādīhi phusitvā ṭhānampi
tika-vin07t0:2105_10: na vaṭṭatīti bhagavato adhippāyaññūhi saṅgītikārakehi niddhārito.
tika-vin07t0:2106_1: pubbe suṭṭhu baddhānaṃ pacchā sañjātattā bajjhamānakkhaṇe viya asīmattaṃ kātuṃ na sakkoti.
tika-vin07t0:2106_2: Tasmā rukkhādisambandhe apanītamatte tā sīmā pākatikā honti.
tika-vin07t0:2106_4: evaṃ bajjhamānakkhaṇepi tāsaṃ rukkhādisambandhe sati tā bandhituṃ na vaṭṭatīti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:2107_0: Keci pana “mahāsīmaṃ vā sodhetvāti ettha mahāsīmāgatā bhikkhū yathā taṃ sākhaṃ vā pārohaṃ vā kāyapaṭibaddhehi na phusanti,
tika-vin07t0:2107_4: Tathā hi “mahāsīmāya pathavitalaṃ vā tatthajātarukkhādīni vā āhacca tiṭṭhatī”ti evaṃ sākhāpārohānaṃ mahāsīmaṃ
tika-vin07t0:2107_6: na pana tattha ṭhitabhikkhūhi sākhādīnaṃ phusanaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:2107_7: Yadi hi bhikkhūnaṃ sākhādi phusitvā ṭhānameva kāraṇaṃ siyā,
tika-vin07t0:2107_8: tassa sākhaṃ vā tato niggatapārohaṃ vā mahāsīmāya paviṭṭhaṃ tatraṭṭho koci bhikkhu phusitvā tiṭṭhatīti bhikkhuphusanameva vattabbaṃ siyā.
tika-vin07t0:2107_11: Na hi āhacca ṭhitameva sākhādiṃ phusitvā ṭhito bhikkhu sodhetabbo ākāsaṭṭhasākhādiṃ phusitvā ṭhitassāpi sodhetabbato,
tika-vin07t0:2107_13: Ākāsaṭṭhasākhāsu ca bhikkhuno phusanameva kāraṇattena vuttaṃ,
tika-vin07t0:2107_14: sodhanañca tasseva bhikkhussa hatthapāsānayanādivasena sodhanaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:2107_15: Idha pana “mahāsīmaṃ sodhetvā”ti sakalasīmāsādhāraṇavacanena sodhanaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:2108_0: Apica sākhādiṃ phusitvā ṭhitabhikkhumattasodhane abhimate “mahāsīmāya pathavitala”nti visesasīmopādānaṃ
tika-vin07t0:2108_1: niratthakaṃ siyā yattha katthaci antamaso ākāsepi ṭhatvā sākhādiṃ phusitvā ṭhitassa visodhetabbato.
tika-vin07t0:2108_2: Chinditvā bahiṭṭhakā kātabbāti tattha patiṭṭhitabhāvaviyojanavacanato ca visabhāgasīmānaṃ phusaneneva
tika-vin07t0:2108_3: sakalasīmāsodhanahetuko aṭṭhakathāsiddhoyaṃ eko sambandhadoso atthevāti gahetabbo.
tika-vin07t0:2108_4: Teneva udakukkhepasīmākathāyampi “vihārasīmāya vā gāmasīmāya vā patiṭṭhito”ti ca “naditīre pana khāṇukaṃ
tika-vin07t0:2108_5: koṭṭetvā tattha baddhanāvāya na vaṭṭatī”ti ca “sace pana setu vā setupādā vā bahitīre patiṭṭhitā,
tika-vin07t0:2108_6: kammaṃ kātuṃ na vaṭṭatī”ti ca evaṃ visabhāgāsu gāmasīmāsu sākhādīnaṃ phusanameva saṅkaradosakāraṇattena vuttaṃ,
tika-vin07t0:2108_8: Tathā hi “antonadiyaṃ jātarukkhe bandhitvā kammaṃ kātabba”nti nadiyaṃ nāvābandhanaṃ anuññātaṃ udakukkhepanissayattena nadisīmāya sabhāgattā.
tika-vin07t0:2108_9: Yadi hi bhikkhūnaṃ phusanameva paṭicca sabbattha sambandhadoso vutto siyā,
tika-vin07t0:2108_12: tasmā sabhāgasīmāsu pavisitvā bhūmiādiṃ phusitvā vā aphusitvā vā sākhādimhi ṭhite taṃ sākhādiṃ phusantova bhikkhu sodhetabbo.
tika-vin07t0:2108_13: Visabhāgasīmāsu pana sākhādimhi phusitvā ṭhite taṃ sākhādiṃ aphusantāpi sabbe bhikkhū sodhetabbā.
tika-vin07t0:2108_14: Aphusitvā ṭhite pana taṃ sākhādiṃ phusantova bhikkhu sodhetabboti niṭṭhamettha gantabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:2109_0: Yaṃ panettha keci “baddhasīmānaṃ dvinnaṃ aññamaññaṃ viya baddhasīmāgāmasīmānampi tadaññāsampi sabbāsaṃ
tika-vin07t0:2109_1: samānasaṃvāsakasīmānaṃ aññamaññaṃ rukkhādisambandhe sati tadubhayampi ekasīmaṃ viya sodhetvā ekattheva
tika-vin07t0:2109_6: sabhāgasīmānaṃ aññamaññaṃ sambhedadosābhāvassa visabhāgasīmānameva tabbhāvassa suttasuttānulomādivinayanayehi siddhattā.
tika-vin07t0:2109_9: sīmaṃ sammannitu”nti gāmasīmāyameva baddhasīmaṃ sammannituṃ anuññātaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:2109_12: Bandhanakāle pana anuññātassa sambandhassa anulomato pacchā sañjātarukkhādisambandhopi tāsaṃ vaṭṭati eva. “Yaṃ,
tika-vin07t0:2110_1: nadiādisīmāsu ca bandhituṃ paṭikkhepasiddhito ceva udakukkhepasattabbhantarasīmānaṃ nadiādīsu eva kātuṃ
tika-vin07t0:2110_2: niyamanasuttasāmatthiyena baddhasīmāgāmasīmādīsu karaṇapaṭikkhepasiddhito ca tāsaṃ aññamaññaṃ visabhāgatā,
tika-vin07t0:2110_4: pacchā ca rukkhādīhi sambhedādidosasambhavo ca vuttanayena suttasuttānulomato ca sijjhanti.
tika-vin07t0:2110_5: Teneva aṭṭhakathāyaṃ visabhāgasīmānameva vaṭarukkhādivacanehi sambandhadosaṃ dassetvā sabhāgānaṃ baddhasīmāgāmasīmādīnaṃ sambandhadoso na dassito,
