tika-vin07t0:2110_7: atha kho tāsaṃ sabhāgasīmānaṃ rukkhādisambandhepi dosābhāvo pāḷiaṭṭhakathāsu ñāpito eva.
tika-vin07t0:2110_8: Tathā hi pāḷiyaṃ “pabbatanimittaṃ pāsāṇanimittaṃ vananimittaṃ rukkhanimitta”ntiādinā vaḍḍhanakanimittāni anuññātāni.
tika-vin07t0:2110_9: Tena nesaṃ rukkhādīnaṃ nimittānaṃ vaḍḍhanepi baddhasīmāgāmasīmānaṃ saṅkaradosābhāvo ñāpitova hoti.
tika-vin07t0:2110_10: Dvinnaṃ pana baddhasīmānaṃ īdiso sambandho na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin07t0:2110_11: Vuttañhi “ekarukkhopi ca dvinnaṃ sīmānaṃ nimittaṃ hoti,
tika-vin07t0:2110_15: tiyojanaparamaṃ sīmaṃ sammannitu”nti vacanatopi cāyaṃ ñāpito.
tika-vin07t0:2110_16: Tiyojanaparamāya hi sīmāya samantā pariyantesu rukkhalatāgumbādīhi baddhasīmāgāmasīmānaṃ niyamena aññamaññaṃ
tika-vin07t0:2110_17: sambandhassa sambhavato “īdisaṃ sambandhanaṃ vināsetvāva sīmā sammannitabbā”ti aṭṭhakathāyampi na vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:2111_2: Vipattiparihāratthañhi ācariyā nirāsaṅkaṭṭhānesupi “bhittiṃ akittetvā”tiādinā siddhamevatthaṃ punappunaṃ avocuṃ.
tika-vin07t0:2111_4: vanaṃ na kittetabba”ntiādirukkhalatādīhi nirantare vanamajjhepi sīmābandhanameva avocuṃ.
tika-vin07t0:2111_5: Tathā thambhānaṃ upari katapāsādādīsu heṭṭhā thambhādīhi ekābaddhesu uparimatalādīsu sīmābandhanaṃ bahudhā vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:2111_6: Tasmā baddhasīmāgāmasīmānaṃ rukkhādisambandho tehi mukhatova vihito.
tika-vin07t0:2111_7: Apica gāmasīmānampi pāṭekkaṃ baddhasīmāsadisatāya ekissā gāmasīmāya kammaṃ karontehi dabbatiṇamattenāpi
tika-vin07t0:2111_8: sambandhā gāmantaraparamparā araññanadisamuddā ca sodhetabbāti sakaladīpaṃ sodhetvāva kātabbaṃ siyā.
tika-vin07t0:2111_9: Evaṃ pana asodhetvā paṭhamamahāsaṅgītikālato pabhuti katānaṃ upasampadādikammānaṃ,
tika-vin07t0:2111_10: sīmāsammutīnañca vipajjanato sabbesampi bhikkhūnaṃ anupasampannasaṅkāpasaṅgo ca dunnivāro hoti.
tika-vin07t0:2112_0: Mahāsīmāsodhanassa dukkaratāya khaṇḍasīmāyameva yebhuyyena saṅghakammakaraṇanti āha “sīmāmāḷake”tiādi.
tika-vin07t0:2112_1: Mahāsaṅghasannipāte pana khaṇḍasīmāya appahonakatāya mahāsīmāya kamme kariyamānepi ayaṃ nayo gahetabbova.
tika-vin07t0:2113_0: “Ukkhipāpetvā”ti iminā kāyapaṭibaddhenapi sīmaṃ phusanto sīmaṭṭhova hotīti dasseti.
tika-vin07t0:2113_2: Sīmaṭṭharukkhasākhāya nisinno sīmaṭṭhova hotīti āha “hatthapāsameva ānetabbo”ti.
tika-vin07t0:2113_3: Ettha ca rukkhasākhādīhi aññamaññaṃ sambandhāsu etāsu khandhasīmāyaṃ tayo bhikkhū,
tika-vin07t0:2113_4: mahāsīmāyaṃ dveti evaṃ dvīsu sīmāsu sīmantarikaṃ aphusitvā,
tika-vin07t0:2113_5: hatthapāsañca avijahitvā ṭhitehi pañcahi bhikkhūhi upasampadādikammaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭatīti keci vadanti.
tika-vin07t0:2113_6: Taṃ na yuttaṃ “nānāsīmāya ṭhitacatuttho kammaṃ kareyya, akammaṃ,
tika-vin07t0:2113_8: Tenevetthāpi mahāsīmaṃ sodhetvā māḷakasīmāyameva kammakaraṇaṃ vihitaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:2113_9: Aññathā bhinnasīmaṭṭhatāya tatraṭṭhassa gaṇapūrakattābhāvā kammakopova hotīti.
tika-vin07t0:2114_3: dinnassāpi chandassa anāgamanena mahāsīmaṭṭho kammaṃ kopetīti.
tika-vin07t0:2114_8: Na hi vinaye sabbattha yutti sakkā ñātuṃ buddhagocarattāti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:2114_9: Keci pana “sace dvepi sīmāyo pūretvā nirantaraṃ ṭhitesu bhikkhūsu kammaṃ karontesu ekissā eva sīmāya
tika-vin07t0:2114_10: gaṇo ca upasampadāpekkho ca anussāvako ca ekato tiṭṭhati,
tika-vin07t0:2114_12: Sace pana kammāraho vā anussāvako vā sīmantaraṭṭho hoti,
tika-vin07t0:2114_17: na tāsu visabhāgasīmāsu rukkhādisambandhe sati ekattha ṭhito itaraṭṭhānaṃ kammaṃ kopeti eva aṭṭhakathāyaṃ
tika-vin07t0:2115_0: Na otaratīti paṇavasaṇṭhānapabbatādīsu heṭṭhā pamāṇarahitaṭṭhānaṃ na otarati.
tika-vin07t0:2115_1: Kiñcāpi panettha bajjhamānakkhaṇe uddhampi pamāṇarahitaṃ pabbatādīni nārohati,
tika-vin07t0:2115_2: tathāpi taṃ pacchā sīmaṭṭhatāya sīmā hoti.
tika-vin07t0:2115_3: Heṭṭhā paṇavasaṇṭhānādi pana upari baddhāyapi sīmāya sīmāsaṅkhyaṃ na gacchati,
tika-vin07t0:2115_6: Yaṃ kiñcīti niṭṭhitasīmāya upari jātaṃ vijjamānaṃ pubbe ṭhitaṃ,
tika-vin07t0:2115_9: Antosīmāya hi hatthikkhandhādisaviññāṇakesu nisinnopi bhikkhu sīmaṭṭhova hoti.
tika-vin07t0:2115_11: Abaddhasīmāsupi sabbāsu ṭhitaṃ taṃ sīmāsaṅkhyameva gacchati.
tika-vin07t0:2116_2: Yaṃ pana “ito gata”nti vā “tato āgata”nti vā vattuṃ asakkuṇeyyaṃ ubhosu baddhasīmāgāmasīmāsu,
tika-vin07t0:2116_8: gāmasīmāya gāmasīmato uṭṭhitavaṭarukkhassa pārohe ca baddhasīmāya patiṭṭhitepi eseva nayo.
tika-vin07t0:2116_10: tato āgata”nti vattuṃ asakkuṇeyyato so bhāgo yathāpaviṭṭhasīmāsaṅkhyameva gacchati,
tika-vin07t0:2116_11: tesaṃ rukkhapārohānaṃ antarā pana ākāsaṭṭhasākhā bhūmiyaṃ sīmāparicchedappamāṇena tadubhayasīmā hotīti keci vadanti.
tika-vin07t0:2116_12: Yasmā panassa sākhāya pāroho paviṭṭhasīmāya pathaviyaṃ mūlehi patiṭṭhahitvāpi yāva sākhaṃ vinā ṭhātuṃ na sakkoti,
tika-vin07t0:2116_16: Tasmā sabbopi ākāsaṭṭhasākhābhāgo purimasīmaṭṭhataṃ na vijahati,
tika-vin07t0:2116_19: Tattha ca visabhāgasīmāya evaṃ paviṭṭhe sakalasīmāsodhanaṃ,
tika-vin07t0:2116_20: sabhāgāya paviṭṭhe phusitvā ṭhitamattabhikkhusodhanañca sabbaṃ pubbe vuttanayameva.
tika-vin07t0:2117_2: nadiyā ubhosu tīresu patiṭṭhamānā sīmā nadiajjhottharā nāma hotīti āha “nadiṃajjhottharamāna”nti.
tika-vin07t0:2117_5: sā ca tadā nadipārasīmā na hotīti āha “nadiyā lakkhaṇaṃ nadinimitte vuttanayamevā”ti.
tika-vin07t0:2117_7: Avassaṃ labbhaneyyā pana dhuvanāvāva hotīti sambandho.
tika-vin07t0:2117_8: “Na nāvāyā”ti iminā nāvaṃ vināpi sīmā baddhā subaddhā eva hoti,
tika-vin07t0:2118_2: “Sabbanimittānaṃ anto ṭhite bhikkhū hatthapāsagate katvā”ti idaṃ ubhinnaṃ tīrānaṃ ekagāmakhettabhāvaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:2121_0: 141. Samūhanitvāti vināsetvā, uddharitvāti attho. Idañca āpattiparihāratthaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:2122_0: 142. Yāni kānicīti idha nimittānaṃ sīmāya pāḷiyaṃ sarūpato avuttattā vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:2127_2: Evaṃ ajānantehipi antosīmāya ṭhatvā kammavācāya katāya sā sīmā samūhatāva hotīti āha “samūhanituñceva bandhituñca sakkhissantī”ti.
tika-vin07t0:2127_4: Idañca mahāsīmāya vijjamānāyapi kammakaraṇasukhatthaṃ khaṇḍasīmā icchitāti taṃ cetiyaṅgaṇādibahusannipātaṭṭhāne na bandhatīti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:2127_5: Tatthāpi sā baddhā subaddhā eva mahāsīmā viya.
tika-vin07t0:2127_6: “Paṭibandhituṃ pana na sakkhissantevā”ti idaṃ khaṇḍasīmāya asamūhatattā,
tika-vin07t0:2127_7: tassā avijjamānattassa ajānanato ca mahāsīmābandhanaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:2127_9: Sīmāsambhedaṃ katvāti khaṇḍasīmāya vijjamānapakkhe sīmāya sīmaṃ ajjhottharaṇasambhedaṃ katvā avijjamānapakkhepi
tika-vin07t0:2127_12: Pubbe hi cetiyaṅgaṇādinirāsaṅkaṭṭhāne kammaṃ kātuṃ sakkā,
tika-vin07t0:2127_14: Na samūhanitabbāti khaṇḍasīmaṃ ajānantehi na samūhanitabbā.
tika-vin07t0:2127_15: Ubhopi na jānantīti ubhinnaṃ padesaniyamaṃ vā tāsaṃ dvinnampi vā aññatarāya vā vijjamānataṃ vā avijjamānataṃ vā na jānanti,
tika-vin07t0:2127_18: na bandhituṃ sakkhissantī”ti idaṃ nirāsaṅkaṭṭhāne ṭhatvā samūhanituṃ sakkontopi mahāsīmaṃ paṭibandhituṃ na sakkontīti imamatthaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:2127_20: kammavācaṃ kātu”nti idaṃ sīmābandhanakammavācaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:2128_0: Keci pana “īdisesu vihāresu chapañcamatte bhikkhū gahetvā vihārakoṭito paṭṭhāya vihāraparikkhepassa anto
tika-vin07t0:2128_1: ca bahi ca samantā leḍḍupāte sabbattha mañcappamāṇe okāse nirantaraṃ ṭhatvā paṭhamaṃ avippavāsasīmaṃ,
tika-vin07t0:2128_2: tato samānasaṃvāsakasīmañca samūhananavasena sīmāya samugghāte kate tasmiṃ vihāre khaṇḍasīmāya,
tika-vin07t0:2128_3: mahāsīmāyapi vā vijjamānatte sati avassaṃ ekasmiṃ mañcaṭṭhāne tāsaṃ majjhagatā te bhikkhū tā samūhaneyyuṃ,
tika-vin07t0:2128_9: Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ ‘khaṇḍasīmaṃ pana jānantā avippavāsaṃ ajānantāpi samūhanituñceva bandhituñca sakkhissantī’ti
tika-vin07t0:2128_10: evaṃ mahāsīmāya paricchedassa ajānanepi samūhanassa vuttattā.
tika-vin07t0:2128_11: Gāmasīmāya eva ca avasiṭṭhāya tattha yathāruci duvidhampi sīmaṃ bandhituñceva upasampadādikammaṃ kātuñca vaṭṭatī”ti vadanti,
tika-vin07t0:2131_5: Sā ca gāmasīmā baddhasīmāvirahitaṭṭhāne sayameva samānasaṃvāsā hotīti dasseti.
tika-vin07t0:2131_6: Yā tassa vā gāmassa gāmasīmāti ettha gāmasīmāparicchedassa anto ca bahi ca khettavatthuaraññapabbatādikaṃ
tika-vin07t0:2131_9: Tasmā tassa sakalassa gāmakhettassa sambandhanīyā gāmasīmāti evamattho veditabbo.
tika-vin07t0:2131_10: Yo hi so antaragharakhettādīsu anekesu bhūmibhāgesu “gāmo”ti ekattena lokajanehi paññatto gāmavohāro,
tika-vin07t0:2131_13: Imināva nayena upari araññaṃ nadī samuddo jātassaroti evaṃ tesu bhūmippadesesu ekattena lokajanapaññattānameva
tika-vin07t0:2131_15: Loke pana gāmasīmādivohāro gāmādīnaṃ mariyādāyameva vattuṃ vaṭṭati,
tika-vin07t0:2131_17: Sāsane pana te gāmādayo itaranivattiatthena sayameva attano mariyādāti katvā gāmo eva gāmasīmā,
tika-vin07t0:2131_19: samuddo eva samuddasīmāti sīmāvohārena vuttāti veditabbā.
tika-vin07t0:2132_0: “Nigamassa vā”ti idaṃ gāmasīmappabhedaṃ sabbaṃ upalakkhaṇavasena dassetuṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:2132_3: “ayaṃ gāmo ettako karīsabhāgo”tiādinā pana rājapaṇṇesu āropitesu bhūmibhāgesu yasmiṃ yasmiṃ taḷākamātikāsusānapabbatādike padese baliṃ na gaṇhanti,
tika-vin07t0:2132_5: Rājādīhi paricchinnabhūmibhāgo hi sabbova ṭhapetvā nadiloṇijātassare gāmasīmāti veditabbo.
tika-vin07t0:2132_7: Sace pana tattha rājā kañci padesaṃ gāmantarena yojeti,
tika-vin07t0:2132_9: nadijātassaresu vināsetvā taḷākādibhāvaṃ vā pūretvā khettādibhāvaṃ vā pāpitesupi eseva nayo.
tika-vin07t0:2133_0: Ye pana gāmā rājacorādibhayapīḷitehi manussehi chaḍḍitā cirampi nimmanussā tiṭṭhanti,
tika-vin07t0:2133_3: Tesu hi rājāno samantagāmavāsīhi kasāpetvā vā yehi kehici kasitaṭṭhānaṃ likhitvā vā baliṃ gaṇhanti,
tika-vin07t0:2133_4: aññena vā gāmena ekībhāvaṃ vā upanenti.
tika-vin07t0:2133_5: Ye pana gāmā rājūhipi pariccattā gāmakhettānantarikā mahāraññena ekībhūtā,
tika-vin07t0:2133_8: Rājāno pana ekasmiṃ araññādippadese mahantaṃ gāmaṃ katvā anekasahassāni kulāni vāsāpetvā tattha vāsīnaṃ
tika-vin07t0:2133_14: Sā ca itarā cātiādi “samānasaṃvāsā ekūposathā”ti pāḷipadassa adhippāyavivaraṇaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:2133_15: Tattha hi sā ca rājicchāvasena parivattitvā samuppannā abhinavā,
tika-vin07t0:2133_17: yathā baddhasīmāya sabbaṃ saṅghakammaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭati,
tika-vin07t0:2133_20: Sāmaññato “baddhasīmāsadisā”ti vutte ticīvarāvippavāsasīmaṃ baddhasīmaṃ eva maññantīti taṃsadisatānivattanamukhena
tika-vin07t0:2133_21: upari sattabbhantarasīmāya taṃsadisatāpi atthīti dassananayassa idheva pasaṅgaṃ dassetuṃ “kevala”ntiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:2134_0: Viñjhāṭavisadise araññeti yattha “asukagāmassa idaṃ khetta”nti gāmavohāro natthi,
tika-vin07t0:2134_1: yattha ca na kasanti na vapanti,
tika-vin07t0:2134_3: Macchabandhānaṃ agamanapathā nimmanussāvāsā samuddantaradīpakāpi ettheva saṅgayhanti.
tika-vin07t0:2134_6: Sā ca sattabbhantarasīmaṃ vināva sayameva samānasaṃvāsā baddhasīmāsadisā.
tika-vin07t0:2134_7: Nadiādisīmāsu viya sabbamettha saṅghakammaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin07t0:2134_8: Nadisamuddajātassarānaṃ tāva aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “attano sabhāveneva baddhasīmāsadisā”tiādinā vuttattā sīmatā siddhā.
tika-vin07t0:2134_11: Yathā hi gāmasīmāya vaggakammaparihāratthaṃ bahū baddhasīmāyo anuññātā,
tika-vin07t0:2134_12: tāsañca dvinnamantarā aññamaññaṃ asambhedatthaṃ sīmantarikā anuññātā,
tika-vin07t0:2134_14: Tāsañca dvinnaṃ antarā sīmantarikāya pāḷiaṭṭhakathāsupi vidhānasāmatthiyato araññassapi sabhāveneva nadiādīnaṃ
tika-vin07t0:2134_15: viya sīmābhāvo tattha vaggakammaparihāratthameva sattabbhantarasīmāya anuññātattāva siddhoti veditabbo.
tika-vin07t0:2134_16: Tattha sīmāyameva hi ṭhitā sīmaṭṭhānaṃ vaggakammaṃ karonti,
tika-vin07t0:2134_17: na asīmāyaṃ ākāse ṭhitā viya ākāsaṭṭhānaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:2134_20: nadī asīmā”tiādinā paṭikkhittabaddhasīmānampi nadisamuddajātassarānaṃ attano sabhāveneva sīmābhāvo aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttoti gahetabbo.
tika-vin07t0:2135_2: tassa ṭhitokāsassa bāhirantato paṭṭhāya bhikkhūnaṃ vaggakammaparihāratthaṃ sīmāpekkhāya uppannāya tāya
tika-vin07t0:2135_3: saha sayameva sañjātā sattabbhantarasīmā samānasaṃvāsāti adhippāyo.
tika-vin07t0:2135_4: Yattha pana khuddake araññe mahantehi bhikkhūhi paripuṇṇatāya vaggakammasaṅkābhāvena sattabbhantarasīmāpekkhā natthi,
tika-vin07t0:2135_10: pabhavato paṭṭhāya yāva mukhadvārā sabbattha saṅgho nisīdati,
tika-vin07t0:2135_12: Iminā eva ca vacanena vaggakammaparihāratthaṃ sīmāpekkhāya sati eva udakukkhepasattabbhantarasīmā uppajjanti,
tika-vin07t0:2136_0: Keci pana “samantā abbhantaraṃ minitvā paricchedakaraṇeneva sīmā sañjāyati,
tika-vin07t0:2136_4: abaddhasīmā ca na siyā bhikkhūnaṃ kiriyāpakārasiddhito.
tika-vin07t0:2136_7: vinaye īdisaṃ hatthappamāṇanti avuttattā ca yena kenaci minite ca bhagavatā anuññātena nu kho hatthena minitaṃ,
tika-vin07t0:2136_8: na nu khoti sīmāya vipattisaṅkā bhaveyya.
tika-vin07t0:2136_9: Minantehi ca aṇumattampi ūnamadhikaṃ akatvā minituṃ asakkuṇeyyatāya vipatti eva siyā.
tika-vin07t0:2136_10: Parisavasena cāyaṃ vaḍḍhamānā tesaṃ minanena vaḍḍhati vā hāyati vā.
tika-vin07t0:2136_11: Saṅghe ca kammaṃ katvā gate ayaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ payogena samuppannasīmā tesaṃ payogena vigacchati na vigacchati ca.
tika-vin07t0:2136_12: Kathaṃ baddhasīmā viya yāva sāsanantaradhānā na tiṭṭheyya,
tika-vin07t0:2136_13: ṭhitiyā ca purāṇavihāresu viya sakalepi araññe kathaṃ sīmāsambhedasaṅkā na bhaveyya.
tika-vin07t0:2137_1: Tathā sabbathāmena khipanaṃ ubhayatthāpi ca yassaṃ disāyaṃ sattabbhantarassa,
tika-vin07t0:2137_5: Gāmakhettādīsu pavisanato akhette sīmā paviṭṭhā nāmāti sīmā vipajjeyya.
tika-vin07t0:2137_9: tattha attano khettappamāṇeneva jāyanti, na bahi.
tika-vin07t0:2137_12: taṃ sañjātasīmānaṃ ṭhitaṭṭhānassa paricchedanatthaṃ kataṃ gāmūpacāragharūpacārajānanatthaṃ leḍḍusuppādikhipanavidhānadassanaṃ viya.
tika-vin07t0:2137_13: Teneva mātikāṭṭhakathāyaṃ “sīmaṃ vā sammannati udakukkhepaṃ vā paricchindatī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:2137_14: Evaṃ katepi tassa paricchedassa yāthāvato ñātuṃ asakkuṇeyyattena puthulato ñatvā anto tiṭṭhantehi nirāsaṅkaṭṭhāne ṭhātabbaṃ,
tika-vin07t0:2137_15: aññaṃ bahi karontehi atidūre nirāsaṅkaṭṭhāne pesetabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:2138_1: maggagamananahānādiatthehi ekabhikkhusmimpi araññe vā nadiādīsu vā paviṭṭhe taṃ parikkhipitvā sattabbhantaraudakukkhepasīmā
tika-vin07t0:2138_4: Teneva cettha dvinnaṃ saṅghānaṃ visuṃ kammaṃ karontānaṃ sīmādvayassa antarā sīmantarikā aññaṃ sattabbhantaraṃ,
tika-vin07t0:2138_6: sīmāpariyante hi kenaci kammena pesitassa bhikkhuno samantā sañjātasīmā itaresaṃ sīmāya phusitvā sīmāsambhedaṃ kareyya,
tika-vin07t0:2138_9: Apica sīmantarikāya ṭhitassāpi ubhayattha kammakopavacanatopi cetaṃ sijjhati.
tika-vin07t0:2138_10: Tampi parikkhipitvā sayameva sañjātāya sīmāya ubhinnampi sīmānaṃ,
tika-vin07t0:2138_13: Vuttañhi mātikāṭṭhakathāyaṃ ‘paricchedabbhantare hatthapāsaṃ vijahitvā ṭhitopi paricchedato bahi aññaṃ
tika-vin07t0:2138_14: tattakaṃyeva paricchedaṃ anatikkamitvā ṭhitopi kammaṃ kopetī’ti.
tika-vin07t0:2138_15: Kiñca agāmakāraññe ṭhitassa kammakaraṇicchāvirahitassāpi bhikkhuno sattabbhantaraparicchinne ajjhokāse cīvaravippavāso bhagavatā anuññāto,
tika-vin07t0:2138_19: Tasmā kammakaraṇicchaṃ vināpi vuttanayena samuppatti gahetabbā”ti vadanti,
tika-vin07t0:2138_20: taṃ na yuttaṃ padīpassa pabhā viya sabbapuggalānampi paccekaṃ sīmāsambhavena saṅghe,
tika-vin07t0:2138_21: gaṇe vā kammaṃ karonte tatraṭṭhānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ samantā paccekaṃ samuppannānaṃ anekasīmānaṃ aññamaññaṃ saṅkaradosappasaṅgato.
tika-vin07t0:2138_25: gatānaṃ samantā ṭhitasīmāpi vināso ca bhaveyya.
tika-vin07t0:2139_1: ayaṃ tattha samānasaṃvāsā”tiādinā ekā eva sattabbhantarā,
tika-vin07t0:2139_4: kāraṇasāmatthiyena vā pabhā viya padīpassa uppajjati.
tika-vin07t0:2139_6: bhagavā ca imāyo anujānanto bhikkhūnaṃ vaggakammaparihārena kammakaraṇasukhatthameva anuññāsīti kathaṃ
tika-vin07t0:2139_7: nahānādikiccena paviṭṭhānampi samantā tāsaṃ sīmānaṃ samuppatti payojanābhāvā?
tika-vin07t0:2139_8: Payojane ca ekaṃ eva payojananti kathaṃ paccekaṃ bhikkhugaṇanāya anekasīmāsamuppatti?
tika-vin07t0:2139_10: Yaṃ pana dvinnaṃ sīmānaṃ antarā tattakaparicchedeneva sīmantarikaṭṭhapanavacanaṃ,
tika-vin07t0:2139_12: tampi imāsaṃ sīmānaṃ paricchedassa dubbodhatāya sīmāya sambhedasaṅkaṃ,
tika-vin07t0:2140_0: Yo ca cīvarāvippavāsatthaṃ bhagavatā abbhokāse dassito sattabbhantaraparicchedo,
tika-vin07t0:2140_3: Tattha ca bahūsu bhikkhūsu ekato ṭhitesu tesaṃ visuṃ visuṃ attano ṭhitaṭṭhānato paṭṭhāya samantā sattabbhantaraparicchedabbhantare
tika-vin07t0:2140_6: Parisapariyantato paṭṭhāya hi abbhantare gayhamāne abbhantarapariyosāne ṭhapitacīvaraṃ majjhe ṭhitassa
tika-vin07t0:2140_7: abbhantarato bahi hotīti taṃ aruṇuggamane nissaggiyaṃ siyā.
tika-vin07t0:2140_10: na pana yāva sīmāparicchedaṃ labbhamānattā mahāsīmāya avippavāsasīmāvohāro viya.
tika-vin07t0:2140_11: Mahāsīmāyampi hi gāmagāmūpacāresu cīvaraṃ nissaggiyaṃ hoti.
tika-vin07t0:2140_12: Idhāpi majjhe ṭhitassa sīmāpariyante nissaggiyaṃ hoti.
tika-vin07t0:2140_14: tabbigamena vināso ca gahetabbāti amhākaṃ khanti.
tika-vin07t0:2140_16: Añño vā pakāro ito yuttataro gavesitabbo.
tika-vin07t0:2141_0: Idha pana “araññe samantā sattabbhantarā”ti evaṃ pāḷiyaṃ viñjhāṭavisadise araññe samantā sattabbhantarāti
tika-vin07t0:2141_1: aṭṭhakathāyañca rukkhādinirantarepi araññe sattabbhantarasīmāya vihitattā attano nissayabhūtāya araññasīmāya
tika-vin07t0:2141_2: saha etassā rukkhādisambandhe dosābhāvo pageva agāmake rukkheti nissitepi padese cīvaravippavāsassa rukkhaparihāraṃ
tika-vin07t0:2142_1: Ūnakaṃ pana na vaṭṭati eva sattabbhantaraparicchedassa dubbijānattā.
tika-vin07t0:2142_2: Tasmā saṅghaṃ vinā ekenāpi bhikkhunā bahi tiṭṭhantena aññaṃ sattabbhantaraṃ atikkamitvā atidūre eva ṭhātabbaṃ,
tika-vin07t0:2142_6: Idañcettha sīmantarikavidhānaṃ dvinnaṃ baddhasīmānaṃ sīmantarikānujānanasuttānulomato siddhanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:2142_8: ekasabhāgānañca dvinnaṃ baddhasīmānameva aññamaññaṃ sambhedajjhottharaṇadosaparihārāya sīmantarikā anuññātā,
tika-vin07t0:2142_9: tathāpi tadanulomato ekaaraññasīmānadiādisīmañca nissitānaṃ ekasabhāgānaṃ dvinnaṃ sattabbhantarasīmānampi
tika-vin07t0:2142_11: sīmantarikaṃ vinā abyavadhānena ṭhānañca bhagavatā anabhimatamevāti ñatvā aṭṭhakathācariyā idhāpi sīmantarikavidhānamakaṃsu.
tika-vin07t0:2142_13: ekasabhāgattañcāti dvīhaṅgehi samannāgate sati ekaṃ sīmantarikaṃ vinā ṭhānaṃ sambhedāya hoti,
tika-vin07t0:2142_15: Sīmantarikavidhānasāmatthiyeneva cetāsaṃ rukkhādisambandhopi baddhasīmānaṃ viya aññamaññaṃ na vaṭṭatīti ayampi nayato dassito evāti gahetabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:2143_1: Sabbamettha saṅghakammaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭatīti samānasaṃvāsā ekūposathāti dasseti.
tika-vin07t0:2143_3: Mahoghena pana unnataṭṭhānato ninnaṭṭhāne patantena khato khuddako vā mahanto vā lakkhaṇayutto jātassarova.
tika-vin07t0:2143_5: samudde pana sabbathā udakukkhepasīmāyameva kammaṃ kātabbaṃ sodhetuṃ dukkarattā.
tika-vin07t0:2144_0: Puna tatthāti lokavohārasiddhāsu etāsu nadiādīsu tīsu abaddhasīmāsu puna vaggakammaparihāratthaṃ sāsanavohārasiddhāya
tika-vin07t0:2144_2: Pāḷiyaṃ yaṃ majjhimassa purisassātiādīsu udakaṃ ukkhipitvā khipīyati etthāti udakukkhepo,
tika-vin07t0:2144_6: parisapariyantato paṭṭhāya samantā yāva majjhimassa purisassa udakukkhepo udakapatanaṭṭhānaṃ,
tika-vin07t0:2144_8: ayaṃ tattha nadiādīsu aparā samānasaṃvāsā udakukkhepasīmāti.
tika-vin07t0:2145_0: Tassa antoti tassa udakukkhepaparicchinnassa ṭhānassa anto.
tika-vin07t0:2145_3: ekassa udakukkhepassa anto ṭhātuṃ na vaṭṭatīti vacanaṃ udakukkhepaparicchedassa dubbijānato kammakopasaṅkā hotīti.
tika-vin07t0:2145_4: Teneva mātikāṭṭhakathāyaṃ “paricchedabbhantare hatthapāsaṃ vijahitvā ṭhitopi paricchedato bahi aññaṃ
tika-vin07t0:2145_5: tattakaṃyeva paricchedaṃ anatikkamitvā ṭhitopi kammaṃ kopeti idaṃ sabbaaṭṭhakathāsu sanniṭṭhāna”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:2145_6: Yaṃ panettha sāratthadīpaniyaṃ “tassa anto hatthapāsaṃ vijahitvā ṭhito kammaṃ kopetīti iminā bahiparicchedato
tika-vin07t0:2145_7: yattha katthaci ṭhito kammaṃ na kopetī”ti vatvā mātikāṭṭhakathāvacanampi paṭikkhipitvā “neva pāḷiyaṃ
tika-vin07t0:2145_9: taṃ na sundaraṃ idha aṭṭhakathāvacanena mātikāṭṭhakathāvacanassa nayato saṃsandanato saṅghaṭanato.
tika-vin07t0:2145_10: Tathā hi dvinnaṃ udakukkhepaparicchedānamantarā vidatthicaturaṅgulamattampi sīmantarikaṃ aṭṭhapetvā “añño udakukkhepo sīmantarikāya ṭhapetabbo,
tika-vin07t0:2145_12: ūnakaṃ pana na vaṭṭatī”ti evaṃ idheva vuttena iminā aṭṭhakathāvacanena sīmantarikopacārena udakukkhepato
tika-vin07t0:2145_13: ūnake ṭhapite sīmāya sīmāsambhedato kammakopopi vutto eva.
tika-vin07t0:2145_15: tadaggena tattha ekabhikkhuno pavesepi sati tassa sīmaṭṭhabhāvato kammakopo vutto eva hoti.
tika-vin07t0:2145_16: Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “ūnakaṃ pana na vaṭṭatī”ti kathanañcetaṃ udakukkhepaparicchedassa dubbijānantenapi sīmāsambhedasaṅkaāparihāratthaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:2145_19: Kammakopasaṅkaṭṭhānampi ācariyā dūrato parihāratthaṃ kammakopaṭṭhānanti vatvāva ṭhapesunti gahetabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:2146_1: “Sīghameva atikkāmetī”ti iminā taṃ anatikkamitvā anto eva parivattamānāya kātuṃ vaṭṭatīti dasseti.
tika-vin07t0:2146_6: Antonadiyaṃ jātarukkhe vāti udakukkhepaparicchedassa bahi ṭhite rukkhepi vā.
tika-vin07t0:2146_9: Teneva “bahinaditīre vihārasīmāya vā”tiādinā tīrameva abandhitabbaṭṭhānattena dassitaṃ,
tika-vin07t0:2146_12: Na hi bahiudakukkhepe bhikkhūnaṃ ṭhātuṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin07t0:2147_1: Sīmaṃ vā sodhetvāti yathāvuttaṃ vihāre baddhasīmaṃ,
tika-vin07t0:2147_5: gāmasīmāyaṃ vā kammaṃ karontehipi udakukkhepasīmaṭṭhe sodhetvāva kātabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:2147_7: imāya ca saddhiṃ tāsaṃ rukkhādisambandhadosopi nayato dassitova hoti.
tika-vin07t0:2147_10: Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ panetaṃ sabbaṃ vuttanayato sakkā ñātunti aññamaññasamāsannānamevettha dassitaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:2148_1: yathā hi baddhasīmāyaṃ sammatā vipattisīmā hotīti tāsaṃ aññamaññaṃ rukkhādisambandho na vaṭṭati,
tika-vin07t0:2148_2: evaṃ nadiādīsu sammatāpi baddhasīmā vipattisīmāva hotīti tāhipi saddhiṃ tassā rukkhādisambandho na vaṭṭatīti sijjhati.
tika-vin07t0:2148_4: udakukkhepasīmāya ca araññādīhi saddhiṃ rukkhādisambandhassa na vaṭṭanakabhāvo ñātabbo,
tika-vin07t0:2148_5: evametā bhagavatā anuññātā baddhasīmā sattabbhantaraudakukkhepasīmā aññamaññañceva attano nissayavirahitāhi
tika-vin07t0:2148_6: itarītarāsaṃ nissayasīmāhi ca rukkhādisambandhe sati sambhedadosamāpajjatīti suttānulomanayo ñātabbova.
tika-vin07t0:2149_0: Attano attano pana nissayabhūtagāmādīhi saddhiṃ baddhasīmādīnaṃ tissannaṃ uppattikāle bhagavatā anuññātassa
tika-vin07t0:2149_1: sambhedajjhottharaṇassa anulomato rukkhādisambandhopi anuññātova hotīti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:2149_2: Yadi evaṃ udakukkhepabaddhasīmādīnaṃ antarā kasmā sīmantarikā na vihitāti?
tika-vin07t0:2149_4: Ekanissayaekasabhāvānameva hi sīmantarikāya vināsaṃ karotīti vuttovāyamattho.
tika-vin07t0:2149_5: Eteneva nadinimittaṃ katvā baddhāya sīmāya saṅghe kammaṃ karonte nadiyampi yāva gāmakhettaṃ āhacca ṭhitāya
tika-vin07t0:2149_6: udakukkhepasīmāya aññesaṃ kammaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭatīti siddhaṃ hoti.
tika-vin07t0:2149_11: nadiādīhi ca rukkhādisambandhamattena sambhinnāti loke voharanti.
tika-vin07t0:2149_12: Lokavohārasiddhānañca lokavohāratova sambhedo vā asambhedo vā gahetabbo, nāññato.
tika-vin07t0:2149_13: Teneva aṭṭhakathāyaṃ tāsaṃ aññamaññaṃ katthacipi sambhedanayo na dassito,
tika-vin07t0:2150_0: Ettha pana baddhasīmāya tāva “heṭṭhā pathavīsandhārakaṃ udakapariyantaṃ katvā sīmāgatā hotī”tiādinā adhobhāgaparicchedo
tika-vin07t0:2150_4: Keci tāvettha “gāmasīmādayopi baddhasīmā viya pathavīsandhārakaṃ udakaṃ āhacca tiṭṭhatī”ti vadanti.
tika-vin07t0:2151_4: Sace pana udakoghādinā yojanappamāṇampi ninnaṭṭhānaṃ hoti,
tika-vin07t0:2151_8: iddhiyā vā paviṭṭho bhikkhu nadiyaṃ ṭhitānaṃ kammaṃ na kopeti.
tika-vin07t0:2151_9: So pana āsannagāme bhikkhūnaṃ kammaṃ kopeti.
tika-vin07t0:2151_10: Sace pana so ubhinnaṃ tīragāmānaṃ majjhe nisinno hoti,
tika-vin07t0:2151_12: Sace pana tīraṃ gāmakhettaṃ na hoti,
tika-vin07t0:2151_14: Tattha pana tīradvayepi sattabbhantarasīmaṃ vinā kevalāya khuddakāraññasīmāya kammaṃ karontānaṃ kammaṃ kopeti.
tika-vin07t0:2151_16: tadā yadi tesaṃ sattabbhantarasīmāya paricchedo etassa nisinnokāsassa parato ekaṃ sattabbhantaraṃ atikkamitvā ṭhito na kammakopo. No ce,
tika-vin07t0:2151_18: Gāmasīmāyaṃ pana antoumaṅge vā bile vā yattha pavisituṃ sakkā,
tika-vin07t0:2151_22: tattha iddhiyā anto nisinnopi kammaṃ kopeti.
tika-vin07t0:2151_31: Na hi tattha paviṭṭhaṃ araññaṃ paviṭṭho ti voharanti.
tika-vin07t0:2151_32: Tasmā tatraṭṭho upari araññaṭṭhānaṃ kammaṃ na kopeti umaṅganadiyaṃ ṭhito viya uparinadiyaṃ ṭhitānaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:2151_33: Ekasmiñhi cakkavāḷe gāmanadisamuddajātassare muñcitvā tadavasesaṃ amanussāvāsaṃ devabrahmalokaṃ upādāya sabbaṃ araññameva.
tika-vin07t0:2151_34: ‘Gāmā vā araññā vā’ti vuttattā hi nadisamuddajātassarādipi araññameva.
tika-vin07t0:2151_35: Idha pana nadiādīnaṃ visuṃ sīmābhāvena gahitattā tadavasesameva araññaṃ gahetabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:2151_36: Tattha ca yattake padese ekaṃ ‘arañña’nti voharanti,
tika-vin07t0:2151_40: Ākāsaṭṭhadevabrahmavimānāni pana samantā ākāsaparicchinnāni paccekaṃ araññasīmā samuddamajjhe pabbatadīpakā viya.
tika-vin07t0:2151_43: Tasmā idhāpi upariaraññatalena saddhiṃ heṭṭhāpathaviyā araññavohārābhāvā visuṃ araññasīmāti gahetabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:2151_44: Tenevettha gāmanadiādisīmākathāya aṭṭhakathāyaṃ ‘iddhimā bhikkhu heṭṭhāpathavitale ṭhito kammaṃ kopetī’ti
tika-vin07t0:2152_0: Idañcetāsaṃ gāmasīmādīnaṃ heṭṭhāpamāṇadassanaṃ suttādivirodhābhāvā yuttaṃ viya dissati.
tika-vin07t0:2152_2: Evaṃ gahaṇe ca gāmasīmāyaṃ sammatā baddhasīmā upari gāmasīmaṃ,
tika-vin07t0:2152_3: heṭṭhā udakapariyantaṃ araññasīmañca avattharatīti tassā araññasīmāpi khettanti sijjhati.
tika-vin07t0:2152_6: nadī asīmā”tiādinā nadisamuddajātassarā baddhasīmāya akhettabhāvena vuttā,
tika-vin07t0:2152_9: Yadi evaṃ kasmā tattha sā na bajjhatīti?
tika-vin07t0:2152_12: Tassā ca upari sammatāya baddhasīmāya sambhedajjhottharaṇānulomato vipattisīmā eva siyā.
tika-vin07t0:2152_13: Gāmakhette pana ṭhatvā agāmakāraññekadesampi antokaritvā sammatā kiñcāpi susammatā,
tika-vin07t0:2152_15: Tattha pana kammaṃ kātuṃ paviṭṭhānampi tato bahi kevalāraññe karontānampi antarā tīṇi sattabbhantarāni ṭhapetabbāni,
tika-vin07t0:2152_16: aññathā vipatti eva siyāti sabbathā niratthakameva agāmakāraññe baddhasīmākaraṇanti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:2153_0: Antonadiyaṃ paviṭṭhasākhāyāti nadiyā pathavitalaṃ āhacca ṭhitāya sākhāyapi,
tika-vin07t0:2153_3: Etena sabhāgaṃ nadisīmaṃ phusitvā ṭhitenapi visabhāgasīmāsambandhasākhādinā udakukkhepasīmāya sambandho na vaṭṭatīti dasseti.
tika-vin07t0:2153_5: gāmasīmañca phusitvā ṭhitena sākhādinā māḷakasīmāya sambandho na vaṭṭatīti ñāpitoti daṭṭhabbo.
tika-vin07t0:2154_1: Tena udakukkhepaparicchedato bahi nadiyaṃ patiṭṭhitattepi sambhedābhāvaṃ dasseti.
tika-vin07t0:2154_3: Yadi hi udakukkhepato bahi antonadiyampi patiṭṭhitatte sambhedo bhaveyya,
tika-vin07t0:2154_6: Tasmā sabbattha attano nissayasīmāya sambhedadoso natthevāti gahetabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:2155_4: heṭṭhā nadiṃ āvaritvā pāḷi baddhāti attho.
tika-vin07t0:2155_6: “Nadiṃ ottharitvā sandanaṭṭhānato”ti iminā taḷākanadīnaṃ antarā pavattanaṭṭhāne na vaṭṭatīti dasseti.
tika-vin07t0:2156_1: Araññasīmāsaṅkhyameva gacchatīti lokavohārasiddhaṃ agāmakāraññasīmaṃ sandhāya vadati.
tika-vin07t0:2158_1: Sambhindantīti yattha catūhi bhikkhūhi nisīdituṃ na sakkā,
tika-vin07t0:2158_2: tattakato paṭṭhāya yāva kesaggamattampi antosīmāya karonto sambhindati.
tika-vin07t0:2158_3: Catunnaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ pahonakato paṭṭhāya yāva sakalampi anto karonto ajjhottharantīti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:2158_6: Sākhāya sākhaṃ phusantā hi dūraṭṭhāpi siyyuṃ,
tika-vin07t0:2158_7: tato ekaṃsato sambhedalakkhaṇaṃ dassitaṃ na siyāti taṃ dassetuṃ viṭapaggahaṇaṃ kataṃ.
tika-vin07t0:2158_8: Evañhi bhikkhūnaṃ nisīdituṃ appahonakaṭṭhānaṃ attano sīmāya antosīmaṭṭhaṃ karitvā purāṇavihāraṃ karonto sīmāya sīmaṃ sambhindati nāma,
tika-vin07t0:2158_11: Ambanti aparena samayena purāṇavihāraparikkhepādīnaṃ vinaṭṭhattā ajānantānaṃ taṃ purāṇasīmāya nimittabhūtaṃ ambaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:2158_12: Attano sīmāya antosīmaṭṭhaṃ karitvā purāṇavihārasīmaṭṭhaṃ jambuṃ kittetvā ambajambūnaṃ antare yaṃ ṭhānaṃ,
tika-vin07t0:2158_13: taṃ attano sīmāya pavesetvā bandhantīti attho.
tika-vin07t0:2158_14: Ettha ca purāṇasīmāya nimittabhūtassa gāmaṭṭhassa ambarukkhassa antosīmaṭṭhāya jambuyā saha saṃsaṭṭhaviṭapattepi
tika-vin07t0:2158_15: sīmāya bandhanakāle vipatti vā pacchā gāmasīmāya saha sambhedo vā kammavipatti vā na hotīti mukhatova
tika-vin07t0:2159_1: “Sīmantarikaṃ ṭhapetvā”tiādinā sambhedajjhottharaṇaṃ akatvā baddhasīmāhi aññamaññaṃ phusāpetvā abyavadhānena baddhāpi sīmā asīmā evāti dasseti.
tika-vin07t0:2159_3: Sā pana dubbodhāti aṭṭhakathāsu caturaṅgulādikā vuttāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:2159_5: Nimittaṃ hotīti nimittassa sīmato bāhirattā bandhanakāle tāva sambhedadoso natthīti adhippāyo.
tika-vin07t0:2159_6: Na kevalañca nimittakattā eva saṅkaraṃ karoti,
tika-vin07t0:2159_7: atha kho sīmantarikāya ṭhito aññopi rukkho karoti eva.
tika-vin07t0:2159_8: Tasmā appamattikāya sīmantarikāya vaḍḍhanakā rukkhādayo na vaṭṭanti eva.
tika-vin07t0:2159_9: Ettha ca upari dissamānakhandhasākhādipavese eva saṅkaradosassa sabbattha dassitattā adissamānānaṃ mūlānaṃ
tika-vin07t0:2159_14: Yadi pana bandhanakāle eva eko thūlarukkho ubhayampi sīmaṃ āhacca tiṭṭhati,
tika-vin07t0:2160_1: Yaṃ pana sāratthadīpaniyaṃ vuttaṃ “sīmāsaṅkaraṃ karotīti vaḍḍhitvā sīmappadesaṃ paviṭṭhe dvinnaṃ sīmānaṃ gataṭṭhānassa duviññeyyattā vutta”nti,
tika-vin07t0:2160_2: taṃ na yuttaṃ gāmasīmāyapi saha saṅkaraṃ karotīti vattabbato.
tika-vin07t0:2160_3: Tatthāpi hi nimitte vaḍḍhite gāmasīmābaddhasīmānaṃ gataṭṭhānaṃ dubbiññeyyameva hoti,
tika-vin07t0:2160_4: tattha pana avatvā dvinnaṃ baddhasīmānameva saṅkarassa vuttattā yathāvuttasambaddhadosova saṅkara-
tika-vin07t0:2160_9: tesaṃ taṃ kammaṃ adhammika”ntiādinā pacchā sammatāya asīmatte vuttepi dvīsu gāmasīmāsu ṭhatvā dvīhi saṅghehi
tika-vin07t0:2160_10: sambhedaṃ vā ajjhottharaṇaṃ vā katvā sīmantarikaṃ aṭṭhapetvā vā rukkhapārohādisambandhaṃ aviyojetvā vā
tika-vin07t0:2160_11: ekasmiṃ khaṇe kammavācāniṭṭhāpanavasena ekato sammatānaṃ dvinnaṃ sīmānampi asīmatā pakāsitāti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:2163_1: Adhammena vagganti ettha ekasīmāya catūsu bhikkhūsu vijjamānesu pātimokkhuddesova anuññāto, tīsu,
tika-vin07t0:2163_4: Yasmā pana chandapārisuddhi saṅghe eva āgacchati, na gaṇe,
tika-vin07t0:2164_0: Sace pana dve saṅghā ekasīmāya aññamaññaṃ chandaṃ āharitvā ekasmiṃ khaṇe visuṃ saṅghakammaṃ karonti,
tika-vin07t0:2164_4: Kammaṃ karontānañhi chandapārisuddhi aññattha na gacchati tathā vacanābhāvā,
tika-vin07t0:2164_5: visuṃ visuṃ kammakaraṇatthameva sīmāya anuññātattā cāti gahetabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:2164_6: Vihārasīmāyaṃ pana saṅghe vijjamānepi kenaci paccayena khandhasīmāyaṃ tīsu,
tika-vin07t0:2164_7: dvīsu vā pārisuddhiuposathaṃ karontesu kammaṃ dhammena samaggameva bhinnasīmaṭṭhattāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:2167_2: Sutā kho panāyasmantehīti ettha “evametaṃ dhārayāmī”ti vatvā “uddiṭṭhaṃ kho āyasmanto nidānaṃ,
tika-vin07t0:2167_3: sutā kho panāyasmantehi cattāro pārājikā dhammā”tiādinā vattabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:2168_2: Nidānuddese aniṭṭhite pātimokkhaṃ niddiṭṭhaṃ nāma na hotīti āha “dutiyādīsu uddesesū”tiādi.
tika-vin07t0:2168_4: Ettha ca atthaṃ bhaṇitukāmatāya vā bhaṇāpetukāmatāya vā suttassa osāraṇaṃ osāraṇaṃ nāma.
tika-vin07t0:2168_6: Kevalaṃ pāṭhasseva sarena bhaṇanaṃ sarabhaññaṃ nāma.
tika-vin07t0:2168_8: Osāretvā pana kathentenāti sayameva pāṭhaṃ vatvā pacchā atthaṃ kathentena.
tika-vin07t0:2176_1: Viññāpetīti ettha manasā cintetvā kāyavikārakaraṇameva viññāpananti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:2176_2: Pāḷiyaṃ aññassa dātabbā pārisuddhīti pārisuddhidāyakena puna aññassa bhikkhuno santike dātabbā.
tika-vin07t0:2176_3: “Bhūtaṃyeva vā sāmaṇerabhāvaṃ ārocetī”ti vuttattā ūnavīsativassakāle upasampannassa,
tika-vin07t0:2176_6: Yadā pana te attano sāmaṇerādibhāvaṃ paṭijānanti,
tika-vin07t0:2176_12: āhaṭā hoti pārisuddhī”ti vuttattā paṇḍakādīnampi bhikkhupaṭiññāya vattamānakālesu chandapārisuddhiyā āgamanaṃ siddhameva.
tika-vin07t0:2176_14: Ummattakakhittacittavedanāṭṭānaṃ pana pakatattā antarāmagge ummattakādibhāve paṭiññātepi tesaṃ saṅghappattamatteneva chandādi āgacchatīti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:2177_0: “Bhikkhūnaṃ hatthapāsa”nti iminā gaṇapuggalesu chandapārisuddhiyā anāgamanaṃ dasseti.
tika-vin07t0:2177_3: yathā saṅkhalikā biḷāle āgacchante eva āgacchati,
tika-vin07t0:2177_6: Atha vā yathā saṅkhalikāya paṭhamavalayaṃ dutiyavalayaṃ pāpuṇāti,
tika-vin07t0:2180_0: 165. Pāḷiyaṃ “santi saṅghassa karaṇīyānī”ti vattabbe vacanavipallāsena “karaṇīya”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:2181_1: “Tassa sammutidānakiccaṃ natthī”ti idaṃ pāḷiyaṃ ekadā sarantasseva sammutidānassa vuttattā ekadā asarantassa
tika-vin07t0:2181_2: sammutiabhāvepi tassa anāgamanaṃ vaggakammāya na hotīti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:2182_4: āpatti dukkaṭassāti ettha asañcicca asatiyā anāpatti.
tika-vin07t0:2183_1: “Paññattaṃ hotī”ti iminā “na sāpattikena uposatho kātabbo”ti visuṃ paṭikkhepābhāvepi yathāvuttasuttasāmatthiyato paññattamevāti dasseti.
tika-vin07t0:2184_2: anavakāso yaṃ tathāgato aparisuddhāya parisāya uposathaṃ kareyya,
tika-vin07t0:2185_0: Ādisuttanayato ca alajjīhipi saddhiṃ uposathakaraṇampi paṭikkhittameva alajjiniggahatthattā sabbasikkhāpadānanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:2185_1: “Pārisuddhidānapaññāpanenā”ti iminā sāpattikena pārisuddhipi na dātabbāti dīpitaṃ hoti.
tika-vin07t0:2185_2: Ubhopi dukkaṭanti ettha sabhāgāpattibhāvaṃ ajānitvā kevalaṃ āpattināmeneva desentassa paṭiggaṇhantassa acittakameva dukkaṭaṃ hotīti vadanti.
tika-vin07t0:2185_3: Yathā saṅgho sabhāgāpattiṃ āpanno ñattiṃ ṭhapetvā uposathaṃ kātuṃ labhati,
tika-vin07t0:2185_6: ime bhikkhū sabhāgaṃ āpattiṃ āpannā”tiādinā vuttanayānusāreneva gaṇañattiṃ ṭhapetvā dvīhi aññamaññaṃ ārocetvā uposathaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin07t0:2185_7: Ekena pana sāpattikena dūraṃ gantvāpi paṭikātumeva vaṭṭati,
tika-vin07t0:2188_1: Kenaci 63 karaṇīyena gantvāti sīmāparicchedato bahibhūtaṃ gāmaṃ vā araññaṃ vā gantvāti attho.
tika-vin07t0:2188_2: Eteneva uposathañattiyā ṭhapanakāle samaggā eva te ñattiṃ ṭhapesunti siddhaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:2188_4: Vaggā samaggasaññinotiādi pana ñattiyā niṭṭhitāya “kiṃ saṅghassa pubbakicca”ntiādīnaṃ vacanakkhaṇe bahigatānaṃ
tika-vin07t0:2188_5: bhikkhūnaṃ sīmāya paviṭṭhattā bhikkhū tasmiṃ khaṇe vaggā hontīti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:2188_7: etena pārājikuddesādikkhaṇepi vaggasaññīnaṃ uddisantānaṃ āpatti eva,
tika-vin07t0:2188_8: ñattiyā pana pubbe niṭṭhitattā kammakopo natthīti dassitameva hoti.
tika-vin07t0:2189_1: tesaṃ santike pārisuddhi ārocetabbā”ti vuttattā bahisīmāgatāya parisāya tesu yassa kassaci santike anadhiṭṭhitehi
tika-vin07t0:2194_4: tiṇṇaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ nisinnaṭṭhānato pana gacchantena ekena bhikkhunāpi saha gantumpi vaṭṭati.
tika-vin07t0:2194_6: saṅghuposathaṭṭhānato gaṇapuggalehi sabhikkhukopi āvāso na gantabbo “aññatra saṅghenā”ti vuttattāti vadanti.
tika-vin07t0:2194_7: Uposathaṃ karontīti saṅghuposathaṃ vā gaṇuposathaṃ vā.
tika-vin07t0:2194_8: “Tassa santika”nti idaṃ gaṇuposathaṭṭhānato gacchantaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ,
tika-vin07t0:2194_9: aññathā “sabbantimena paricchedena attacatutthena vā”ti vacanena virujjhanato.
tika-vin07t0:2195_0: 183. Pāḷiyaṃ bhikkhuniyā nisinnaparisāyātiādīsu bhikkhuniyātiādi karaṇatthe sāmivacanaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:2201_1: Aññattha aruṇaṃ uṭṭhāpanena vāti sāpekkhassa akaraṇīyena gantvā aññattha aruṇaṃ uṭṭhāpanena vā.
tika-vin07t0:2202_1: Pāḷiyaṃ sattāhaṃ sannivatto kātabboti sakalaṃ sattāhaṃ bahi eva avītināmetvā sattāhapariyosānabhūtaṃ
tika-vin07t0:2202_2: aruṇuṭṭhānakālaṃ puna vihāreva sambandhavasena sattāhaṃ vihāre sannivattaṃ kātabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:2202_6: Tīṇi parihīnānīti bhikkhunīnaṃ vaccakuṭiādīnaṃ paṭikkhittattā parihīnāni.
tika-vin07t0:2203_0: 189. Na palujjatīti aññesaṃ appaguṇattā, mama ca maraṇena na vinassati.
tika-vin07t0:2206_3: Ettha ca anupāsakehipi sāsanabhāvaṃ ñātukāmehi pahite tesaṃ pasādavaḍḍhiṃ sampassantehipi sattāhakaraṇīyena gantuṃ vaṭṭatīti gahetabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:2207_0: Ratticchedavinicchayoti sattāhakaraṇīyena gantvā bahiddhā aruṇuṭṭhāpanasaṅkhātassa ratticchedassa vinicchayo.
tika-vin07t0:2207_1: Gantuṃ vaṭṭatīti antoupacārasīmāyaṃ ṭhiteneva sattāhakaraṇīyanimittaṃ sallakkhetvā iminā nimittena gantvā
tika-vin07t0:2207_3: Purimakkhaṇe ābhogaṃ katvā gamanakkhaṇe vissaritvā gatepi doso natthi “sakaraṇīyo pakkamatī”ti vuttattā.
tika-vin07t0:2207_4: Sabbathā pana ābhogaṃ akatvā gatassa vassacchedoti vadanti.
tika-vin07t0:2207_5: Yo pana sattāhakaraṇīyanimittābhāvepi “sattāhabbhantare āgamissāmī”ti ābhogaṃ katvā gantvā sattāhabbhantare āgacchati,
tika-vin07t0:2207_11: vaṭṭatīti tadaheva āgamane saussāhattā vassacchedo vā āpatti vā na hotīti adhippāyo.
tika-vin07t0:2210_0: 200. Pāḷiyaṃ gaṇhiṃsūti gahetvā khādiṃsu. Paripātiṃsūti palāpesuṃ, anubandhiṃsūti attho.
tika-vin07t0:2211_1: Sattāhavārena aruṇo uṭṭhāpetabboti ettha chadivasāni bahiddhā vītināmetvā sattame divase purāruṇā eva
tika-vin07t0:2211_2: antoupacārasīmāya pavisitvā aruṇaṃ uṭṭhāpetvā punadivase sattāhaṃ adhiṭṭhāya gantabbanti adhippāyo.
tika-vin07t0:2211_3: Keci pana “sattame divase āgantvā aruṇaṃ anuṭṭhāpetvā tadaheva divasabhāgepi gantuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti vadanti,
tika-vin07t0:2211_5: Sattame divase tattha aruṇuṭṭhāpanameva hi sandhāya pāḷiyampi “sattāhaṃ sannivatto kātabbo”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:2211_6: Aruṇaṃ anuṭṭhāpetvā gacchanto anto appavisitvā bahiddhāva sattāhaṃ vītināmentena samucchinnavasso eva bhavissati aruṇassa bahi eva uṭṭhāpitattā.
tika-vin07t0:2211_7: Itarathā “aruṇo uṭṭhāpetabbo”ti vacanaṃ niratthakaṃ siyā “sattāhavārena antovihāre pavisitvā aruṇaṃ anuṭṭhāpetvāpi gantabba”nti vattabbato.
tika-vin07t0:2211_9: Vakkhati hi cīvarakkhandhake “ekasmiṃ vihāre vasanto itarasmiṃ sattāhavārena aruṇameva uṭṭhāpetī”ti.
tika-vin07t0:2212_0: Athāpi yaṃ te vadeyyuṃ “sattame divase yadā kadāci paviṭṭhena taṃdivasanissito atītaaruṇo uṭṭhāpito nāma
tika-vin07t0:2212_3: Na hi uṭṭhite aruṇe pacchā paviṭṭho tassa payojako uṭṭhāpako bhavitumarahati.
tika-vin07t0:2212_5: vassaṃ upagantvā panassa aruṇaṃ anuṭṭhāpetvā tadaheva sattāhakaraṇīyena pakkantassāpīti ettha “aruṇaṃ anuṭṭhāpetvā”ti vacanaṃ virujjheyya,
tika-vin07t0:2212_7: Āraññakassāpi hi bhikkhuno sāyanhasamaye aṅgayuttaṃ araññaṭṭhānaṃ gantvā tadā eva nivattantassa aruṇo uṭṭhāpito dhutaṅgañca visodhitaṃ siyā,
tika-vin07t0:2212_8: na cetaṃ yuttaṃ aruṇuggamanakāle eva aruṇuṭṭhāpanassa vuttattā.
tika-vin07t0:2212_9: Vuttañhi “kālasseva pana nikkhamitvā aṅgayutte ṭhāne aruṇaṃ uṭṭhāpetabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:2212_13: Tathā pārivāsikādīnampi aruṇaṃ anuṭṭhāpetvā vattaṃ nikkhipantānaṃ ratticchedo vutto.
tika-vin07t0:2212_15: Sahaseyyasikkhāpadepi anupasampannehi saha nivutthabhāvaparimocanatthaṃ “purāruṇā nikkhamitvā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:2212_16: Evaṃ cīvaravippavāsādīsu ca sabbattha rattipariyosāne āgāmiaruṇavaseneva aruṇuṭṭhāpanaṃ dassitaṃ,
tika-vin07t0:2212_18: Tasmā vuttanayenevettha aruṇuṭṭhāpanaṃ veditabbaṃ aññathā vassacchedattā.
tika-vin07t0:2213_0: Yaṃ pana vassaṃ upagatassa tadaheva aruṇaṃ anuṭṭhāpetvā sakaraṇīyassa pakkamanavacanaṃ,
tika-vin07t0:2213_1: taṃ vassaṃ upagatakālato paṭṭhāya yadā kadāci nimitte sati gamanassa anuññātattā yuttaṃ,
tika-vin07t0:2213_2: na pana sattāhavārena gatassa aruṇaṃ anuṭṭhāpetvā tadaheva gamanaṃ “aruṇo uṭṭhāpetabbo”ti vuttattā eva.
tika-vin07t0:2213_3: Yathā vā “sattāhaṃ anāgatāya pavāraṇāya sakaraṇīyo pakkamati,
tika-vin07t0:2213_7: na vā āgaccheyyā”tiādinā pacchimasattāhe anāgamane anuññātepi aññasattāhesu na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin07t0:2213_8: Evaṃ paṭhamasattāhe aruṇaṃ anuṭṭhāpetvā gamane anuññātepi tato paresu sattāhesu āgatassa aruṇaṃ anuṭṭhāpetvā
tika-vin07t0:2213_10: Idha āhaṭanti vihārato bahi āgataṭṭhāne ānītaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:2216_1: Upagantuṃ 68 na vaṭṭatīti kuṭikādīnaṃ abhāvena “idha vassaṃ upemī”ti evaṃ vacībhedaṃ katvā upagantuṃ na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin07t0:2217_5: Ṭaṅkitamañco nāma dīghe mañcapāde vijjhitvā aṭaniyo pavesetvā kato,
tika-vin07t0:2217_9: Catunnaṃ pāsāṇānaṃ upari pāsāṇaphalake attharitvā katagehampi “ṭaṅkitamañco”ti vuccati.
tika-vin07t0:2220_2: Parato senāsanakkhandhakepi adhammikaṃ katikavattaṃ āvi bhavissati eva.
tika-vin07t0:2221_1: Yasmā nānāsīmāyaṃ dvīsu āvāsesu vassaṃ upagacchantassa “dutiye vasissāmī”ti upacārato nikkhantamatte paṭhamo senāsanaggāho paṭippassambhati.
tika-vin07t0:2221_4: bhikkhuno purimikā ca na paññāyatī”ti paṭhamaṃ senāsanaggāhaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:2221_6: tattheva temāsaṃ vasanto purimavassaṃvuttho eva hoti,
tika-vin07t0:2221_7: tato vā pana dutiyadivasādīsu “paṭhamasenāsane vasissāmī”ti upacārātikkame purimikāpi na paññāyatīti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:2222_1: Pāḷiyaṃ “so sattāhaṃ anāgatāya pavāraṇāya sakaraṇīyo pakkamatī”ti vuttattā pavāraṇādivasepi sattāhakaraṇīyaṃ vinā gantuṃ na vaṭṭatīti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:2222_4: Sā hi tasmiṃ kāle kumudānaṃ atthitāya komudī,
tika-vin07t0:2222_5: catunnaṃ vassikamāsānaṃ pariyosānattā cātumāsinīti ca vuccati.
tika-vin07t0:2228_1: Pavāraṇākkhandhake pāḷiyaṃ piṇḍāya paṭikkameyyāti piṇḍāya caritvā paṭikkameyya.
tika-vin07t0:2228_7: Atha vā vilaṅghakena ukkhepakena hatthenātipi attho,
tika-vin07t0:2229_1: Sace pana vuḍḍhataro hotīti pavāraṇādāyako bhikkhu vuḍḍhataro hoti.
tika-vin07t0:2229_2: Evañhi tena tassatthāya pavāritaṃ hotīti ettha evaṃ tena appavāritopi tassa saṅghappattimattena saṅghapavāraṇākammaṃ
tika-vin07t0:2230_1: Bahūpi samānavassā ekato pavāretuṃ labhantīti ekasmiṃ saṃvacchare laddhūpasampadatāya samānupasampannavassā sabbe ekato pavāretuṃ labhantīti attho.
tika-vin07t0:2231_3: Yaṃ kho tvantiādīsu yaṃ pavāraṇaṃ ṭhapesi,
tika-vin07t0:2232_1: Vatthuṃ pakāsentoti puggale parisaṅkuppattiyā nimittabhūtaṃ vatthumattaṃyeva sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:2232_5: Yadi pana tassa bhikkhuno vasanaṭṭhāne pokkharaṇito macchaggahaṇādi disseyya,
tika-vin07t0:2232_6: tadā “vatthu ca puggalo ca paññāyatī”ti vattabbaṃ bhaveyya.
tika-vin07t0:2232_8: Bhikkhuno sarīre mālāgandhañca ariṭṭhagandhañca disvā evaṃ “vatthu ca puggalo ca paññāyatī”ti vuttanti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:2235_1: Dve cātuddasikā hontīti tatiyapakkhe cātuddasiyā saddhiṃ dve cātuddasikā honti.
tika-vin07t0:2235_2: “Bhaṇḍanakārakānaṃ terase vā cātuddase vā ime pannarasīpavāraṇaṃ pavāressantī”ti iminā yathāsakaṃ uposathakaraṇadivasato
tika-vin07t0:2235_7: rājūnaṃ anuvattitu”nti vacanato panettha lokiyānaṃ tithiṃ anuvattantehipi attano uposathakkamena cātuddasiṃ pannarasiṃ vā,
tika-vin07t0:2235_9: na pana soḷasamadivasaṃ vā terasamadivasaṃ vā uposathadivasaṃ karontehi.
tika-vin07t0:2235_10: Teneva pāḷiyampi “dve tayo uposathe cātuddasike kātu”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:2238_1: “Pavāretvā pana antarāpi cārikaṃ pakkamituṃ labhantī”ti iminā pavāraṇāsaṅgahe kate antarā pakkamitukāmā
tika-vin07t0:2243_1: Cammakkhandhake uṇṇapāvāraṇanti ubhato lomāni uṭṭhāpetvā kataṃ uṇṇamayaṃ pāvāraṇaṃ,
tika-vin07t0:2244_0: Aḍḍhacandapāsāṇeti sopānamūle upaḍḍhaṃ anto pavesetvā ṭhapite aḍḍhapāsāṇe.
tika-vin07t0:2245_6: Tattha ca nimittaṃ gaṇhāhīti tasmiñca samabhāve sati yaṃ ādāse mukhanimittaṃ viya nimittaṃ uppajjati,
tika-vin07t0:2247_0: Kevalaṃ saddhāmattakanti kevalaṃ paṭivedhapaññāya asammissaṃ saddhāmattakaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:2247_2: Vītarāgattāti maggapaṭivedhena rāgassa vigatattā eva nekkhammasaṅkhātaṃ arahattaṃ paṭivijjhitvā sacchikatvā ṭhito hoti.
tika-vin07t0:2247_4: Pavivekādhimuttoti “paviveke adhimutto aha”nti evaṃ arahattaṃ byākarotīti attho.
tika-vin07t0:2249_1: Kilesā hi ārammaṇena saddhiṃ cittaṃ missaṃ karonti,
tika-vin07t0:2250_1: Disvā āyatanuppādanti cakkhādiāyatanānaṃ uppādañca vayañca disvā.
tika-vin07t0:2250_2: Cittaṃ vimuccatīti imāya vipassanāpaṭipattiyā phalasamāpattivasena cittaṃ vimuccati.
tika-vin07t0:2254_6: Yaṃ pana cammassa duggandhāpanayanatthaṃ kāḷarattādirajanehi rañjitattā kāḷarattādivaṇṇaṃ hoti,
tika-vin07t0:2254_7: taṃ coḷādīhi apanetuṃ na sakkā cammagatikameva,
tika-vin07t0:2255_3: na vaṇṇato sabbaso apanetabbesu khallakādīsu paviṭṭhattā.
tika-vin07t0:2258_0: 251. Uṇṇāhi katapādukāti ettha uṇṇāmayakambalehi katā pādukā saṅgayhanti.
tika-vin07t0:2259_2: Tattha hi itthipurisā yānehi udakakīḷaṃ gacchanti.
tika-vin07t0:2259_5: Sabbampi yānaṃ upāhanenapi gantuṃ asamatthassa gilānassa anuññātaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:2260_3: Caturaṅgulato hi ūnāni kira uddalomīādīsu pavisanti.
tika-vin07t0:2260_4: Vānacitro uṇṇāmayattharaṇoti nānāvaṇṇehi uṇṇāmayasuttehi bhitticchedādivasena vāyitvā katacittattharaṇo.
tika-vin07t0:2260_9: Koseyyakaṭṭissamayanti kosiyasuttānaṃ antarā suvaṇṇamayasuttāni pavesetvā vītaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:2261_0: Ajinamigacammānaṃ atisukhumattā dupaṭṭatipaṭṭāni katvā sibbantīti vuttaṃ “ajinappaveṇī”ti.
tika-vin07t0:2261_2: Yaṃ pana nānāvaṇṇaṃ vānacittaṃ vā lepacittaṃ vā,
tika-vin07t0:2261_5: “Citraṃ vā”ti idaṃ pana sabbathā kappiyattā vuttaṃ,
tika-vin07t0:2261_12: Sace pamāṇayuttantiādi aññappamāṇātikkantassa bibbohanassa paṭikkhittabhāvadassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ,
tika-vin07t0:2261_14: Taṃ pana upadhānaṃ uposathikānaṃ gahaṭṭhānaṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin07t0:2261_15: Uccāsayanamahāsayanameva hi tadā tesaṃ na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin07t0:2261_16: Dīghanikāyaṭṭhakathādīsu kiñcāpi “ṭhapetvā tūlikaṃ sabbāneva gonakādīni ratanaparisibbitāni vaṭṭantī”tiādi vuttaṃ,
tika-vin07t0:2266_1: Pāḷiyaṃ aṭṭhakavaggikānīti suttanipāte aṭṭhakavaggabhūtāni soḷasa suttāni.
tika-vin07t0:2266_2: Evaṃ ciraṃ akāsīti evaṃ cirakālaṃ pabbajjaṃ anupagantvā agāramajjhe kena kāraṇena vāsamakāsīti attho.
tika-vin07t0:2266_5: Etamatthaṃ viditvāti kāmesu diṭṭhādīnavā cirāyitvāpi gharāvāsena pakkhandantīti etamatthaṃ sabbākārato viditvā.
tika-vin07t0:2267_2: “Ariyo na ramatī pāpe”ti imassa hetumāha “pāpe na ramatī sucī”ti.
tika-vin07t0:2268_2: Cammaṃ na vaṭṭatīti nisīdanattharaṇaṃ kātuṃ na vaṭṭati,
tika-vin07t0:2273_1: Bhesajjakkhandhake pittaṃ koṭṭhabbhantaragataṃ hotīti bahisarīre byāpetvā ṭhitaṃ abaddhapittaṃ koṭṭhabbhantaragataṃ hoti,
tika-vin07t0:2277_3: Tāya chārikāya paggharitaṃ khārodakanti parissāvane tacchārikaṃ pakkhipitvā udake abhisiñcite tato chārikato heṭṭhā paggharitaṃ khārodakaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:2277_5: Kaṭākaṭenāti mugge pacitvā acāletvā parissāvitena muggayūsenāti vadanti.
tika-vin07t0:2281_1: Appamattakepi vārentīti appamattake dinne dāyakānaṃ pīḷāti paṭikkhipanti.
tika-vin07t0:2282_3: Sambādhe satthakammavatthikammānameva paṭikkhittattā dahanakammaṃ vaṭṭati eva.
tika-vin07t0:2285_1: Pāḷiyaṃ dasassa ṭhānānīti assa paṭiggāhakassa dasa ṭhānāni kāraṇāni dhammenāti attho.
tika-vin07t0:2285_5: Saggā te āraddhāti tayā devalokā ārādhitā.
tika-vin07t0:2288_1: Pāṭaligāme nagaraṃ māpentīti pāṭaligāmassa samīpe tasseva gāmakhettabhūte mahante araññappadese pāṭaliputtaṃ nāma nagaraṃ māpenti.
tika-vin07t0:2288_2: Yāvatā ariyaṃ āyatananti yattakaṃ ariyamanussānaṃ osaraṇaṭṭhānaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:2288_5: idaṃ tesaṃ sabbesaṃ agganagaraṃ bhavissatīti attho.
tika-vin07t0:2288_6: Puṭabhedananti sakaṭādīhi nānādesato āhaṭānaṃ bhaṇḍapuṭānaṃ vikkīṇanatthāya mocanaṭṭhānaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:2288_8: tannivattanatthaṃ “saranti idha nadī adhippetā”ti vuttaṃ sarati sandatīti katvā.
tika-vin07t0:2288_9: Vinā eva kullena tiṇṇāti idaṃ appamattakaudakampi aphusitvā vinā kullena pārappattā.
tika-vin07t0:2291_1: Pāḷiyaṃ sandhāvitanti bhavato bhavaṃ paṭisandhiggahaṇavasena sandhāvanaṃ kataṃ.
tika-vin07t0:2291_3: Mamañceva tumhākañcāti mayā ca tumhehi ca,
tika-vin07t0:2291_4: sāmivaseneva vā mama ca tumhākañca sandhāvanaṃ ahosīti attho gahetabbo.
tika-vin07t0:2291_6: Bhavataṇhā eva bhavato bhavaṃ netīti bhavanettīti vuttā.
tika-vin07t0:2292_12: Licchavirājāno hi sabbe na cirasseva ajātasattunā vināsaṃ pāpuṇissanti.
tika-vin07t0:2295_1: Sandhāgāreti rājakiccassa sandhāraṇatthāya nicchiddaṃ katvā vicāraṇatthāya katamahāsabhāya.
tika-vin07t0:2295_3: Dhammassa ca anudhammanti tumhehi vuttassa kāraṇassa anukāraṇaṃ,
tika-vin07t0:2295_5: Sahadhammiko vādānuvādoti parehi vuttakāraṇena sakāraṇo hutvā tumhākaṃ vādo vā ito paraṃ tassa anuvādo vā.
tika-vin07t0:2295_6: Koci appamattakopi gārayhaṃ ṭhānaṃ na āgacchatīti kiṃ tava vāde gārayhakāraṇaṃ natthīti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-vin07t0:2296_3: Sahasā katvā mā pacchā vippaṭisārī ahosīti attho.
tika-vin07t0:2296_4: Paṭākaṃ parihareyyunti dhajapaṭākaṃ ukkhipitvā “īdiso amhākaṃ saraṇaṃ gato sāvako jāto”ti nagare ghosentā āhiṇḍanti.
tika-vin07t0:2301_2: yaṃ ādiṃ katvā bhittiṃ uṭṭhāpetukāmāti attho.
tika-vin07t0:2301_4: tasmā vaṭṭantī”ti etena iṭṭhakapāsāṇā heṭṭhā patiṭṭhāpitāpi yadi cayato,
tika-vin07t0:2302_1: Senāsanānīti vihārassa anto tiṇakuṭiādikāni saṅghassa nivāsagehāni.
tika-vin07t0:2302_3: Senāsanāni hi sayaṃ parikkhittānipi ārāmaparikkhepābhāvena “gonisādikānī”ti vuttāni.
tika-vin07t0:2302_4: “Upaḍḍhaparikkhittopī”ti iminā tato ūnaparikkhitto yebhuyyena aparikkhitto nāma,
tika-vin07t0:2302_7: Kappiyakuṭiṃ laddhuṃ vaṭṭatīti gonisādiyā abhāvena sesakappiyakuṭīsu tīsu yā kāci kappiyakuṭi kātabbāti attho.
tika-vin07t0:2303_0: Tesaṃ gehānīti ettha bhikkhūnaṃ vāsatthāya katampi yāva na denti,
tika-vin07t0:2303_2: Vihāraṃ ṭhapetvāti upasampannānaṃ vāsatthāya katagehaṃ ṭhapetvāti attho.
tika-vin07t0:2303_4: tadaññaṃ pana uposathāgārādi sabbaṃ anivāsagehaṃ catukappiyabhūmivimuttā pañcamī kappiyabhūmi.
tika-vin07t0:2303_5: Saṅghasantakepi hi etādise gehe suṭṭhu parikkhittārāmattepi abbhokāse viya antovutthādidoso natthi.
tika-vin07t0:2303_7: paricchanne ca sahaseyyappahonake bhikkhusaṅghassa nivāsagehe antovutthādidoso,
tika-vin07t0:2303_10: Tattha “saṅghikaṃ vā puggalikaṃ vā”ti idaṃ kiñcāpi bhikkhunīnaṃ sāmaññato vuttaṃ,
tika-vin07t0:2303_12: tāsaṃ saṅghikaṃ puggalikañca bhikkhūnaṃ gihisantakaṭṭhāne tiṭṭhatīti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:2304_0: Mukhasannidhīti antosannihitadoso hi mukhappavesananimittaṃ āpattiṃ karoti, nāññathā.
tika-vin07t0:2305_0: Tattha tattha khaṇḍā hontīti upaḍḍhato adhikaṃ khaṇḍā honti.
tika-vin07t0:2305_1: Sabbasmiṃ chadane vinaṭṭheti tiṇapaṇṇādivassaparittāyake chadane vinaṭṭhe.
tika-vin07t0:2305_2: Gopānasīnaṃ pana upari vallīhi baddhadaṇḍesu ṭhitesupi jahitavatthukā honti eva.
tika-vin07t0:2305_3: Pakkhapāsakamaṇḍalanti ekasmiṃ passe tiṇṇaṃ gopānasīnaṃ upari ṭhitatiṇapaṇṇādicchadanaṃ vuccati.
tika-vin07t0:2306_0: Anupasampannassa dātabbo assātiādinā akappiyakuṭiyaṃ vutthampi anupasampannassa dinne kappiyaṃ hoti,
tika-vin07t0:2310_1: Jaṭiloti āharimajaṭādharo tāpasavesadhārako yaññayutto lokapūjito brāhmaṇo.
tika-vin07t0:2310_5: Gītaṃ pavuttaṃ samihitanti aññamaññassa pariyāyavacanaṃ vuttanti attho.
tika-vin07t0:2310_6: Tadanugāyantīti taṃ tehi pubbe gītaṃ anugāyanti.
tika-vin07t0:2311_1: āmāni pana anupasampannehi sītudake madditvā parissāvetvā dinnapānaṃ pacchābhattampi kappati eva.
tika-vin07t0:2311_2: Ayañca attho mahāaṭṭhakathāyaṃ sarūpato avuttoti āha “kurundiyaṃ panā”tiādi.
tika-vin07t0:2315_1: Bahukato buddhe vāti buddhe katabahumānoti attho.
tika-vin07t0:2316_2: Dve dārakāti sāmaṇerabhūmiyaṃ ṭhitā dve puttā.
tika-vin07t0:2316_4: Saṃharatha imehi bhājanehi taṇḍulādīni saṅkaḍḍhathāti attho.
tika-vin07t0:2316_6: palālapuñjaṃ abbhantarato palālaṃ saṅkaḍḍhitvā agāraṃ kataṃ hoti,
tika-vin07t0:2319_2: Dve paṭā desanāmeneva vuttāti tesaṃ sarūpadassanapadametaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:2325_3: So nesaṃ bhavissatīti yujjatīti “so tumhāka”nti avatvā “nesa”nti vacanaṃ yujjati.
tika-vin07t0:2325_7: Atha vā voti tadā sammukhībhūtehi saddhiṃ asammukhībhūte ca anāgate ca bhikkhū sabbe ekato sampiṇḍetvā vuttaṃ,
tika-vin07t0:2325_9: So nesanti ettha so tesanti yojetabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:2325_14: “Vutthavassavasenā”ti idaṃ pacchimavassaṃvutthānampi sādhāraṇanti āha “purimikāya vassaṃ upagantvā paṭhamapavāraṇāya pavāritā labhantī”ti.
tika-vin07t0:2325_15: Upagatā vā na labhantīti pacchimikāya vutthavassepi sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:2326_1: “Akātuṃ na labbhatī”ti iminā anādariye sati dukkaṭanti dīpeti.
tika-vin07t0:2327_0: “Apaloketvā”ti idaṃ aññesaṃ vassaṃvutthabhikkhūnaṃ adatvā dātukāmehi kattabbavidhidassanaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:2327_1: Yadi evaṃ kammavācāya eva dānaṃ avuttanti āha “kammavācā panā”tiādi.
tika-vin07t0:2327_2: Kathinacīvaraṃ viya kammavācāya dātuṃ na vaṭṭatīti apaloketvāva dātabbanti adhippāyo.
tika-vin07t0:2328_6: Kucchicimilikaṃ katvā sibbitamattenāti thirajiṇṇānaṃ cimilikānaṃ ekato katvā sibbanassetaṃ adhivacananti vadanti.
tika-vin07t0:2329_2: Na hi tenātiādīsu tena parivārāgatapāṭhena idha ānetvā avuccamānena kathinatthārakassa jānitabbesu na kiñci parihāyati,
tika-vin07t0:2330_6: Pakkamanantiko kathinubbhāro eva hi sayaṃ attano uppajjatīti evamabhedūpacārena “mātikā”ti vutto ubbhārasseva pakkamanante samuppattito,
tika-vin07t0:2333_2: Pañcasu hi cīvaramāsesu yadā kadāci na paccessanti cittena upacārasīmātikkamena āvāsapalibodho chijjati.
tika-vin07t0:2333_3: Paccessanti bahiupacāragatassa pana yattha katthaci na paccessanti citte uppannamatte chijjati.
tika-vin07t0:2333_4: Paṭhamaṃ cīvarapalibodho chijjatīti na paccessanti pakkamanato puretarameva cīvarassa niṭṭhitattā vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:2333_6: Atthatakathinassa hi bhikkhuno yāva “saṅghato vā dāyakakulādito vā cīvaraṃ labhissāmī”ti cīvarāsā vā
tika-vin07t0:2333_7: laddhavatthānaṃ sahāyasampadādiyogaṃ labhitvā saṅghāṭiādibhāvena “chinditvā karissāmī”ti karaṇicchā vā
tika-vin07t0:2333_10: Yadā pana yathāpatthitaṭṭhānato cīvarādīnaṃ sabbathā alābhena vā cīvarāsā ceva laddhānaṃ katvā niṭṭhānena
tika-vin07t0:2333_11: vā naṭṭhavinaṭṭhādibhāvena vā cīvare nirapekkhatāya vā karaṇicchā ca vigacchati,
tika-vin07t0:2334_0: So ca idha “katacīvaraṃ ādāyā”ti vacanena pakāsito.
tika-vin07t0:2334_1: Evaṃ upari sabbattha pāḷivacanakkamaṃ nissāya nesaṃ paṭhamaṃ,
tika-vin07t0:2334_3: Sabbathāpi ca imesaṃ ubhinnaṃ palibodhānaṃ upacchedeneva kathinubbhāro,
tika-vin07t0:2334_6: ekakkhaṇe ca upacchijjanaṃ dassetuṃ imā aṭṭha mātikā ṭhapitāti veditabbā.
tika-vin07t0:2334_8: Nevimaṃ cīvaraṃ kāressanti cīvare apekkhāya vigatattā karaṇapalibodhassāpi upacchinnataṃ dasseti.
tika-vin07t0:2334_9: Yo pana appicchatāya vā anatthikatāya vā sabbathā cīvaraṃ na sampaṭicchati,
tika-vin07t0:2334_10: tassa bahisīmāgatassa sabbathāpi cīvarapalibodhābhāvena na paccessanti sanniṭṭhānamattena sanniṭṭhānantiko kathinubbhāro veditabbo.
tika-vin07t0:2334_12: Ayaṃ panāti āsāvacchedako kathinubbhāro visuṃ vitthāretvā vutto,
tika-vin07t0:2335_0: Anāsāya labhatīti “yasmiṃ kule cīvaraṃ labhissāmā”ti āsā anuppannapubbā,
tika-vin07t0:2335_1: tattha cīvarāsāya anuppannaṭṭhāne yattha katthaci labhatīti attho.
tika-vin07t0:2335_2: Āsāya na labhatīti āsīsitaṭṭhāne na labhatīti attho.
tika-vin07t0:2335_3: Idha na vuttoti idha savanantikānantare na vutto.
tika-vin07t0:2335_5: Sīmātikkantiko nāma cīvaramāsānaṃ pariyantadivasasaṅkhātāya sīmāya atikkamanato sañjāto.
tika-vin07t0:2335_7: tesaṃ antoupacāre cīvarakālātikkamepi kathinubbhāro asammato nāma siyāti na cetaṃ yuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:2335_8: Tasmā yattha katthaci kālātikkamo sīmātikkamoti veditabbo.
tika-vin07t0:2335_12: Evaṃ aññatthāpi yathāsambhavaṃ taṃtaṃ visesanābhāvepi kathinubbhāratā,
tika-vin07t0:2335_14: “Sahubbhāre dvepi palibodhā apubbaṃ acarimaṃ chijjantī”ti idaṃ akatacīvarassa paccessanti adhiṭṭhānasambhavapakkhaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ,
tika-vin07t0:2336_8: so etesu vāresu yattha katthaci na vutto,
tika-vin07t0:2336_10: Vippakatavāre cettha ādāyavārasamādāyavāravasena dve chakkavārā vuttā.
tika-vin07t0:2337_0: Tato paraṃ niṭṭhānasanniṭṭhānanāsanantikānaṃ vasena tīṇi tikāni dassitāni.
tika-vin07t0:2337_4: Tatiyattikato pana paraṃ ekaṃ chakkaṃ dassitaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:2338_0: Pāḷiyaṃ āsādvādasake bahisīmāgatassa kathinuddhāresu tesampi cīvarāsādivasena cīvarapalibodho yāva cīvaraniṭṭhānā
tika-vin07t0:2338_1: tiṭṭhatīti āha “so bahisīmāgato suṇāti ‘ubbhataṃ kira tasmiṃ āvāse kathinanti…pe…
tika-vin07t0:2338_3: Ettha ca savanakkhaṇe āvāsapalibodho paṭhamaṃ chijjati,
tika-vin07t0:2339_0: Disaṃgamikanavake disaṃgamiko pakkamatīti na paccessanti pakkamati,
tika-vin07t0:2339_2: Teneva vassaṃvutthāvāse puna gantvā cīvaraniṭṭhāpitamatte niṭṭhānantiko kathinuddhāro vutto.
tika-vin07t0:2344_1: Cīvarakkhandhake kammavipākanti kammapaccayautucittāhārasamuṭṭhitaṃ appaṭibāhiyarogaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ kammajassa rogassa abhāvā.
tika-vin07t0:2345_2: Avisajjanassāti attho “yo saṃyamo so vināso”tiādīsu viya.
tika-vin07t0:2348_0: 338-9. Upaḍḍhakāsinaṃ khamamānanti aḍḍhakāsiagghanakaṃ. Pāḷiyaṃ kiṃ nu khoti katamaṃ nu kho.
tika-vin07t0:2349_2: Chaḍḍetvā gatāti kiñci avatvā eva chaḍḍetvā gatā,
tika-vin07t0:2349_3: etena “bhikkhū gaṇhantū”ti chaḍḍite eva akāmā bhāgadānaṃ vihitaṃ,
tika-vin07t0:2349_4: kevalaṃ chaḍḍite pana katikāya asati ekato bahūsu paviṭṭhesu yena gahitaṃ,
tika-vin07t0:2349_6: Samānā disā puratthimādibhedā etesanti sadisāti āha “ekadisāya vā okkamiṃsū”ti.
tika-vin07t0:2352_2: Vaṇṇāvaṇṇaṃ katvāti paṭivīsappahonakatājānanatthaṃ haliddiyādīhi khuddakamahantavaṇṇehi yutte same koṭṭhāse katvā.
tika-vin07t0:2352_6: Yattakena vinayāgatena sammuñjanībandhanādihatthakammena vihārassa ūnakatā na hoti,
tika-vin07t0:2352_12: Virajjhitvā karontīti kattabbakālesu akatvā yathārucitakkhaṇe karonti.
tika-vin07t0:2353_0: Ettakena mama cīvaraṃ pahotīti dvādasagghanakeneva mama cīvaraṃ paripuṇṇaṃ hoti,
tika-vin07t0:2353_1: na tato ūnenāti sabbaṃ gahetukāmoti attho.
tika-vin07t0:2356_3: Na uttaratīti kevalaṃ udakato pheṇuṭṭhānābhāvā na uttarati.
tika-vin07t0:2357_3: saddena dvinnaṃ khandhānaṃ antarā mātikākārena ṭhapitapattañca “dīghapatta”nti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:2357_4: Āgantukapattanti diguṇacīvarassa upari aññaṃ paṭṭaṃ appenti,
tika-vin07t0:2360_3: Abhisamparāyoti “sakideva imaṃ lokaṃ āgantvā dukkhassantaṃ karotī”tiādinā vutto ñāṇābhisamparāyo,
tika-vin07t0:2360_6: “Dadāti dāna”nti idaṃ annapānavirahitānaṃ sesapaccayānaṃ dānavasena vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:2362_1: Pāḷiyaṃ nadīpāraṃ gantunti bhikkhuno nadīpāragamanaṃ hotīti attho.
tika-vin07t0:2362_2: Aggaḷaguttiyeva pamāṇanti imehi catūhi nikkhepakāraṇehi ṭhapentenapi aggaḷaguttivihāre eva ṭhapetuṃ vaṭṭatīti adhippāyo.
tika-vin07t0:2365_2: Vaḍḍhiṃ payojetvā ṭhapitaupanikkhepatoti vassāvāsikassatthāya dāyakehi vaḍḍhiṃ payojetvā ṭhapitaupanikkhepato.
tika-vin07t0:2365_4: saddaṃ pana vinā “vassaṃvutthasaṅghassa demā”ti vuttepi so eva nayo.
tika-vin07t0:2365_5: Anatthatakathinassāpi pañca māse pāpuṇātīti vassāvāsikalābhavasena uppannattā anatthatakathinassāpi vutthavassassa pañca māse pāpuṇāti.
tika-vin07t0:2365_6: Vakkhati hi “cīvaramāsato paṭṭhāya yāva hemantassa pacchimo divaso,
tika-vin07t0:2365_7: tāva vassāvāsikaṃ demāti vutte kathinaṃ atthataṃ vā hotu anatthataṃ vā,
tika-vin07t0:2365_11: Piṭṭhisamaye uppannattā”ti idaṃ “udāhu anāgatavasse”ti imassānantaraṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:2365_12: Potthakesu pana “anatthatakathinassāpi pañca māse pāpuṇātī”ti imassānantaraṃ “kasmā piṭṭhisamaye uppannattā”ti idaṃ likhanti,
tika-vin07t0:2365_13: taṃ pamādalikhitaṃ piṭṭhisamaye uppannaṃ sandhāya “anatthatakathinassāpī”ti vattabbato.
tika-vin07t0:2365_15: na ca piṭṭhisamaye uppannaṃ vutthavassasseva pāpuṇātīti sammukhībhūtānaṃ sabbesampi pāpuṇanato.
tika-vin07t0:2365_16: Teneva vakkhati “sace pana gimhānaṃ paṭhamadivasato paṭṭhāya evaṃ vadati,
tika-vin07t0:2366_0: Duggahitānīti aggahitāni. Saṅghikānevāti attho. Itovāti therānaṃ dātabbatova, idānevāti vā attho.
tika-vin07t0:2369_1: “Sattāhavārena aruṇameva uṭṭhāpetī”ti idaṃ nānāsīmāvihāresu kattabbanayena ekasmimpi vihāre dvīsu senāsanesu nivutthabhāvadassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ,
tika-vin07t0:2369_4: Antoupacārasīmāyapi yattha katthaci aruṇaṃ uṭṭhāpento attanā gahitasenāsanaṃ appaviṭṭhopi vutthavasso eva hoti,
tika-vin07t0:2369_5: gahitasenāsane pana nivuttho nāma na hoti,
tika-vin07t0:2369_6: tattha ca aruṇuṭṭhāpane pana sati hoti.
tika-vin07t0:2369_8: etena ca itarasmiṃ sattāhavārenāpi aruṇuṭṭhāpane sati eva appakataraṃ nivasati nāma hoti,
tika-vin07t0:2369_12: Ekasīmāvihārehīti dvinnaṃ vihārānaṃ ekena pākārena parikkhittattā ekāya upacārasīmāya antogatehi dvīhi vihārehi.
tika-vin07t0:2372_1: Bhūmiyaṃ paribhaṇḍaṃ akāsīti gilānena nipannabhūmiyaṃ kiliṭṭhaṭṭhānaṃ dhovitvā haritūpalittaṃ kāresīti attho.
tika-vin07t0:2372_2: Bhesajjaṃ yojetuṃ asamatthoti parehi vuttavidhimpi kātuṃ asamattho.
tika-vin07t0:2372_3: Pāḷiyaṃ gilānupaṭṭhākānaṃ cīvaradāne sāmaṇerānaṃ ticīvarādhiṭṭhānābhāvā “cīvarañca pattañcā”tiādi sabbattha vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:2376_0: Tattha tattha saṅghassevāti tasmiṃ tasmiṃ vihāre saṅghasseva.
tika-vin07t0:2376_1: Pāḷiyaṃ avissajjikaṃ avebhaṅgikanti āgatānāgatassa cātuddisassa saṅghasseva santakaṃ hutvā kassaci avissajjikaṃ
tika-vin07t0:2377_4: Dupaṭṭacīvarassa vā majjheti yaṃ niṭṭhite tipaṭṭacīvaraṃ hoti,
tika-vin07t0:2377_5: tassa majjhe paṭalaṃ katvā dātabbānīti attho.
tika-vin07t0:2378_0: 374. “Sante patirūpe gāhake”ti vuttattā gāhake asati adatvā bhājitepi subhājitamevāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:2379_1: Dakkhiṇodakaṃ pamāṇanti “ettakāni cīvarāni dassāmī”ti paṭhamaṃ udakaṃ pātetvā pacchā denti.
tika-vin07t0:2382_1: Puggalādhiṭṭhānanayena vuttanti “sīmāya dāna”ntiādinā vattabbe “sīmāya detī”tiādi puggalādhiṭṭhānena vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:2382_4: Loke gāmasīmādayo viya lābhasīmā nāma visuṃ pasiddhā nāma natthi,
tika-vin07t0:2383_0: Pathavīvemajjhe gatassāti yāva udakapariyantā khaṇḍasīmattā vuttaṃ,
tika-vin07t0:2383_1: upacārasīmādīsu pana abaddhasīmāsu heṭṭhāpathaviyaṃ sabbattha ṭhitānaṃ na pāpuṇāti,
tika-vin07t0:2383_2: kūpādipavesārahaṭṭhāne ṭhitānaññeva pāpuṇātīti heṭṭhā sīmākathāyaṃ vuttanayena taṃtaṃsīmaṭṭhabhāvo veditabbo.
tika-vin07t0:2383_3: Cakkavāḷasīmāya pana dinnaṃ pathavīsandhārakaudakaṭṭhānepi ṭhitānaṃ pāpuṇāti sabbattha cakkavāḷavohārattā.
tika-vin07t0:2384_5: Dutiyabhāge pana therāsanaṃ āruḷheti yāva saṅghanavakā ekavāraṃ sabbesaṃ bhāgaṃ datvā cīvare aparikkhīṇe
tika-vin07t0:2384_6: puna sabbesaṃ dātuṃ dutiyabhāge therassa dinneti attho.
tika-vin07t0:2384_7: Paṃsukūlikānampi vaṭṭatīti ettha “tuyhaṃ demā”ti avuttattāti kāraṇaṃ vadanti.
tika-vin07t0:2384_11: saṅghassa demā”ti vacanato bhedo na dissati.
tika-vin07t0:2385_1: Bhikkhusaṅghassa ca bhikkhunīnañca dammīti vutte pana na majjhe bhinditvā dātabbanti ettha yasmā bhikkhunipakkhe
tika-vin07t0:2385_2: saṅghassa paccekaṃ aparāmaṭṭhattā bhikkhunīnaṃ gaṇanāya bhāgo dātabboti dāyakassa adhippāyoti sijjhati,
tika-vin07t0:2385_3: tathā dānañca bhikkhūpi gaṇetvā dinne eva yujjati.
tika-vin07t0:2385_6: tasmā “bhikkhusaṅghassā”ti vuttavacanampi “bhikkhūna”nti vuttavacanasadisamevāti āha “bhikkhū ca bhikkhuniyo ca gaṇetvā dātabba”nti.
tika-vin07t0:2385_11: puggalassa pana “tuyhañcā”ti visuṃ gahitattā ca tatthassa aggahitatā daṭṭhabbā,
tika-vin07t0:2385_16: taṃ na sundaraṃ tassa visuṃ lābhaggahaṇe kāraṇavacanattā.
tika-vin07t0:2385_17: Tathā hi visuṃ saṅghaggahaṇena gahitattāti visuṃ puggalassapi bhāgaggahaṇe kāraṇaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:2386_0: Pūjetabbantiādi gihikammaṃ na hotīti dassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:2386_3: “Antohemante”ti iminā anatthate kathine vassānaṃ pacchime māse dinnaṃ purimavassaṃvutthānaññeva pāpuṇāti,
tika-vin07t0:2386_4: tato paraṃ hemante dinnaṃ pacchimavassaṃvutthānampi vutthavassattā pāpuṇāti.
tika-vin07t0:2386_5: Hemantato pana paraṃ piṭṭhisamaye “vassaṃvutthasaṅghassā”ti evaṃ vatvā dinnaṃ anantare vasse vā tato
tika-vin07t0:2386_6: paresu vā yattha katthaci tasmiṃ vutthavassānaṃ sabbesaṃ pāpuṇāti.
tika-vin07t0:2386_9: Sabbesampīti hi tasmiṃ bhikkhubhāve vutthavassānaṃ sabbesampīti attho daṭṭhabbo.
tika-vin07t0:2386_10: “Vassaṃvutthasaṅghassā”ti vuttattā sammukhībhūtānaṃ sabbesanti etthāpi eseva nayo.
tika-vin07t0:2387_0: Uddesaṃ gahetuṃ āgatoti uddese aggahitepi antevāsikovāti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:2387_2: “Vattaṃ katvā uddesaparipucchādīni gahetvā vicarantāna”nti idaṃ “uddesantevāsikāna”nti imasseva visesanaṃ,
tika-vin07t0:2387_3: tena uddesakāle āgantvā uddesaṃ gahetvā gantvā aññattha nivasante anibaddhacārike nivatteti.
tika-vin07t0:2393_1: Hāpanaṃ vā aññathā karaṇaṃ vā natthīti ñattikammassa ñattiyā ekattā hāpanaṃ na sambhavati,
tika-vin07t0:2393_3: dvikkhattuṃ ṭhapanavasena ca aññathā karaṇaṃ natthi.
tika-vin07t0:2396_4: Tattha āveṇikena lakkhaṇenāti pabbājanīyakammassa nimittabhāvena pāḷiyaṃ vuttattā asādhāraṇabhūtena kuladūsakabhāvena.
tika-vin07t0:2396_6: kathaṃ pana sunissāritoti āha “yasmā panassa ākaṅkhamāno saṅgho pabbājanīyakammaṃ kareyyāti vuttaṃ,
tika-vin07t0:2397_0: Ettha pana kuladūsakakammaṃ katvā pabbājanīyakammakatassa terasakakaṇḍakaṭṭhakathāyaṃ “yasmiṃ vihāre
tika-vin07t0:2397_1: vasantena yasmiṃ gāme kuladūsakakammaṃ kataṃ hoti,
tika-vin07t0:2397_2: tasmiṃ vihāre vā tasmiṃ gāme vā na vasitabba”ntiādinā yā sammāvattanā vuttā,
tika-vin07t0:2397_4: Yaṃ pana paṭippassaddhakammassa kuladūsakassa tattheva aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “yesu kulesu kuladūsakakammaṃ kataṃ,
tika-vin07t0:2397_8: Yadi evaṃ “tajjanīyakammārahassa niyasakammaṃ karoti…pe… evaṃ kho, upāli,
tika-vin07t0:2397_11: Yassa hi saṅgho “tajjanīyakammaṃ karomā”ti sanniṭṭhānaṃ katvā kammavācaṃ sāvento pabbājanīyakammavācaṃ sāveti,
tika-vin07t0:2397_13: Sace pana “tasseva pabbājanīyakammameva karomā”ti sanniṭṭhānaṃ katvā tadeva karoti,
tika-vin07t0:2398_0: Evamidha “nissāraṇa”nti adhippetassa pabbājanīyakammassa vasena atthaṃ dassetvā idāni tadaññesaṃ tajjanīyādīnaṃ
tika-vin07t0:2398_1: vasena nissāraṇe adhippete “appatto nissāraṇa”nti imassa paṭipakkhavasena sampatto nissāraṇaṃ,
tika-vin07t0:2398_3: Sunissārito”ti atthasambhavaṃ dassetuṃ puna “tañce saṅgho nissāretīti sace saṅgho”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:2398_6: Pāḷiyaṃ appatto nissāraṇanti ettha āpanno āveṇikavasena tajjanīyādisaṅkhātaṃ nissāraṇaṃ pattoti attho gahetabbo.
tika-vin07t0:2403_2: desessāmīti vinayadharassa vacanena āpattidiṭṭhiṃ paṭilabhitvā evamāha.
tika-vin07t0:2403_3: Teneva pāḷiyaṃ “so tassā āpattiyā anāpattidiṭṭhi hotī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:2403_4: Natthi āpattīti udakassa ṭhapanabhāvaṃ ajānitvā vā ṭhapitaṃ chaḍḍetvā vissaritvā vā gamane asañcicca
tika-vin07t0:2403_5: asatiyā anāpattipakkhopi sambhavatīti vinayadharo tattha anāpattidiṭṭhiṃ paṭilabhitvā evamāha.
tika-vin07t0:2403_6: Teneva pāḷiyaṃ “aññe bhikkhū tassa āpattiyā anāpattidiṭṭhino hontī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:2403_8: Anāpattidiṭṭhi ahosīti suttantikattherassa vinaye apakataññutāya vinayadharassa vacanamattena so evamahosi,
tika-vin07t0:2403_9: sā panassa āpatti eva udakāvasesassa ṭhapanabhāvaṃ ñatvā ṭhapitattā.
tika-vin07t0:2403_12: Teneva pāḷiyaṃ “tassā āpattiyā anāpattidiṭṭhi hotī”ti sabbattha āpatti icceva vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:2403_13: “Āpattiṃ āpajjamāno”ti idaṃ vinayadharatthero “tayā idaṃ udakaṃ ṭhapita”nti attanā puṭṭhena suttantikattherena
tika-vin07t0:2403_14: “āmāvuso”ti vuttavacanaṃ saritvā paṇṇattiakovidatāya sañcicceva akāsīti āpattidiṭṭhi hutvāva avoca.
tika-vin07t0:2403_15: Teneva pāḷiyaṃ “aññe bhikkhū tassā āpattiyā āpattidiṭṭhino hontī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:2404_1: “Na tāva bhinno”ti idaṃ ukkhipanatadanuvattanamattena saṅgho bhinno nāma na hoti,
tika-vin07t0:2404_2: taṃ nissāya pana ubhayapakkhikānaṃ pakkhaṃ pariyesitvā aññamaññaṃ kodhavasena kāyavacīkalahavaḍḍhaneneva hotīti imamatthaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:2405_1: Akāraṇetiādi anukkhipitvāva upāyena saññāpetvā hitesitāya āpattito mocetuṃ yuttaṭṭhāne kodhacittavasena viheṭhanatthāya katabhāvaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ,
tika-vin07t0:2406_2: dhammavādīnaṃ pakkhe nisīditvā adhammavādīnaṃ laddhiṃ gaṇhantopi dhammavādīnaṃ nānāsaṃvāsako hoti eva.
tika-vin07t0:2406_3: Kammaṃ kopetīti taṃ vinā gaṇassa apūraṇapakkhaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:2406_4: Yattha vā tattha vāti dhammavādīnaṃ pakkhe vā adhammavādīnaṃ pakkhe vāti attho.
tika-vin07t0:2406_5: Ime dhammavādinoti gaṇhātīti taṃtaṃpakkhagate bhikkhū yāthāvato vā ayāthāvato vā “ime dhammavādino”ti gaṇhāti,
tika-vin07t0:2407_2: Pāḷiyaṃ ettāvatāti “ettakapadesaṃ muñcitvā nisinnā mayaṃ kodhacitte uppannepi aññamaññaṃ ananulomikaṃ
tika-vin07t0:2407_3: kāyakammādiṃ pavattetuṃ na sakkhissāmā”ti sallekkhetvā dūre nisīditabbanti adhippāyo.
tika-vin07t0:2408_1: Pāḷiyaṃ bhaṇḍanajātātiādīsu kalahassa pubbabhāgo bhaṇḍanaṃ nāma.
tika-vin07t0:2411_1: Taṃ na jānantīti taṃ kalahaṃ na jānanti.
tika-vin07t0:2411_2: Ye upanayhantīti yathāvuttaṃ kodhākāraṃ citte bandhanti.
tika-vin07t0:2411_5: Pāḷiyaṃ natthi bāle 97 sahāyatāti bālaṃ nissāya sīlādiguṇasaṅkhātā sahāyatā natthi,
tika-vin07t0:2412_4: Khamanīyaṃ sarīraṃ yāpanīyaṃ jīvitaṃ “kacci vo sarīrañca dhāretuṃ,
tika-vin07t0:2412_11: Ekañca pana maññe cittanti ekassa cittavasena itaresampi pavattanato sabbesaṃ no ekaṃ viya cittanti attho.
tika-vin07t0:2412_12: Kacci pana vo anuruddhāti ettha voti nipātamattaṃ,
tika-vin07t0:2412_16: amhesu tīsu yo paṭhamaṃ paṭikkamatīti attho.
tika-vin07t0:2416_1: rathaīsasadisadantassa nāgassa hatthino etaṃ vivekaninnaṃ cittaṃ nāgena buddhanāgassa vivekaninnacittena sameti. Kasmā?
tika-vin07t0:2419_1: Yathā dhammo tathā tiṭṭhāhīti yathā dhammo ca vinayo ca ṭhito,
tika-vin07t0:2420_2: āpatti dukkaṭassā”ti idaṃ sāmaggībhedassa akārake sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:2420_4: tesaṃ paṭibāhituṃ vaṭṭati tesaṃ santakassapi senāsanassa vināsanavacanato.
tika-vin07t0:2420_5: “Vivittaṃ katvāpi dātabba”nti vuttattā pana yathāvuḍḍhaṃ varasenāsanaṃ adatvā vuḍḍhānampi asaññatānaṃ saññatehi vivittaṃ katvā dātabbanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:2421_1: Kammavācāya osāretvāti ettha ukkhittassa bhikkhuno āpattiyāpannabhāvaṃ paṭijānitvā sammāvattanena ukkhepakānaṃ
tika-vin07t0:2421_2: samuppannaosāraṇacchandassa pageva ñātattā paṭippassambhanakammavācāya ukkhittānuvattakā sayameva naṃ
tika-vin07t0:2423_3: Ādātabbato gahetabbato ādāyanti ācariyavādo vuttoti āha “ādāyaṃ attano ācariyavāda”nti.
tika-vin07t0:2424_0: Aṭṭhahi dūtaṅgehīti “sotā ca hoti sāvetā ca uggahetā ca dhāretā ca viññātā ca viññāpetā ca kusalo ca
tika-vin07t0:2424_1: sahitāsahitassa no ca kalahakārako”ti evaṃ vuttehi aṭṭhahi dūtaṅgehi.
tika-vin07t0:2433_1: Cūḷavaggassa paṭhame kammakkhandhake tāva “balavābalava”nti idaṃ ekapadaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:2433_3: Tañca “dukkhadukkha”ntiādīsu viya atisayatthe vattatīti āha “suṭṭhu balavaṃ paṭivadathā”ti,
tika-vin07t0:2433_4: ati viya balavaṃ katvā paṭivacanaṃ dethāti attho.
tika-vin07t0:2434_1: Pāḷiyaṃ āpatti āropetabbāti ettha kiñcāpi “mā kho tumhe āyasmanto eso ajesī”tiādike bhaṇḍanādijanake
tika-vin07t0:2434_2: vacane paññattā kāci āpatti nāma natthi musāpesuññādīsu etassa appaviṭṭhattā,
tika-vin07t0:2434_6: nedaṃ appicchatādīnaṃ atthāya vattatī”ti evaṃ apaññattena vuccamānassa bhikkhuno anādariyena anoramanapaccayā
tika-vin07t0:2434_7: vā aññavādavihesādikaraṇapaccayā vā yā āpatti hoti,
tika-vin07t0:2434_8: sā āpatti āropetabbā diṭṭhivipannassa viyāti evamattho daṭṭhabbo.
tika-vin07t0:2435_0: Yassa pana idaṃ vacanaṃ vināva kāyavācāhi āpannā lahukāpatti atthi,
tika-vin07t0:2435_8: aññe pana bhaṇḍanakārake upasaṅkamitvā “mā kho tumhe”tiādivacanaṃ na vadati,
tika-vin07t0:2435_14: Yo ca aññepi bhikkhū kalahāya samādapeti,
tika-vin07t0:2435_15: tassāpi evameva kammavācaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭati aññesaṃ samādāpanassapi bhaṇḍanakārakatte eva pavisanato.
tika-vin07t0:2435_17: kammavācaṃ kātukāmenapi ca tehi vuttavacanatthameva gahetvā tadanuguṇaṃ yojetvāva kātabbaṃ,
tika-vin07t0:2435_19: Bhūtena vatthunā katameva hi avipannaṃ hoti,
tika-vin07t0:2438_1: Appaṭiññāya katanti vatthuṃ vā āpattiṃ vā asampaṭicchāpetvā kataṃ.
tika-vin07t0:2438_2: Yo pana sabbesaṃ passantānaṃ eva vatthuvītikkamaṃ katvā pacchā kammakaraṇabhayena “na karomī”ti musā vadati,
tika-vin07t0:2439_0: “Pārājikāpattiyā vā”ti idaṃ liṅganāsananimittatāya pārājikassa kammena atikicchanīyato vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:2439_1: “Saṅghādisesāpattiyā vā”ti idaṃ pana parivāsādinissāraṇakammassa āveṇikassa vijjamānattā vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:2439_4: taṃ “āyatiṃ saṃvare ṭhatvā vuṭṭhānaṃ karohī”ti ovadiyamānassa anādariyādipaccayalahukāpattiṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:2439_5: Sīlavipattimūlakañhi lahukāpattiṃ āpanno idha abhedūpacārena “adhisīle sīlavipanno”ti vutto “atidiṭṭhiyā diṭṭhivipanno”ti ettha viya.
tika-vin07t0:2440_0: Yathā ca diṭṭhiṃ gahetvā voharantassa “ito diṭṭhito oramāhī”ti avatvā katakammaṃ kevalāya diṭṭhivipattiyā
tika-vin07t0:2440_1: katattā anāpattiyā kataṃ nāma adhammakammaṃ hoti,
tika-vin07t0:2440_2: evaṃ sīlavipattiṃ āpajjitvā lajjidhamme okkante yathādhammaṃ vuṭṭhāya saṃvare ṭhātukāmassa kataṃ tajjanīyādikammaṃ
tika-vin07t0:2440_3: kevalāya sīlavipattiyā katattā adesanāgāminiyā kataṃ nāma adhammakammaṃ hoti.
tika-vin07t0:2440_4: Teneva niyassakammepi “apissu bhikkhū pakatā parivāsaṃ dentā”tiādinā saṃvare aṭṭhānameva kammanimittabhāvena vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:2440_6: Keci pana “adesanāgāminiyāti idaṃ pārājikāpattiṃyeva sandhāya vuttaṃ,
tika-vin07t0:2440_8: taṃ sukkapakkhe “desanāgāminiyā āpattiyā kataṃ hotī”ti iminā vacanena virujjhati.
tika-vin07t0:2440_9: Saṅghādisesassāpi ca pariyāyato desanāgāminivohāre gayhamāne “āpattiyā kataṃ hotī”ti vuttavārato imassa vārassa viseso na siyā,
tika-vin07t0:2441_2: Aññakammassa vatthunāti tajjanīyato aññassa kammassa vatthunā aññakammakaraṇaṃ nāma koci dosopi na hotīti adhippāyo.
tika-vin07t0:2445_1: Niyassakamme pāḷiyaṃ apissūti apicāti imasmiṃ atthe nipātasamudāyo.
tika-vin07t0:2445_2: Nissāya te vatthabbanti ettha keci kalyāṇamittāyattavuttitaṃ sandhāya vuttanti vadanti,
tika-vin07t0:2445_4: ubhayenapissa serivihāro na vaṭṭatīti dīpitanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:2446_1: Pabbājanīyakamme “pabbājanīyakammaṃ paṭippassambhetū”ti idaṃ pakkamanādiṃ akatvā sammāvattantānaṃ vasena vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:2447_2: na gihivacananti ettha pariyāyatopi bhikkhū parakhuṃsanaṃ na vadanti,
tika-vin07t0:2447_3: gahaṭṭhā pana sarūpeneva akkosituṃ samatthāpi upakārīsu akāraṇaṃ evarūpaṃ na vadanti,
tika-vin07t0:2448_1: “Aṅgasamannāgamo purimehi asadiso”ti iminā tajjanīyādīnaṃ vuttakāraṇamattena idaṃ kātuṃ na vaṭṭatīti dīpeti.
tika-vin07t0:2448_2: Idha vuttena pana gihīnaṃ alābhāya parisakkanādinā aṅgena tānipi kātuṃ vaṭṭatīti gahetabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:2448_3: Ettha ca “saddhaṃ pasannaṃ dāyakaṃ kārakaṃ saṅghupaṭṭhākaṃ hīnena khuṃsetī”ti vuttattā tādisesu gihīsu
tika-vin07t0:2448_7: āpatti ca yattha katthaci desetuṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin07t0:2448_8: Yo ce tikkhattuṃ khamāpiyamānopi na khamati,
tika-vin07t0:2448_14: katakammenapi akatakammenapi saṅghamajjhe yathābhūtaṃ viññāpetvā khamāpetvā āpatti desetabbāti vadanti.
tika-vin07t0:2448_15: Dhammikapaṭissavassa asaccāpane pana tesaṃ santikaṃ gantvā “mayā asamavekkhitvā paṭissavaṃ katvā so na saccāpito,
tika-vin07t0:2448_16: taṃ me khamathā”tiādinā khamāpane vacanakkamo ñāpetabbo.
tika-vin07t0:2449_1: Pāḷiyaṃ maṅkubhūto nāsakkhi cittaṃ gahapatiṃ khamāpetunti tiṃsayojanamaggaṃ puna gantvāpi mānathaddhatāya
tika-vin07t0:2449_2: yathābhūtaṃ dosaṃ āvikatvā akhamāpanena “nāhaṃ khamāmī”ti tena paṭikkhitto maṅkubhūto khamāpetuṃ na sakkhi,
tika-vin07t0:2449_3: so punadeva sāvatthiṃ paccāgantvāpi mānaniggahatthāyeva punapi satthārā pesito purimanayeneva khamāpetuṃ asakkonto punāgacchi.
tika-vin07t0:2449_4: Athassa bhagavā “asantaṃ bhāvanamiccheyyā”tiādināva dhammaṃ desetvā mānanimmathanaṃ katvā anudūtadānaṃ anuññāsīti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:2450_2: āpattiṃ desāpetabbo”ti vuttattā pageva gahaṭṭho khamati ce,
tika-vin07t0:2451_1: Ukkhepanīyakammesu tīsu ariṭṭhavatthusmiṃ āpattiṃ āropetvāti visuṃ saṅghamajjheva pāpikāya diṭṭhiyā appaṭinissajjanapaccayā dukkaṭaṃ,
tika-vin07t0:2451_5: tena tena pakārena yojetvā kammavācā kātabbā.
tika-vin07t0:2451_6: Gahaṇākāraṃ pana vināpi “suṇātu me, bhante, saṅgho,
tika-vin07t0:2451_9: yadi saṅghassa pattakalla”nti evaṃ sāmaññatopi kammavācaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin07t0:2452_1: “Yaṃ diṭṭhiṃ nissāya bhaṇḍanādīni karotī”ti iminā diṭṭhiṃ nissāya uppannāni eva bhaṇḍanādīni idha adhippetāni,
tika-vin07t0:2452_3: Yo pana “bhaṇḍanādīnaṃ karaṇe doso natthī”ti diṭṭhiko hutvā bhaṇḍanādiṃ karoti,
tika-vin07t0:2457_4: pārivāsikā ca tesaṃ pakatattaṭṭhāne eva tiṭṭhanti.
tika-vin07t0:2457_8: “Vattaṃ karontī”ti ettakamattasseva vuttattā saddhivihārikādīhipi abhivādanādiṃ kātuṃ na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin07t0:2458_0: “Pārisuddhiuposathe kariyamāne”ti idaṃ pavāraṇādivasesu saṅghe pavārente anupagatachinnavassādīhi kariyamānapārisuddhiuposathampi sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:2459_0: “Pārivāsikassevā”ti idaṃ abbhānārahapariyosāne sabbe garukaṭṭhe sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:2459_1: Tesampi paccekaṃ oṇojanassa anuññātattā tadavasesā pakatattā eva taṃ na labhanti.
tika-vin07t0:2460_1: Hatthapāse ṭhitenāti dāyakassa hatthapāse paṭiggahaṇaruhanaṭṭhāneti adhippāyo.
tika-vin07t0:2462_3: Attano vacane pavattanakammanti evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo,
tika-vin07t0:2462_4: “mā pakkamāhī”ti vā “ehi vinayadharānaṃ sammukhībhāva”nti vā evaṃ attano āṇāya pavattanakakammaṃ na kātabbanti adhippāyo.
tika-vin07t0:2462_5: Evañhi kenaci savacanīye kate anādarena atikkamituṃ na vaṭṭati,
tika-vin07t0:2462_6: buddhassa saṅghassa āṇā atikkantā nāma hoti.
tika-vin07t0:2463_2: Senāsanaṃ na labhatīti vassaggena na labhati.
tika-vin07t0:2464_1: Sace vāyamantopīti ettha avisayabhāvaṃ ñatvā avāyamantopi saṅgayhati.
tika-vin07t0:2466_2: Mañce vā pīṭhe vāti ettha vā-
tika-vin07t0:2466_4: tena taṭṭikācammakhaṇḍādīsu dīghāsanesupi nisīdituṃ na vaṭṭatīti dīpitaṃ hoti.
tika-vin07t0:2467_0: Na vattabhedadukkaṭanti vuḍḍhatarassa jānantassāpi vattabhede dukkaṭaṃ natthīti dasseti.
tika-vin07t0:2472_6: Keci pana “tadaheva puna vattaṃ samādiyitvā aruṇaṃ uṭṭhāpetukāmassa ratticchedaparihāratthampī”ti vadanti.
tika-vin07t0:2473_0: “Sabhāgā bhikkhū vasantī”ti vuttattā visabhāgānaṃ vasanaṭṭhāne vattaṃ asamādiyitvā bahi eva kātumpi vaṭṭatīti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:2473_1: “Dve leḍḍupāte atikkamitvā”ti idaṃ vihāre bhikkhūnaṃ sajjhāyādisaddasavanūpacāravijahanatthaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:2473_2: “Mahāmaggato okkammā”ti idaṃ maggapaṭipannānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ upacārātikkamanatthaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:2474_0: “Sopi kenaci kammena pure aruṇe eva gacchatī”ti iminā ārocanāya katāya sabbesupi bhikkhūsu vihāragatesu
tika-vin07t0:2474_1: ūne gaṇe caraṇadoso vā vippavāsadoso vā na hoti ārocitattā sahavāsassāti dasseti.
tika-vin07t0:2474_3: Abbhānaṃ kātuṃ na vaṭṭatīti katampi akatameva hotīti attho.
tika-vin07t0:2477_4: Pāḷiyaṃ “paṭikassito saṅghena udāyi bhikkhu antarā ekissā āpattiyā…pe…
tika-vin07t0:2477_5: mūlāyapaṭikassanā”ti idaṃ karaṇavasena vipariṇāmetvā mūlāyapaṭikassanāya paṭikassitoti yojetabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:2477_6: Atha vā “mūlāya paṭikassanā khamati saṅghassā”ti uttarapadena saha paccattavaseneva yojetumpi vaṭṭati.
tika-vin07t0:2478_1: mūlāya paṭikassitvā”ti ettha antarā ekissā āpattiyā hetubhūtāya udāyiṃ bhikkhuṃ mūlāya paṭikassitvā mūladivase
tika-vin07t0:2478_2: ākaḍḍhitvā tassā antarāpattiyā samodhānaparivāsaṃ detūti yojanā.
tika-vin07t0:2478_3: Āvikārāpetvā vissajjetabboti tassa atekicchabhāvaṃ teneva saṅghassa pākaṭaṃ kāretvā lajjigaṇato viyojanavasena vissajjetabbo.
tika-vin07t0:2479_0: Sataṃ āpattiyoti kāyasaṃsaggādivasena ekadivase āpannā sataṃ āpattiyo.
tika-vin07t0:2479_4: tiṇṇaṃ samodhānaparivāsānañcāti imesaṃ sabbesaṃ parivāsānaṃ kammavācāpariyosāne.
tika-vin07t0:2480_1: “Dve leḍḍupātā atikkamitabbā”ti idaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ savanūpacārātikkamanaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:2480_2: Gāmassāti na vuttanti gāmassa upacāraṃ muñcituṃ vaṭṭatīti na vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:2480_3: Tena gāmūpacāre ṭhitāpi tattha dassanasavanūpacāre atikkamitvā ṭhitā bhikkhū ca bhikkhuniyo ca tassā ratticchedaṃ na karontīti dīpeti.
tika-vin07t0:2481_0: Anikkhittavattabhikkhūnaṃ vuttanayenevāti upacārasīmāya paviṭṭhānaṃ vasena ratticchedaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:2481_4: “Sammannitvā dātabbā”ti iminā sammatāya sahavāsepi ratticchedo na hotīti dasseti.
tika-vin07t0:2483_4: chārattaṃ mānattaṃ dātabba”nti idaṃ mūlāyapaṭikassanākammavācānantarameva dātuṃ vuttaṃ na hoti.
tika-vin07t0:2483_5: Mūlāyapaṭikassitassa pana pañcadivasāni parivasitvā yācitassa mānattacaraṇakāle āpannāya tatiyāya antarāpattiyā
tika-vin07t0:2483_7: Evañca dinnamānattassa ekena chārattena pubbe dinnamānattāhi tīhi āpattīhi saha catassannampi āpattīnaṃ mānattaṃ ciṇṇameva hoti.
tika-vin07t0:2483_8: Iminā pana nayena abbhānārahakāle āpannāya antarāpattiyā,
tika-vin07t0:2483_10: “Ekāhappaṭicchannādivasena pañcā”ti idaṃ ekāhappaṭicchannādīnaṃ catunnaṃ paccekaparivāsadānamānattadānaabbhānāni ekekaṃ katvā vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:2483_11: “Antarāpattivasena catasso”ti idampi mānattadānaabbhānāni tasmiṃ tasmiṃ mūlāyapaṭikassane ekattaṃ āropetvā vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:2486_3: appaṭicchannāya antarāpattiyā mūlāyapaṭikassane katepi tesaṃ makkhitabhāvasambhavato.
tika-vin07t0:2486_4: Tasmā “mānattaciṇṇadivasāpi parivutthadivasāpi sabbe makkhitāva hontī”ti imassānantaraṃ “samodhānaparivāso cassa dātabbo”ti evamettha yojanā kātabbā.
tika-vin07t0:2489_3: Appaṭicchannabhāvaṃ dassetunti ajānanādinā paṭicchannāyapi āpattiyā mānattārahatāvacanena appaṭicchannabhāvaṃ dassetuṃ. “Ekassa, āvuso,
tika-vin07t0:2489_5: Ettha ekassa ajānanapaṭicchannamāsassa parivāsāraho na hoti,
tika-vin07t0:2489_6: kevalaṃ āpattiyā appaṭicchannattā mānattāraho hotīti adhippāyo.
tika-vin07t0:2489_8: Saṅghādisesānaṃ parivāsadānādisabbavinicchayassa samuccayattā panesa samuccayakkhandhakoti vuttoti veditabbo.
tika-vin07t0:2494_1: Samathakkhandhake khīṇāsavassa vipulasatiṃ nissāya dātabbo vinayo codanādiasāruppānaṃ vinayanupāyo sativinayo.
tika-vin07t0:2495_3: codentīti ettha pana ummattakassa idaṃ ummattakaṃ,
