tika-vin07t0:2495_6: Tena ummattakena cittavipariyāsakatena ajjhāciṇṇena anācārena āpannāya āpattiyā gaggaṃ bhikkhuṃ codentīti evamattho daṭṭhabbo.
tika-vin07t0:2495_7: Paṭhamaṃ mūḷho hutvā pacchā amūḷhabhāvaṃ upagatassa dātabbo vinayo amūḷhavinayo.
tika-vin07t0:2496_1: Dhammavādīnaṃ yebhuyyabhāvasampādikā kiriyā yebhuyyasikāti imasmiṃ atthe sa-
tika-vin07t0:2496_5: Yebhuyyabhāvaṃ nissitasamathakiriyā yebhuyyasikāti evaṃ yebhuyyasikāsaddassa attho gahetabbo.
tika-vin07t0:2496_7: Yathāvuttasalākaggāhena hi dhammavādīnaṃ yebhuyyabhāve siddhe pacchā taṃ yebhuyyabhāvaṃ nissāyeva adhikaraṇavūpasamo hoti,
tika-vin07t0:2497_1: “Sesamettha tajjanīyādīsu vuttanayamevā”ti etena tajjanīyādisattakammāni viya idampi tassapāpiyasikākammaṃ asucibhāvādidosayuttassa,
tika-vin07t0:2497_2: saṅghassa ca vinicchaye atiṭṭhamānassa kattabbaṃ visuṃ ekaṃ niggahakammanti dasseti.
tika-vin07t0:2497_3: Etasmiñhi niggahakamme kate so puggalo “ahaṃ suddho”ti attano suddhiyā sādhanatthaṃ saṅghamajjhaṃ otarituṃ,
tika-vin07t0:2497_4: saṅgho cassa vinicchayaṃ dātuṃ na labhati,
tika-vin07t0:2497_5: taṃ kammakaraṇamatteneva ca taṃ adhikaraṇaṃ vūpasantaṃ hoti.
tika-vin07t0:2498_1: Keci panettha “so tathā niggahito niggahitova hoti,
tika-vin07t0:2498_3: Teneva pāḷiyaṃ osāraṇā na vuttā”ti vadanti.
tika-vin07t0:2498_4: Aññe pana “pāḷiyaṃ na upasampādetabbantiādinā sammāvattanassa vuttattā sammāvattitvā lajjidhamme okkantassa
tika-vin07t0:2498_5: osāraṇā avuttāpi tajjanīyādīsu viya nayato kammavācaṃ yojetvā osāraṇā kātabbā evā”ti vadanti,
tika-vin07t0:2498_8: vattaṃ paripūretvā paṭippassaddhiṃ labhissati. No ce,
tika-vin07t0:2501_1: Virūpato vipariṇāmaṭṭhena cittaṃ dukkhaṃ vipaccatīti āha “cittadukkhatthaṃ vohāro”tiādi.
tika-vin07t0:2502_0: Ādito paṭṭhāya ca tassa tassa kammassa viññātattāti vitthārato āgatakammavaggassa ādito paṭṭhāya vaṇṇanāmukhena
tika-vin07t0:2503_1: Pāḷiyaṃ ajjhattaṃ vāti attani vā attano parisāya vā.
tika-vin07t0:2503_2: Bahiddhā vāti parasmiṃ vā parassa parisāya vā.
tika-vin07t0:2505_1: Sammutisabhāvāyapi āpattiyā kāraṇūpacārena akusalābyākatabhāvena vuccamāne kusalassāpi āpattikāraṇattā
tika-vin07t0:2505_3: tathā avatvā “natthi āpattādhikaraṇaṃ kusala”nti evaṃvacanassa kāraṇaṃ dassetuṃ “ettha sandhāyabhāsitavasena attho veditabbo”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:2505_5: yadi hi āpatti nāma paramatthadhammasabhāvā bhaveyya,
tika-vin07t0:2505_7: Yasmā duṭṭhadosasikkhāpadaṭṭhakathādīsu dassitadosappasaṅgato paramatthasabhaāvatā na yuttā,
tika-vin07t0:2505_9: tasmā “siyā akusalaṃ siyā abyākata”ntipi nippariyāyato na vattabbā.
tika-vin07t0:2505_10: Yadi pana akusalaabyākatadhammasamuṭṭhitattameva upādāya pariyāyato “siyā akusalaṃ siyā abyākata”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:2505_11: Tadā kusaladhammasamauṭṭhitattampi upādāya pariyāyato “āpattādhikaraṇaṃ siyā kusala”ntipi vattabbaṃ bhaveyya.
tika-vin07t0:2505_12: Yato cetaṃ vacanaṃ āpattiyā akusalābyākatūpacārārahattassa kusalūpacārānārahattassa visuṃ kāraṇasabbhāvaṃ sandhāya bhāsitaṃ,
tika-vin07t0:2505_13: tasmā yaṃ taṃ kāraṇavisesaṃ sandhāya idaṃ bhāsitaṃ,
tika-vin07t0:2506_0: Idāni pana yo aṅgappahonakacittameva sandhāya āpattiyā akusalādibhāvo vutto,
tika-vin07t0:2506_4: Āpattādhikaraṇe kusalacittaṃ aṅganti paṇṇattiṃ ajānitvā kusalacittena cetiyaṅgaṇādīsu bhūmisodhanādivasena
tika-vin07t0:2506_6: Tasmiṃ satīti tasmiṃ āpattādhikaraṇe vijjamāne kusalacittasamuṭṭhitattena kusalavohārārahāya āpattiyā vijjamānāyāti adhippāyo.
tika-vin07t0:2506_7: Sāratthadīpaniyaṃ pana “tasmiṃ satī”ti imassa “tasmiṃ kusalacitte āpattibhāvena gahite”ti attho vutto,
tika-vin07t0:2507_0: Na sakkā vattunti yadi sammutisabhāvāyapi āpattiyā akusalādisamuṭṭhitattena akusalādivohāro karīyati,
tika-vin07t0:2507_1: tadā kusalavohāropi kattabboti “natthi āpattādhikaraṇaṃ kusala”nti na sakkā vattuṃ,
tika-vin07t0:2507_3: Tasmāti yasmā kusalādīnaṃ tiṇṇaṃ samānepi āpattiyā aṅgappahonakatte kusalavohārova āpattiyā paṭikkhitto,
tika-vin07t0:2507_5: tasmā nayidaṃ aṅgappahonakaṃ cittaṃ sandhāya vuttanti “āpattādhikaraṇaṃ siyā akusalaṃ siyā abyākataṃ,
tika-vin07t0:2507_6: natthi āpattādhikaraṇaṃ kusala”nti idaṃ āpattiyā samuṭṭhāpakattena aṅgappahonakaṃ kāraṇabhūtaṃ cittamattaṃ sandhāya na vuttaṃ,
tika-vin07t0:2507_8: Etena āpattiyā akusalādibhāvopi kenaci nimittena pariyāyatova vutto,
tika-vin07t0:2508_1: “āpattādhikaraṇaṃ siyā akusalaṃ siyā abyākata”nti idañhi yaṃ kiñci kadāci katthaci kāraṇaṃ bhavantaṃ aniyatakāraṇaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ na hoti.
tika-vin07t0:2508_2: Yaṃ pana sabbasikkhāpadesu āpattiyā kāraṇaṃ bhavitumarahati,
tika-vin07t0:2508_4: Akusalañhi paṇṇattiṃ ñatvā vītikkamantassa sabbāpattiyā kāraṇaṃ hoti,
tika-vin07t0:2508_5: lokavajjāpattiyā pana paṇṇattiṃ ajānantassapi kāraṇaṃ hoti.
tika-vin07t0:2508_6: Kevalaṃ paṇṇattivajjāpattīsu kusalābyākatacittapavattikkhaṇe eva akusalaṃ na vattati,
tika-vin07t0:2508_8: Abyākataṃ pana kāyavacībhūtaṃ kusalākusalādīnaṃ pavattikkhaṇe nirodhasamāpannassa sahaseyyāpattiyanti
tika-vin07t0:2508_9: sabbāpattiyā aṅgameva hoti channaṃ āpattisamuṭṭhānānaṃ kāyavācaṅgavirahitattābhāvā.
tika-vin07t0:2508_10: Tasmā imesaṃ akusalābyākatānaṃ sabbāpattimūlakattameva sandhāya idaṃ āpattiyā akusalattaṃ,
tika-vin07t0:2508_12: Yattha pana pathavīkhaṇanādīsu kusalampi āpattiyā kāraṇaṃ hoti,
tika-vin07t0:2508_13: tatthāpi āpattiyā tadupacārena kusalattavohāro ayutto sāvajjānavajjānaṃ ekattavohārassa viruddhattā.
tika-vin07t0:2509_0: Tattha ekantato akusalamevāti akusalacittena samuṭṭhahanato kāraṇūpacārato evaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:2509_4: Akusalaṃ hotīti akusalasamuṭṭhitāya kāraṇūpacārena akusalaṃ hoti.
tika-vin07t0:2509_5: Sahaseyyādivasena āpajjanato abyākataṃ hotīti itthiyādīhi saha piṭṭhipasāraṇavasappavattakāyadvārasaṅkhātarūpābyākatavaseneva
tika-vin07t0:2509_9: aññatvā ca āpajjanavasena imaṃ vikappabhāvaṃ sandhāya akusalattaabyākatattasaṅkhātaṃ yathāvuttaṃ imaṃ vikappasabhāvaṃ sandhāya idaṃ vacanaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:2510_0: Yadi evaṃ asañciccāpajjanapakkhe kusalenāpi āpajjanato tampi vikappaṃ sandhāya “āpattādhikaraṇaṃ siyā
tika-vin07t0:2510_1: kusala”ntipi kasmā na vuttanti āha “sace panā”tiādi.
tika-vin07t0:2510_3: Acittakasamuṭṭhānānaṃ “kusalacittaṃ āpajjeyyā”ti etena sāvajjabhūtāya āpattiyā kāraṇūpacārenāpi anavajjabhūtakusalavohāro ayuttoti dasseti.
tika-vin07t0:2510_4: “Na ca tatthā”tiādinā kusalassa āpattiyā kāraṇattaṃ vijjamānampi tathā voharituṃ ayuttanti paṭikkhipitvā
tika-vin07t0:2510_12: “Āpattādhikaraṇaṃ siyā akusalaṃ siyā abyākata”nti idaṃ kāraṇūpacārena pariyāyato vuttaṃ,
tika-vin07t0:2511_0: Yaṃ pana sāratthadīpaniyaṃ āpattiyā nippariyāyatova akusalādisabhāvataṃ samatthetuṃ bahuṃ papañcitaṃ,
tika-vin07t0:2511_1: taṃ na sārato paccetabbaṃ duṭṭhadosasikkhāpadaṭṭhakathāyameva paṭikkhittattā.
tika-vin07t0:2511_2: Tenevetthāpi “yaṃ cittaṃ āpattiyā aṅgaṃ hotī”tiādinā akusalacittassāpi āpattiyā kāraṇattena bhinnatāva dassitā.
tika-vin07t0:2511_4: taṃ heṭṭhā dassitamevāti idha na vitthārayimha.
tika-vin07t0:2511_5: Evaṃ vītikkamato yo vītikkamoti ettha akusalacittena ñatvā vītikkamantassa kāyavacīvītikkamasamuṭṭhitā āpattivītikkamoti vutto.
tika-vin07t0:2514_1: Pāḷiyaṃ vivādādhikaraṇaṃ ekaṃ samathaṃ anāgammātiādi pucchā.
tika-vin07t0:2514_3: Siyātissa vacanīyanti eteneva vūpasamaṃ siyāti vattabbaṃ bhaveyyāti attho.
tika-vin07t0:2514_8: Ubbāhikāya khīyanake pācittiyaṃ na vuttaṃ tattha chandadānassa natthitāya.
tika-vin07t0:2515_1: Vaṇṇāvaṇṇāyo katvāti khuddakamahantehi saññāṇehi yuttāyo katvā.
tika-vin07t0:2516_2: sammatīti ettha sammukhāvinayena apalokanādikammaṃ sampajjatīti attho daṭṭhabbo.
tika-vin07t0:2522_1: Puthupāṇikanti muṭṭhiṃ akatvā vikasitahatthatalehi piṭṭhiparikammaṃ vuccati.
tika-vin07t0:2524_3: Ettha ca dumāsassa vā dvaṅgulassa vā atikkantabhāvaṃ ajānantassāpi kesamassugaṇanāya acittakāpattiyo hontīti vadanti.
tika-vin07t0:2525_0: Kocchenāti usīratiṇādīni bandhitvā samaṃ chinditvā gahitakocchena.
tika-vin07t0:2526_6: tatopi adhikamattāyuttaṃ katvā kathanaṃ vikārakathanaṃ nāma,
tika-vin07t0:2527_1: Pāḷiyaṃ taruṇaññeva ambanti taruṇaṃ asañjātabījaṃ eva ambaphalaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:2528_1: Cattāri ahirājakulānīti sabbesaṃ ahibhedānaṃ catūsu eva saṅgahato vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:2529_0: Virūpakkhehi me mettanti virūpakkhajātikehi nāgehi saha mayhaṃ mittabhāvo hotu,
tika-vin07t0:2529_2: te sukhitā niddukkhā averā hontūti adhippāyo.
tika-vin07t0:2529_5: Apādakehīti ahikulehi saha sabbasattesu odhiso mettāpharaṇadassanaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:2529_6: Mā maṃ apādako hiṃsīti tāya mettāya attarakkhāvidhānadassanaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:2530_0: Sabbe sattātiādi attānaṃ upamaṃ katvā sabbasattesu anodhiso mettāpharaṇadassanaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:2530_1: Tattha mā kañci pāpamāgamāti kañci sattaṃ lāmakaṃ dukkhahetu,
tika-vin07t0:2531_0: Evaṃ mettāya attaguttiṃ dassetvā idāni ratanattayānussaraṇena dassetuṃ “appamāṇo”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:2532_3: Yasmā mayā mettādīhi tumhākañca mayhañca rakkhā katā,
tika-vin07t0:2532_4: yasmā ca sohaṃ bhagavato namo karomi,
tika-vin07t0:2533_2: Bīje hi chinne opakkamikapaṇḍako nāma abhabbo hotīti vadanti.
tika-vin07t0:2533_3: Eke pana “bījassāpi chedanakkhaṇe dukkaṭāpatti eva kamena purisindriyādike antarahite paṇḍako nāma abhabbo hoti,
tika-vin07t0:2533_5: Tādisaṃ vā dukkhaṃ uppādentassāti muṭṭhippahārādīhi attano dukkhaṃ uppādentassa.
tika-vin07t0:2534_1: Pāḷiyaṃ tuyheso pattoti “yo ca arahā ceva iddhimā ca,
tika-vin07t0:2534_4: Taṃ pattaṃ gahetvā tikkhattuṃ rājagahaṃ anupariyāyīti ettha veḷuparamparāya baddhapattassa uparibhāge
tika-vin07t0:2534_5: ākāse nagaraṃ tikkhattuṃ anupariyāyitvā ṭhitabhāvaṃ sandhāya “pattaṃ gahetvā”ti vuttaṃ,
tika-vin07t0:2534_6: na pana thero hatthena pattaṃ sayameva aggahesi.
tika-vin07t0:2534_7: Keci pana vadanti “iddhibalena taṃ pattaṃ veḷuparamparato muñcitvā theraṃ anubandhamāno aṭṭhāsi,
tika-vin07t0:2534_8: so ca anena hatthena gahito viya ahosī”ti.
tika-vin07t0:2534_9: Tathā ṭhitameva pana sandhāya “bhāradvājassa hatthato pattaṃ gahetvā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:2534_11: anubandhiṃsūti ye ca manussā paṭhamaṃ pāṭihāriyaṃ nāddasaṃsu,
tika-vin07t0:2534_13: Thero ca sīhabyagghādirūpaṃ gahetvā vikubbaniddhiṃ dasseti,
tika-vin07t0:2534_14: te ca acchariyabbhutajātā uccāsaddā mahāsaddā ahesuṃ.
tika-vin07t0:2534_17: Iddhipāṭihāriyaṃ na dassetabbanti ettha “yo pakativaṇṇaṃ vijahitvā kumāravaṇṇaṃ vā dasseti,
tika-vin07t0:2534_19: vividhampi senābyūhaṃ dassetī”ti evamāgatā attano sarīrassa vikārāpādanavasappavattā vikubbaniddhi adhippetāti
tika-vin07t0:2534_22: sataṃ vā sahassaṃ vā satasahassaṃ vā āvajjetvā ñāṇena adhiṭṭhāti “bahuko homī”ti evaṃ dassitā adhiṭṭhānavasena nipphannā adhiṭṭhāniddhi nāma.
tika-vin07t0:2535_0: 253. Pāḷiyaṃ na acchupiyantīti na phusitāni honti. Rūpakākiṇṇānīti itthirūpādīhi ākiṇṇāni.
tika-vin07t0:2536_2: Etassa valayādhārakassa anuccatāya ṭhapitā pattā na paripatantīti “tayo patte ṭhapetuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:2536_6: Ete ca uccatarā honti pattehi saha patanasabhāvā.
tika-vin07t0:2536_10: Tādisassa dāruādhārakassa avitthiṇṇatāya ṭhapitopi patto patatīti “anokāso”ti vutto.
tika-vin07t0:2537_4: Sabbattha pana hatthappamāṇato abbhantare ṭhapetuṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin07t0:2538_1: Pattamāḷakanti upacikānaṃ anuṭṭhahanatthāya bhūmito uccataraṃ kataṃ vedikākāramāḷakaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:2538_6: Aññena pana bhaṇḍakenāti aññena bhārabandhanena bhaṇḍakena.
tika-vin07t0:2538_7: “Bandhitvā olambetu”nti vuttattā pattatthavikāya aṃsabaddhako yathā laggitaṭṭhānato na parigaḷati,
tika-vin07t0:2538_9: Bandhitvāpi upari ṭhapetuṃ na vaṭṭatīti upari nisīdantā ottharitvā bhindantīti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:2539_1: Pariharitunti divase divase piṇḍāya caraṇatthāya ṭhapetuṃ.
tika-vin07t0:2539_2: Pattaṃ alabhantena pana ekadivasaṃ piṇḍāya caritvā bhuñjitvā chaḍḍetuṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin07t0:2540_1: “Paṭiggahaṃ katvā”ti vuttattā ucchiṭṭhahatthena udakaṃ gahetvā pattaṃ paripphositvā dhovanaghaṃsanavasena hatthaṃ dhovituṃ vaṭṭati,
tika-vin07t0:2540_2: ettakena pattaṃ paṭiggahaṃ katvā hattho dhovito nāma na hoti.
tika-vin07t0:2540_3: Ekaṃ udakagaṇḍusaṃ gahetvāti pattaṃ aphusitvā tattha udakameva ucchiṭṭhahatthena ukkhipitvā gaṇḍusaṃ katvā,
tika-vin07t0:2540_4: vāmahattheneva vā pattaṃ ukkhipitvā mukhena gaṇḍusaṃ gahetumpi vaṭṭati.
tika-vin07t0:2540_5: Bahi udakena vikkhāletvāti dvīsu aṅgulīsu āmisamattaṃ vikkhāletvā bahi gahetumpi vaṭṭati.
tika-vin07t0:2540_6: Paṭikhāditukāmoti ettha na sayaṃ khāditukāmopi aññesaṃ khādanārahaṃ ṭhapetuṃ labhati.
tika-vin07t0:2541_3: Nisseṇimpīti catūhi daṇḍehi cīvarappamāṇena āyatacaturassaṃ katvā baddhapaṭalampi.
tika-vin07t0:2541_4: Ettha hi cīvarakoṭiyo samakaṃ bandhitvā cīvaraṃ yathāsukhaṃ sibbanti.
tika-vin07t0:2541_5: Tattha attharitabbanti tassā nisseṇiyā upari cīvarassa upatthambhanatthāya attharitabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:2541_6: Kathinasaṅkhātāya nisseṇiyā cīvarassa bandhanakarajju kathinarajjūti majjhimapadalopīsamāsoti āha “yāyā”tiādi.
tika-vin07t0:2541_7: Tattha yasmā dvinnaṃ paṭalānaṃ ekasmiṃ adhike jāte tattha valiyo honti,
tika-vin07t0:2541_8: tasmā dupaṭṭacīvarassa paṭaladvayampi samakaṃ katvā bandhanakarajju kathinarajjūti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:2542_0: Pāḷiyaṃ kathinassa anto jīratīti kathine baddhassa cīvarassa pariyanto jīrati.
tika-vin07t0:2542_1: Kathinanissitañhi cīvaraṃ idha nissayavohārena “kathina”nti vuttaṃ “mañcā ghosantī”tiādīsu viya.
tika-vin07t0:2542_2: Anuvātaṃ paribhaṇḍanti kathine bandhanarajjūhi cīvarassa samantā pariyantassa ajīraṇatthaṃ yehi kehici coḷakehi dīghato anuvātaṃ,
tika-vin07t0:2542_3: tiriyato paribhaṇḍañca sibbitvā kātuṃ yattha rajjuke pavesetvā daṇḍesu paliveṭhetvā cīvarasamakaṃ ākaḍḍhituṃ sakkā,
tika-vin07t0:2542_5: Keci pana “kathinasaṅkhātesu kilañjādīsu eva ajīraṇatthāya anuvātaparibhaṇḍakaraṇaṃ anuññāta”nti vadanti.
tika-vin07t0:2542_8: Aññaṃ nisseṇinti dīghato ca tiriyato ca aññaṃ daṇḍaṃ ṭhapetvā bandhituṃ.
tika-vin07t0:2545_3: Addhānamaggo paṭipajjitabboti ettha addhayojanaṃ addhānamaggo nāma,
tika-vin07t0:2545_6: tattha ṭhatvā saṅghāṭikaṇṇādiṃ anadhiṭṭhahitvā gamane padavārena āpattīti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:2547_4: Udakena otthariyyatīti samantā vassodakaṃ āgantvā kūpe patatīti attho.
tika-vin07t0:2548_2: Arahaṭaghaṭiyantaṃ nāma cakkasaṇṭhānaṃ anekāraṃ are are ghaṭikāni bandhitvā ekena,
tika-vin07t0:2549_3: Pakkhapāsake ṭhapetvāti samantā caturassākārena phalakādīni ṭhapetvā.
tika-vin07t0:2550_5: Yattha uṇhapāyāsādiṃ pakkhipitvā upari bhojanapātiṃ ṭhapenti bhattassa uṇhabhāvāvigamanatthaṃ,
tika-vin07t0:2550_9: Idañca āsittakūpadhānaṃ paccantesu na jānanti kātuṃ,
tika-vin07t0:2550_11: Keci pana “gihiparibhogo ayomayādi sabbopi ādhāro āsittakūpadhānameva anulometī”ti vadanti,
tika-vin07t0:2551_1: Pattaṃ nikkujjitunti ettha kammavācāya asambhogakaraṇavaseneva nikkujjanaṃ,
tika-vin07t0:2551_4: taṃ vaḍḍhaṃ kammavācāya saṅghena saddhiṃ asambhogaṃ saṅgho karotūti attho.
tika-vin07t0:2552_1: Asambhogaṃ saṅghena karaṇanti saṅghena vaḍḍhassa asambhogakaraṇaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:2552_5: asambhogaṃ saṅghenāti ettha saṅghena asambhogo hotīti attho daṭṭhabbo.
tika-vin07t0:2552_8: aṭṭhakathāyañca “koci deyyadhammo na gahetabbo”ti vuttattā patte nikkujjite tassa santakaṃ ñatvā gaṇhantassa dukkaṭamevāti gahetabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:2553_3: Taṃ te mayaṃ paṭiggaṇhāmāti taṃ te aparādhaṃ mayaṃ khamāma.
tika-vin07t0:2553_4: Bhikkhūnaṃ alābhāya parisakkatītiādīsu alābhāya parisakkanādito viratoti evamattho gahetabbo.
tika-vin07t0:2554_1: Yāva pacchimā sopānakaḷevarāti paṭhamasopānaphalakaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:2554_2: Tañhi pacchā dussena santhatattā eva vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:2554_3: “Pacchimaṃ janataṃ tathāgato anukampatī”ti idaṃ thero anāgate bhikkhūnaṃ celapaṭikassa akkamanapaccayā
tika-vin07t0:2554_4: apavādaṃ sikkhāpadapaññattiyā nivāraṇena bhagavato anukampaṃ sandhāyāha.
tika-vin07t0:2555_0: 269-270. Bījaninti caturassabījaniṃ. Ekapaṇṇacchattanti tālapaṇṇādinā ekena pattena katachattaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:2556_2: Dīghaṃ kārentīti kesehi saddhiṃ acchinditvā ṭhapāpenti.
tika-vin07t0:2556_4: heṭṭhā hanukapasse dveti cattāro koṇā paññāyanti,
tika-vin07t0:2556_6: Pāḷiyaṃ dāṭhikaṃ ṭhapāpentīti uttaroṭṭhe massuṃ acchinditvā ṭhapāpenti.
tika-vin07t0:2557_3: Bandhanamattanti vāsidaṇḍādīnaṃ koṭīsu apātanatthaṃ lohehi bandhanaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:2558_2: tattha bandhitabba”nti etena asañcicca kāyabandhanaṃ abandhitvā paviṭṭhassa anāpattīti dasseti.
tika-vin07t0:2558_3: Murajavaṭṭisaṇṭhānaṃ veṭhetvā katanti evaṃ bahurajjuke ekato katvā nānāvaṇṇehi suttehi katanti keci vadanti.
tika-vin07t0:2558_5: Vikāraṃ pana adassetvā maṭṭhaṃ katvā nirantaraṃ veṭhitaṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin07t0:2558_6: Teneva dutiyapārājikasaṃvaṇṇanāyaṃ vuttaṃ “bahurajjuke ekato katvā ekena nirantaraṃ veṭhetvā kataṃ ‘bahurajjuka’nti na vattabbaṃ,
tika-vin07t0:2559_1: Pāḷiyaṃ gaṇṭhikaphalakaṃ pāsakaphalakanti ettha dārudantādimayesu phalakesu gaṇṭhikapāsakāni appetvā cīvare ṭhapetuṃ anuññātaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:2561_4: Na hi pakataṅgulena caturaṅgulappamāṇaṃ dantakaṭṭhaṃ kaṇṭhe avilaggaṃ khādituṃ sakāti.
tika-vin07t0:2562_1: Pāḷiyaṃ sakāya niruttiyā buddhavacanaṃ dūsentīti māgadhabhāsāya sabbesaṃ vattuṃ sukaratāya hīnajaccāpi uggaṇhantā dūsentīti attho.
tika-vin07t0:2563_0: 289. Mā bhikkhū byābādhayiṃsūti lasuṇagandhena bhikkhū mā bādhayiṃsu.
tika-vin07t0:2569_1: Senāsanakkhandhake sisireti sisirakāle himapātavasena sattāhavaddalikādivassapātavassena ca uppanno kharo
tika-vin07t0:2569_4: tena ca vihārena vātātapo paṭihaññatīti atthoti āha “vihārena paṭihaññatī”ti.
tika-vin07t0:2570_1: Āviñchanachiddanti yattha aṅguliṃ vā rajjusaṅkhalikādiṃ vā pavesetvā kavāṭaṃ ākaḍḍhantā dvārabāhaṃ phusāpenti,
tika-vin07t0:2570_3: Senāsanaparibhoge akappiyaṃ nāma natthīti dassanatthaṃ “sacepi dīpinaṅguṭṭhenā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:2570_4: Cetiye vedikāsadisanti vātapānadāruṃ vā jālaṃ vā aṭṭhapetvā dāruṭṭhāne cetiye vedikāya paṭṭādīni viya iṭṭhakādīhi uddhaṃ,
tika-vin07t0:2570_6: Thambhakavātapānaṃ nāma tiriyaṃ dārūni adatvā uddhaṃ ṭhapitadārūhi eva kataṃ.
tika-vin07t0:2570_7: Coḷakapādapuñchanaṃ bandhitunti vātapānappamāṇena pādapuñchanasadisaṃ coḷakādinā bandhitvā vagguliādippavesananivāraṇatthaṃ,
tika-vin07t0:2571_4: Āyatacaturassā pana sattaṅgapañcaṅgāpi uccapādā na vaṭṭanti.
tika-vin07t0:2571_5: Vetteheva caturassādiākārena kataṃ bhaddapīṭhanti āha “vettamayaṃ pīṭha”nti.
tika-vin07t0:2571_6: Dārupaṭṭikāya uparīti aṭaniākārena ṭhitadārupaṭalassa heṭṭhā uddhaṃ pādaṃ katvā.
tika-vin07t0:2571_8: Eḷakassa pacchimapādadvayaṃ viya vaṅkākārena ṭhitattā panetaṃ “eḷakapādapīṭha”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:2571_10: latā ca muñcitvā avasesaṃ gacchādikaṃ sabbampi tiṇajāti evāti āha “yesaṃ kesañci tiṇajātikāna”ntiādi.
tika-vin07t0:2572_1: Sīsappamāṇaṃ nāma yattha gīvāya saha sakalaṃ sīsaṃ ṭhapetuṃ sakkā,
tika-vin07t0:2572_5: taṃ vaṭṭaṃ vā caturassaṃ vā katvā sibbitaṃ yathā koṭito koṭi vitthārato puthulaṭṭhānaṃ muṭṭhiratanappamāṇaṃ hoti,
tika-vin07t0:2572_8: taṃ pana antesu ṭhapitacoḷaṃ koṭiyā koṭiṃ āhacca diguṇaṃ kataṃ tikaṇṇaṃ hoti.
tika-vin07t0:2572_9: Tesu tīsu kaṇṇesu dvinnaṃ kaṇṇānamantaraṃ vidatthicaturaṅgulaṃ hoti,
tika-vin07t0:2572_10: majjhaṭṭhānaṃ koṭito koṭiṃ āhacca muṭṭhiratanaṃ hoti,
tika-vin07t0:2573_1: uṇṇabhisisaṅkhyameva gacchatī”ti sāmaññato vuttattā gonakādiakappiyampi uṇṇamayattharaṇaṃ bhisiyaṃ pakkhipitvā sayituṃ vaṭṭatīti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:2574_1: Cammamayaṃ pana bimbohanaṃ tūlapuṇṇampi na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin07t0:2574_4: Paribhijjatīti mañcādito sāriyamānā pīṭhakoṭiādīsu nisīdantehi ghaṃsiyamānā bhisi paribhijjati.
tika-vin07t0:2574_6: Pāḷiyaṃ chaviṃ uppāṭetvā harantīti bhisicchaviṃ corā haranti.
tika-vin07t0:2574_7: Phositunti corehi haritassa pacchā haritasaññāṇaphusitabindūni dātuṃ.
tika-vin07t0:2576_1: “Karohī”ti vattumpi na labbhatīti āṇattiyā eva paṭikkhittattā dvārapālaṃ “kiṃ na karosī”tiādinā pariyāyena vattuṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin07t0:2576_2: Jātakapakaraṇanti jātakapaṭisaṃyuttaṃ itthipurisādi yaṃ kiñci rūpaṃ adhippetaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:2576_3: “Parehi kārāpetu”nti vuttattā buddharūpampi sayaṃ kātuṃ na labhati.
tika-vin07t0:2577_1: Upacāro na hotīti gabbhassa bahi samantā anuparigamanassa okāso nappahoti.
tika-vin07t0:2577_4: Kappakataṃ viya sārakhāṇuke ākoṭetvā evaṃ katameva “āharimaṃ bhittipāda”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:2577_5: Upatthambhanatthaṃ bhūmiyaṃ patiṭṭhāpetunti jiṇṇabhittipādena bahi samānabhāraṃ khāṇukappasīsena ussāpetvā mūlena bhūmiyaṃ patiṭṭhāpetuṃ.
tika-vin07t0:2578_0: Ubhatokuṭṭaṃ nīharitvā katapadesassāti yathā bahi ṭhitā ujukaṃ anto nisinne na passanti,
tika-vin07t0:2578_1: evaṃ dvārābhimukhaṃ pidahanavasena bhittiñca aññato dvārañca yojetvā kataṭṭhānaṃ vadati.
tika-vin07t0:2578_3: Vaṃsaṃ datvāti purisappamāṇe pāde nikhaṇitvā tesaṃ upari piṭṭhivaṃsasadisaṃ passavaṃsaṃ ṭhapetvā osāretvā.
tika-vin07t0:2578_4: Ekaṃ daṇḍakoṭiṃ atiuccāya vihārabhittikoṭiyā ekaṃ koṭiṃ nīce vaṃsapiṭṭhiyaṃ ṭhapanavasena daṇḍake pasāretvā.
tika-vin07t0:2578_5: Cakkalayutto kiṭikoti kavāṭaṃ viya vivaraṇathakanasukhatthaṃ cakkalabandhakiṭikaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:2578_8: kappasīsehi vā upatthambhanīhi ukkhipitvā pacchā otaraṇakiṭikampi.
tika-vin07t0:2579_0: 301. Pānīyaṃ otappatīti pānīyabhājanesu ṭhapitapānīyaṃ ātapena santappati.
tika-vin07t0:2581_1: Āloko antaradhāyīti yo buddhārammaṇāya pītiyā ānubhāvena mahanto obhāso ahosi,
tika-vin07t0:2581_2: yena cassa padīpasahassena viya vigatandhakāro maggo ahosi,
tika-vin07t0:2581_3: so bahinagare chavasarīrasamākulaṃ duggandhaṃ bībhacchaṃ āmakasusānaṃ pattassa bhayena pītivege mandībhūte antaradhāyi.
tika-vin07t0:2582_0: Sataṃ hatthīti gāthāya hatthino satasahassānīti evaṃ paccekaṃ sahassa-
tika-vin07t0:2582_2: Padavītihārassāti “buddhaṃ vandissāmī”ti ratanattayaṃ uddissa gacchato ekapadavītihārassa,
tika-vin07t0:2582_5: taṃ soḷasiṃ kalaṃ yathāvuttā hatthiādayo sabbe nāgghanti nārahanti,
tika-vin07t0:2583_0: Andhakāro antaradhāyīti puna balavapītiyā āloke samuppanne antaradhāyi.
tika-vin07t0:2584_1: Dadeyyāti navakammaṃ adhiṭṭhātuṃ vihāre issariyaṃ dadeyyāti attho.
tika-vin07t0:2588_3: “Taṃ na gāhetabba”nti vacanassa kāraṇamāha “paccayeneva hi ta”ntiādinā,
tika-vin07t0:2588_4: paccayaññeva nissāya tattha vasitvā paṭijagganā bhavissantīti adhippāyo.
tika-vin07t0:2589_4: “Adātuṃ na labbhatī”ti iminā sañcicca adadantassa paṭibāhane pavisanato dukkaṭanti dīpeti.
tika-vin07t0:2590_0: “Na gocaragāmo ghaṭṭetabbo”ti vuttamevatthaṃ vibhāvetuṃ “na tattha manussā vattabbā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:2590_1: Vitakkaṃ chinditvāti “iminā nīhārena gacchantaṃ disvā nivāretvā paccaye dassantī”ti evarūpaṃ vitakkaṃ anuppādetvā.
tika-vin07t0:2590_4: “Suddhacittattāva anavajja”nti idaṃ pucchitakkhaṇe kāraṇācikkhanaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ na hoti asuddhacittassapi pucchitapañhavisajjane dosābhāvā.
tika-vin07t0:2590_5: Evaṃ pana gate maṃ pucchissantītisaññāya agamanaṃ sandhāya vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:2591_1: Muddavedikāyāti cetiyassa hammiyavedikāya ghaṭākārassa upari caturassavedikāya.
tika-vin07t0:2592_4: Iti saddhādeyyeti evaṃ heṭṭhā vuttanayena saddhāya dātabbe vassāvāsikalābhavisayeti attho.
tika-vin07t0:2593_1: tañca “tato catupaccayaṃ paribhuñjathā”ti dinnakhettādito uppannattā kappiyakārakānaṃ hatthe “kappiyabhaṇḍaṃ
tika-vin07t0:2593_2: paribhuñjathā”ti dāyakehi dinnavatthusadisaṃ hotīti āha “kappiyakārakānaṃ hī”tiādi.
tika-vin07t0:2595_0: “Kappiyabhaṇḍavasenā”ti sāmaññato vuttamevatthaṃ vibhāvetuṃ “cīvarataṇḍulādivaseneva cā”ti vuttaṃ. Ca-
tika-vin07t0:2595_5: kappiyabhaṇḍavasena ca apalokanappakāraṃ dassetuṃ “taṃ pana evaṃ kattabba”ntiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:2596_0: Cīvarapaccayaṃ sallakkhetvāti saddhādeyyatatruppādādivasena tasmiṃ vassāvāse labbhamānaṃ cīvarasaṅkhātaṃ paccayaṃ “ettaka”nti paricchinditvā.
tika-vin07t0:2596_3: vuḍḍho ca navakassā”ti idaṃ senāsanaggāhassa attanāva attano gahaṇaṃ asāruppanti vuttaṃ,
tika-vin07t0:2596_5: Aṭṭhapi soḷasapi jane sammannituṃ vaṭṭatīti ekakammavācāya sabbepi ekato sammannituṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin07t0:2596_6: Niggahakammameva hi saṅgho saṅghassa na karoti.
tika-vin07t0:2596_7: Teneva sattasatikakkhandhake “ubbāhikakammasammutiyaṃ aṭṭhapi janā ekatova sammatāti.
tika-vin07t0:2598_2: Āvāsesu pakkhipitvāti “ito uppannaṃ asukasmiṃ asukasmiñca āvāse vasantā pāpetvā gaṇhantū”ti vācāya upasaṃharitvā.
tika-vin07t0:2598_3: Pavisitabbanti mahālābhe pariveṇe vasitvāva lābho gahetabboti adhippāyo.
tika-vin07t0:2599_0: Ayampīti ettha yo paṃsukūliko paccayaṃ vissajjeti.
tika-vin07t0:2599_2: Pādamūle ṭhapetvā sāṭakaṃ dentīti paccayadāyakā denti.
tika-vin07t0:2599_3: Etena gahaṭṭhehi pādamūle ṭhapetvā dinnampi paṃsukūlikānampi vaṭṭatīti dasseti.
tika-vin07t0:2599_4: Atha vassāvāsikaṃ demāti vadantīti ettha paṃsukūlikānaṃ na vaṭṭatīti ajjhāharitvā yojetabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:2600_0: Upanibandhitvā gāhāpetabbanti idha rukkhādīsu vasitvā cīvaraṃ gaṇhathāti paṭibandhaṃ katvā gāhetabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:2601_1: Antarāmuttakaṃ pana pāṭipadaṃ atikkamitvāpi gāhetuṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin07t0:2601_2: Nibaddhavattaṃ ṭhapetvāti sajjhāyamanasikārādīsu nirantarakaraṇīyesu kattabbaṃ katikavattaṃ katvā.
tika-vin07t0:2602_3: Tañhi gaṇasaṅgaṇikaṃ pahāya ekacārikeneva vattitabbattā evaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:2603_0: Dantakaṭṭhakhādanavattanti dantakaṭṭhamāḷake nikkhittesu dantakaṭṭhesu “divase divase ekameva dantakaṭṭhaṃ
tika-vin07t0:2603_5: Khandhakavattanti vattakkhandhake āgataṃ piṇḍacārikavattato avasiṭṭhavattaṃ tassa “bhikkhācāravatta”nti visuṃ gahitattā.
tika-vin07t0:2604_0: Idāni yaṃ dāyakā pacchimavassaṃvutthānaṃ vassāvāsikaṃ denti,
tika-vin07t0:2604_2: Āgantuko sace bhikkhūti cīvare gāhite pacchā āgato āgantuko bhikkhu.
tika-vin07t0:2604_4: Paṭhamavassūpagatāti āgantukassa āgamanato puretarameva pacchimikāya vassūpanāyikāya vassūpagatā.
tika-vin07t0:2604_5: Laddhaṃ laddhanti punappunaṃ dāyakānaṃ santikā āgatāgatasāṭakaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:2605_1: Paṭhamameva katikāya katattā “neva adātuṃ labhantī”ti vuttaṃ,
tika-vin07t0:2605_3: Tesameva dātabbanti vassūpagatesu aladdhavassāvāsikānaṃ ekaccānameva dātabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:2606_2: Tattha apalokanakammaṃ katvā gāhitanti “chinnavassānaṃ vassāvāsikañca idāni uppajjanakavassāvāsikañca
tika-vin07t0:2606_3: imesaṃ dātuṃ ruccatī”ti anantare vuttanayena apalokanaṃ katvā gāhitaṃ saṅghena dinnattā vibbhantopi labhati.
tika-vin07t0:2606_5: Paccayavasena gāhitaṃ pana temāsaṃ vasitvā gahetuṃ attanā,
tika-vin07t0:2606_6: dāyakehi ca anumatattā bhatiniviṭṭhampi chinnavassopi vibbhantopi na labhatīti keci ācariyā vadanti.
tika-vin07t0:2606_8: Teneva vassūpanāyikadivase eva dāyakehi dinnavassāvāsikaṃ gahitabhikkhuno vassacchedaṃ akatvā vāsova heṭṭhā vihito,
tika-vin07t0:2606_12: Tasmā vassaggena gāhitaṃ chinnavassādayo na labhantīti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:2607_0: “Saṅghikaṃ hotī”ti etena vutthavassānampi vassāvāsikabhāgo saṅghikato amocito tesaṃ vibbhamena saṅghiko hotīti dasseti.
tika-vin07t0:2607_1: Labhatīti “mama pattabhāgaṃ etassa dethā”ti dāyake sampaṭicchāpenteneva saṅghikato viyojitaṃ hotīti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:2611_1: Pāḷiyaṃ ubhayattha paribāhiroti kamena ubhayassapi muttattā vuttaṃ,
tika-vin07t0:2612_1: Yaṃ tiṇṇaṃ pahotīti mañcapīṭhavinimuttaṃ yaṃ āsanaṃ tiṇṇaṃ sukhaṃ nisīdituṃ pahoti,
tika-vin07t0:2612_3: Ettha mañcapīṭharahitesu asamānāsanikāpi tayo nisīdituṃ labhanti.
tika-vin07t0:2612_5: Adīghāsanesu mañcapīṭhesu samānāsanikā eva dve nisīdituṃ labhanti duvaggasseva anuññātattā.
tika-vin07t0:2613_0: Hatthinakho heṭṭhābhāge etassa atthīti hatthinakho, pāsādo.
tika-vin07t0:2613_2: so sabbadisāsu anekehi hatthirūpehi samalaṅkato ṭhito.
tika-vin07t0:2613_3: Tassūpari kato pāsādo hatthikumbhe patiṭṭhito viya hotīti āha “hatthikumbhe patiṭṭhita”nti.
tika-vin07t0:2613_5: Puggalikaṃ pana suvaṇṇādivicitraṃ bhikkhussa sampaṭicchitumeva na vaṭṭati “na kenaci pariyāyena jātarūparajataṃ sāditabba”nti vuttattā.
tika-vin07t0:2613_6: Tenevettha aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “saṅghikavihāre vā puggalikavihāre vā”ti na vuttaṃ,
tika-vin07t0:2613_7: gonakādiakappiyabhaṇḍavisaye eva vuttaṃ ekabhikkhussāpi tesaṃ gahaṇe dosābhāvā.
tika-vin07t0:2613_9: gihīhi attano santakaṃ attharitvā dinnaniyāmenāti attho.
tika-vin07t0:2616_0: 321. Arañjaroti bahuudakagaṇhanikā mahācāṭi, jalaṃ gaṇhitumalanti arañjaro.
tika-vin07t0:2617_0: Thāvarena ca thāvarantiādīsu pañcasu koṭṭhāsesu purimadvayaṃ thāvaraṃ,
tika-vin07t0:2617_2: Samakameva detīti ettha ūnakaṃ dentampi vihāravatthusāmantaṃ gahetvā dūrataraṃ dukkhagopaṃ vissajjetuṃ vaṭṭatīti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:2617_7: “Nanu tumhākaṃ bahutarā rukkhāti vattabba”nti idaṃ sāmikesu attano bhaṇḍassa mahagghataṃ ajānitvā dentesu
tika-vin07t0:2617_8: taṃ ñatvā theyyacittena gaṇhato avahāro hotīti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:2618_0: Vihārena vihāro parivattetabboti savatthukena aññesaṃ bhūmiyaṃ katapāsādādinā,
tika-vin07t0:2619_0: “Kappiyamañcā sampaṭicchitabbā”ti iminā suvaṇṇādivicittaṃ akappiyamañcaṃ “saṅghassā”ti vuttepi sampaṭicchituṃ na vaṭṭatīti dasseti.
tika-vin07t0:2619_7: Mahagghaṃ kappiyaṃ vāti suvaṇṇādivicittaṃ kappiyavohārena dinnaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:2620_1: bhājetabbo”ti vuttattā vaṭṭakaṃsalohamayampi bhājanaṃ puggalikampi sampaṭicchitumpi pariharitumpi vaṭṭati
tika-vin07t0:2620_3: Taṃ upari “kaṃsalohavaṭṭalohabhājanavikati saṅghikaparibhogena vā gihivikaṭā vā vaṭṭatī”tiādikena mahāpaccarivacanena virujjhati.
tika-vin07t0:2620_4: Imassa hi “vaṭṭalohakaṃsalohānaṃ yena kenaci kato sīhaḷadīpe pādaggaṇhanako bhājetabbo”ti vuttassa mahāaṭṭhakathāvacanassa
tika-vin07t0:2620_6: Tasmā vaṭṭalohakaṃsalohamayaṃ yaṃ kiñci pādaggaṇhanakavārakampi upādāya abhājanīyameva.
tika-vin07t0:2620_7: Gihīhi diyyamānampi puggalassa sampaṭicchitumpi na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin07t0:2620_8: Pārihāriyaṃ na vaṭṭatīti pattādiparikkhāraṃ viya sayameva paṭisāmetvā paribhuñjituṃ na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin07t0:2620_9: Gihisantakaṃ viya ārāmikādayo ce sayameva gopetvā viniyogakāle ānetvā paṭinenti,
tika-vin07t0:2622_0: Anāmāsampīti suvaṇṇādimayampi sabbaṃ taṃ āmasitvāpi paribhuñjituṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin07t0:2624_0: “Ghaṭṭanaphalakaṃ ghaṭṭanamuggaro”ti idaṃ rajitacīvaraṃ ekasmiṃ maṭṭhe daṇḍamuggare veṭhetvā ekassa maṭṭhaphalakassa
tika-vin07t0:2624_1: upari ṭhapetvā upari aparena maṭṭhaphalakena nikujjitvā eko upari akkamitvā tiṭṭhati.
tika-vin07t0:2624_2: Dve janā upari phalakaṃ dvīsu koṭīsu gahetvā aparāparaṃ ākaḍḍhanavikaḍḍhanaṃ karonti,
tika-vin07t0:2624_4: Hatthe ṭhapāpetvā hatthena paharaṇaṃ pana niṭṭhitarajanassa cīvarassa allakāle kātabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:2624_5: Idaṃ pana phalakamuggarehi ghaṭṭanaṃ sukkhakāle thaddhabhāvavimocanatthanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:2625_0: Bhūmattharaṇaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭatīti akappiyacammaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:2625_2: “Paccattharaṇagatika”nti iminā mañcādīsu attharitabbaṃ mahācammaṃ eḷakacammaṃ nāmāti dasseti.
tika-vin07t0:2626_0: Chattamuṭṭhipaṇṇanti tālapaṇṇaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Pattakaṭāhanti pattapacanakaṭāhaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:2629_1: Pāḷiyaṃ piṇḍanikkhepanamattenātiādīsu khaṇḍaphullaṭṭhāne mattikāpiṇḍaṭṭhapanaṃ piṇḍanikkhepanaṃ nāma.
tika-vin07t0:2629_7: Ubbedhato pana anekabhūmakattā vaḍḍhakīhatthena vīsatihatthopi nānāsaṇṭhānavicittopi hoti.
tika-vin07t0:2630_1: Ekassa sabbesu vihāresu navakammaṃ detīti attho.
tika-vin07t0:2630_2: Sabbakālaṃ paṭibāhantīti navakammikā attano gāhitaṃ varaseyyaṃ sampattānaṃ yathāvuḍḍhaṃ akatvā utukālepi paṭibāhanti.
tika-vin07t0:2631_3: Evaṃ vissajjanampi thāvarena thāvaraparivattanaṭṭhāne eva pavisati,
tika-vin07t0:2631_5: Sace saddhivihārikānaṃ dātukāmo hotīti sace so saṅghassa bhaṇḍakaṭṭhapanaṭṭhānaṃ vā aññesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ vasanaṭṭhānaṃ vā dātuṃ na icchati,
tika-vin07t0:2631_7: tādisassa tuyhaṃ puggalikameva katvā jaggāti na sabbaṃ tassa dātabbanti adhippāyo.
tika-vin07t0:2631_9: Evañhītiādimhi vayānurūpaṃ tatiyabhāge vā upaḍḍhabhāge vā gahite taṃ bhāgaṃ dātuṃ labhatīti attho.
tika-vin07t0:2632_1: So sāmīti tassā bhūmiyā vihārakaraṇe sova sāmī,
tika-vin07t0:2632_2: taṃ paṭibāhitvā itarena na kātabbanti adhippāyo.
tika-vin07t0:2632_5: Cayaṃ vā pamukhaṃ vāti saṅghikasenāsanaṃ nissāya tato bahi cayaṃ bandhitvā,
tika-vin07t0:2635_2: evaṃ kattabbassa evaṃ nipphādetabbassa mañcapīṭhādino atthāya.
tika-vin07t0:2637_0: “Tatheva vaḷañjetuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti iminā nevāsikehi dhotapādādīhi vaḷañjanaṭṭhāne sañcicca adhotapādādīhi vaḷañjantasseva āpatti paññattāti dasseti.
tika-vin07t0:2638_0: “Dvārampī”tiādinā sāmaññato vuttattā dvāravātapānādayo aparikammakatāpi na apassayitabbā.
tika-vin07t0:2641_1: Uddesabhattaṃ nimantananti imaṃ vohāraṃ pattānīti ettha iti-
tika-vin07t0:2645_1: vuḍḍhatare niddāyante navakassa gāhitaṃ suggahitanti attho.
tika-vin07t0:2646_2: “Ekā kūṭaṭṭhitikā nāmā”ti vuttamevatthaṃ vibhāvetuṃ “rañño vā hī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:2647_0: Sabbaṃ pattassāmikassa hotīti cīvarādikampi sabbaṃ pattassāmikasseva hoti,
tika-vin07t0:2647_2: na cīvarādinti vatvā gahetuṃ na vaṭṭatīti attho.
tika-vin07t0:2649_0: Kiṃ āharīyatīti avatvāti “katarabhattaṃ vā tayā āharīyatī”ti dāyakaṃ apucchitvā.
tika-vin07t0:2652_0: Vicchinditvāti “bhattaṃ gaṇhathā”ti padaṃ avatvā. Tenevāha “bhattanti avadantenā”ti.
tika-vin07t0:2654_1: saṅghato aṭṭha bhikkhūti ettha ye mātikaṃ āruḷhā,
tika-vin07t0:2654_4: vā sayaṃ vā saṅghato uddisāpetvā gahetvā gantabbaṃ,
tika-vin07t0:2654_6: Mātikaṃ āropetvāti “saṅghato gaṇhāmī”tiādinā vuttamātikābhedaṃ dāyakassa viññāpetvāti attho.
tika-vin07t0:2655_0: Paṭibaddhakālato pana paṭṭhāyāti tattheva vāsassa nibaddhakālato paṭṭhāya.
tika-vin07t0:2658_2: Bahūni salākabhattānīti tiṃsaṃ vā cattārīsaṃ vā bhattāni.
tika-vin07t0:2659_1: Niggahena datvāti dūraṃ gantuṃ anicchantassa niggahena sampaṭicchāpetvā datvā.
tika-vin07t0:2659_2: Puna vihāraṃ āgantvāti ettha vihāraṃ anāgantvā bhattaṃ gahetvā pacchā vihāre attano pāpetvā bhuñjitumpi vaṭṭati.
tika-vin07t0:2660_1: Uddisitvāpīti asukakule salākabhattāni tuyhaṃ pāpuṇantīti vatvā.
tika-vin07t0:2661_1: Saṭṭhito vā paṇṇāsato vāti daṇḍakammatthāya udakaghaṭaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:2662_2: Ekasseva pāpuṇantīti divase divase ekekasseva pāpitānīti attho.
tika-vin07t0:2663_1: “Salākavasena gāhitattā pana na sāditabbā”ti idaṃ asāruppavasena vuttaṃ,
tika-vin07t0:2663_6: Laddhā vā aladdhā vā svepi gaṇheyyāsīti laddhepi appamattatāya vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:2664_1: Taṃ gahetvāti taṃ vāragāme salākaṃ attano gahetvā.
tika-vin07t0:2664_3: Devasikaṃ pāpetabbāti upacārasīmāya ṭhitassa yassa kassaci vassaggena pāpetabbā.
tika-vin07t0:2664_4: Evaṃ etesu agatesu āsannavihāre bhikkhūnaṃ bhuñjituṃ vaṭṭati itarathā saṅghikato.
tika-vin07t0:2665_0: Amhākaṃ gocaragāmevāti salākabhattadāyakānaṃ gāmaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:2665_1: Vihāre therassa pattasalākabhattanti vihāre ekekasseva ohīnattherassa sabbasalākānaṃ attano pāpanavasena pattasalākabhattaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:2668_0: “Sve pakkho”ti ajja pakkhikaṃ na gāhetabbanti aṭṭhamiyā bhuñjitabbaṃ sattamiyā bhuñjanatthāya na gāhetabbaṃ,
tika-vin07t0:2668_3: Sve lūkhanti ajja āvāhamaṅgalādikaraṇato atipaṇītabhojanaṃ karīyati,
tika-vin07t0:2669_0: Pakkhikabhattato uposathikassa bhedaṃ dassento āha “uposathaṅgāni samādiyitvā”tiādi.
tika-vin07t0:2670_0: Gamiko āgantukabhattampīti gāmantarato āgantvā avūpasantena gamikacittena vasitvā puna aññattha gacchantaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:2670_2: “Lesaṃ oḍḍetvā”ti vuttattā lesābhāve yāva gamanaparibandho vigacchati,
tika-vin07t0:2677_1: Saṅghabhedakakkhandhake pāḷiyaṃ anupiyaṃ nāmāti anupiyā nāma.
tika-vin07t0:2678_2: Migabhūtena cetasāti katthaci alaggatāya migassa viya jātena cittena.
tika-vin07t0:2679_3: yasmiṃ me pasanne bahulābhasakkāro uppajjeyyā”ti paṭhamaṃ uppannaparivitakkassa mandapariyuṭṭhānatāya devadattassa tasmiṃ khaṇe jhānaparihāni nāhosi,
tika-vin07t0:2679_6: Dve vā tīṇi vā māgadhakāni gāmakhettānīti ettha magadharaṭṭhe khuddakaṃ gāmakhettaṃ gāvutamattaṃ,
tika-vin07t0:2679_9: Tesu majjhimena gāmakhettena dve vā khuddakena tīṇi vā gāmakhettāni,
tika-vin07t0:2679_10: tassa sarīraṃ tigāvutappamāṇo attabhāvoti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-vin07t0:2680_6: parehi vā ayaṃ satthā sammānīyatīti attho.
tika-vin07t0:2681_1: Nāsāya pittaṃ bhindeyyunti acchapittaṃ vā macchapittaṃ vā nāsāpuṭe pakkhipeyyuṃ.
tika-vin07t0:2681_3: Tassā hi gahitagabbhāya vijāyitumasakkontiyā udaraṃ phāletvā potakaṃ nīharanti.
tika-vin07t0:2683_1: Mā kuñjara nāgamāsadoti he kuñjara buddhanāgaṃ vadhakacittena mā upagaccha.
tika-vin07t0:2683_7: Mā ca madoti mado tayā na kātabboti attho.
tika-vin07t0:2684_2: tato adhikehi ekato paṭiggahetvā bhuñjituṃ na vaṭṭanakaṃ gaṇabhojanapaṭipakkhaṃ bhojananti attho.
tika-vin07t0:2687_6: Tena sahitā anusāsanī eva dhammī kathā.
tika-vin07t0:2688_0: “Thullaccayaṃ desāpehī”ti idaṃ bhedapurekkhārassa uposathādikaraṇe thullaccayassa uposathakkhandhakādīsu paṭhamameva paññattattā vuttaṃ,
tika-vin07t0:2691_3: Pāpicchānaṃ yathāgatīti pāpicchānaṃ puggalānaṃ yādisī gati abhisamparāyo.
tika-vin07t0:2691_5: Imināpi kāraṇena jānāthāti devadattassa “paṇḍito”tiādinā upari vakkhamānākāraṃ dasseti.
tika-vin07t0:2693_3: Na padūseyya visamissaṃ kātuṃ na sakkotīti attho.
tika-vin07t0:2696_1: Na pana ettāvatā saṅgho bhinno hotīti salākaggāhāpanamattena saṅghabhedānibbattito vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:2696_2: Uposathādisaṅghakamme kate eva hi saṅgho bhinno hoti.
tika-vin07t0:2697_1: devadattena paṭhamaṃ ānantariyakammaṃ upacita”ntiādinā ānantariyattaṃ vadatā bhagavatā tassa abhabbatāsaṅkhātā pārājikatā na paññattā.
tika-vin07t0:2697_2: Etena āpatti viya abhabbatāpi paññattianantarameva hoti,
tika-vin07t0:2697_4: Idha pana ādikammikassapi anāpattiyā avuttattā devadattādayopi na muttāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:2698_1: na tato paranti ekassa satipaṭṭhānassa paṭikkhepova idha adhammo,
tika-vin07t0:2698_2: na pana tiṇṇaṃ satipaṭṭhānattavidhānaṃ tassa dhammattā.
tika-vin07t0:2698_4: Vaḍḍhanesu pana cha indriyānīti anindriyassapi ekassa indriyattavidhānameva adhammo.
tika-vin07t0:2698_8: terasāyatanānī”tiādinā yattha katthaci viparītato pakāsanaṃ sabbaṃ adhammo.
tika-vin07t0:2698_10: Pakāsananti cettha tathā tathā kāyavacīpayogasamuṭṭhāpikā arūpakkhandhāva adhippetā,
tika-vin07t0:2698_12: akusalakammapathādīsu sāvajjaṭṭhena sarūpato adhammesu ca tadaññesu ca abyākatesu yassa kassaci koṭṭhāsassa
tika-vin07t0:2698_13: bhagavatā paññattakkameneva pakāsanaṃ “dhammo”ti ca viparītato pakāsanaṃ “adhammo”ti ca dassitanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:2698_15: ayathābhūtato ca pakāsanavasena dhammādhammesu eva pavisanti,
tika-vin07t0:2698_16: vinayādināmena pana visesetvā visuṃ gahitattā tadavasesameva dhammādhammakoṭṭhāse pavisatīti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:2699_0: Imaṃ adhammaṃ dhammoti karissāmātiādi dhammañca adhammañca yāthāvato ñatvāva pāpicchaṃ nissāya viparītato pakāsentasseva saṅghabhedo hoti,
tika-vin07t0:2699_1: na pana tathāsaññāya pakāsentassāti dassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:2700_4: “Paññattaṃ apaññatta”nti dukaṃ “bhāsitaṃ abhāsita”nti dukena atthato samānameva,
tika-vin07t0:2701_1: Pāḷiyaṃ samaggānañca anuggahoti yathā samaggānaṃ sāmaggī na bhijjati,
tika-vin07t0:2702_1: Siyā nu khoti sambhaveyya nu kho.
tika-vin07t0:2702_2: Tasmiṃ adhammadiṭṭhīti attano “adhammaṃ dhammo”ti etasmiṃ dīpane ayuttadiṭṭhi.
tika-vin07t0:2702_3: Bhede adhammadiṭṭhīti “adhammaṃ dhammo”ti dīpetvā anussāvanasalākaggāhāpanādinā attānaṃ muñcitvā catuvaggādikaṃ
tika-vin07t0:2702_4: saṅghaṃ ekasīmāyameva ṭhitato catuvaggādisaṅghato viyojetvā ekakammādinipphādanavasena saṅghabhedakaraṇe
tika-vin07t0:2702_6: Vinidhāya diṭṭhinti yā tasmiṃ “adhammaṃ dhammo”ti dīpane attano adhammadiṭṭhi uppajjati,
tika-vin07t0:2702_7: taṃ vinidhāya paṭicchādetvā “dhammo evāya”nti viparītato pakāsetvāti attho.
tika-vin07t0:2703_0: Bhede dhammadiṭṭhīti yathāvuttanayena saṅghabhedane doso natthīti laddhiko.
tika-vin07t0:2703_1: Ayaṃ pana “adhammaṃ dhammo”ti dīpane adhammadiṭṭhiko hutvāpi taṃ diṭṭhiṃ vinidhāya karaṇena saṅghabhedako atekiccho jāto.
tika-vin07t0:2703_2: Evaṃ bhede vematikoti imassa pana bhede vematikadiṭṭhiyā vinidhānampi atthi.
tika-vin07t0:2703_4: Tasmiṃ dhammadiṭṭhibhede adhammadiṭṭhīti ayaṃ pana bhede adhammadiṭṭhiṃ vinidhāya katattā saṅghabhedako atekiccho jāto.
tika-vin07t0:2703_5: Sukkapakkhe pana sabbattha “adhammaṃ dhammo”tiādidīpane vā bhede vā dhammadiṭṭhitāya diṭṭhiṃ avinidhāyeva katattā saṅghabhedakopi satekiccho jāto.
tika-vin07t0:2703_6: Tasmā “adhammaṃ dhammo”tiādidīpane vā saṅghabhede vā ubhosupi vā adhammadiṭṭhi vā vematiko vā hutvā taṃ diṭṭhiṃ,
tika-vin07t0:2703_7: vimatiñca vinidhāya “dhammo”ti pakāsetvā vuttanayena saṅghabhedaṃ karontasseva ānantariyaṃ hotīti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:2708_2: Pāḷiyaṃ abhivādāpetabboti vandanatthāya vassaṃ pucchanena navako sayameva vandatīti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:2711_1: “Yathābhāga”nti ṭhapitaṭṭhānaṃ anatikkamitvā mañcapīṭhādiṃ papphoṭetvā pattharitvā upari paccattharaṇaṃ
tika-vin07t0:2711_2: datvā dānampi senāsanapaññāpanamevāti dassento āha “papphoṭetvā hi pattharituṃ pana vaṭṭatiyevā”ti.
tika-vin07t0:2714_2: Na mahātherassa bhāro hotīti anumodakaṃ āgametuṃ na bhāro.
tika-vin07t0:2714_3: Ajjhiṭṭhova āgametabboti attanā ajjhiṭṭhehi bhikkhūhi anumodanteyeva nisīditabbanti attho.
tika-vin07t0:2717_1: Manussānaṃ parivisanaṭṭhānanti yattha antovihārepi manussā saputtadārā āvasitvā bhikkhū netvā bhojenti.
tika-vin07t0:2717_2: Āsanesu satīti nisīdanaṭṭhānesu santesu. Idaṃ, bhante,
tika-vin07t0:2717_3: āsanaṃ uccanti āsanne samabhūmibhāge paññattaṃ therāsanena samakaṃ āsanaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ,
tika-vin07t0:2717_4: therāsanato pana uccatare āpucchitvāpi nisīdituṃ na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin07t0:2718_1: odano paṭiggahetabbo”ti idaṃ hatthatale vā pacchipiṭṭhiādidussaṇṭhitādhāre vā pattaṃ ṭhapetvā odanassa gahaṇakāle pattassa apatanatthāya vuttaṃ,
tika-vin07t0:2718_2: susajjite pana ādhāre pattaṃ ṭhapetvā ekena hatthena taṃ parāmasitvāpi odanaṃ paṭiggahetuṃ vaṭṭati eva.
tika-vin07t0:2719_3: bhojanantare pana pānīyapivanādinā nayena hatthaṃ dhovitvā puna bhuñjituṃ vaṭṭatīti dasseti.
tika-vin07t0:2719_4: Potthakesu pana “pānīyaṃ pivitvā hatthā na dhovitabbā”ti likhanti,
tika-vin07t0:2719_5: taṃ purimavacanena na sameti pariyosāne udakasseva “hatthadhovanaudaka”nti vuttattā.
tika-vin07t0:2719_7: bhantetiādi niṭṭhitabhattaṃ nisinnaṃ theraṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:2722_0: 366. Pāḷiyaṃ ṭhāpeti vāti tiṭṭha bhanteti vadanti.
tika-vin07t0:2723_4: disābhāganti etthāpi eseva nayo. Kenajja, bhante,
tika-vin07t0:2723_5: yuttanti kena nakkhattena cando yuttoti attho.
tika-vin07t0:2724_0: 369. Aṅgaṇeti abbhokāse. Evameva paṭipajjitabbanti uddesadānādi āpucchitabbanti dasseti.
tika-vin07t0:2730_3: bhagavā”ti pātimokkhuddesayācanaṃ anuposathe uposathakaraṇapaṭikkhepassa sikkhāpadassa apaññattattā therena katanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:2730_4: Kasmā pana bhagavā evaṃ tuṇhībhūtova tiyāmarattiṃ vītināmesīti?
tika-vin07t0:2730_5: Aparisuddhāya parisāya uposathādisaṃvāsakaraṇassa sāvajjataṃ bhikkhusaṅghe pākaṭaṃ kātuṃ,
tika-vin07t0:2730_6: tañca āyatiṃ bhikkhūnaṃ tathāpaṭipajjanatthaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ ñāpetuṃ.
tika-vin07t0:2730_7: Keci panettha “aparisuddhampi puggalaṃ tassa sammukhā ‘aparisuddho’ti vattuṃ mahākaruṇāya avisahanto bhagavā tathā nisīdī”ti kāraṇaṃ vadanti.
tika-vin07t0:2730_9: mahāmoggallānattherenāpi taṃ bāhāyaṃ gahetvā bahi nīharaṇassa akattabbatāpasaṅgato.
tika-vin07t0:2730_14: yaṃ tathāgato aparisuddhāya parisāya uposathaṃ kareyya,
tika-vin07t0:2730_17: sāpattikena pātimokkhaṃ sotabba”ntiādinā sāpattikaparisāya kattabbavidhi dassito.
tika-vin07t0:2731_0: Saṅkassarasamācāranti kiñcideva asāruppaṃ disvā “idaṃ iminā kataṃ bhavissatī”ti parehi saṅkāya saritabbasamācāraṃ,
tika-vin07t0:2731_1: attanā vā “mama anācāraṃ ete jānantī”ti saṅkāya saritabbasamācāraṃ.
tika-vin07t0:2731_3: saṅghikapaccayabhāgagahaṇādinā ca jīvikaṃ kappento “ahaṃ samaṇo”ti paṭiññaṃ adentopi atthato dento viya
tika-vin07t0:2732_1: Mahāsamudde abhiramantīti bahuso dassanapavisanādinā mahāsamudde abhiratiṃ vindanti.
tika-vin07t0:2732_2: Na āyatakeneva papātoti chinnataṭamahāsobbho viya na āditova ninnoti attho.
tika-vin07t0:2735_1: Udāharitabbanti pāḷiyā avatvā tamatthaṃ yāya kāyaci bhāsāya udāhaṭampi udāhaṭamevāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:2736_0: Pure vā pacchā vāti ñattiārambhato pubbe vā ñattiniṭṭhānato pacchā vā.
tika-vin07t0:2737_1: Katañca akatañca ubhayaṃ gahetvāti yassa katāpi atthi akatāpi.
tika-vin07t0:2741_1: Puna codetuṃ attanā ādātabbaṃ gahetabbaṃ adhikaraṇaṃ attādānanti āha “sāsanaṃ sodhetukāmo”tiādi.
tika-vin07t0:2741_3: Sopi hi dubbhikkhādikālo viya adhikaraṇavūpasamatthaṃ lajjiparisāya dūrato ānayanassa,
tika-vin07t0:2741_4: āgatānañca piṇḍāya caraṇādisamācārassa dukkarattā akālo eva.
tika-vin07t0:2742_2: saṃvattatīti ettha yathā abbhahimādiupakkilesavirahitānaṃ candimasūriyānaṃ sassirīkatā hoti,
tika-vin07t0:2742_3: evamassāpi codakassa pāpapuggalūpakkilesavigamena sassirīkatā hotīti adhippāyo.
tika-vin07t0:2744_0: 400-1. “Dosantaro”ti ettha antara-saddo cittapariyāyoti āha “na duṭṭhacitto hutvā”ti.
tika-vin07t0:2745_0: Kāruññaṃ nāma karuṇā evāti āha “kāruññatāti karuṇābhāvo”ti.
tika-vin07t0:2750_1: Bhikkhunikkhandhake “mātugāmassa pabbajitattā”ti idaṃ pañcavassasatato uddhaṃ saddhammassa appavattanakāraṇadassanaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:2750_2: Sukkhavipassakakhīṇāsavavasena vassasahassantiādi khandhakabhāṇakānaṃ mataṃ gahetvā vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:2750_10: taṃ sabbaṃ aññamaññaviruddhampi taṃtaṃbhāṇakānaṃ matena likhitasīhaḷaṭṭhakathāsu āgatanayameva gahetvā
tika-vin07t0:2750_11: ācariyena likhitaṃ īdise kathāvirodhe sāsanaparihāniyā abhāvato,
tika-vin07t0:2753_0: 404-8. Pāḷiyaṃ yadaggenāti yasmiṃ divase. Tadāti tasmiṃyeva divase. Vimānetvāti avamānaṃ katvā.
tika-vin07t0:2754_0: 410-1. Āpattigāminiyoti āpattiṃ āpannāyo. Kammavibhaṅgeti parivāre kammavibhaṅge.
tika-vin07t0:2755_1: Pāḷiyaṃ dve tisso bhikkhuniyoti dvīhi tīhi bhikkhunīhi.
tika-vin07t0:2758_2: Tayo nissayeti rukkhamūlasenāsanassa tāsaṃ alabbhanato vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:2759_1: Aṭṭheva bhikkhuniyo yathāvuḍḍhaṃ paṭibāhantīti aṭṭha bhikkhuniyo vuḍḍhapaṭipāṭiyāva gaṇhantiyo āgatapaṭipāṭiṃ paṭibāhanti,
tika-vin07t0:2759_3: Anuvādaṃ paṭṭhapentīti issariyaṃ pavattentīti atthaṃ vadanti.
tika-vin07t0:2760_0: 430. Bhikkhudūtenāti bhikkhunā dūtabhūtena. Sikkhamānadūtenāti sikkhamānāya dūtāya.
tika-vin07t0:2761_2: Navakammanti “navakammaṃ katvā vasatū”ti apaloketvā saṅghikabhūmiyā okāsadānaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:2767_2: amhākaṃ satthāraṃ jānāsī”ti idaṃ thero sayaṃ bhagavato parinibbutabhāvaṃ jānantopi attanā sahagatabhikkhuparisāya ñāpanatthameva,
tika-vin07t0:2767_3: subhaddassa vuḍḍhapabbajitassa sāsanassa paṭipakkhavacanaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ viññāpanatthañca evaṃ pucchi.
tika-vin07t0:2767_4: Subhaddo hi kusinārāyaṃ bhagavati abhippasannāya khattiyādigahaṭṭhaparisāya majjhe bhagavato parinibbānaṃ
tika-vin07t0:2767_5: sutvā haṭṭhapahaṭṭhopi bhayena pahaṭṭhākāraṃ vācāya pakāsetuṃ na sakkhissati,
tika-vin07t0:2767_6: idheva pana vijanapadese sutvā yathājjhāsayaṃ attano pāpaladdhiṃ pakāsessati,
tika-vin07t0:2767_7: tato tameva paccayaṃ dassetvā bhikkhū samussāhetvā dhammavinayasaṅgahaṃ kāretvā etassa pāpabhikkhussa,
tika-vin07t0:2767_9: sāsanaṭṭhitiñca karissāmīti jānantova taṃ pucchīti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:2768_2: samūhaneyyā”ti idaṃ bhagavā mayā “ākaṅkhamāno”ti vuttattā ekasikkhāpadampi samūhanitabbaṃ apassantā,
tika-vin07t0:2768_3: samūhane ca dosaṃ disvā dhammasaṅgahakā bhikkhū “apaññattaṃ na paññāpessāma,
tika-vin07t0:2768_4: paññattaṃ na samucchindissāmā”tiādinā puna “paññattisadisāya akuppāya kammavācāya sāvetvā samādāya vattissanti,
tika-vin07t0:2768_5: tato yāva sāsanantaradhānā appaṭibāhiyāni sikkhāpadāni bhavissantī”ti iminā adhippāyena avocāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:2770_2: tathāgato kappaṃ vā tiṭṭheyya kappāvasesaṃ vā”ti evaṃ thūlatare “tiṭṭhatu, bhagavā,
tika-vin07t0:2771_4: Taṃ na gacchantīti na kulavaṃ gamenti.
tika-vin07t0:2777_3: Upakkilesā vuttāti tesaṃ samaṇabrāhmaṇānaṃ ete surāpānādayo upakkilesāti vuttā.
tika-vin07t0:2778_2: Paṭikacceva gaccheyyanti yattha naṃ adhikaraṇaṃ vūpasamituṃ bhikkhū sannipatissanti,
tika-vin07t0:2780_2: Pācīnakāti puratthimadisāya jātattā vajjiputtake sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:2781_3: kasmā taṃ thero paṇāmesīti bhedavacanaṃ vadanti.
tika-vin07t0:2781_4: Garunissayaṃ gaṇhāmāti nissayamuttāpi mayaṃ ekaṃ sambhāvanīyagaruṃ nissayabhūtaṃ gahetvāva vasissāmāti adhippāyo.
tika-vin07t0:2782_3: Pathabyā saṅghattheroti loke sabbabhikkhūnaṃ tadā upasampadāya vuḍḍho.
tika-vin07t0:2783_2: Idañca “yo pana bhikkhu sannidhikārakaṃ khādanīyaṃ vā bhojanīyaṃ vā”ti sutte yāvakālikasseva parāmaṭṭhattā
tika-vin07t0:2783_3: siṅgīloṇassa yāvajīvikassa sannidhikatassa āmisena saddhiṃ paribhoge pācittiyaṃ vibhaṅganayeneva sijjhatīti vuttaṃ,
tika-vin07t0:2783_4: taṃ pana pācittiyaṃ vibhaṅge āgatabhāvaṃ sādhetuṃ “kathaṃ suttavibhaṅge”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:2783_6: na khādanīyaṃ bhojanīyanti loṇamissabhojane vajjiputtakā anavajjasaññino ahesuṃ.
tika-vin07t0:2783_7: Tathāsaññīnampi nesaṃ āpattidassanatthaṃ “sannidhikāre asannidhikārasaññī”ti idaṃ suttavibhaṅgaṃ uddhaṭanti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:2784_3: yāvajīvikaṃ paṭiggahita”nti avatvā “tadahupaṭiggahita”nti vacanasāmatthiyato purepaṭiggahitaṃ yāvajīvikaṃ
tika-vin07t0:2784_4: yāvakālikena saddhiṃ sambhinnarasaṃ kālepi na kappatīti sijjhati,
tika-vin07t0:2784_6: Dukkaṭenapi na bhavitabbanti yadi hi sannidhikārapaccayā dukkaṭaṃ maññatha,
tika-vin07t0:2784_7: yāvajīvikassa loṇassa sannidhidosābhāvā dukkaṭena na bhavitabbaṃ,
tika-vin07t0:2784_8: atha āmisena sambhinnarasassa tassa āmisagatikattā dukkaṭaṃ mā maññatha.
tika-vin07t0:2784_9: Tadā ca hi pācittiyeneva bhavitabbaṃ āmisattupagamanatoti adhippāyo.
tika-vin07t0:2784_10: Na hi ettha yāvajīvikantiādināpi dukkaṭābhāvaṃ samattheti.
tika-vin07t0:2785_0: Pāḷiyaṃ rājagahe suttavibhaṅgetiādīsu sabbattha sutte ca vibhaṅge cāti attho gahetabbo.
tika-vin07t0:2785_1: Tassa tassa vikālabhojanādino suttepi paṭikkhittattā vinayassa atisaraṇaṃ atikkamo vinayātisāro.
tika-vin07t0:2785_2: “Nisīdanaṃ nāma sadasaṃ vuccatīti āgata”nti idaṃ vibhaṅge ca āgatadassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:2785_3: Taṃ pamāṇaṃ karontassāti sugatavidatthiyā vidatthittayappamāṇaṃ karontassa,
tika-vin07t0:2794_2: anantaraṃ parivāroti yo vinayo saṅgahaṃ samāruḷho,
tika-vin07t0:2795_1: Ativisuddhena maṃsacakkhunāti rattindivaṃ samantā yojanappamāṇe atisukhumānipi rūpāni passanato ativiya parisuddhena pasādacakkhunā.
tika-vin07t0:2795_2: “Atthi tattha paññattī”tiādīsu atthi nu kho tattha paññattītiādinā attho gahetabboti āha “tattha paññatti…pe…
tika-vin07t0:2796_0: 2. Pucchāvissajjaneti pucchāya vissajjane. Vinītakathāti vinītavatthukathā, ayameva vā pāṭho.
tika-vin07t0:2797_1: Aṅgadvayavimuttassa samuṭṭhānassa abhāvepi tesu ekenaṅgena vinā ayaṃ āpatti na hotīti dassanatthameva “ekena samuṭṭhānenā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:2797_2: Idāni tesu dvīsu aṅgesu padhānaṅgaṃ dassetumāha “ettha hi cittaṃ aṅgaṃ hotī”tiādi.
tika-vin07t0:2797_3: Yasmā pana maggenamaggappaṭipattisaṅkhātāya kāyaviññattiyā sevanacitteneva sambhave sati ayaṃ taṃ aṅgadvayaṃ
tika-vin07t0:2797_4: upādāya bhagavatā paññattā āpattisammuti hoti, nāsati.
tika-vin07t0:2797_5: Tasmā taṃ cittaṃ kāyaviññattisaṅkhātassa kāyassa aṅgaṃ kāraṇaṃ hoti,
tika-vin07t0:2797_7: Tassa pana taṃsamuṭṭhitakāyo eva aṅgaṃ abyavahitakāraṇaṃ,
tika-vin07t0:2797_9: Evaṃ uparipi sabbattha cittaṅgayuttasamuṭṭhānesu adhippāyo veditabbo.
tika-vin07t0:2797_10: “Ekena samuṭṭhānena samuṭṭhātī”tiādiparivāravacaneneva āpattiyā akusalādiparamatthasabhāvatā pāḷiaṭṭhakathāsu pariyāyatova vuttā,
tika-vin07t0:2797_11: sammutisabhāvā eva āpattīti sijjhati samuṭṭhānasamuṭṭhitānaṃ bhedasiddhitoti gahetabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:2797_12: Imamatthaṃ sandhāyāti āpannāya pārājikāpattiyā kehicipi samathehi anāpattibhāvāpādanassa asakkuṇeyyattasaṅkhātamatthaṃ sandhāya.
tika-vin07t0:2798_1: Porāṇakehi mahātherehīti saṅgītittayato pacchā potthakasaṅgītikārakehi chaḷabhiññāpaasambhidādiguṇasamujjalehi mahātherehi.
tika-vin07t0:2799_2: Soḷasa vārā dassitāti yehi vārehi ādibhūtehi upalakkhitattā ayaṃ sakalopi parivāro soḷasaparivāroti voharīyati,
tika-vin07t0:2802_1: Pāḷiyaṃ nibbānañceva paññattīti ettha yasmā saṅkhatadhamme upādāya paññattā sammutisaccabhūtā puggalādipaññatti
tika-vin07t0:2802_4: kārakavedakādirūpena pana parikappitena attasabhāvena virahitattā “anattā”ti vattuṃ yuttā.
tika-vin07t0:2802_5: Tasmā ayaṃ paññattipi asaṅkhatattasāmaññato vatthubhūtena nibbānena saha “anattā iti nicchayā”ti vuttā.
tika-vin07t0:2802_6: Avijjamānāpi hi sammuti kenaci paccayena akatattā asaṅkhatā evāti.
tika-vin07t0:2803_6: Piṭake tīṇi desayīti yasmā aññepi mahāvīrā sammāsambuddhā saddhammaṃ desayanti,
tika-vin07t0:2803_7: tasmā aṅgīraso piṭakāni tīṇi desayīti yojanā.
tika-vin07t0:2803_9: Evaṃ nīyati saddhammoti yadi vinayapariyatti aparihīnā tiṭṭhati,
tika-vin07t0:2804_0: Vinayapariyatti pana kathaṃ tiṭṭhatīti āha “ubhato cā”tiādi.
tika-vin07t0:2804_3: Samuṭṭhānaṃ niyato katanti ekaccaṃ samuṭṭhānena niyataṃ kataṃ.
tika-vin07t0:2804_4: Tasmiṃ parivāre kiñci sikkhāpadaṃ niyatasamuṭṭhānaṃ aññehi asādhāraṇaṃ,
tika-vin07t0:2805_0: Sambhedaṃ nidānañcaññanti sambhedo sikkhāpadānaṃ aññamaññasamuṭṭhānena saṃkiṇṇatā,
tika-vin07t0:2805_4: upari vakkhamāne ca parivārasutte eva dissanti.
tika-vin07t0:2805_6: tasmā sakalasāsanādhārassa vinayassa ṭhitihetubhūtaṃ parivāraṃ sikkheti,
tika-vin07t0:2806_1: Ādimhi tāva purimanayeti sabbapaṭhame paññattivāre āgatanayaṃ sandhāya vadati,
tika-vin07t0:2806_2: tattha pana paññattivāre “paṭhamaṃ pārājikaṃ kattha paññattanti,
tika-vin07t0:2806_4: Paratoti āgatabhāvaṃ pana sandhāya parato āgate sutte dissatīti veditabbanti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:2807_1: Aniyatā paṭhamikāti āpattiṃ apekkhitvāva itthiliṅgaṃ kataṃ,
tika-vin07t0:2807_3: Pāḷiyaṃ nānubandhe pavattininti vuṭṭhāpitaṃ pavattiniṃ ananubandhanasikkhāpadaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:2808_1: Eḷakalomasikkhāpadavatthusmiṃ “bhikkhuniyo eḷakalomāni dhovantiyo rajantiyo vijaṭentiyo riñcanti uddesaṃ paripuccha”nti āgatattā imaṃ riñcanti-
tika-vin07t0:2808_2: padaṃ gahetvā sikkhāpadaṃ upalakkhitanti dassento “vibhaṅge ‘riñcanti uddesa’nti āgataṃ eḷakalomadhovāpanasikkhāpada”nti āha.
tika-vin07t0:2809_1: Ratanasikkhāpadanti ratanaṃ vā ratanasammataṃ vā paṭisāmanasikkhāpadaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:2811_0: 267. “Na desenti tathāgatā”ti etena chattapāṇissa dhammadesanāpaṭikkhepaṃ dasseti.
tika-vin07t0:2813_1: Samuṭṭhānañhi saṅkhepanti ettha saṅkhipanti saṅgayhanti sadisasamuṭṭhānāni etthāti saṅkhepo,
tika-vin07t0:2817_1: Kati āpattiyoti pārājikādīsu pañcasu āpattīsu methunādinnādānādiantogadhabhedaṃ apekkhitvā jātivasena ekattaṃ āropetvā pucchā katā.
tika-vin07t0:2817_2: Kati āpattikkhandhāti antogadhabhedaṃ apekkhitvā paccekaṃ rāsaṭṭhenāti ettakamevettha bhedo.
tika-vin07t0:2817_3: Vinītāniyeva vinītavatthūnīti āpattito viramaṇāni eva avippaṭisārapāmojjādidhammānaṃ kāraṇattā vatthūnīti vinītavatthūni,
tika-vin07t0:2817_5: Veraṃ maṇatīti verahetuttā “vera”nti laddhanāmaṃ rāgādiakusalapakkhaṃ vināseti.
tika-vin07t0:2818_0: Dhammassavanaggaṃ bhinditvā gacchatīti bahūsu ekato nisīditvā dhammaṃ suṇantesu taṃ dhammassavanasamāgamaṃ kopetvā uṭṭhāya gacchati.
tika-vin07t0:2819_5: Piyaṃ karotīti taṃ puggalaṃ pemaṭṭhānaṃ karoti,
tika-vin07t0:2821_0: Bhujissabhāvakaraṇatoti taṇhādāsabyato mocetvā samathavipassanāsu serivihāritākaraṇatoti attho.
tika-vin07t0:2824_3: Saṅghādisesādīnaṃ dukkaṭapariyosānānaṃ pañcannaṃ acittakānampi sambhavato “siyā”ti vuttaṃ,
tika-vin07t0:2824_5: Hīnukkaṭṭhehi jātiādīhi omasane eva dubbhāsitassa paññattattā sā ekantavācācittasamuṭṭhānā evāti.
tika-vin07t0:2825_0: Dutiyasamuṭṭhānanaye vācāya eva samāpajjitabbapāṭidesanīyassa abhāvā “na hī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:2826_0: Tatiye pana vosāsamānarūpaṃ bhikkhuniṃ kāyavācāhi anapasādanapaccayā pāṭidesanīyasambhavato “siyā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:2827_0: Omasane pācittiyassa adinnādānasamuṭṭhānattepi tappaccayā paññattassa dubbhāsitassa pañcameneva samuppattīti
tika-vin07t0:2827_1: dassetuṃ catutthavāre “dubbhāsitaṃ āpajjeyyāti na hīti vattabba”nti vatvā pañcamavāre “siyāti vattabba”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:2827_2: Kāyavikāreneva omasantassa panettha dubbhāsitabhāvepi kāyakīḷābhāvābhāvato dukkaṭamevāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:2828_0: Chaṭṭhavāre pana vijjamānopi kāyo dubbhāsitassa aṅgaṃ na hoti,
tika-vin07t0:2828_1: pañcamasamuṭṭhāne eva chaṭṭhampi pavisatīti dassetuṃ “na hī”ti paṭikkhittaṃ,
tika-vin07t0:2828_2: na pana tattha sabbathā dubbhāsitena anāpattīti dassetuṃ.
tika-vin07t0:2828_3: Na hi davakamyatāya kāyavācāhi omasantassa dubbhāsitāpatti na sambhavati.
tika-vin07t0:2828_5: taṃ chaṭṭhenapi samāpajjati eva dhammadesanāpatti viyāti gahetabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:2831_1: Dutiye pana kativāre paṭhamasamuṭṭhānena āpajjitabbānaṃ āpattīnaṃ lahudassanasukhatthaṃ kuṭikārādīni eva samuddhaṭāni,
tika-vin07t0:2831_7: Ubhayenāpi kevalaṃ kāyeneva dukkaṭādīnaṃ sambhavaṃ dasseti.
tika-vin07t0:2832_0: “Ekena samuṭṭhānena samuṭṭhahantī”ti idaṃ idha visesetvā dassitānaṃ kāyatova samuṭṭhitānaṃ vasena vuttaṃ,
tika-vin07t0:2832_1: avisesato pana tā āpattiyo itarasamuṭṭhānehipi yathārahaṃ samuṭṭhahanti eva.
tika-vin07t0:2833_0: “Tiṇavatthārakena cā”ti idaṃ saṅghādisesavajjitānaṃ catunnaṃ āpattīnaṃ vasena vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:2834_0: 279. Saṃvidahitvā kuṭiṃ karotīti vācāya saṃvidahati, sayañca kāyena karotīti attho.
tika-vin07t0:2837_1: Tatiyo pana gāthāvāro dutiyavārena vuttamevatthaṃ saṅgahetvā dassetuṃ vutto.
tika-vin07t0:2837_2: Tattha kāyova kāyikoti vattabbe vacanavipallāsena “kāyikā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:2838_1: tato vivittahetuttā ca nīvaraṇavivekañca nibbānañca dassanasīlena.
tika-vin07t0:2838_3: Idha panevaṃ añño pucchanto nāma natthi,
tika-vin07t0:2838_4: upālitthero sayameva atthaṃ pākaṭaṃ kātuṃ pucchāvisajjanañca akāsīti iminā nayena sabbattha attho veditabbo.
tika-vin07t0:2843_1: Ājīvavipattipaccayāti ettha āgamma jīvanti etenāti ājīvo,
tika-vin07t0:2846_2: Pañcāti ettha adhammikakatikādiṃ apaloketvā karontānaṃ animittanti attho.
tika-vin07t0:2846_4: adhippāyādinā ñattikammādiṃ karontānaṃ thullaccayādi ca saṅgayhatīti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:2846_6: “Natthaññā āpattiyo”ti idaṃ vipattiādibhāginiyo sāvajjāpattiyo sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:2850_1: Chaṭṭhe pariyāyavāre alobho pubbaṅgamotiādi sāsanaṭṭhitiyā aviparītato dhammavādissa vivādaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:2850_2: Aṭṭhārasa bhedakaravatthūni ṭhānānīti dhammādīsu adhammotiādinā gahetvā dīpanāni idheva bhedakaravatthūni,
tika-vin07t0:2850_12: sandiṭṭhiparāmāsitā ādhānaggāhīduppaṭinissajjitānīti imesaṃ channaṃ yugaḷānaṃ vasena cha dhammā ceva
tika-vin07t0:2850_13: lobhādayo cha hetū cāti dvādasa dhammā vivādādhikaraṇassa mūlāni.
tika-vin07t0:2851_0: 294. Cuddasa mūlānīti tāneva dvādasa kāyavācāhi saddhiṃ cuddasa anuvādādhikaraṇassa mūlāni.
tika-vin07t0:2852_1: Pathavīkhaṇanādīsu paṇṇattivajjesu kusalābyākatacittamūlikā āpatti hotīti dassetuṃ “alobho pubbaṅgamo”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:2852_2: Satta āpattikkhandhā ṭhānānītiādi sattannaṃ āpattikkhandhānaṃ paṭicchādanapaccayā āpattisambhavato vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:2852_4: “Cha hetū”ti idaṃ kusalānaṃ āpattihetuvohārassa ayuttatāya vuttaṃ,
tika-vin07t0:2853_3: Tā eva hi ekasīmāyaṃ sāmaggimupagatānaṃ kammappattānaṃ anumatiyā sāvanakiriyānipphattisaṅkhātassa saṅghagaṇakiccasabhāvassa
tika-vin07t0:2853_9: Kammañattikammavācāñattivasena hi duvidhāsu ñattīsu anussāvanāpi kammamūlakantveva saṅgayhanti.
tika-vin07t0:2854_5: Tattha “vatthuvasenā”ti idaṃ “satta samathā dasa samathā hontī”ti imassa kāraṇavacanaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:2854_6: “Pariyāyenā”ti idaṃ “dasa samathā satta samathā hontī”ti imassa kāraṇavacanaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:2857_0: 297. Sattame sādhāraṇavāre sādhāraṇāti vivādādhikaraṇassa vūpasamanakiccasādhāraṇā. Evaṃ sabbattha.
tika-vin07t0:2858_0: 298. Aṭṭhame tabbhāgiyavāre tabbhāgiyāti vivādādhikaraṇassa vūpasamanato tappakkhikā.
tika-vin07t0:2861_1: Navame samathāsamathasādhāraṇavāre “sabbe samathā ekatova adhikaraṇaṃ samenti udāhu nānā”ti pucchantena “samathā samathassa sādhāraṇā,
tika-vin07t0:2861_4: Sammukhāvinayaṃ vinā kassaci samathassa asambhavā sesā chapi samathā sammukhāvinayassa sādhāraṇā vuttā,
tika-vin07t0:2861_5: tesaṃ pana channaṃ aññamaññāpekkhābhāvato te aññamaññaṃ asādhāraṇā vuttā.
tika-vin07t0:2865_0: Tattha sammukhāvinayo siyā kusalotiādīsu tasmiṃ tasmiṃ vinayakamme,
tika-vin07t0:2865_1: vivādādimhi ca niyuttapuggalānaṃ samuppajjanakakusalādīnaṃ vasena sammukhāvinayādīnaṃ,
tika-vin07t0:2865_2: vivādādīnañca kusalādibhāvo tena tena upacārena vutto.
tika-vin07t0:2865_3: Yasmā panetassa sammukhāvinayo nāma saṅghasammukhatādayo honti,
tika-vin07t0:2865_4: tesañca anavajjasabhāvattā akusale vijjamānepi akusalattūpacāro na yutto āpattādhikaraṇassa akusalattūpacāro viya,
tika-vin07t0:2866_2: tattha sammukhāvinayo labbhatītiādi sammukhāvinayassa itarehi samathehi niyamena saṃsaṭṭhataṃ,
tika-vin07t0:2866_3: itaresaṃ pana channaṃ aññamaññaṃ saṃsaggābhāvañca dassetuṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:2869_1: Adhikaraṇanti vā samathāti vā ime dhammā saṃsaṭṭhātiādi samathānaṃ adhikaraṇesu eva yathārahaṃ pavattiṃ,
tika-vin07t0:2869_2: adhikaraṇāni vinā tesaṃ visuṃ aṭṭhānañca dassetuṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:2869_3: Vinibbhujitvā nānākaraṇaṃ paññāpetunti adhikaraṇato samathehi viyojetvā asaṃsaṭṭhe katvā nānākaraṇaṃ
tika-vin07t0:2869_4: aññamaññaṃ asaṃsaṭṭhatāya ṭhitabhāvasaṅkhātaṃ nānattaṃ paññāpetuṃ adhikaraṇavūpasamakkhaṇe eva tesaṃ
tika-vin07t0:2870_1: So mā hevanti yo evaṃ vadati,
tika-vin07t0:2870_3: na ca labbhati samathānaṃ aññatra adhikaraṇā vūpasamalakkhaṇanti pahānāvatthānasaṅkhātaṃ nānākaraṇaṃ paṭikkhipati.
tika-vin07t0:2870_4: Lakkhaṇato pana adhikaraṇehi samathānaṃ nānākaraṇaṃ atthevāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:2870_5: Samathā adhikaraṇehi sammantīti apalokanādīhi catūhi kiccādhikaraṇehi sabbepi samathā niṭṭhānaṃ gacchanti,
tika-vin07t0:2871_2: Tadanantaro sammatinasammativāro ca adhikaraṇehi samathānaṃ saṃsaṭṭhataṃ,
tika-vin07t0:2871_4: Samathā samathehi sammantītiādiko samathādhikaraṇavāro samathānaṃ aññamaññaṃ,
tika-vin07t0:2872_1: Samuṭṭhāpetivāro pana adhikaraṇehi adhikaraṇānaṃ uppattippakāradassanatthaṃ vutto.
tika-vin07t0:2872_2: Na katamaṃ adhikaraṇanti attano sambhavamattena ekampi adhikaraṇaṃ na samuṭṭhāpetīti attho.
tika-vin07t0:2872_4: Tattha jāyantīti anantarameva anuppajjitvā paramparapaccayā jāyantīti adhippāyo.
tika-vin07t0:2872_5: “Dhammo adhammo”tiādinā ubhinnaṃ puggalānaṃ vivādapaccayā aññamaññakhemabhaṅgā honti,
tika-vin07t0:2872_6: tappaccayā tesaṃ pakkhaṃ pariyesanena kalahaṃ vaḍḍhantānaṃ vivādo kañci mahāparisaṃ saṅghapariṇāyakaṃ lajjiṃ āgamma vūpasamaṃ gacchati.
tika-vin07t0:2872_7: Tathā avūpasamante pana vivādo kamena vaḍḍhitvā sakalepi saṅghe vivādaṃ samuṭṭhāpeti,
tika-vin07t0:2872_8: tato anuvādādīnīti evaṃ paramparakkamena vūpasamakāraṇābhāve cattāri adhikaraṇāni jāyanti.
tika-vin07t0:2875_1: Tadanantaravāre pana vivādādhikaraṇaṃ catunnaṃ adhikaraṇānantiādi adhikaraṇānaṃ vuttanayena aññamaññapaccayattepi saṃsaggabhāvadassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:2875_2: Vivādādhikaraṇaṃ catunnaṃ adhikaraṇānaṃ vivādādhikaraṇaṃ bhajatītiādīsu vivādādhikaraṇaṃ catūsu adhikaraṇesu vivādādhikaraṇabhāvameva bhajati,
tika-vin07t0:2875_4: catūsu adhikaraṇesu vivādādhikaraṇattameva nissitaṃ vivādādhikaraṇameva pariyāpannaṃ vivādādhikaraṇabhāveneva saṅgahitanti evamattho gahetabbo.
tika-vin07t0:2876_1: Vivādādhikaraṇaṃ sattannaṃ samathānaṃ kati samathe bhajatītiādi pana catunnaṃ adhikaraṇānaṃ vūpasamane sati niyatasamathe dassetuṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:2876_2: Tattha kati samathe bhajatīti attano upasamatthāya kittake samathe upagacchati,
tika-vin07t0:2876_3: kittake samathe āgamma vūpasamaṃ gacchatīti attho.
tika-vin07t0:2876_4: Kati samathapariyāpannanti attānaṃ vūpasametuṃ katisu samathesu tehi samānavasena paviṭṭhaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:2876_5: Katihi samathehi saṅgahitanti vūpasamaṃ karontehi katihi samathehi vūpasamakaraṇatthaṃ saṅgahitaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:2880_5: Nidānena ca niddesena ca saddhinti ettha paññattiṭṭhānapuggalādippakāsakaṃ nidānavacanaṃ nidānaṃ nāma,
tika-vin07t0:2880_7: tehi avayavabhūtehi sahitaṃ taṃsamudāyabhūtaṃ khandhakaṃ pucchāmīti attho.
tika-vin07t0:2880_8: Uttamāni padānīti āpattipaññāpakāni vacanāni adhippetāni. Tesaṃ…pe…
tika-vin07t0:2880_9: kati āpattiyo hontīti tehi vacanehi paññattā kati āpattikkhandhā hontīti attho.
tika-vin07t0:2880_12: kasmā pana “samukkaṭṭhapadānaṃ kati āpattiyo”ti sāmivasena niddeso katoti āha “yena yena hi padenā”tiādi.
tika-vin07t0:2884_1: Ekuttarikanaye pana ajānantena vītikkantāti paṇṇattiṃ vā vatthuṃ vā ajānantena vītikkantā pathavīkhaṇanasahaseyyādikā,
tika-vin07t0:2884_2: sāpi pacchā āpannabhāvaṃ ñatvā paṭikammaṃ akarontassa antarāyikāva hoti.
tika-vin07t0:2885_0: Pārivāsikādīhi pacchā āpannāti vattabhedesu dukkaṭāni sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:2885_1: Tasmiṃ khaṇe āpajjitabbaantarāpattiyo sandhāyāti keci vadanti,
tika-vin07t0:2885_4: Mūlavisuddhiyā antarāpattīti mūlāyapaṭikassanādīni akatvā sabbapaṭhamaṃ dinnaparivāsamānattavisuddhiyā
tika-vin07t0:2885_6: Agghavisuddhiyāti antarāpattiṃ āpannassa mūlāya paṭikassitvā odhānasamodhānavasena odhunitvā purimāpattiyā
tika-vin07t0:2885_7: samodhāya tadagghavasena puna dinnaparivāsādisuddhiyā caraṇakāle puna āpannā antarāpatti.
tika-vin07t0:2886_1: evaṃ desitāpi āpatti na vuṭṭhātīti adhippāyo.
tika-vin07t0:2886_2: Dhuranikkhepaṃ akatvā āpajjane sikhāppattadosaṃ dassento āha “aṭṭhame vatthusmiṃ bhikkhuniyā pārājikamevā”ti.
tika-vin07t0:2886_4: bhikkhūnampi dhuranikkhepaṃ akatvā thokaṃ thokaṃ sappiādikaṃ theyyāya gaṇhantānaṃ pādagghanake puṇṇe pārājikameva.
tika-vin07t0:2886_5: Keci pana “aṭṭhame vatthusmiṃ bhikkhuniyā pārājikameva hotīti vuttattā aṭṭhavatthukamevetaṃ sandhāya vutta”nti vadanti.
tika-vin07t0:2887_0: Dhammikassa paṭissavassāti “idha vassaṃ vasissāmī”tiādinā gihīnaṃ sammukhā katassa dhammikassa paṭissavassa,
tika-vin07t0:2887_1: adhammikassa pana “asukaṃ paharissāmī”tiādikassa paṭissavassa asaccāpanena āpatti natthi.
tika-vin07t0:2888_2: akuppe ca aṭṭhatvā paṭicchādentopi adhammacuditako eva.
tika-vin07t0:2892_5: patto dātabbo”tiādi vacanato anādariyena āmisasaṅgahaṃ akarontassa dukkaṭaṃ,
tika-vin07t0:2893_4: Ovādaṃ agaṇhantoti bhikkhūhi bhikkhuniovādatthāya vuttaṃ vacanaṃ agaṇhanto bālagilānagamiyavivajjito.
tika-vin07t0:2893_6: saṅghāṭiṃ apārupitvā santaruttarena gāmappavesanādīsu ca āpattiyopi aparibhogena āpajjitabbāpattiyova.
tika-vin07t0:2893_10: Vinaye āgatā atthā venayikāti āha “dve atthā vinayasiddhā”ti.
tika-vin07t0:2894_0: Pāḷiyaṃ appatto nissāraṇanti ettha pabbājanīyakammaṃ vihārato nissāraṇattā nissāraṇanti adhippetaṃ,
tika-vin07t0:2894_1: tañca yasmā kuladūsakaṃ akaronto puggalo āpattibahulopi āveṇikalakkhaṇena appatto nāma hoti,
tika-vin07t0:2894_3: Yasmā pana āpattādibahulassāpi “ākaṅkhamāno saṅgho pabbājanīyakammaṃ kareyyā”ti vuttaṃ,
tika-vin07t0:2894_5: sabbathā pana suddho nirāpattiko dunnissāritoti daṭṭhabbo.
tika-vin07t0:2895_0: Appatto osāraṇantiādīsu upasampadākammaṃ ettha osāraṇaṃ adhippetaṃ,
tika-vin07t0:2895_1: tañca hatthacchinnādiko ekacco paṭikkhittattā appattopi sosārito,
tika-vin07t0:2898_4: Sesā rattiñceva divā cāti ettha aruṇuggamane āpajjitabbā paṭhamakathinādī sabbā āpattiyopi rattindivānaṃ
tika-vin07t0:2898_6: Atha vā uddhaste aruṇe āpajjitabbattā divā āpajjitabbesu eva paviṭṭhāti daṭṭhabbā,
tika-vin07t0:2898_8: pana rattandhakāre purisena saddhiṃ santiṭṭhanāpatti ca rattiyaññeva āpajjitabbā.
tika-vin07t0:2899_0: Purebhattaṃ kulāni upasaṅkamanaanatirittabhojanādīni divā eva āpajjitabbāni.
tika-vin07t0:2899_2: gaṇabhojanādīni ca divā eva āpajjitabbānī”ti vadanti.
tika-vin07t0:2899_3: Tasmā īdisā āpattiyo muñcitvā sesāva tatiyakoṭṭhāsaṃ bhajantīti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:2900_0: Na ūnadasavassoti dasavassassa bālasseva paññattasikkhāpadattā vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:2900_3: vuṭṭhāpiniṃ dve vassāni ananubandhādimpi ūnadasavassā āpajjanti.
tika-vin07t0:2901_0: Appavārentoti anādariyena appavārento kenaci paccayena appavāretvā kāḷapakkhacātuddase saṅghe pavārente
tika-vin07t0:2901_1: tattha anādariyena appavārento tameva āpattiṃ kāḷepi āpajjatīti juṇhe evāti niyamo na dissati,
tika-vin07t0:2901_2: pacchimavassaṃvuttho pana pacchimakattikapuṇṇamiyameva pavāretuṃ labbhatīti tattha appavāraṇāpaccayā
tika-vin07t0:2901_3: āpattiṃ āpajjamāno eva juṇhe āpajjatīti niyametabboti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:2902_0: “Apaccuddharitvā hemante āpajjatī”ti iminā “vassānaṃ cātumāsaṃ adhiṭṭhātu”nti niyamavacaneneva apaccuddharantassa dukkaṭanti dasseti.
tika-vin07t0:2902_8: Alajjissa santike nissayaggahaṇādipi puggalassa santike eva āpajjati.
tika-vin07t0:2903_0: Tīṇi adhammikāni amūḷhavinayassa dānānīti yo ummattakopi vītikkamakāle,
tika-vin07t0:2903_1: anummatto sañcicceva āpattiṃ āpajjitvā bhikkhūhi pacchā codito saramāno eva “na sarāmī”ti vadati,
tika-vin07t0:2903_2: yo ca “supinaṃ viya sarāmī”ti vā musā vadati,
tika-vin07t0:2903_3: yo ca ummattakakāle kataṃ sabbampi sabbesaṃ vaṭṭatīti vadati,
tika-vin07t0:2903_4: imesaṃ tiṇṇaṃ dinnāni tīṇi amūḷhavinayassa dānāni adhammikāni.
tika-vin07t0:2904_2: “Diṭṭhiñca anissajjantānaṃyeva kammaṃ kātabba”nti idaṃ bhikkhūhi ovadiyamānassa diṭṭhiyā anissajjanapaccayā dukkaṭaṃ,
tika-vin07t0:2905_2: Bījaniggāhādiketi cittaṃ bījaniṃ gāhetvā anumodanādikaraṇeti attho.
tika-vin07t0:2908_2: Avāpuraṇaṃ dātunti gabbhaṃ vivaritvā anto parikkhāraṭṭhapanatthāya vivaraṇakuñcikaṃ dātuṃ.
tika-vin07t0:2908_3: Saṅghatthāya upanītaṃ sayameva anto paṭisāmitumpi vaṭṭati.
tika-vin07t0:2909_0: Ādikammikesu paṭhamaṃ purisaliṅgaṃ uppajjatīti āha “paṭhamaṃ uppannavasenā”ti.
tika-vin07t0:2909_1: Pāḷiyaṃ anāpatti vassacchedassāti vassacchedasambandhiniyā anāpattiyā evamattho.
tika-vin07t0:2909_5: aṭṭhannaṃ bhikkhunīnaṃ yathāvuḍḍhaṃ avasesānaṃ yathākatika”nti vacanato ādito aṭṭhannaṃ bhikkhunīnaṃ paccuṭṭhātabbattā vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:2910_0: “Idha na kappantīti vadantopi paccantimesu āpajjatī”tiādinā sañcicca kappiyaṃ akappiyanti vā akappiyaṃ
tika-vin07t0:2910_1: kappiyanti vā kathentassa sabbattha dukkaṭanti dasseti.
tika-vin07t0:2914_1: Pañcakesu āpucchitvā cārassa abhāvoti piṇḍapātikassa “nimantito sabhatto”ti imassa aṅgassa abhāvā tena
tika-vin07t0:2914_3: Susānaṃ netvā puna ānītakanti susāne petakiccaṃ katvā nikkhantehi nhatvā chaḍḍitāni nivatthapārutavatthāni evaṃ vuccanti.
tika-vin07t0:2915_3: Pañhāsahassaṃ pucchīti samathavipassanākammaṭṭhānesu pañhāsahassaṃ sammajjitvā ṭhitaṃ daharaṃ pucchi.
tika-vin07t0:2915_4: Itaropi daharo attano gatamaggattā sabbaṃ vissajjesi,
tika-vin07t0:2915_7: Kiṃ tvaṃ āvusotiādikaṃ thero khīṇāsavo sammajjanānisaṃsaṃ sabbesaṃ pākaṭaṃ kātuṃ avocāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:2917_0: Ettakaṃ gayhūpaganti ettakaṃ adhikaraṇavūpasamatthāya gahetabbavacananti yathā sutvā viññātuṃ sakkoti,
tika-vin07t0:2917_2: Ettha ca “attano bhāsapariyantaṃ anuggahetvā parassa bhāsapariyantaṃ anuggahetvā”ti ekaṃ,
tika-vin07t0:2917_4: “appaṭiññāyā”ti ekañca katvā purimehi dvīhi pañcaṅgāni veditabbāni.
tika-vin07t0:2917_6: Kathānusandhivinicchayānulomasandhivasena vatthuṃ na jānātīti codakena vā cuditakena vā vuttakathānusandhinā
tika-vin07t0:2917_7: tesaṃ vacanapaṭivacanānurūpena vadanto kathānusandhinā vatthuṃ na jānāti nāma,
tika-vin07t0:2917_8: tañca suttavibhaṅge vinītavatthusaṅkhātena vinicchayānulomeneva vadanto vinicchayānulomasandhivasena vatthuṃ na jānāti nāma.
tika-vin07t0:2917_9: Ñattikammaṃ nāma hotīti ñattikammaṃ niṭṭhitaṃ nāma hotīti na jānātīti sambandho.
tika-vin07t0:2917_10: Ñattiyā kammappattoti ñattiyā niṭṭhitāyapi kammappatto eva hoti.
tika-vin07t0:2917_11: Anussāvanaṭṭhāne eva kammaṃ niṭṭhitaṃ hotīti ñattikammaṃ niṭṭhitaṃ nāma hoti,
tika-vin07t0:2917_12: taṃ ñattiyā kāraṇaṃ na jānātīti attho.
tika-vin07t0:2918_0: Pāḷiyaṃ pañca visuddhiyoti āpattito visuddhihetuttā, visuddhehi kattabbato ca pātimokkhuddesā vuttā.
tika-vin07t0:2921_1: Chakkādīsu pāḷiyaṃ cha agāravāti buddhadhammasaṅghasikkhāsu, appamāde,
tika-vin07t0:2921_3: tesu eva ca cha gāravā veditabbā.
tika-vin07t0:2921_4: “Chabbassaparamatā dhāretabba”nti idaṃ vibhaṅge āgatassa paramassa dassanaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:2922_1: Pāḷiyaṃ āgatehi sattahīti “pubbevassa hoti musā bhaṇissa”ntiādinā musāvādasikkhāpade āgatehi sattahi.
tika-vin07t0:2923_1: Taṃ kutettha labbhāti taṃ anatthassa acaraṇaṃ ettha etasmiṃ puggale,
tika-vin07t0:2923_2: lokasannivāse vā kuto kena kāraṇena sakkā laddhunti āghātaṃ paṭivineti.
tika-vin07t0:2924_9: Hoti ca na hoti ca tathāgato parammaraṇā,
tika-vin07t0:2924_10: neva hoti na na hoti tathāgato parammaraṇā”ti evaṃ āgatā dasa antaggāhikā diṭṭhiyo sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:2924_11: Micchādiṭṭhiādayoti micchādiṭṭhimicchāsaṅkappādayo aṭṭhamicchāñāṇamicchāvimuttīhi saddhiṃ dasa micchattā.
tika-vin07t0:2925_2: taṃsampayuttaṃ pana ñāṇaṃ vā paccavekkhaṇañāṇaṃ vā sammāñāṇanti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:2928_1: Uposathādipucchāsu pavāraṇagāthāti diṭṭhādīhi tīhi ṭhānehi pavāraṇāvācā eva.
tika-vin07t0:2928_2: Evaṃ vuttānaṃ pana chandovicitilakkhaṇena vuttajātibhedā gāthā.
tika-vin07t0:2934_0: 335. Aḍḍhuḍḍhasatānīti paññāsādhikāni tīṇi satāni. Viggahapadena manussaviggahaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:2935_3: Bhikkhunīsu ca akkosoti “yā pana bhikkhunī bhikkhuṃ akkoseyyā”ti vuttaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:2936_1: Antaravāsakanāmena aññātikāya bhikkhuniyā hatthato cīvarapaṭiggahaṇaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:2937_0: Cīvaraṃ datvāti samaggena saṅghena cīvaraṃ datvā khiyyanaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:2937_3: Tatthevāti vassaṃvutthāya cārikaṃ apakkamitvā tattheva nivāsanaṃ paṭicca paññattasikkhāpadaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:2939_3: Chapaññāsasatanti vesāliyādīsu paññattāni dvattiṃsasikkhāpadāni ṭhapetvā sesā chapaññāsasataṃ.
tika-vin07t0:2940_0: Dasa gārayhāti vosāsaappaṭisaṃ viditasikkhāpadadvayañca ṭhapetvā sesāni dasa pāṭidesanīyāni.
tika-vin07t0:2940_1: Dve sattati sekhiyāni surusurukārakasāmisenahatthenapānīyathālakapaṭiggahaṇasasitthakapattadhovanāni tīṇi ṭhapetvā sesāni sekhiyāni.
tika-vin07t0:2943_5: Ovādoti ovādāya vā saṃvāsāya vā agamanaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:2944_1: “Ye ca yāvatatiyakā”ti pañhassa “ime kho yāvatatiyakā”ti vissajjanaṃ vatvā tadanantaraṃ “sādhāraṇaṃ asādhāraṇa”ntiādipañhānaṃ
tika-vin07t0:2944_2: vissajjane vattabbe yasmā taṃ avatvā “kati chedanakānī”tiādike aṭṭha pañhe antarā vissajjetvā tesaṃ anantarā
tika-vin07t0:2944_6: tasmā taṃ ukkamavissajjanakāraṇaṃ dassetuṃ “yasmā pana ye ca yāvatatiyakāti ayaṃ pañho”tiādimāha.
tika-vin07t0:2945_4: Vassikā āraññakena cāti vassikasāṭikā pariyesanaaraññakesu senāsanesu viharaṇasikkhāpadena saha.
tika-vin07t0:2946_4: Nisīdane ca yā sikkhāti pamāṇātikkantanisīdanakārāpane yaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:2946_5: Tathā vassikā yā ca sāṭikāti etthāpi.
tika-vin07t0:2947_0: Pāḷiyaṃ sataṃ sattati chaccevime honti ubhinnaṃ asādhāraṇāti bhikkhūnaṃ bhikkhunīhi asādhāraṇā chacattārīsa,
tika-vin07t0:2947_1: bhikkhunīnaṃ bhikkhūhi asādhāraṇā tiṃsādhikaṃ satañcāti evaṃ ubhinnaṃ asādhāraṇā ca chasattatiadhikaṃ sataṃ sikkhāpadānīti attho.
tika-vin07t0:2947_2: Sataṃ sattati cattārīti ubhinnaṃ sādhāraṇasikkhānaṃ gaṇanā catusattatiadhikaṃ sataṃ sikkhāpadānīti attho.
tika-vin07t0:2948_0: Vibhattiyoti āpattikkhandhā ceva uposathapavāraṇādayo ca adhippetā.
tika-vin07t0:2951_1: Idanti “pārājikanti yaṃ vutta”ntiādinā vuttaṃ vacanaṃ sandhāya vadati.
tika-vin07t0:2951_2: Idañhi heṭṭhā “garuka lahuka”ntiādinā uddhaṭapañhesu anāgatampi “sabbānipetāni viyākarohi,
tika-vin07t0:2951_3: handa vākyaṃ suṇoma te”ti ettha yathāvuttāni aññānipi “sabbānipetāni viyākarohi,
tika-vin07t0:2951_4: handa vākyaṃ suṇomā”ti evaṃ gahitamevāti dassento “iminā pana āyācanavacanena saṅgahitassā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:2952_2: Dhammānanti yathā catupaccaye dhārayatīti dhammo, tesaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:2952_5: te te atthā gāthāhi saṅgahetvā gaṇīyanti kathīyanti etthāti hi gāthāsaṅgaṇikaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:2957_1: “Alaṃ āvuso”ti attapaccatthike saññāpetvāti pattacīvarādiatthāya alaṃ bhaṇḍanādikaraṇanti vivādādīsu
tika-vin07t0:2958_0: Visamāni kāyakammādīni nissito bhikkhu visamanissito nāma,
tika-vin07t0:2958_2: balavante purise nissito balavanissito nāmāti dassento “eko visamānī”tiādimāha.
tika-vin07t0:2961_2: attano ca āpattiṃ paṭicchādentānaṃ vajjapaṭicchādīnaṃ pārājikādiāpattimeva sandhāya vuttaṃ,
tika-vin07t0:2961_4: Kiccaṃ nissāya uppajjanakakiccānanti ukkhepanīyādikammaṃ nissāya uppajjanakānaṃ tadanuvattikāya bhikkhuniyā yāvatatiyānussāvanānaṃ kiccānaṃ vasena,
tika-vin07t0:2962_1: Pāḷiyaṃ “katihi adhikaraṇehī”ti pucchāya “ekena adhikaraṇena kiccādhikaraṇenā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:2963_1: Vivādādhikaraṇaṃ hoti anuvādādhikaraṇantiādīsu vivādādhikaraṇameva anuvādādhikaraṇādipi hotīti pucchāya vivādādhikaraṇaṃ vivādādhikaraṇameva hoti,
tika-vin07t0:2966_1: Adhikaraṇapucchāvissajjane pāḷiyaṃ vipaccayatāya vohāroti virūpavipākāya aññamaññaṃ dukkhuppādanāya kāyavacīvohāro.
tika-vin07t0:2967_0: Anusampavaṅkatāti vipatticodanāya anu anu saṃyujjanavasena ninnatā.
tika-vin07t0:2968_2: Kammasaṅgahābhāvenāti saṅghasammukhatādimattassa sammukhāvinayassa saṅghādīhi kattabbakiccesu saṅgahābhāvā.
tika-vin07t0:2973_3: Upālitthero sayameva pucchitvā vissajjanaṃ akāsītipi vadanti.
tika-vin07t0:2974_3: Pāṭekkaṃ vinicchayasanniṭṭhāpanatthanti tesaṃ paccekaṃ adhippāyaṃ ñatvā tehi samuṭṭhāpitanayampi gahetvā vinicchayapariyosāpanatthanti adhippāyo.
tika-vin07t0:2975_0: “Mā kho turito abhaṇī”tiādinā abhimukhe ṭhitaṃ kañci anuvijjakaṃ ovadantena viya therena anuvijjakavattaṃ kathitaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:2976_1: taṃ pana yasmā sabbasikkhāpadavītikkamavisayepi taṃtaṃsikkhāpadānulomena kattabbaṃ,
tika-vin07t0:2976_3: Attano gatiṃ nāsetīti attano sugatigamanaṃ vināseti.
tika-vin07t0:2978_0: Pāḷiyaṃ sañcicca āpattintiādi alajjilajjilakkhaṇaṃ bhikkhubhikkhunīnaṃ vasena vuttaṃ tesaññeva sabbappakārato sikkhāpadādhikārattā.
tika-vin07t0:2978_1: Sāmaṇerādīnampi sādhāraṇavasena pana sañcicca yathāsakaṃ sikkhāpadavītikkamanādikaṃ alajjilajjilakkhaṇaṃ veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:2979_0: Kathānusandhivacananti cuditakaanuvijjakānaṃ kathāya anusandhiyuttaṃ vacanaṃ na jānāti,
tika-vin07t0:2979_1: tehi ekasmiṃ kāraṇe vutte sayaṃ taṃ asallakkhetvā attano abhirucitameva asambandhitatthanti attho.
tika-vin07t0:2983_1: Pāḷiyaṃ yaṃ kho tvantiādīsu tvaṃ, āvuso,
tika-vin07t0:2984_1: Asuddhaparisaṅkitoti asuddhāya aṭṭhāne uppannāya parisaṅkāya parisaṅkito.
tika-vin07t0:2985_1: Pāḷiyaṃ uposatho sāmaggatthāyāti visuddhānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ aññoññanirapekkho ahutvā uposatho uposathaṭṭhānaṃ
tika-vin07t0:2985_4: parisuddho ahaṃ āvuso”tiādinā aññamaññaṃ parisuddhivīmaṃsanārocanavasena ayutte vivajjetvā yutteheva kāyacittasāmaggīkaraṇatthāya.
tika-vin07t0:2986_0: Visuddhāya pavāraṇāti diṭṭhasutādīhi aññamaññaṃ kathāpetvā visuddhisampādanatthāyāti attho.
tika-vin07t0:2990_3: Sāsanapaccatthikāti attano anācārānuguṇaṃ buddhavacanaṃ pakāsento taṇhāgatikā,
tika-vin07t0:2990_6: So saṅgāmāvacaroti so codako saṅgāmāvacaro nāma.
tika-vin07t0:2990_13: Ṭhānanisajjavattādinissitāti saṅghamajjhādīsu garucittīkāraṃ paccupaṭṭhapetvā ṭhānādikkamanissitā ceva cuddasamahāvattādivattanissitā ca, ādi-
tika-vin07t0:2990_15: Pañhe uppanneti kenaci uppanne pañhe pucchite.
tika-vin07t0:2990_17: yaṃ kiñci upaṭṭhitaṃ dhammaṃ bhāsassūti adhippāyo.
tika-vin07t0:2991_2: Sannipātamaṇḍaleti attano anuvijjamānappakāraṃ saṅghassa ñāpanatthaṃ uṭṭhāya saṅghasannipātamajjhe ito
tika-vin07t0:2991_3: cito ca paresaṃ mukhaṃ olokentena na caritabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:2991_4: Yathānisinneneva dhammavinayānuguṇaṃ vinicchayaṃ yathā sabbe suṇanti,
tika-vin07t0:2992_5: Tenāha “karuṇā ca karuṇāpubbabhāgo ca upaṭṭhāpetabboti ayaṃ padadvayepi adhippāyo”ti.
tika-vin07t0:2993_2: taṃ kathāpetvā teneva kamena anuyuñjāpetvāti attho.
tika-vin07t0:2993_4: “Dhammesu ca puggalesu cā”ti idaṃ “majjhattena bhavitabba”nti pakatena sambandhitabbanti āha “dhammesu ca puggalesu ca…pe…
tika-vin07t0:2993_7: taṃ tattha atikkamanto majjhatto nāma na hoti,
tika-vin07t0:2993_10: Tasmā imaṃ vidhiṃ anatikkantova tesu majjhattoti veditabbo.
tika-vin07t0:2994_1: Saṃsandanatthanti āpatti vā anāpatti vāti saṃsaye jāte saṃsanditvā nicchayakaraṇatthaṃ vuttanti adhippāyo.
tika-vin07t0:2994_2: Atthadassanāyāti sādhetabbassa āpattādiupameyyatthassa codakacuditake attano paṭiññāya eva sarūpavibhāvanatthaṃ.
tika-vin07t0:2994_3: Attho jānāpanatthāyāti evaṃ vibhāvito attho codakacuditakasaṅghānaṃ ñāpanatthāya nijjhāpanatthāya,
tika-vin07t0:2994_5: Puggalassa ṭhapanatthāyāti codakacuditake attano paṭiññāya eva āpattiyaṃ,
tika-vin07t0:2994_8: Savacanīyakaraṇatthāyāti dose sāritepi sampaṭicchitvā paṭikammaṃ akarontassa savacanīyakaraṇatthāya.
tika-vin07t0:2994_10: Tattha avisaṃvādakaṭṭhāne ṭhitā eva na apasādetabbā,
tika-vin07t0:2995_1: Parinibbānañhi nāma khīṇāsavānaṃ sabbapacchimā cuticittakammajarūpasaṅkhātā khandhā,
tika-vin07t0:2995_2: te ca sabbākārato samucchinnānusayatāya punabbhavāya anantarādipaccayā na honti aññehi ca taṇhādipaccayehi virahitattā.
tika-vin07t0:2995_10: Yathāvuttāya vinayasaṃvarādikāraṇaparamparāya vimuttiyā eva padhānattā sā puna cittassa vimokkhoti uddhaṭoti āha “arahattaphalasaṅkhāto vimokkho”ti.
tika-vin07t0:2995_11: Atha vā yo yaṃ kiñci dhammaṃ anupādiyitvā parinibbānavasena cittassa cittasantatiyā,
tika-vin07t0:2995_12: tappaṭibaddhakammajarūpasantatiyā ca vimokkho vimuccanaṃ apunappavattivasena vigamo,
tika-vin07t0:2995_13: etadatthāya etassa vigamassatthāya evāti evaṃ nigamanavasenapettha attho veditabbo.
tika-vin07t0:2996_4: Tenevātiādīsu teneva katākatassa ajānaneva pubbāparaṃ ajānanassa,
tika-vin07t0:2996_7: Attano sadisāyāti yathāvuttehi dosehi yuttatāya attanā sadisāya.
